questions: The lawyer was not _____ that the accused person was telling the truth.
full_sentence: The lawyer was not convinced that the accused person was telling the truth.

questions: He joined another company immediately _____ resigning from our enterprise.
full_sentence: He joined another company immediately upon resigning from our enterprise.

questions: The capital is _____ city in the country.
full_sentence: The capital is the largest city in the country.

questions: The shrine in the forest is over two hundred _____.
full_sentence: The shrine in the forest is over two hundred years old.

questions: Life in the modern times is very _____ from that of the previous times.
full_sentence: Life in the modern times is very different from that of the previous times.

questions: Do not call my mobile number _____ it is an emergency.
full_sentence: Do not call my mobile number unless it is an emergency.

questions: This device _____ not be left unattended.
full_sentence: This device should not be left unattended.

questions: The minister's French is so good that he sounds almost _____ a native speaker.
full_sentence: The minister's French is so good that he sounds almost like a native speaker.

questions: It was _____ long seminar that the employees missed their flight.
full_sentence: It was such a long seminar that the employees missed their flight.

questions: When traveling overseas, there are many places worth _____.
full_sentence: When traveling overseas, there are many places worth seeing.

questions: Nothing seems to _____ to the new manager.
full_sentence: Nothing seems to matter to the new manager.

questions: _____ with similar equipment, this one provides better quality at a reduced price.
full_sentence: Compared with similar equipment, this one provides better quality at a reduced price.

questions: People say that if you want a task _____ right, you have to do it yourself.
full_sentence: People say that if you want a task done right, you have to do it yourself.

questions: According to the agreement, _____ deposits must be directly sent to the bank.
full_sentence: According to the agreement, all deposits must be directly sent to the bank.

questions: Jenny enjoys shopping, skiing and _____.
full_sentence: Jenny enjoys shopping, skiing and skating.

questions: In order to comprehend _____ a corporate client needs, you must listen to his viewpoints.
full_sentence: In order to comprehend what a corporate client needs, you must listen to his viewpoints.

questions: It is _____ said that nobody wins an argument.
full_sentence: It is often said that nobody wins an argument.

questions: They had three sons, but waited until their _____ son married, before moving to the suburbs.
full_sentence: They had three sons, but waited until their youngest son married, before moving to the suburbs.

questions: This is the best time to plan for future growth and _____.
full_sentence: This is the best time to plan for future growth and development.

questions: Effective resource management _____ the key to economic stability.
full_sentence: Effective resource management is the key to economic stability.

questions: Considering the economic issues of the country, borrowing money at fixed rates is more _____.
full_sentence: Considering the economic issues of the country, borrowing money at fixed rates is more desirable.

questions: Our mission is to find the financial opportunities that best _____ your budget.
full_sentence: Our mission is to find the financial opportunities that best suit your budget.

questions: _____ you are like a normal person, you require eight hour's sleep every day.
full_sentence: If you are like a normal person, you require eight hour's sleep every day.

questions: The tax _____ has benefited lower-income families.
full_sentence: The tax reform has benefited lower-income families.

questions: The company's goal is to increase production by 50 percent _____ the next two years.
full_sentence: The company's goal is to increase production by 50 percent over the next two years.

questions: The directors voted to have the old offices _____.
full_sentence: The directors voted to have the old offices remodeled.

questions: _____ having recruited additional supervisors, the quality continued to worsen.
full_sentence: In spite of having recruited additional supervisors, the quality continued to worsen.

questions: The IT department was asked when the new computers _____.
full_sentence: The IT department was asked when the new computers would arrive.

questions: The man _____ shirt had been torn was very upset.
full_sentence: The man whose shirt had been torn was very upset.

questions: _____ cottage in the village was known to everybody.
full_sentence: The small green cottage in the village was known to everybody.

questions: The soccer team always performs a _____ warm-up exercise before starting the game.
full_sentence: The soccer team always performs a few warm-up exercise before starting the game.

questions: With the arrival of the new financial controller, hopes for the company's growth have _____ greatly.
full_sentence: With the arrival of the new financial controller, hopes for the company's growth have risen greatly.

questions: Some people _____ the most important element in any business is excellent customer service.
full_sentence: Some people say the most important element in any business is excellent customer service.

questions: _____ his calls come from foreign countries.
full_sentence: Most of his calls come from foreign countries.

questions: The increasing cost of advertising _____ the corporate profitability.
full_sentence: The increasing cost of advertising lowers the corporate profitability.

questions: Ten years ago, few people experienced the _____ technological development that has occurred.
full_sentence: Ten years ago, few people experienced the dramatic technological development that has occurred.

questions: In spite of experiencing many challenges, the company made _____ overall showing.
full_sentence: In spite of experiencing many challenges, the company made a good overall showing.

questions: The production assistant's _____ will keep him out for at least another three days.
full_sentence: The production assistant's illness will keep him out for at least another three days.

questions: After a foreign trip, one always has _____ foreign coins in one's pocket.
full_sentence: After a foreign trip, one always has a few foreign coins in one's pocket.

questions: Public transportation is _____ for the people living in the town.
full_sentence: Public transportation is necessary for the people living in the town.

questions: The news reporter stated that the _____ has improved immensely in the past few years.
full_sentence: The news reporter stated that the economy has improved immensely in the past few years.

questions: She would not talk in that manner if she _____ not the owner's daughter.
full_sentence: She would not talk in that manner if she was not the owner's daughter.

questions: In this industry, a person must keep a _____ of humor.
full_sentence: In this industry, a person must keep a sense of humor.

questions: There are not _____ people who dislike chocolates.
full_sentence: There are not many people who dislike chocolates.

questions: The Prime Minister will come, but says his family will not come with _____.
full_sentence: The Prime Minister will come, but says his family will not come with him.

questions: They introduced the new system _____ his second year with the company.
full_sentence: They introduced the new system during his second year with the company.

questions: The passengers were advised to _____ a long delay.
full_sentence: The passengers were advised to expect a long delay.

questions: Children are taught to have respect _____ elderly people.
full_sentence: Children are taught to have respect for elderly people.

questions: In contemporary society, more women hold jobs in management _____ before.
full_sentence: In contemporary society, more women hold jobs in management than ever before.

questions: The dancers exhibited complete _____.
full_sentence: The dancers exhibited complete confidence.

questions: Many people _____ depend on newspapers for much of their information.
full_sentence: Many people still depend on newspapers for much of their information.

questions: To _____ the repair job on time, the engineer asked the carpenters and electricians to do overtime yesterday.
full_sentence: To finish the repair job on time, the engineer asked the carpenters and electricians to do overtime yesterday.

questions: The union leader plans to _____ his remarks on work safety problems to the management during the meeting this afternoon.
full_sentence: The union leader plans to address his remarks on work safety problems to the management during the meeting this afternoon.

questions: _____ to secure your export products, we recommend that you have them insured before shipment.
full_sentence: In order to secure your export products, we recommend that you have them insured before shipment.

questions: The consultant was impressed that the draftsmen worked efficiently even without the _____ of a design director.
full_sentence: The consultant was impressed that the draftsmen worked efficiently even without the supervision of a design director.

questions: Jerry Cunningham will _____ the names of researchers and production assistants who will join Ms. Marina Fletcher at the Paris Film Festival.
full_sentence: Jerry Cunningham will announce the names of researchers and production assistants who will join Ms. Marina Fletcher at the Paris Film Festival.

questions: With all the negative reviews about the novel, it seems that the author's message was _____ by literary critics.
full_sentence: With all the negative reviews about the novel, it seems that the author's message was misinterpreted by literary critics.

questions: The painting's monetary worth in the arts market _____ when it was discovered that it was one of the earliest works done by the renowned artist Van Gogh.
full_sentence: The painting's monetary worth in the arts market doubled when it was discovered that it was one of the earliest works done by the renowned artist Van Gogh.

questions: Ellen's probationary status was extended by _____ month after it was discovered that she had no actual experience in accounting procedures.
full_sentence: Ellen's probationary status was extended by another month after it was discovered that she had no actual experience in accounting procedures.

questions: If you would like to cancel or make any changes to your order, please include your order number on the subject line in all _____ to customer service.
full_sentence: If you would like to cancel or make any changes to your order, please include your order number on the subject line in all correspondence to customer service.

questions: _____ last minute finishing touches in decorating the venue, preparations for the community ball to be held in the afternoon are complete.
full_sentence: But for last minute finishing touches in decorating the venue, preparations for the community ball to be held in the afternoon are complete.

questions: Clients interested in holding social or business gatherings at the Mayfair Hotel may inquire about the availability of function rooms at _____ reception area or on the hotel's website.
full_sentence: Clients interested in holding social or business gatherings at the Mayfair Hotel may inquire about the availability of function rooms at our reception area or on the hotel's website.

questions: The most recent economic crisis resulted in the near collapse of Smart Savings Bank, a highly _____ financial institution in Asia and Europe.
full_sentence: The most recent economic crisis resulted in the near collapse of Smart Savings Bank, a highly recognized financial institution in Asia and Europe.

questions: The national economy has been _____ for nearly two years because of the impact of global recession.
full_sentence: The national economy has been stagnant for nearly two years because of the impact of global recession.

questions: Garbage, _____ biodegradable or non-biodegradable, should be thrown into designated trash cans within the park.
full_sentence: Garbage, whether biodegradable or non-biodegradable, should be thrown into designated trash cans within the park.

questions: At the general assembly, the manager thanked the employees for giving their full _____ to the company.
full_sentence: At the general assembly, the manager thanked the employees for giving their full commitment to the company.

questions: Mr. Forester is confident that _____ can convince the Japanese investors to do further business with our company.
full_sentence: Mr. Forester is confident that you can convince the Japanese investors to do further business with our company.

questions: Customers cannot claim their cash remittance _____ presenting valid identification, such as a driver's license and passport.
full_sentence: Customers cannot claim their cash remittance without presenting valid identification, such as a driver's license and passport.

questions: Due to the economic crisis, many companies all over the world are _____ to reduce operating costs next year.
full_sentence: Due to the economic crisis, many companies all over the world are expected to reduce operating costs next year.

questions: Low sales recorded by Blued Clothing last year was primarily due to its _____ popularity in the market.
full_sentence: Low sales recorded by Blued Clothing last year was primarily due to its declining popularity in the market.

questions: Climate in different parts of the world has become _____ unpredictable because of global warming.
full_sentence: Climate in different parts of the world has become increasingly unpredictable because of global warming.

questions: Overtime requests must be _____ by employees' immediate supervisors and the personnel department.
full_sentence: Overtime requests must be approved by employees' immediate supervisors and the personnel department.

questions: If you would like to _____ another venue for the party, please contact the events coordinator on her mobile phone.
full_sentence: If you would like to suggest another venue for the party, please contact the events coordinator on her mobile phone.

questions: ExD Enterprise Incorporated is the leading local _____ of imported contact lenses in the country.
full_sentence: ExD Enterprise Incorporated is the leading local distributor of imported contact lenses in the country.

questions: The food packaging process is _____ checked by a team of well-trained quality control staff.
full_sentence: The food packaging process is carefully checked by a team of well-trained quality control staff.

questions: Pedestrians are advised to be _____ and look both ways before crossing the street.
full_sentence: Pedestrians are advised to be cautious and look both ways before crossing the street.

questions: To purchase the items using your credit card, please _____ your credit card number and card expiration date in the boxes below.
full_sentence: To purchase the items using your credit card, please enter your credit card number and card expiration date in the boxes below.

questions: During the meeting, the head editor asked writers to attend a grammar workshop because their language errors had become increasingly _____.
full_sentence: During the meeting, the head editor asked writers to attend a grammar workshop because their language errors had become increasingly repetitive.

questions: Organizers from local government have planned a whole day event at the Waterford Park near City Hall to honor the city's _____ Brendan O'Connell.
full_sentence: Organizers from local government have planned a whole day event at the Waterford Park near City Hall to honor the city's founder Brendan O'Connell.

questions: The construction crew has _____ completed renovating the hospital ward, after which new machines for the pediatric center will be brought in.
full_sentence: The construction crew has almost completed renovating the hospital ward, after which new machines for the pediatric center will be brought in.

questions: The demand for handheld devices such as tablets and cell phones _____ South Asia has not been as intense as in East Asia, but it is steadily rising.
full_sentence: The demand for handheld devices such as tablets and cell phones across South Asia has not been as intense as in East Asia, but it is steadily rising.

questions: Automobile factories in areas _____ affected by heavy rains postponed operations last week.
full_sentence: Automobile factories in areas severely affected by heavy rains postponed operations last week.

questions: Once you have completed the customer data form, please write your _____ on the back page of the document.
full_sentence: Once you have completed the customer data form, please write your signature on the back page of the document.

questions: These agricultural _____ are intended to provide adequate funds and technical support for farmers in the rural areas.
full_sentence: These agricultural reforms are intended to provide adequate funds and technical support for farmers in the rural areas.

questions: The letter states that _____ delegates will be accommodated at nearby hotels and provided meals at the expense of the convention organizer.
full_sentence: The letter states that invited delegates will be accommodated at nearby hotels and provided meals at the expense of the convention organizer.

questions: If the participants have _____ suggestions, please request them to include their insights on the evaluation form that will be distributed at the end of the workshop.
full_sentence: If the participants have further suggestions, please request them to include their insights on the evaluation form that will be distributed at the end of the workshop.

questions: During trainings with probationary employees, the instructors break the ice by _____ a session with interesting stories about the computer industry.
full_sentence: During trainings with probationary employees, the instructors break the ice by preceding a session with interesting stories about the computer industry.

questions: According to the advertisement, Iron Gym and Sports Center _____ free tennis lessons to new members.
full_sentence: According to the advertisement, Iron Gym and Sports Center is offering free tennis lessons to new members.

questions: One of the waiters _____ about to close the restaurant when a customer arrived to inquire about catering services.
full_sentence: One of the waiters was about to close the restaurant when a customer arrived to inquire about catering services.

questions: Our function rooms and conference halls are _____ and adequately equipped with multimedia systems.
full_sentence: Our function rooms and conference halls are spacious and adequately equipped with multimedia systems.

questions: Rooms for the Asian cruise were _____ booked because of the special discount offered to corporate groups.
full_sentence: Rooms for the Asian cruise were totally booked because of the special discount offered to corporate groups.

questions: All items deposited at the baggage counter should be claimed _____ the department store closes.
full_sentence: All items deposited at the baggage counter should be claimed before the department store closes.

questions: The brand manager recommended changing the scent of their perfume due to _____ feedback from consumers.
full_sentence: The brand manager recommended changing the scent of their perfume due to unfavorable feedback from consumers.

questions: Wheeler Corporation will _____ a temporary information and support website for customers whose vehicles were recalled due to a defective brake system.
full_sentence: Wheeler Corporation will set up a temporary information and support website for customers whose vehicles were recalled due to a defective brake system.

questions: Sales agents who work in assigned territories to distribute the company's products are able to earn a _____ income even though they are on commission basis.
full_sentence: Sales agents who work in assigned territories to distribute the company's products are able to earn a sizable income even though they are on commission basis.

questions: Revenues for this quarter were expected to be about the same as in the previous period, but the accounting manager reported that it was _____ much higher.
full_sentence: Revenues for this quarter were expected to be about the same as in the previous period, but the accounting manager reported that it was actually much higher.

questions: The theme park's _____ is to restrict boarding participation on rides that may be dangerous to those who have medical issues.
full_sentence: The theme park's policy is to restrict boarding participation on rides that may be dangerous to those who have medical issues.

questions: Ms. Tan considered hiring a real property broker to help her choose the _____ office space for her company.
full_sentence: Ms. Tan considered hiring a real property broker to help her choose the appropriate office space for her company.

questions: According to the company handbook, salary _____ may be given in cases where an unexpected event or emergency situation imposes a financial burden on an employee.
full_sentence: According to the company handbook, salary advances may be given in cases where an unexpected event or emergency situation imposes a financial burden on an employee.

questions: During the press conference, the spokesperson did not comment _____ the measures the government would take with regard to the recent spate of bank failures.
full_sentence: During the press conference, the spokesperson did not comment on the measures the government would take with regard to the recent spate of bank failures.

questions: Armelle's, a newly-opened restaurant on Saturn Drive, offers _____ and tasty meals to office workers who prefer not to eat at company cafeterias.
full_sentence: Armelle's, a newly-opened restaurant on Saturn Drive, offers affordable and tasty meals to office workers who prefer not to eat at company cafeterias.

questions: Maintenance workers are tasked to inspect apartment units _____ for plumbing and electrical problems and to make needed repairs.
full_sentence: Maintenance workers are tasked to inspect apartment units periodically for plumbing and electrical problems and to make needed repairs.

questions: Although the information campaign is scheduled to begin tomorrow, an employee has _____ to print the flyers to be handed out at distribution points.
full_sentence: Although the information campaign is scheduled to begin tomorrow, an employee has yet to print the flyers to be handed out at distribution points.

questions: The establishment of a branch in Thailand is expected to _____ the company's position in south Asia and increase its presence in the international market.
full_sentence: The establishment of a branch in Thailand is expected to solidify the company's position in south Asia and increase its presence in the international market.

questions: The Bristol Museum's _____ is to educate visitors on the art genres and their numerous categories as well as to increase appreciation of the arts.
full_sentence: The Bristol Museum's objective is to educate visitors on the art genres and their numerous categories as well as to increase appreciation of the arts.

questions: A colleague will be visiting to participate in a seminar, and I am wondering if the university can accommodate him in any way _____ from May 15 to 17.
full_sentence: A colleague will be visiting to participate in a seminar, and I am wondering if the university can accommodate him in any way possible from May 15 to 17.

questions: The CEO _____ to maximize the company's growth potential by studying the investment opportunities available and selecting the most promising.
full_sentence: The CEO aims to maximize the company's growth potential by studying the investment opportunities available and selecting the most promising.

questions: _____ the keynote speaker was giving a talk on the effects of technology on society, attendees were recording his speech and preparing their questions.
full_sentence: As the keynote speaker was giving a talk on the effects of technology on society, attendees were recording his speech and preparing their questions.

questions: _____ the exam will take four hours to finish, applicants are advised to have lunch before proceeding to the head office.
full_sentence: Because the exam will take four hours to finish, applicants are advised to have lunch before proceeding to the head office.

questions: To accommodate more customers during weekends, the manager of Black Coffee Shop recommended _____ the outlet at 3 A.M. on Saturdays and Sundays.
full_sentence: To accommodate more customers during weekends, the manager of Black Coffee Shop recommended closing the outlet at 3 A.M. on Saturdays and Sundays.

questions: Beat Asia is set to conduct a survey to _____ the public's perception on global warming.
full_sentence: Beat Asia is set to conduct a survey to determine the public's perception on global warming.

questions: Thousands of visitors come to the park every Friday to watch the free concert, but _____ simply want to sit in a quiet place and watch people walking by.
full_sentence: Thousands of visitors come to the park every Friday to watch the free concert, but some simply want to sit in a quiet place and watch people walking by.

questions: The memo stated that the human resources director has personal matters to attend to and will _____ be on extended leave for the remainder of the year.
full_sentence: The memo stated that the human resources director has personal matters to attend to and will therefore be on extended leave for the remainder of the year.

questions: At the close of the press conference, the president left immediately, _____ to give further comment on the company's decision to declare bankruptcy.
full_sentence: At the close of the press conference, the president left immediately, refusing to give further comment on the company's decision to declare bankruptcy.

questions: As an employee on provisional status, Naomi has shown an exceptional ability to solve problems by _____.
full_sentence: As an employee on provisional status, Naomi has shown an exceptional ability to solve problems by herself.

questions: Bank officials consider it neither necessary _____ advisable to confirm all information submitted by an applicant when conducting a credit investigation.
full_sentence: Bank officials consider it neither necessary nor advisable to confirm all information submitted by an applicant when conducting a credit investigation.

questions: Mr. Cruz's rashes _____ by the time he went to the hospital to see a dermatologist.
full_sentence: Mr. Cruz's rashes had disappeared by the time he went to the hospital to see a dermatologist.

questions: Due to the _____ conditions during the political rally, the mayor asked the police force to be extra vigilant.
full_sentence: Due to the crowded conditions during the political rally, the mayor asked the police force to be extra vigilant.

questions: Hoping _____ the talk show and boost its ratings, producers met with the writers to discuss a change in the program's format.
full_sentence: Hoping to revamp the talk show and boost its ratings, producers met with the writers to discuss a change in the program's format.

questions: Under the existing agreement, both municipalities have promised that they _____ continuing trade and economic ties.
full_sentence: Under the existing agreement, both municipalities have promised that they will maintain continuing trade and economic ties.

questions: Diamond Motor Company is considering _____ 30 assembly workers in order to increase production by 50 percent during the upcoming fiscal year.
full_sentence: Diamond Motor Company is considering hiring 30 assembly workers in order to increase production by 50 percent during the upcoming fiscal year.

questions: All customers who purchase a travel package to any destination in Asia this month have the _____ of canceling at least two weeks before the travel date.
full_sentence: All customers who purchase a travel package to any destination in Asia this month have the option of canceling at least two weeks before the travel date.

questions: The conference room is large enough to hold 200 persons, and this will make it necessary for participants to speak _____ so that they can be heard.
full_sentence: The conference room is large enough to hold 200 persons, and this will make it necessary for participants to speak loudly so that they can be heard.

questions: The product satisfaction survey will target respondents in the southern region _____ because the item was first introduced in that locale.
full_sentence: The product satisfaction survey will target respondents in the southern region exclusively because the item was first introduced in that locale.

questions: _____ unexpected demand for the company's kitchen floor tiles, recent orders for the merchandise will have to be placed on backlog.
full_sentence: Due to unexpected demand for the company's kitchen floor tiles, recent orders for the merchandise will have to be placed on backlog.

questions: Because of unanticipated delays in the printing phase of the book, the release of the novel has been _____ and will be reset for the first week of August.
full_sentence: Because of unanticipated delays in the printing phase of the book, the release of the novel has been postponed and will be reset for the first week of August.

questions: The television crew paid homage to Mr. We Lafang, the network's founding chairman, _____ his grand retirement banquet.
full_sentence: The television crew paid homage to Mr. We Lafang, the network's founding chairman, during his grand retirement banquet.

questions: Defective merchandise may _____ with a new product of the same model within seven days of the date of purchase.
full_sentence: Defective merchandise may be replaced with a new product of the same model within seven days of the date of purchase.

questions: Plans for the new headquarters were drafted in _____ with the regulations and guidelines stipulated in the city's building code.
full_sentence: Plans for the new headquarters were drafted in accordance with the regulations and guidelines stipulated in the city's building code.

questions: For tourists interested in the local dining experience, El Cuervo Bar and Restaurant, which _____ on Alberto Avenue, offers excellent Spanish food.
full_sentence: For tourists interested in the local dining experience, El Cuervo Bar and Restaurant, which is located on Alberto Avenue, offers excellent Spanish food.

questions: The chief executive officer is looking for an innovative marketer that can help the company _____ in the global market.
full_sentence: The chief executive officer is looking for an innovative marketer that can help the company compete in the global market.

questions: The details of a customer's bank transactions are considered _____ and may only be disclosed for legal purposes.
full_sentence: The details of a customer's bank transactions are considered confidential and may only be disclosed for legal purposes.

questions: The special edition nature scene photos taken by renowned photographer Bill Miller may be purchased as a collection or _____ on our website.
full_sentence: The special edition nature scene photos taken by renowned photographer Bill Miller may be purchased as a collection or separately on our website.

questions: Although _____ the reset button is the only way to get a computer started if the equipment stops working, technicians warn that doing so can cause data corruption.
full_sentence: Although pressing the reset button is the only way to get a computer started if the equipment stops working, technicians warn that doing so can cause data corruption.

questions: A new or revised policy must be fully _____ at the workplace before its impact on the company and its employees can be evaluated.
full_sentence: A new or revised policy must be fully implemented at the workplace before its impact on the company and its employees can be evaluated.

questions: The company's recently-appointed executive officer will honor _____ agreements with partner firms and forge new ties with other establishments.
full_sentence: The company's recently-appointed executive officer will honor existing agreements with partner firms and forge new ties with other establishments.

questions: An adviser cautioned the manager about the _____ of distributing a product in a market where the demand has not yet been fully ascertained.
full_sentence: An adviser cautioned the manager about the consequence of distributing a product in a market where the demand has not yet been fully ascertained.

questions: An assistant made hotel reservations and arranged for transportation and other services for delegates to a medical convention _____ their scheduled arrival.
full_sentence: An assistant made hotel reservations and arranged for transportation and other services for delegates to a medical convention in advance of their scheduled arrival.

questions: More and more university graduates are opting to work abroad because _____ in the local job market nowadays is very stiff.
full_sentence: More and more university graduates are opting to work abroad because competition in the local job market nowadays is very stiff.

questions: Medical records are kept confidential by hospital officials _____ a valid request for access is approved by a court judge.
full_sentence: Medical records are kept confidential by hospital officials unless a valid request for access is approved by a court judge.

questions: Skyline Telecommunications, a cable and broadband service provider, has _____ telephone lines for new residents in the subdivision.
full_sentence: Skyline Telecommunications, a cable and broadband service provider, has installed telephone lines for new residents in the subdivision.

questions: The human resources head _____ the supervisors to determine which of the new employees will be sent to the institute for additional training.
full_sentence: The human resources head convened the supervisors to determine which of the new employees will be sent to the institute for additional training.

questions: Shocked by the _____ drop in value of several small capital stocks that were previously doing well, some investors began selling their shares.
full_sentence: Shocked by the sudden drop in value of several small capital stocks that were previously doing well, some investors began selling their shares.

questions: A conference to be attended by members of the banking community on _____ measures to curb indiscriminate lending will be suspended until next week.
full_sentence: A conference to be attended by members of the banking community on implementing measures to curb indiscriminate lending will be suspended until next week.

questions: Tourism in Europe has seen steady growth, particularly in major cities, but the United States is still the _____ earner in the industry.
full_sentence: Tourism in Europe has seen steady growth, particularly in major cities, but the United States is still the highest earner in the industry.

questions: The editor in chief stated that as long as due credit is given, he is agreeable to reprints of articles _____ in the National Journal.
full_sentence: The editor in chief stated that as long as due credit is given, he is agreeable to reprints of articles appearing in the National Journal.

questions: Meridian Company does not foresee increasing the prices of its computer components unless the _____ demand for these products escalates.
full_sentence: Meridian Company does not foresee increasing the prices of its computer components unless the current demand for these products escalates.

questions: The top-selling books printed by the Minton Publishing Company are reference materials _____ their romance novels are also very popular with the reading public.
full_sentence: The top-selling books printed by the Minton Publishing Company are reference materials although their romance novels are also very popular with the reading public.

questions: The latest air conditioners utilize new technology and run more _____ than the older models, making them ideal for offices and small rooms.
full_sentence: The latest air conditioners utilize new technology and run more quietly than the older models, making them ideal for offices and small rooms.

questions: Should you have any problem with your computer or other equipment, please notify technical _____ by phone or the intranet messaging system.
full_sentence: Should you have any problem with your computer or other equipment, please notify technical personnel by phone or the intranet messaging system.

questions: An important customer sent in a large order for construction equipment, making it necessary to have a _____ number of workers do overtime hours for several weeks.
full_sentence: An important customer sent in a large order for construction equipment, making it necessary to have a considerable number of workers do overtime hours for several weeks.

questions: Due to unavoidable circumstances, our second lecturer Bernard Cole will _____ the keynote speaker, who is now stuck in traffic on the main highway.
full_sentence: Due to unavoidable circumstances, our second lecturer Bernard Cole will precede the keynote speaker, who is now stuck in traffic on the main highway.

questions: After his _____ meeting with the client, the architect had a clearer idea of the style of the office building to be constructed in the downtown area.
full_sentence: After his initial meeting with the client, the architect had a clearer idea of the style of the office building to be constructed in the downtown area.

questions: After calculating, the secretary _____ reached the conclusion that they had exceeded the monthly budget for business trips.
full_sentence: After calculating, the secretary mistakenly reached the conclusion that they had exceeded the monthly budget for business trips.

questions: Lance called the service center _____ noticing problems with the computer network, but it took a while before it sent a technician to check on the server.
full_sentence: Lance called the service center upon noticing problems with the computer network, but it took a while before it sent a technician to check on the server.

questions: More often than not, the president chooses an officer to take care of his domestic duties _____ he has to leave for business trips in Europe.
full_sentence: More often than not, the president chooses an officer to take care of his domestic duties whenever he has to leave for business trips in Europe.

questions: At a news conference announcing the merger of two publishing firms, a team of assistants handed out press kits _____ for reporters and newscasters.
full_sentence: At a news conference announcing the merger of two publishing firms, a team of assistants handed out press kits prepared for reporters and newscasters.

questions: Staff members were forced to set their usual tasks _____ when the director asked them to prepare a financial report for investors.
full_sentence: Staff members were forced to set their usual tasks aside when the director asked them to prepare a financial report for investors.

questions: An employee who had no urgent deadlines was asked to _____ the workload of a female employee who had suddenly taken ill in the morning.
full_sentence: An employee who had no urgent deadlines was asked to assume the workload of a female employee who had suddenly taken ill in the morning.

questions: The real estate developers signed an agreement _____ the subdivision of residential high-rise buildings close to the international airport.
full_sentence: The real estate developers signed an agreement to locate the subdivision of residential high-rise buildings close to the international airport.

questions: The office has a number of computers _____ will be ready for use once the new employees begin working.
full_sentence: The office has a number of computers which will be ready for use once the new employees begin working.

questions: _____ one hundred high school students in rural areas received scholarships from Gastron Inc. this school year.
full_sentence: Over one hundred high school students in rural areas received scholarships from Gastron Inc. this school year.

questions: To prevent injury, amusement ride operators should make certain that a mechanical device's restraint system will stay _____ secured throughout the ride.
full_sentence: To prevent injury, amusement ride operators should make certain that a mechanical device's restraint system will stay completely secured throughout the ride.

questions: Every month, the hospital administrator _____ a group to discuss medical approaches that may be utilized in the most complex cases.
full_sentence: Every month, the hospital administrator assembles a group to discuss medical approaches that may be utilized in the most complex cases.

questions: A study on women's magazines indicated that female readers have a _____ leaning toward content with familiar settings and characters.
full_sentence: A study on women's magazines indicated that female readers have a definite leaning toward content with familiar settings and characters.

questions: The finance department divided up the quarterly profits from retail sales and online advertisement revenue _____ the stockholders.

questions: To _____ free repair and battery replacement services, please fill out the warranty slip attached to the watch's manual.
full_sentence: To guarantee free repair and battery replacement services, please fill out the warranty slip attached to the watch's manual.

questions: If the weather in Vietnam _____ so inclement, flight PR632 would have set down at the international airport as scheduled.

questions: As part of the plan to upgrade the Gramercy Restaurant and attract more patrons, an _____ ambience will be created by an interior decorator.
full_sentence: As part of the plan to upgrade the Gramercy Restaurant and attract more patrons, an inviting ambience will be created by an interior decorator.

questions: The new bakery on Main Street produced such _____ products that within six months time, it opened another branch to accommodate customer demands.
full_sentence: The new bakery on Main Street produced such exceptional products that within six months time, it opened another branch to accommodate customer demands.

questions: _____ arbitration, senior management made concessions to the employees' demands, which union representatives believed to be fair and progressive.
full_sentence: During arbitration, senior management made concessions to the employees' demands, which union representatives believed to be fair and progressive.

questions: Customers who are dissatisfied with a product must furnish proof of purchase _____ file a complaint with the company.

questions: The deadline for our feasibility study is unattainable, _____ the financial data we received was inaccurate and needs to be corrected.

questions: The Gibson Hotel is rather _____ with regard to its proximity to the airport, but the lack of fine dining establishments in the area is bothersome to hotel guests.

questions: _____ the city government has limited funds, it displayed expensive decorations during this year's Winter Festival.
full_sentence: Although the city government has limited funds, it displayed expensive decorations during this year's Winter Festival.

questions: The Nutcracker commemorative items _____ in the theatre lobby after the show.
full_sentence: The Nutcracker commemorative items will be sold in the theatre lobby after the show.

questions: During the orientation, the personnel department chief told the newly hired flight attendants to expect a _____ future with Andromeda Airlines.
full_sentence: During the orientation, the personnel department chief told the newly hired flight attendants to expect a promising future with Andromeda Airlines.

questions: As a matter of policy, we expedite delivery of all online orders, which will be _____ directly from the warehouse closest to your location.
full_sentence: As a matter of policy, we expedite delivery of all online orders, which will be shipped directly from the warehouse closest to your location.

questions: To receive credit for the fieldwork _____ for political science courses, students must satisfy a total of 12 hours when doing their internship.
full_sentence: To receive credit for the fieldwork requirement for political science courses, students must satisfy a total of 12 hours when doing their internship.

questions: Workshop participants are reminded not to leave the building during the morning _____ so as not to miss the next presentation, which will begin in 10 minutes.
full_sentence: Workshop participants are reminded not to leave the building during the morning break so as not to miss the next presentation, which will begin in 10 minutes.

questions: Immediately following the conclusion of the performance, commemorative items for the Nutcracker _____ in the theatre lobby.
full_sentence: Immediately following the conclusion of the performance, commemorative items for the Nutcracker will be sold in the theatre lobby.

questions: As part of our promotion, a free bottle of wine and cheese will be brought to the guest's room _____ any 2-night stay at the hotel during the month of April.

questions: The client will be very _____ to know that the terms he requested were approved by management, and the contract will be delivered before noon.
full_sentence: The client will be very pleased to know that the terms he requested were approved by management, and the contract will be delivered before noon.

questions: The factory supervisors are confident that the skilled workers will be able to _____ any equipment problems they experience on the assembly line.
full_sentence: The factory supervisors are confident that the skilled workers will be able to address any equipment problems they experience on the assembly line.

questions: _____ the country's Independence Day, Omega Broadcasting Network will air a series of documentaries about our national heroes.
full_sentence: To celebrate the country's Independence Day, Omega Broadcasting Network will air a series of documentaries about our national heroes.

questions: The _____ of the consumer survey, which was conducted last week, is scheduled to be finalized this month.
full_sentence: The analysis of the consumer survey, which was conducted last week, is scheduled to be finalized this month.

questions: Questions _____ the merger of Digital Works and Silver-Print Company will be addressed at a press conference at the Middleton Hotel media room at 1 P.M.
full_sentence: Questions concerning the merger of Digital Works and Silver-Print Company will be addressed at a press conference at the Middleton Hotel media room at 1 P.M.

questions: An organization of highly successful entrepreneurs has sponsored a franchise fair _____ clothing stores and pastry shops.
full_sentence: An organization of highly successful entrepreneurs has sponsored a franchise fair featuring clothing stores and pastry shops.

questions: _____ suites at Roxton Silverline Apartments are still available except the one on the 50th floor, which is reserved for Ms. Diggins' family.
full_sentence: All suites at Roxton Silverline Apartments are still available except the one on the 50th floor, which is reserved for Ms. Diggins' family.

questions: Power Blast helps the body recover energy as it _____ restores minerals and body fluids lost through physical exertion.
full_sentence: Power Blast helps the body recover energy as it rapidly restores minerals and body fluids lost through physical exertion.

questions: The purpose of the meeting tomorrow is to go over the revised terms of the contract and ensure that its new stipulations are _____ to the client.
full_sentence: The purpose of the meeting tomorrow is to go over the revised terms of the contract and ensure that its new stipulations are agreeable to the client.

questions: When _____ stains from a delicate fabric, use a mild soap instead of a powerful bleach, which can quickly destroy the fibers of the material.
full_sentence: When removing stains from a delicate fabric, use a mild soap instead of a powerful bleach, which can quickly destroy the fibers of the material.

questions: Employees who would like to assist the victims of the storm are requested to _____ directly to the calamity fund or volunteer in the clean-up work.
full_sentence: Employees who would like to assist the victims of the storm are requested to donate directly to the calamity fund or volunteer in the clean-up work.

questions: Bien Castro requested to have all his mail _____ to his office because he rooms in a dormitory on weekdays and returns home only at the end of the workweek.
full_sentence: Bien Castro requested to have all his mail delivered to his office because he rooms in a dormitory on weekdays and returns home only at the end of the workweek.

questions: Please _____ a recent identification card with a picture or a valid passport when applying for documents and services at government offices.
full_sentence: Please present a recent identification card with a picture or a valid passport when applying for documents and services at government offices.

questions: In a letter that was published by a popular newspaper, a reader wrote _____ about the need for more funding to assist local charities and help organizations.
full_sentence: In a letter that was published by a popular newspaper, a reader wrote expressly about the need for more funding to assist local charities and help organizations.

questions: Since its formation in 1993, the Youth Employment Center has provided _____ to out-of-school youth in education and career planning.
full_sentence: Since its formation in 1993, the Youth Employment Center has provided assistance to out-of-school youth in education and career planning.

questions: At top-rated restaurants, cooks constantly _____ the dishes they prepare to ensure that they are perfect before being served to customers.
full_sentence: At top-rated restaurants, cooks constantly taste the dishes they prepare to ensure that they are perfect before being served to customers.

questions: Only recently did Digital Age's board _____ discussing the possibility of forming affiliations with smaller manufacturers of electronic devices.
full_sentence: Only recently did Digital Age's board begin discussing the possibility of forming affiliations with smaller manufacturers of electronic devices.

questions: _____ the company has only one week to submit a proposal to the funding organization, the manager has asked the staff to set aside other tasks.
full_sentence: Given that the company has only one week to submit a proposal to the funding organization, the manager has asked the staff to set aside other tasks.

questions: Ticket sales for a concert featuring some of the best performers in the world of entertainment were the _____ on record for the Wilmington Performance Center.
full_sentence: Ticket sales for a concert featuring some of the best performers in the world of entertainment were the highest on record for the Wilmington Performance Center.

questions: _____ of the persons who submitted their job applications had already applied for previous openings at the company, but had not been accepted.
full_sentence: Some of the persons who submitted their job applications had already applied for previous openings at the company, but had not been accepted.

questions: _____ construction work on the Tower Bridge began last week, traffic policemen have been rerouting vehicles to other roads.
full_sentence: Since construction work on the Tower Bridge began last week, traffic policemen have been rerouting vehicles to other roads.

questions: Problems with credit card transactions cannot be resolved on Sundays because the personnel in charge are _____ on non-working days.
full_sentence: Problems with credit card transactions cannot be resolved on Sundays because the personnel in charge are unavailable on non-working days.

questions: Decisions involving the future of long-time employees are _____ than those having to do with persons on probationary status.
full_sentence: Decisions involving the future of long-time employees are more difficult than those having to do with persons on probationary status.

questions: A scheduled training program on dealing with customers will help representatives learn to _____ customer complaints effectively.
full_sentence: A scheduled training program on dealing with customers will help representatives learn to address customer complaints effectively.

questions: _____ the higher charges imposed by couriers, the warehouse director will need to compare prices to save on shipping costs.
full_sentence: Due to the higher charges imposed by couriers, the warehouse director will need to compare prices to save on shipping costs.

questions: On the advice of a stockbroker, Mr. Park acquired additional capital for his Internet cafe business by _____ heavily in the stock market.
full_sentence: On the advice of a stockbroker, Mr. Park acquired additional capital for his Internet cafe business by investing heavily in the stock market.

questions: _____ posted the draft of the annual report on the company website will be severely disciplined, as the information in it has not been approved for publication.
full_sentence: Whoever posted the draft of the annual report on the company website will be severely disciplined, as the information in it has not been approved for publication.

questions: The flyer _____ to this e-mail gives a brief overview of the many services Laundry Care provides for residents in the community.
full_sentence: The flyer attached to this e-mail gives a brief overview of the many services Laundry Care provides for residents in the community.

questions: For the past hour, Ms. Lim has been trying to contact the executive director _____ a change in the agenda for a conference with the board of directors.

questions: Television stations revised their program scheduling for the week because of the _____ election and the need to provide the public with timely updates.
full_sentence: Television stations revised their program scheduling for the week because of the approaching election and the need to provide the public with timely updates.

questions: A "Safety on the Road" campaign spearheaded by the local mayor's office reminded motorists to diligently _____ traffic regulations at all times.

questions: The brand-name apparel in the shops on this avenue are _____ more expensive than even those in the department store on Seventh Avenue.
full_sentence: The brand-name apparel in the shops on this avenue are considerably more expensive than even those in the department store on Seventh Avenue.

questions: Guthrie Bus Line's board of directors recently _____ Brandon Noland the new chief executive director for the southeast region.
full_sentence: Guthrie Bus Line's board of directors recently appointed Brandon Noland the new chief executive director for the southeast region.

questions: Membership with Blue Waters Spa and Salon entitles the cardholder _____ unrestricted access to the facility's swimming pool, gym room and sauna.
full_sentence: Membership with Blue Waters Spa and Salon entitles the cardholder to unrestricted access to the facility's swimming pool, gym room and sauna.

questions: After consulting with a financial adviser, Pembroke Association, a top producer of educational multimedia, decided to _____ Colton's Encyclopedia Company.
full_sentence: After consulting with a financial adviser, Pembroke Association, a top producer of educational multimedia, decided to acquire Colton's Encyclopedia Company.

questions: The historical journal's editors are vigilant, scrupulously _____ out errors of omission that writers have made during the research process.
full_sentence: The historical journal's editors are vigilant, scrupulously pointing out errors of omission that writers have made during the research process.

questions: Many companies print coupons on product packaging that shoppers can use _____ various items in a supermarket or grocery store.
full_sentence: Many companies print coupons on product packaging that shoppers can use in exchange for various items in a supermarket or grocery store.

questions: Because Ivy's face is expressionless and she rarely if ever greets people, staff members in the office characterize her as aloof and _____.
full_sentence: Because Ivy's face is expressionless and she rarely if ever greets people, staff members in the office characterize her as aloof and unfriendly.

questions: Although the hotel's marketing campaign was scheduled for July, the manager said it would _____ a month early to coincide with an expected increase in tourists.
full_sentence: Although the hotel's marketing campaign was scheduled for July, the manager said it would commence a month early to coincide with an expected increase in tourists.

questions: The company receives _____ from customers on a regular basis, most of whom request for more information about products or inquire about product use.
full_sentence: The company receives correspondence from customers on a regular basis, most of whom request for more information about products or inquire about product use.

questions: The art center manager agreed that the _____ paintings of an unknown artist should be exhibited so that people may learn who he is.
full_sentence: The art center manager agreed that the impressive paintings of an unknown artist should be exhibited so that people may learn who he is.

questions: Although the invitations to the social function were sent a month in advance, it appears _____ nearly half of those invited will be unable to make it.
full_sentence: Although the invitations to the social function were sent a month in advance, it appears as if nearly half of those invited will be unable to make it.

questions: Previously, customer complaints sent in by e-mail were _____ by the secretary, but specially trained staff members now deal with them directly.
full_sentence: Previously, customer complaints sent in by e-mail were handled by the secretary, but specially trained staff members now deal with them directly.

questions: Global Airlines Incorporated has arranged a conference _____ the firm's plans to merge with an airline to increase its destinations both locally and internationally.
full_sentence: Global Airlines Incorporated has arranged a conference regarding the firm's plans to merge with an airline to increase its destinations both locally and internationally.

questions: The social networking company sent e-mails to users, apologizing for a recently _____ service and acknowledging that the blame was theirs.
full_sentence: The social networking company sent e-mails to users, apologizing for a recently suspended service and acknowledging that the blame was theirs.

questions: _____ the delegates disembark from the ferry, they will be brought to their hotels and be supplied with a convention kit in preparation for the first day's activities.
full_sentence: Once the delegates disembark from the ferry, they will be brought to their hotels and be supplied with a convention kit in preparation for the first day's activities.

questions: Spokespersons for companies must be discerning and have good judgment when speaking to the media, _____ providing information only when it's necessary.
full_sentence: Spokespersons for companies must be discerning and have good judgment when speaking to the media, prudently providing information only when it's necessary.

questions: Members of the audience interested in obtaining _____ material on the lectures delivered at the assembly may inquire at the desk in the lobby.
full_sentence: Members of the audience interested in obtaining supplementary material on the lectures delivered at the assembly may inquire at the desk in the lobby.

questions: To _____ to new surroundings at the overseas branch, transferees are given an orientation and a 1-month language and culture course.
full_sentence: To adjust to new surroundings at the overseas branch, transferees are given an orientation and a 1-month language and culture course.

questions: The faulty music playing device could have been refunded or exchanged if the customer _____ the unit to the shop last September 7.

questions: Although the promotion provides reduced costs on meals, customers must order at least one hundred dollars worth of food _____ avail of the discount.

questions: Aside from delicately flavored chocolates and candies, the shop sells jars _____ preserves and jellies of apple, plum and apricot.
full_sentence: Aside from delicately flavored chocolates and candies, the shop sells jars containing preserves and jellies of apple, plum and apricot.

questions: Employees planning to join the company outing must inform their supervisors _____ the administrator can determine how many buses to rent.
full_sentence: Employees planning to join the company outing must inform their supervisors so that the administrator can determine how many buses to rent.

questions: A sudden drop in the value of the company's shares _____ the board of directors to direct the manager to conduct an inquiry and make a report.
full_sentence: A sudden drop in the value of the company's shares prompted the board of directors to direct the manager to conduct an inquiry and make a report.

questions: If GDF Works Associated had raised enough capital for their expansion plans, the company _____ presently constructing a second plant in Michigan.

questions: During the awards ceremony, the executive officer spoke _____ his management team and staff after receiving an award for best advertising firm.
full_sentence: During the awards ceremony, the executive officer spoke on behalf of his management team and staff after receiving an award for best advertising firm.

questions: Aside from _____ a seminar on the effects of climate change at the university, visitors will be asked to participate in a discussion on solutions.
full_sentence: Aside from attending a seminar on the effects of climate change at the university, visitors will be asked to participate in a discussion on solutions.

questions: A powerful storm knocked out the electricity in the building where the conference will be held, and we will _____ be rescheduling our seminar.
full_sentence: A powerful storm knocked out the electricity in the building where the conference will be held, and we will therefore be rescheduling our seminar.

questions: _____ selling the property, the owner renovated all the units, making repairs and painting the walls a subdued color, and then rented them out at higher rates.
full_sentence: Rather than selling the property, the owner renovated all the units, making repairs and painting the walls a subdued color, and then rented them out at higher rates.

questions: Packages _____ fragile and breakable items for shipment should be handled and loaded carefully into trucks by warehouse personnel.
full_sentence: Packages containing fragile and breakable items for shipment should be handled and loaded carefully into trucks by warehouse personnel.

questions: Comcore Company's revenue earnings have increased by about 40 percent _____ it appointed a new marketing manager last year.

questions: After seeing a presentation on a venture opportunity, several local and foreign investors _____ interest in obtaining more information.
full_sentence: After seeing a presentation on a venture opportunity, several local and foreign investors expressed interest in obtaining more information.

questions: After the play's first performance, a critic said that _____ created more excitement among audience members than any other drama in the past year.
full_sentence: After the play's first performance, a critic said that it created more excitement among audience members than any other drama in the past year.

questions: Even if doing so costs so much more, the chef at Italiano Italiani insists on using _____ ingredients to give all his dishes an authentic flavor.

questions: For your application to be accepted by the interview committee, a graduate transcript must _____ your letter of introduction, resume and reference letters.

questions: Although famous for its surgeons, the hospital invites _____ who have developed successful surgical procedures to teach its young interns.

questions: All enrollees at the culinary institute's oriental cooking workshop will receive a certificate and _____ mug upon completing the 4-week course.

questions: None of the accountants are expert at interpreting financial figures, so _____, it was the senior accountant who conducted the income analysis.
full_sentence: None of the accountants are expert at interpreting financial figures, so ultimately, it was the senior accountant who conducted the income analysis.

questions: To ensure that its supplements are of the highest quality, the manufacturer has the strictest standards, _____ only first-rate ingredients.
full_sentence: To ensure that its supplements are of the highest quality, the manufacturer has the strictest standards, using only first-rate ingredients.

questions: To increase their value on the job market, job seekers should consider _____ in professional skills training courses and building a network of contacts.
full_sentence: To increase their value on the job market, job seekers should consider enrolling in professional skills training courses and building a network of contacts.

questions: _____ the initial meeting with the client, the draftsmen prepared drawings of the floor plans based on a perspective prepared by the architect.
full_sentence: Following the initial meeting with the client, the draftsmen prepared drawings of the floor plans based on a perspective prepared by the architect.

questions: Based on the timetable devised by the marketing department, the company _____ releasing a new line of jackets for school-age children in autumn.

questions: The company is _____ committed to halting their assembly lines should any defect in product workmanship be reported or discovered.

questions: The leadership training emphasized the need for _____ on the part of team leaders in order to deal with a changing environment or circumstances.
full_sentence: The leadership training emphasized the need for adaptability on the part of team leaders in order to deal with a changing environment or circumstances.

questions: A well-known newspaper critic praised a new talk show on television, and said its _____ interviews and light entertainment were worth watching.
full_sentence: A well-known newspaper critic praised a new talk show on television, and said its amusing interviews and light entertainment were worth watching.

questions: For two weeks beginning tomorrow, representatives at all outlets _____ customers with small samples of the company's newest face powder and skin lotion.
full_sentence: For two weeks beginning tomorrow, representatives at all outlets will be providing customers with small samples of the company's newest face powder and skin lotion.

questions: _____ the general manager of Automotive United, Anderson Boyles is now the full-time director of an international funding organization.
full_sentence: Formerly the general manager of Automotive United, Anderson Boyles is now the full-time director of an international funding organization.

questions: Based on a wide range of tests by experts in the auto industry, the two compact cars are _____ in terms of speed and energy efficiency.

questions: Asia Stock Trade, a new brokerage firm in Shanghai, _____ its services next week through its new website.
full_sentence: Asia Stock Trade, a new brokerage firm in Shanghai, will be offering its services next week through its new website.

questions: Customers are encouraged to update _____ contact details by filling out the data sheet so that they will continue to receive information on upcoming sales and releases.
full_sentence: Customers are encouraged to update their contact details by filling out the data sheet so that they will continue to receive information on upcoming sales and releases.

questions: With the prevalence of food contamination on farms and in food manufacturing plants, inspections should be _____ conducted to reduce their incidence.

questions: Delivery and service personnel are requested to use the _____ entrance of the hotel to avoid blocking entryways for guests and hotel employees.

questions: The economic decline has affected the purchasing power of consumers, and economists _____ that it will cause employee cuts in the near future.
full_sentence: The economic decline has affected the purchasing power of consumers, and economists anticipate that it will cause employee cuts in the near future.

questions: The magazine's editor has decided to write the article on world climate change _____ as the staff writers are all busy working on other stories.
full_sentence: The magazine's editor has decided to write the article on world climate change herself as the staff writers are all busy working on other stories.

questions: Ms. Warner is _____ asked to carry out research on market segments as she is familiar with creating target groups for the company's various products.
full_sentence: Ms. Warner is frequently asked to carry out research on market segments as she is familiar with creating target groups for the company's various products.

questions: Any machine purchased from Weimar Manufacturing comes with a _____ service agreement program that ensures excellent performance and reduces repair costs.
full_sentence: Any machine purchased from Weimar Manufacturing comes with a comprehensive service agreement program that ensures excellent performance and reduces repair costs.

questions: When Maria Flanders _____ the community's friendship club, she did not realize that the group's activities would take most of her free time.
full_sentence: When Maria Flanders joined the community's friendship club, she did not realize that the group's activities would take most of her free time.

questions: The editor sent a memorandum stating that many of the articles being submitted contained information that was not _____ to the subject.
full_sentence: The editor sent a memorandum stating that many of the articles being submitted contained information that was not relevant to the subject.

questions: The textile-making plant on the outskirts of the town has employed hundreds of local residents _____ its establishment nearly three decades ago.
full_sentence: The textile-making plant on the outskirts of the town has employed hundreds of local residents since its establishment nearly three decades ago.

questions: About 60 percent of the workers at the automobile plant _____ assembled different parts of vehicles for the past ten years or so.
full_sentence: About 60 percent of the workers at the automobile plant have assembled different parts of vehicles for the past ten years or so.

questions: To obtain a client's trust, the company utilizes a _____ approach that takes into consideration the explicit concerns and needs of the client.
full_sentence: To obtain a client's trust, the company utilizes a deliberate approach that takes into consideration the explicit concerns and needs of the client.

questions: The author submitted the first three chapters of a novel in writing and _____ the publisher that the remaining chapters would be written on schedule.
full_sentence: The author submitted the first three chapters of a novel in writing and assured the publisher that the remaining chapters would be written on schedule.

questions: At a televised press conference, a spokesperson for Heywood Firm said that the owners had no _____ of selling the company to Welter & Wargo.
full_sentence: At a televised press conference, a spokesperson for Heywood Firm said that the owners had no intention of selling the company to Welter & Wargo.

questions: The local government has _____ a plan to allow increased foreign investment in the city in order to improve revenues in tourism and manufacturing.
full_sentence: The local government has approved a plan to allow increased foreign investment in the city in order to improve revenues in tourism and manufacturing.

questions: A special certificate _____ to a government employee for his loyal service as a researcher for the Department of Environment was signed by the president.
full_sentence: A special certificate given to a government employee for his loyal service as a researcher for the Department of Environment was signed by the president.

questions: Wellmark Social Network sent an e-mail conveying its _____ regrets to members after confirming that their passwords had been compromised.
full_sentence: Wellmark Social Network sent an e-mail conveying its sincere regrets to members after confirming that their passwords had been compromised.

questions: Having earned a considerable profit in the last two quarters of the fiscal year, the company prepared dividend payouts after _____ its shareholders.
full_sentence: Having earned a considerable profit in the last two quarters of the fiscal year, the company prepared dividend payouts after notifying its shareholders.

questions: The couple worked until they reached retirement age, and then used their _____ to relocate to a country where they could live cheaply.
full_sentence: The couple worked until they reached retirement age, and then used their savings to relocate to a country where they could live cheaply.

questions: A spokesperson represents the company and should thus strive to protect its reputation by _____ appropriately when speaking to media people.
full_sentence: A spokesperson represents the company and should thus strive to protect its reputation by dressing appropriately when speaking to media people.

questions: Despite having little capital when it was first established, the Huntly Company is _____ way ahead of other firms in the design of digital equipment.

questions: Readers have noted that the self-help book distributed by Brewster Publishers is no different from an _____ edition except for a lengthier introduction.
full_sentence: Readers have noted that the self-help book distributed by Brewster Publishers is no different from an earlier edition except for a lengthier introduction.

questions: _____ the Pinkerton Hotel has been redesigned and modernized, it has begun attracting new clientele besides maintaining its loyal patrons.
full_sentence: Now that the Pinkerton Hotel has been redesigned and modernized, it has begun attracting new clientele besides maintaining its loyal patrons.

questions: The courses at the remedial training center are _____ designed to assist students who are unprepared to enter the job market despite having a degree.
full_sentence: The courses at the remedial training center are specifically designed to assist students who are unprepared to enter the job market despite having a degree.

questions: The manager sent employees a memo on taking _____ breaks, giving them a stern reminder that such breaks should not disrupt regular business.
full_sentence: The manager sent employees a memo on taking extended breaks, giving them a stern reminder that such breaks should not disrupt regular business.

questions: The production supervisor contacted the customer _____ it became clear that they would not be able to ship an order as agreed.
full_sentence: The production supervisor contacted the customer once it became clear that they would not be able to ship an order as agreed.

questions: Government leaders around the world cooperate with the world health agency to prevent _____ agents from causing an epidemic.
full_sentence: Government leaders around the world cooperate with the world health agency to prevent infectious agents from causing an epidemic.

questions: Although the advertising campaign was _____ to target the teenage market, the product is popular with customers of different ages.
full_sentence: Although the advertising campaign was intended to target the teenage market, the product is popular with customers of different ages.

questions: The website provides _____ information on investing in stock to enable those interested in purchasing shares to make an informed decision.
full_sentence: The website provides sufficient information on investing in stock to enable those interested in purchasing shares to make an informed decision.

questions: The company consulted with prominent _____ Adrian Wells of Finance World to get professional advice on raising capital for a long-term project.

questions: The marketing department was told to reduce advertising cost _____ for an older appliance model because of plans to phase it out by the end of the year.

questions: When purchasing a vacant dwelling, it is best to inspect the area _____ the home to determine if there are hidden problems that may cause expensive repairs.

questions: The owner had a tall wooden fence erected to create an unmistakable _____ that would prevent hikers from wandering onto private property.

questions: The Best Price Supermarket is _____ to announce that its ongoing sale of kitchen and bathroom items will be extended to next week.

questions: The public relations head will meet with her staff this week to _____ how to enhance the company's image through community activities.

questions: The purchasing head assigned Mr. Barth to inspect the office furniture for signs of _____ so that repairs could be included in the budget.

questions: _____ you travel, Machworld Security Company's monitoring devices will allow you to check your home, store or office in seconds.

questions: Interested employees may _____ their desire to apply for the position vacated by the assistant manager by submitting a letter to HRD.

questions: After a dependable investor dropped out of the agreement, the company found the project in _____, and management had to seek funding elsewhere.

questions: As a whole, television viewers _____ on news program producers to provide accurate and updated information on current events.

questions: A private research study confirmed that those _____ use store coupons spend about 10 percent less on groceries than those who don't.

questions: _____ an invitation to be the keynote speaker at the Third Annual Convention of Advertisers, Mr. Reed began preparing his speech.

questions: Shoppers _____ use coupons at supermarkets save as much as ten percent every week when they buy groceries.

questions: Applications to work at a different regional branch _____ take two or three months to process, so please submit your requests early.

questions: _____ who plan to apply for the HRD head position must face an interview panel consisting of a board member and the company's senior managers.

questions: Vacation leaves longer than three months are not allowed _____ the approval of both the director and the employee's immediate supervisor.

questions: It is the chairperson's responsibility to stick to the meeting agenda and prevent discussions from becoming _____ or unrelated.

questions: The fine-dining restaurant on Second Avenue, which serves exquisitely prepared meals for lunch and dinner, comes _____ recommended.
