questions: The Internet bill sent to Mrs. Stewart _____ the last week of September contained an additional charge for a service that she did not request.

questions: The committee has had a chance to look over _____ resume and is pleased to inform you that you have been selected for the interview.
full_sentence: The committee has had a chance to look over your resume and is pleased to inform you that you have been selected for the interview.

questions: A youth organization will _____ recognition plaques to the high school students with the most exceptional projects in the science exhibition.
full_sentence: A youth organization will present recognition plaques to the high school students with the most exceptional projects in the science exhibition.

questions: He will negotiate with suppliers of agricultural products, if the purchasing officers _____ the chance to visit the Midwest region.

questions: Rick Kotter was the _____ customer representative on the team, but he was the most judicious in dealing with shoppers' complaints.

questions: Bellworks Clothier was _____ the number one producer of down jackets, but it is now competing with two other apparel makers.

questions: Throughout the talk show, Louise Brown kept bringing up _____ achievements during her early years as a reporter for a newsmagazine.
full_sentence: Throughout the talk show, Louise Brown kept bringing up her achievements during her early years as a reporter for a newsmagazine.

questions: At a business convention, an invited speaker discussed the _____ issues affecting economic growth in Europe, Africa and Asia.

questions: Although Jan Marshall is interested in investing in the firm, he cannot commit _____ making an investment at this time because of other agreements.

questions: Thank you for _____ the company to inquire about our products and services, and we hope to provide you with the information you need.

questions: The executive officer's concern for the environment prompted _____ to ensure that company activities adhere to government regulations.

questions: The value of the company's stock _____ until a competitor released a cell phone that boasted many attractive features.
full_sentence: The value of the company's stock increased until a competitor released a cell phone that boasted many attractive features.

questions: Although I promised that I would participate in the event, I _____ inform you that I will have to back out because of a family situation.
full_sentence: Although I promised that I would participate in the event, I regretfully inform you that I will have to back out because of a family situation.

questions: The manager requested the staff not to bring work-related _____ home but to complete the work at the office by doing overtime.
full_sentence: The manager requested the staff not to bring work-related tasks home but to complete the work at the office by doing overtime.

questions: The organization is eager _____ opportunities for collaboration on a project that will not only provide more jobs but also develop the earnings potential of community members.
full_sentence: The organization is eager to explore opportunities for collaboration on a project that will not only provide more jobs but also develop the earnings potential of community members.

questions: The growing _____ for health advice has resulted in the establishment of numerous websites that deal with a wide variety of health issues.
full_sentence: The growing demand for health advice has resulted in the establishment of numerous websites that deal with a wide variety of health issues.

questions: _____, a small manufacturer of appliances and electronic devices has become the top seller of miniature music players in the country.
full_sentence: Remarkably, a small manufacturer of appliances and electronic devices has become the top seller of miniature music players in the country.

questions: The Decor Shop on Second Avenue is frequented by shoppers looking for _____ jewelry and ornaments at reasonable prices.

questions: The Internet has made it possible for cooks and food lovers around the world to _____ ingredients that are difficult to obtain locally.
full_sentence: The Internet has made it possible for cooks and food lovers around the world to access ingredients that are difficult to obtain locally.

questions: After a strong hurricane passed through the region, the government immediately _____ a state of emergency.

questions: Concerned that the new staff might not be able to give a convincing presentation, Anne Myer delivered the report _____.
full_sentence: Concerned that the new staff might not be able to give a convincing presentation, Anne Myer delivered the report herself.

questions: Excerpts from a _____ research paper on product labeling were published for consumers in a major newspaper.
full_sentence: Excerpts from a startling research paper on product labeling were published for consumers in a major newspaper.

questions: The director is planning to have a _____ arranged dinner for a business official who is touring the country to look for investment opportunities.
full_sentence: The director is planning to have a specially arranged dinner for a business official who is touring the country to look for investment opportunities.

questions: The census taker affixed a sticker _____ to the door to let other officers in the area know that the household had already been interviewed.
full_sentence: The census taker affixed a sticker directly to the door to let other officers in the area know that the household had already been interviewed.

questions: The construction of a new 50-floor hotel on Madison Avenue began _____ a ceremonial breaking of the ground spearheaded by the town mayor.
full_sentence: The construction of a new 50-floor hotel on Madison Avenue began with a ceremonial breaking of the ground spearheaded by the town mayor.

questions: Headquarters has recommended _____ operations at two rural branches that have been unprofitable for the past two years.
full_sentence: Headquarters has recommended suspending operations at two rural branches that have been unprofitable for the past two years.

questions: _____ the downturn in consumer spending, the commercial sector remains confident that demand will increase as the economy improves.
full_sentence: Despite the downturn in consumer spending, the commercial sector remains confident that demand will increase as the economy improves.

questions: Donors have made a _____ contribution to the local community center so that the projects aimed at assisting the youth are sufficiently funded.
full_sentence: Donors have made a significant contribution to the local community center so that the projects aimed at assisting the youth are sufficiently funded.

questions: The national government has decided to give farmers in the Midwest a subsidy to _____ rising fuel and fertilizer prices.
full_sentence: The national government has decided to give farmers in the Midwest a subsidy to offset rising fuel and fertilizer prices.

questions: _____ the close of the year, most companies are busy preparing annual reports for the board of directors and stockholders.
full_sentence: Toward the close of the year, most companies are busy preparing annual reports for the board of directors and stockholders.

questions: Foundations often set aside funds to give grants and scholarships to _____ students in high schools and universities.

questions: Patients who have undergone a medical examination and whose diagnosis remains inconclusive _____ to a specialist by their physician.

questions: New subscribers to The Daily News must keep their customer code _____ they can access the online edition of the newspaper without charge.
full_sentence: New subscribers to The Daily News must keep their customer code so that they can access the online edition of the newspaper without charge.

questions: The plant workers who did an extra shift over the past several days were _____ by the supervisor for completing a large order of floor tiles on time.
full_sentence: The plant workers who did an extra shift over the past several days were commended by the supervisor for completing a large order of floor tiles on time.

questions: Medical personnel are required to keep patient records _____, and any failure to follow this regulation might open the hospital to lawsuits.
full_sentence: Medical personnel are required to keep patient records confidential, and any failure to follow this regulation might open the hospital to lawsuits.

questions: Most of the representatives said they plan to take the subway train to the convention building _____ ride a cab paid for by the sponsors.

questions: If you have any questions about the equipment you have just purchased, please bring your inquiries to _____ available technician.
full_sentence: If you have any questions about the equipment you have just purchased, please bring your inquiries to any available technician.

questions: Government leaders have improved the nation's economy by _____ on laying the groundwork for new business development and job creation.
full_sentence: Government leaders have improved the nation's economy by focusing on laying the groundwork for new business development and job creation.

questions: The tourism industry has indicated the need _____ better communications facilities and other public infrastructure to attract more tourists to the country.

questions: Demand for multi-featured smartphones _____ in the summer, resulting in the hiring of more assembly workers to meet market needs.
full_sentence: Demand for multi-featured smartphones peaked in the summer, resulting in the hiring of more assembly workers to meet market needs.

questions: A farm located in Sta. Cruz, California supplies nearly all of the tomatoes _____ by the restaurant for its pasta sauces, sandwiches and salads.
full_sentence: A farm located in Sta. Cruz, California supplies nearly all of the tomatoes utilized by the restaurant for its pasta sauces, sandwiches and salads.

questions: Although the managers are seeking _____ Bill Worthington the new executive officer, the board wants to hire an outsider to direct the company.

questions: The _____ furniture designed by the Hutchins Furnishing Company in Virginia is noted for its exquisite craftsmanship and superb functionality.
full_sentence: The innovative furniture designed by the Hutchins Furnishing Company in Virginia is noted for its exquisite craftsmanship and superb functionality.

questions: _____ their second anniversary, Woodson Caterers offered repeat clients a 15 percent discount on all catered meal packages for the month of October.
full_sentence: To commemorate their second anniversary, Woodson Caterers offered repeat clients a 15 percent discount on all catered meal packages for the month of October.

questions: Participants who have enlisted in any of the workshop offerings for August _____ to switch to other courses if these classes already have twenty registrants.
full_sentence: Participants who have enlisted in any of the workshop offerings for August are not allowed to switch to other courses if these classes already have twenty registrants.

questions: The Web site has a list of requirements that applicants for job openings at the university are expected to _____ by the given deadline.
full_sentence: The Web site has a list of requirements that applicants for job openings at the university are expected to meet by the given deadline.

questions: Subscribers are requested to get in touch with a company representative _____ if a magazine issue is not delivered or arrives damaged at your doorstep.
full_sentence: Subscribers are requested to get in touch with a company representative immediately if a magazine issue is not delivered or arrives damaged at your doorstep.

questions: In accordance _____ department store policy, apparel and shoe wear cannot be returned or exchanged if they have been used or altered in any way.
full_sentence: In accordance with department store policy, apparel and shoe wear cannot be returned or exchanged if they have been used or altered in any way.

questions: Fashion accessories that are on display on the rack near the entrance _____ at regular prices, but those in the bargain bin are from 10 to 60 percent off.
full_sentence: Fashion accessories that are on display on the rack near the entrance are selling at regular prices, but those in the bargain bin are from 10 to 60 percent off.

questions: A report about the economic crisis has the Morgan Cooper Company _____ that its overseas branch may be facing problems in the near future.

questions: The telephone company had little competition _____ the government permitted more firms to establish their own local and long-distance telephone networks.
full_sentence: The telephone company had little competition before the government permitted more firms to establish their own local and long-distance telephone networks.

questions: The administration held a _____ auction of property comprising several buildings and equipment that it owns but no longer has any use for.

questions: After long discussions, the two publishing companies made arrangements to combine their assets, a decision considered _____ beneficial by many.
full_sentence: After long discussions, the two publishing companies made arrangements to combine their assets, a decision considered exceptionally beneficial by many.

questions: With the sudden rise in interest rates for business loans, Counterpoint Manufacturing's plans to expand have been _____ until a more suitable time.

questions: To complete the annual planning activity on time, the managers agreed that employees should not apply for a leave _____ ill or facing an urgent matter.
full_sentence: To complete the annual planning activity on time, the managers agreed that employees should not apply for a leave unless ill or facing an urgent matter.

questions: The purchaser said their usual supplier could not provide industrial diamonds, making it necessary for _____ to order from a company that charges higher prices.
full_sentence: The purchaser said their usual supplier could not provide industrial diamonds, making it necessary for him to order from a company that charges higher prices.

questions: New visitors to the clinic are required by medical personnel _____ fill out a personal information form to establish an outpatient record.
full_sentence: New visitors to the clinic are required by medical personnel to fill out a personal information form to establish an outpatient record.

questions: _____ the package is delivered, the recipient must open it immediately and verify whether the contents are complete and in acceptable condition.
full_sentence: After the package is delivered, the recipient must open it immediately and verify whether the contents are complete and in acceptable condition.

questions: According to company policy, packages that are not delivered to customers due to shipping label errors should be _____ immediately.
full_sentence: According to company policy, packages that are not delivered to customers due to shipping label errors should be refunded immediately.

questions: The avenue is so _____ that bicyclists going up the road usually get off their bicycles before reaching the top and walk the rest of the way.
full_sentence: The avenue is so steep that bicyclists going up the road usually get off their bicycles before reaching the top and walk the rest of the way.

questions: Although prices at most supermarkets _____ from store to store, the disparity is not enough to warrant shopping for groceries at different places.
full_sentence: Although prices at most supermarkets vary from store to store, the disparity is not enough to warrant shopping for groceries at different places.

questions: A negotiator assigned by the company said he would _____ the dispute between the factory workers and management.
full_sentence: A negotiator assigned by the company said he would handle the dispute between the factory workers and management.

questions: Items for personal use are not to be listed as an _____ when submitting receipts for reimbursement to the accounting department.
full_sentence: Items for personal use are not to be listed as an expenditure when submitting receipts for reimbursement to the accounting department.

questions: The purchasing department said it would send a representative _____ with several suppliers for a new contract.
full_sentence: The purchasing department said it would send a representative to negotiate with several suppliers for a new contract.

questions: The sales person at the printing outlet said it would take _____ four hours to print 200 copies of the employee manual.
full_sentence: The sales person at the printing outlet said it would take approximately four hours to print 200 copies of the employee manual.

questions: The purpose of the 2-hour workshop scheduled for tomorrow morning is to teach both managers and staff to cooperate with _____.
full_sentence: The purpose of the 2-hour workshop scheduled for tomorrow morning is to teach both managers and staff to cooperate with one another.

questions: Medical researchers at the Sienna Hospital are working _____ with scientists at a local university to complete a study on human cells.
full_sentence: Medical researchers at the Sienna Hospital are working collaboratively with scientists at a local university to complete a study on human cells.

questions: Despite the intermittent rain, a majority of the runners participating in the annual marathon _____ to run the course until they reached the finish line.
full_sentence: Despite the intermittent rain, a majority of the runners participating in the annual marathon continued to run the course until they reached the finish line.

questions: Zoning officials gave approval to proceed with the hotel construction only _____ the owners settled the building design problem raised by the community.
full_sentence: Zoning officials gave approval to proceed with the hotel construction only when the owners settled the building design problem raised by the community.

questions: The human resources department usually hires the most _____ candidate, but they give priority to people who can work well with a team.
full_sentence: The human resources department usually hires the most qualified candidate, but they give priority to people who can work well with a team.

questions: After a severe economic crisis hit the country, an expert said that the recovery of the trade sector within a few months was _____.

questions: Transfers to any of the company's branches are not allowed _____ a staff member has skills needed by a branch.
full_sentence: Transfers to any of the company's branches are not allowed unless a staff member has skills needed by a branch.

questions: World Ecology, a group of environmental organizations _____ by a former Transportation Department official, is holding a summit in Spain.
full_sentence: World Ecology, a group of environmental organizations established by a former Transportation Department official, is holding a summit in Spain.

questions: Parcels for university students living away from home will be delivered to the dormitories _____ the end of the week.
full_sentence: Parcels for university students living away from home will be delivered to the dormitories by the end of the week.

questions: A representative from a funding organization will give a research center _____ on the types of projects that attract financial institutions.
full_sentence: A representative from a funding organization will give a research center advice on the types of projects that attract financial institutions.

questions: A representative from a real estate agency accompanied a visitor _____ a look at one of the vacant apartment units.
full_sentence: A representative from a real estate agency accompanied a visitor to take a look at one of the vacant apartment units.

questions: After _____ reviewing the manuscripts being considered for publication, the panel has made a choice and will submit their recommendation to the publisher.

questions: _____ for its high quality meal and serene ambience, the Green Ivy Restaurant has attracted diners from around the world who want to sample its extraordinary food.
full_sentence: Known for its high quality meal and serene ambience, the Green Ivy Restaurant has attracted diners from around the world who want to sample its extraordinary food.

questions: The speaker discussed the most important _____ of an advertisement and how its design can make it stand out from other ads.
full_sentence: The speaker discussed the most important elements of an advertisement and how its design can make it stand out from other ads.

questions: If _____ a product back for return or exchange, the customer must ensure that the item is in its original condition and packaging.
full_sentence: If bringing a product back for return or exchange, the customer must ensure that the item is in its original condition and packaging.

questions: Although a definite figure cannot be given, the spokesperson believes that more than a thousand persons will _____ attend the art center's grand opening.
full_sentence: Although a definite figure cannot be given, the spokesperson believes that more than a thousand persons will probably attend the art center's grand opening.

questions: Customers _____ subscriptions to cable service will end this month are urged to apply for renewal to avoid paying a reconnection fee.
full_sentence: Customers whose subscriptions to cable service will end this month are urged to apply for renewal to avoid paying a reconnection fee.

questions: The editor received several letters from readers _____ the periodical's decision to switch from a print publication to an online site.
full_sentence: The editor received several letters from readers regarding the periodical's decision to switch from a print publication to an online site.

questions: The Gellhorn Clothing Company's advertising head said he would be busy preparing for a regional marketing campaign _____ next month.
full_sentence: The Gellhorn Clothing Company's advertising head said he would be busy preparing for a regional marketing campaign beginning next month.

questions: Restaurants in the city will have to stop using MSG _____ the ingredient was banned by the food administration.
full_sentence: Restaurants in the city will have to stop using MSG because the ingredient was banned by the food administration.

questions: The company values its customers very highly and gives _____ response when a customer files a complaint or asks for more information.
full_sentence: The company values its customers very highly and gives immediate response when a customer files a complaint or asks for more information.

questions: By the time the manufacturer completed a large order of floor tiles for an office building, new but smaller orders _____ coming in.
full_sentence: By the time the manufacturer completed a large order of floor tiles for an office building, new but smaller orders had begun coming in.

questions: Because _____ of the newspaper's website has increased by 60 percent, the publisher is considering offering paid subscriptions.
full_sentence: Because readership of the newspaper's website has increased by 60 percent, the publisher is considering offering paid subscriptions.

questions: Travelers who signed up for the package expressed _____ concern about not having enough time to do their own personal sightseeing.
full_sentence: Travelers who signed up for the package expressed their concern about not having enough time to do their own personal sightseeing.

questions: Most of the larger kitchen appliances in the store may be purchased on installment and are _____ over a period of 12 to 24 months.
full_sentence: Most of the larger kitchen appliances in the store may be purchased on installment and are payable over a period of 12 to 24 months.

questions: _____ a more positive corporate image with the public, Anson & Wells hired a well-known public relations consultant.
full_sentence: To cultivate a more positive corporate image with the public, Anson & Wells hired a well-known public relations consultant.

questions: Parents in many parts of Asia are more inclined than those in Western nations to work hard to enroll their children in _____ educational institutions.
full_sentence: Parents in many parts of Asia are more inclined than those in Western nations to work hard to enroll their children in outstanding educational institutions.

questions: The popularity of rubber shoes has dipped so low that _____ they are sold at a large markdown, shoppers will likely not buy them.
full_sentence: The popularity of rubber shoes has dipped so low that even if they are sold at a large markdown, shoppers will likely not buy them.

questions: The manager will not be able to deal with frequent absenteeism in the company _____ unless he identifies the underlying reasons.
full_sentence: The manager will not be able to deal with frequent absenteeism in the company effectively unless he identifies the underlying reasons.

questions: The survey outcome was an unexpected _____, with a majority of the respondents saying they preferred cereal for breakfast.
full_sentence: The survey outcome was an unexpected one, with a majority of the respondents saying they preferred cereal for breakfast.

questions: Sales of real estate, _____ the start of the year, has increased by 40percent, but experts think it will return to normal levels before the year ends.
full_sentence: Sales of real estate, since the start of the year, has increased by 40percent, but experts think it will return to normal levels before the year ends.

questions: Unless _____ informed, the timetable for train departures from London to Birmingham on weekends will remain the same.
full_sentence: Unless otherwise informed, the timetable for train departures from London to Birmingham on weekends will remain the same.

questions: Individuals interested in getting financing new ventures must familiarize themselves with the procedures for obtaining loans and _____ with the bank's requirements.
full_sentence: Individuals interested in getting financing new ventures must familiarize themselves with the procedures for obtaining loans and comply with the bank's requirements.

questions: Customs and immigration service requires passengers to declare _____ currencies in excess of $5,000 when entering the country.
full_sentence: Customs and immigration service requires passengers to declare all currencies in excess of $5,000 when entering the country.

questions: The organization is dedicated to _____ the country's valuable artwork and cultural sites so that future generations can enjoy them.
full_sentence: The organization is dedicated to protecting the country's valuable artwork and cultural sites so that future generations can enjoy them.

questions: To complete its market study, Fizz Soft Drink Company is sending representatives to distribute survey forms to residents living _____ the area.
full_sentence: To complete its market study, Fizz Soft Drink Company is sending representatives to distribute survey forms to residents living in the area.

questions: The department store has already received several applications in response to the advertisement it _____ the day before.
full_sentence: The department store has already received several applications in response to the advertisement it published the day before.

questions: After relocating to Los Angeles, Jeff Barth checked the local newspapers for jobs _____ to the one he had when he was living in Chicago.
full_sentence: After relocating to Los Angeles, Jeff Barth checked the local newspapers for jobs comparable to the one he had when he was living in Chicago.

questions: The organizers are finalizing invitations forth grand opening celebration of the Scintilla Department Store, _____ will take place on August 15 at 10 o' clock.
full_sentence: The organizers are finalizing invitations forth grand opening celebration of the Scintilla Department Store, which will take place on August 15 at 10 o' clock.

questions: According to the health department, getting an annual vaccination is the best and _____ way to prevent from getting influenza.
full_sentence: According to the health department, getting an annual vaccination is the best and easiest way to prevent from getting influenza.

questions: Knowing that thousands tried to reserve seats for the concert online, the sponsor decided it was _____ to rent a larger venue to accommodate more people.
full_sentence: Knowing that thousands tried to reserve seats for the concert online, the sponsor decided it was suitable to rent a larger venue to accommodate more people.

questions: Although Lisa Elliot had been with the company only three months, she _____ her supervisor so much that he recommended her for a promotion.
full_sentence: Although Lisa Elliot had been with the company only three months, she impressed her supervisor so much that he recommended her for a promotion.

questions: The union called on employees to strike after the management refused to cooperate in a _____ for increased pay and better worker benefits.
full_sentence: The union called on employees to strike after the management refused to cooperate in a negotiation for increased pay and better worker benefits.

questions: _____ the company's operating expenses for the coming fiscal year, the administrative office decided to reduce daily allowances for traveling representatives.
full_sentence: To trim the company's operating expenses for the coming fiscal year, the administrative office decided to reduce daily allowances for traveling representatives.

questions: If Steve Jungton had had any aspirations about applying for a managerial position at a rival company, he _____ so years ago.

questions: A memorandum e-mailed to the staff gave notice that an office _____ was scheduled in the large conference room for the afternoon.
full_sentence: A memorandum e-mailed to the staff gave notice that an office assembly was scheduled in the large conference room for the afternoon.

questions: The author is _____ more publicity for his newest non-fiction book by joining talk shows and accepting invitations to book launches.

questions: To measure client satisfaction, Five Stars Electronics asks its customers _____ fill out a product questionnaire by e-mail.
full_sentence: To measure client satisfaction, Five Stars Electronics asks its customers to fill out a product questionnaire by e-mail.

questions: Most financial advisers believe that banking institutions are a _____ way to procure financing for a new home, car or business.

questions: The purchasing officer is planning to fly to London and Barcelona next week to _____ business with some trusted suppliers of cheeses and wines.
full_sentence: The purchasing officer is planning to fly to London and Barcelona next week to conduct business with some trusted suppliers of cheeses and wines.

questions: With the new high technology robotic equipment, the supervisor estimates that a car can be completed on the assembly line _____ four hours.
full_sentence: With the new high technology robotic equipment, the supervisor estimates that a car can be completed on the assembly line inside of four hours.

questions: The human resources head was asked to develop a better assessment system so that supervisors could evaluate their subordinates _____.
full_sentence: The human resources head was asked to develop a better assessment system so that supervisors could evaluate their subordinates adequately.

questions: Info-Base, a top research company, offers superbly researched information on a variety of topics and _____ reports on a paid subscription basis.
full_sentence: Info-Base, a top research company, offers superbly researched information on a variety of topics and provides reports on a paid subscription basis.

questions: The producers of the movie Love in Paradise considered the film an enormous achievement, _____ it was completed in three months on a small budget.
full_sentence: The producers of the movie Love in Paradise considered the film an enormous achievement, considering it was completed in three months on a small budget.

questions: Health club members _____ to use the exercise equipment with an instructor must indicate which of the trainers they would like to work with.
full_sentence: Health club members preferring to use the exercise equipment with an instructor must indicate which of the trainers they would like to work with.

questions: To minimize the problems _____ might arise from the lack of community volunteers, the organization is planning to distribute leaflets.
full_sentence: To minimize the problems that might arise from the lack of community volunteers, the organization is planning to distribute leaflets.

questions: Despite the government's adoption of economic measures to keep inflation down, prices of gas and commodities went up _____ in the past few weeks.
full_sentence: Despite the government's adoption of economic measures to keep inflation down, prices of gas and commodities went up substantially in the past few weeks.

questions: Readers who buy the newsmagazine World News at newspaper stands may now purchase a _____ at a discounted rate if they visit our website before May 31.
full_sentence: Readers who buy the newsmagazine World News at newspaper stands may now purchase a subscription at a discounted rate if they visit our website before May 31.

questions: The employees at the factory decided to join a workers' union _____ their rights and ensure that their salaries and benefits meet labor code standards.
full_sentence: The employees at the factory decided to join a workers' union to protect their rights and ensure that their salaries and benefits meet labor code standards.

questions: The Watson community center is sponsoring a sports event for elementary school children in conjunction _____ a private firm located in the city.
full_sentence: The Watson community center is sponsoring a sports event for elementary school children in conjunction with a private firm located in the city.

questions: Some factors that _____ the price of a product include the cost of the materials to make the item, the salaries of the workers, and the advertising costs.
full_sentence: Some factors that determine the price of a product include the cost of the materials to make the item, the salaries of the workers, and the advertising costs.

questions: Ms. Brent received a message reminding her of a medical appointment with her regular physician just when she was _____ to cancel it.
full_sentence: Ms. Brent received a message reminding her of a medical appointment with her regular physician just when she was about to cancel it.

questions: Although new employees beginning their career will usually _____ difficulties on their first job, most will adjust to their work environment within a few weeks.
full_sentence: Although new employees beginning their career will usually encounter difficulties on their first job, most will adjust to their work environment within a few weeks.

questions: An important consideration in the decision to establish a factory in a particular region is whether sufficient resources are _____ locally.
full_sentence: An important consideration in the decision to establish a factory in a particular region is whether sufficient resources are available locally.

questions: The candidates for town mayor said they would _____ the residents' questions on a radio show to be broadcasted on Wednesday.
full_sentence: The candidates for town mayor said they would address the residents' questions on a radio show to be broadcasted on Wednesday.

questions: The value of Midland Metal Company's shares on the stock exchange rose suddenly _____ a public announcement about the firm's new executive officer.
full_sentence: The value of Midland Metal Company's shares on the stock exchange rose suddenly after a public announcement about the firm's new executive officer.

questions: Upon _____ her new position as financial manager, Janice Diller immediately assessed the company's finances to determine where spending could be reduced.
full_sentence: Upon assuming her new position as financial manager, Janice Diller immediately assessed the company's finances to determine where spending could be reduced.

questions: The televised documentary centered on poaching and why animals such as elephants and rhinoceroses are quickly becoming _____.
full_sentence: The televised documentary centered on poaching and why animals such as elephants and rhinoceroses are quickly becoming endangered.

questions: A large number of customers called to complain about a service, _____ the store manager to look into the problem to find an immediate solution.
full_sentence: A large number of customers called to complain about a service, prompting the store manager to look into the problem to find an immediate solution.

questions: A private firm has set up an affiliate organization to help unemployed persons _____ their career goals through training and employment search.
full_sentence: A private firm has set up an affiliate organization to help unemployed persons realize their career goals through training and employment search.

questions: A new assembly technique will allow the Smart-Call Company to produce mobile phones at a cost that is 20 percent lower _____ when they were originally produced.
full_sentence: A new assembly technique will allow the Smart-Call Company to produce mobile phones at a cost that is 20 percent lower than when they were originally produced.

questions: James Owen is covering for his co-worker, Arlene Soliven, _____ is on leave of absence for personal reasons until the end of the week.
full_sentence: James Owen is covering for his co-worker, Arlene Soliven, who is on leave of absence for personal reasons until the end of the week.

questions: A screenplay writer is planning to meet with several investors for a new science fiction film _____ the home of a top movie director.
full_sentence: A screenplay writer is planning to meet with several investors for a new science fiction film at the home of a top movie director.

questions: According to the agreement, subscribers to the science journal are _____ to a special double issue at the same price as the regular issues at the end of the year.
full_sentence: According to the agreement, subscribers to the science journal are entitled to a special double issue at the same price as the regular issues at the end of the year.

questions: McKesson Corporation announced that its revenues for the quarter were up by 30 percent, but whether that rate would remain high in the next quarter was _____.
full_sentence: McKesson Corporation announced that its revenues for the quarter were up by 30 percent, but whether that rate would remain high in the next quarter was uncertain.

questions: The process of getting a certificate at city hall can be _____ time-consuming that some applicants visit several times before receiving a document.
full_sentence: The process of getting a certificate at city hall can be so time-consuming that some applicants visit several times before receiving a document.

questions: The job interviewers are interested not only in the educational background and experience of the applicants but also in the _____ they demonstrate during the interview.
full_sentence: The job interviewers are interested not only in the educational background and experience of the applicants but also in the aptitude they demonstrate during the interview.

questions: The director of the Winslow Historical Museum _____ Archaeology magazine an exclusive interview for its December issue.
full_sentence: The director of the Winslow Historical Museum granted Archaeology magazine an exclusive interview for its December issue.

questions: The executive officer was so _____ with the candidate from a top university that he asked the interviewer to put him on the shortlist immediately.
full_sentence: The executive officer was so impressed with the candidate from a top university that he asked the interviewer to put him on the shortlist immediately.

questions: After conducting an inspection of the meat packing plant, the inspector wrote a report about the factory's _____ with sanitation regulations.
full_sentence: After conducting an inspection of the meat packing plant, the inspector wrote a report about the factory's compliance with sanitation regulations.

questions: Food critics who have eaten at Lulu's Restaurant have nothing but praise for its excellent _____ secret recipe for barbecue sauce.
full_sentence: Food critics who have eaten at Lulu's Restaurant have nothing but praise for its excellent but secret recipe for barbecue sauce.

questions: The company is not willing to _____ for expenses its traveling representatives incur on trips if these are not backed up with receipts.
full_sentence: The company is not willing to compensate for expenses its traveling representatives incur on trips if these are not backed up with receipts.

questions: For the first two years, the Pearl Department Store attracted many shoppers, but _____ a 40-percent rise in inflation, spending dropped steeply.
full_sentence: For the first two years, the Pearl Department Store attracted many shoppers, but after a 40-percent rise in inflation, spending dropped steeply.

questions: _____ completing the initial draft of a building, the architect sends a copy to the client for comment and approval.
full_sentence: After completing the initial draft of a building, the architect sends a copy to the client for comment and approval.

questions: To ensure that the movie gets as much publicity as possible, the producer releases the film and the musical soundtrack _____.
full_sentence: To ensure that the movie gets as much publicity as possible, the producer releases the film and the musical soundtrack simultaneously.

questions: The company's lawyer prepared a contract that _____ clients who purchase services a full refund if the service provided does not meet industry standards.
full_sentence: The company's lawyer prepared a contract that guarantees clients who purchase services a full refund if the service provided does not meet industry standards.

questions: Housing values had dropped sharply, so even though the house for sale was _____ in design and construction, its market price was very low.
full_sentence: Housing values had dropped sharply, so even though the house for sale was outstanding in design and construction, its market price was very low.

questions: _____ the technician, only the computers on the second floor were affected by the virus, but he cautioned all the staff to avoid downloading files from e-mails.
full_sentence: According to the technician, only the computers on the second floor were affected by the virus, but he cautioned all the staff to avoid downloading files from e-mails.

questions: The construction of the new subway station and railway in the east side of the city is expected to be _____ within six years' time.
full_sentence: The construction of the new subway station and railway in the east side of the city is expected to be concluded within six years' time.

questions: After Bronco Corporation revised its project implementation system, it made good _____ in achieving greater customer satisfaction.
full_sentence: After Bronco Corporation revised its project implementation system, it made good progress in achieving greater customer satisfaction.

questions: The plant supervisor had no choice but to interrupt production on an assembly line when one of the machines stopped _____ without apparent cause.
full_sentence: The plant supervisor had no choice but to interrupt production on an assembly line when one of the machines stopped working without apparent cause.

questions: Because several customers complained about a device on the manufacturer's website, the manager took _____ action and asked the technicians to test the product.
full_sentence: Because several customers complained about a device on the manufacturer's website, the manager took decisive action and asked the technicians to test the product.

questions: Several newspapers published a press release _____ that the grand opening of the newly-constructed Melange Department Store would be postponed.
full_sentence: Several newspapers published a press release stating that the grand opening of the newly-constructed Melange Department Store would be postponed.

questions: News reporters on their first day at a major newspaper agreed that submitting a news story before a deadline was harder than they had _____.
full_sentence: News reporters on their first day at a major newspaper agreed that submitting a news story before a deadline was harder than they had anticipated.

questions: _____ the number of guests at the Moonlight Hotel increased this month, the number is still 10 percent less than it was at the same time last year.
full_sentence: Although the number of guests at the Moonlight Hotel increased this month, the number is still 10 percent less than it was at the same time last year.

questions: The music player manufacturer decided to stop producing portable compact disk players _____ sales of the equipment dropped heavily in the past months.
full_sentence: The music player manufacturer decided to stop producing portable compact disk players after sales of the equipment dropped heavily in the past months.

questions: If you are unable to keep the schedule for your dental check-up, please contact the receptionist to have another appointment _____ as soon as possible.
full_sentence: If you are unable to keep the schedule for your dental check-up, please contact the receptionist to have another appointment arranged as soon as possible.

questions: The fashion magazine had to discard a plan to feature an article on a rising clothing designer due to an _____ change in his plans.
full_sentence: The fashion magazine had to discard a plan to feature an article on a rising clothing designer due to an unexpected change in his plans.

questions: Transportation charges have increased due to the rising cost of energy, and this has _____ affected the prices of major commodities such as wheat and rice.
full_sentence: Transportation charges have increased due to the rising cost of energy, and this has adversely affected the prices of major commodities such as wheat and rice.

questions: _____ the unpopularity of the software company's new word processing program, it enjoyed higher revenues than in the previous year.
full_sentence: Despite the unpopularity of the software company's new word processing program, it enjoyed higher revenues than in the previous year.

questions: Business majors who want a career in in-depth financial analysis are _____ to work with figures and large amounts of information.

questions: Bank officials met to finalize plans for selling property that _____ by clients who had taken out a high-interest loan on a home.
full_sentence: Bank officials met to finalize plans for selling property that had been abandoned by clients who had taken out a high-interest loan on a home.

questions: During the presentation, the speakers will focus on _____ the company's readiness to embark on its expansion plans in Europe and Asia.
full_sentence: During the presentation, the speakers will focus on demonstrating the company's readiness to embark on its expansion plans in Europe and Asia.

questions: The architecture firm Builder's Vision has achieved much _____ in the industry, particularly for its willingness to mix traditional and modern ideas.

questions: To ensure that customers are informed about the availability of a product, the shopping website is _____ updated by staff who work online full-time.

questions: In large malls, advertising is often aimed _____ at shoppers who frequent establishments without any definite idea about what to do or buy.
full_sentence: In large malls, advertising is often aimed intentionally at shoppers who frequent establishments without any definite idea about what to do or buy.

questions: _____ Automotive Components Incorporated has assessed the market for car accessories, it will proceed with its plan to design an advertising campaign.
full_sentence: Now that Automotive Components Incorporated has assessed the market for car accessories, it will proceed with its plan to design an advertising campaign.

questions: When the participants arrived, they were given a kit, _____ contained a convention program, a notebook and pencil, and a list of places they could visit during their free time.
full_sentence: When the participants arrived, they were given a kit, which contained a convention program, a notebook and pencil, and a list of places they could visit during their free time.

questions: Most people had never heard of the book The Last Thinker, but it became well-known when a famous critic _____ the author for his unusual writing style.
full_sentence: Most people had never heard of the book The Last Thinker, but it became well-known when a famous critic praised the author for his unusual writing style.

questions: The 5-day workshop is aimed at helping artistically-inclined teenagers _____ artworks that utilize advanced painting techniques.
full_sentence: The 5-day workshop is aimed at helping artistically-inclined teenagers produce artworks that utilize advanced painting techniques.

questions: The medical test results _____ by the laboratory assistant were delivered by an attendant to the hospital's clinical departments.
full_sentence: The medical test results confirmed by the laboratory assistant were delivered by an attendant to the hospital's clinical departments.

questions: To reduce the amount of time spent on processing loan applications, the bank's officials _____ a procedure that requires the assessment of only one administrator.
full_sentence: To reduce the amount of time spent on processing loan applications, the bank's officials finalized a procedure that requires the assessment of only one administrator.

questions: Eagle Technology, the _____ software company in the region, is planning to merge with a telecommunications firm within two years.

questions: During the entertainment program at the Wilkerson Company's anniversary celebration, a song by an employee was _____ by a live band performance.
full_sentence: During the entertainment program at the Wilkerson Company's anniversary celebration, a song by an employee was followed by a live band performance.

questions: The newspaper's editor approved an article for printing before _____ had a chance to check the work for mistakes and inaccuracies.
full_sentence: The newspaper's editor approved an article for printing before she had a chance to check the work for mistakes and inaccuracies.

questions: _____ the fast food restaurant open sixteen hours a day requires a staff of at least twenty persons on two separate shifts.

questions: Because this is peak season, only convention participants from other cities will be accommodated at available rooms _____ the length of the assembly.
full_sentence: Because this is peak season, only convention participants from other cities will be accommodated at available rooms for the length of the assembly.

questions: A skin cream formulated by a renowned dermatologist will be offered _____ at Landmark Department Store and its branches.

questions: The mechanic _____ checked the vehicle said that it was in good condition and that all it needed was a minor adjustment to the engine.
full_sentence: The mechanic who checked the vehicle said that it was in good condition and that all it needed was a minor adjustment to the engine.

questions: _____ making a bank transaction via the Internet, make sure to install all the security software that the bank's web page initiates.
full_sentence: When making a bank transaction via the Internet, make sure to install all the security software that the bank's web page initiates.

questions: After the inspector examined the plant's assembly line equipment, he prepared a summary _____ what he considered were issues that needed to be dealt with.
full_sentence: After the inspector examined the plant's assembly line equipment, he prepared a summary on what he considered were issues that needed to be dealt with.

questions: The government has decided to charge a higher luxury tax on jewelry and precious stones _____ from North America and Europe.

questions: Book Nook is one of the _____ shops that prohibits customers from reading magazines and books that they do not intend to purchase.
full_sentence: Book Nook is one of the few shops that prohibits customers from reading magazines and books that they do not intend to purchase.

questions: An employer must provide a _____ reason for terminating an employment contract as well as give the employee one month's notice.
full_sentence: An employer must provide a valid reason for terminating an employment contract as well as give the employee one month's notice.

questions: Info-Pool is a large Internet-based information bank that _____ archived electronic journals on a wide variety of topics.
full_sentence: Info-Pool is a large Internet-based information bank that contains archived electronic journals on a wide variety of topics.

questions: With global warming continuing to be a problem, manufacturers now consider it vital to design and utilize technology that is _____ friendly.

questions: The doctor recommended a milder substitute _____ the earlier medicine he prescribed caused the patient to suffer from side effects.
full_sentence: The doctor recommended a milder substitute since the earlier medicine he prescribed caused the patient to suffer from side effects.

questions: Although the electronics shop offers free software installation with a computer purchase, the customer opted to set up the programs _____.
full_sentence: Although the electronics shop offers free software installation with a computer purchase, the customer opted to set up the programs separately.

questions: _____ to keep informed of new treatments and medicines, some hospital staff researchers are assigned to obtain the latest medical information.
full_sentence: So as to keep informed of new treatments and medicines, some hospital staff researchers are assigned to obtain the latest medical information.

questions: As more foreign investments come in and prices begin to drop, the government has decided to revise its growth _____ for the year.
full_sentence: As more foreign investments come in and prices begin to drop, the government has decided to revise its growth estimates for the year.

questions: Alice Robins is considered one of the most _____ and sociable members of the psychology club on the university campus.
full_sentence: Alice Robins is considered one of the most active and sociable members of the psychology club on the university campus.

questions: To test what participants had learned, trainers in the art criticism workshop asked students to give their _____ of the paintings on display in the room.
full_sentence: To test what participants had learned, trainers in the art criticism workshop asked students to give their impressions of the paintings on display in the room.

questions: The training center receives many requests for a brochure _____ all the courses being offered and the class schedule for each.
full_sentence: The training center receives many requests for a brochure listing all the courses being offered and the class schedule for each.

questions: A researcher who conducted the analysis of the market survey data said this morning _____ the results were unclear and inconclusive.
full_sentence: A researcher who conducted the analysis of the market survey data said this morning that the results were unclear and inconclusive.

questions: It was soon after the launch of Pamela Scott's first summer dress collection that she _____ as the year's best new fashion designer.
full_sentence: It was soon after the launch of Pamela Scott's first summer dress collection that she emerged as the year's best new fashion designer.

questions: A website _____ detailed information on subway train and bus arrivals and departures is updated by a site administrator every few minutes.
full_sentence: A website providing detailed information on subway train and bus arrivals and departures is updated by a site administrator every few minutes.

questions: Please confirm how many people will be attending the wedding reception _____ giving the caterer an estimate of the number of guests.
full_sentence: Please confirm how many people will be attending the wedding reception before giving the caterer an estimate of the number of guests.

questions: Blue Tower Real Estate Developer _____ listing several properties on the market since the beginning of the year, and nearly all of them have been sold.
full_sentence: Blue Tower Real Estate Developer has been listing several properties on the market since the beginning of the year, and nearly all of them have been sold.

questions: Online Shoppers Paradise has made its website _____ accessible to persons who are unfamiliar with making purchases over the Internet.

questions: Travelers _____ wish to exchange their banknotes for a different currency may do so at any bank or authorized money exchange outlet.
full_sentence: Travelers who wish to exchange their banknotes for a different currency may do so at any bank or authorized money exchange outlet.

questions: The copier in the Administrative Department no longer _____ clear copies even though the ink was replaced and the machine was cleaned.
full_sentence: The copier in the Administrative Department no longer produces clear copies even though the ink was replaced and the machine was cleaned.

questions: A(n) _____ explanation for the decrease in circulation of most magazines is that people nowadays obtain all their information from the Internet.
full_sentence: A(n) probable explanation for the decrease in circulation of most magazines is that people nowadays obtain all their information from the Internet.

questions: The pilot flying a small plane requested the air traffic controllers to permit him to use the landing strip _____ the right side of the airfield.
full_sentence: The pilot flying a small plane requested the air traffic controllers to permit him to use the landing strip on the right side of the airfield.

questions: Before relocating to the new headquarters, employees were asked to remove personal belongings from their desks and _____ with boxes to pack other items.
full_sentence: Before relocating to the new headquarters, employees were asked to remove personal belongings from their desks and supplied with boxes to pack other items.

questions: A general meeting of the company's stockholders and investors is _____ for the first Saturday of next month and will be chaired by the head of the board of directors.
full_sentence: A general meeting of the company's stockholders and investors is scheduled for the first Saturday of next month and will be chaired by the head of the board of directors.

questions: The technology firm's tenth annual report is not yet _____ for dissemination to company executives and other interested individuals in the industry.
full_sentence: The technology firm's tenth annual report is not yet available for dissemination to company executives and other interested individuals in the industry.

questions: The Pan Airways flight from Brisbane, _____ left at approximately 9 in the morning, is expected to arrive in London in the late afternoon.
full_sentence: The Pan Airways flight from Brisbane, which left at approximately 9 in the morning, is expected to arrive in London in the late afternoon.

questions: Persons _____ their membership with the health club must indicate on the form whether they want to enroll for six months or one year.
full_sentence: Persons renewing their membership with the health club must indicate on the form whether they want to enroll for six months or one year.

questions: _____ the Marshall Art Center's grand opening ceremony, famed artist Henry Dixon gave a short speech on encouraging new young artists.
full_sentence: During the Marshall Art Center's grand opening ceremony, famed artist Henry Dixon gave a short speech on encouraging new young artists.

questions: A glass-and-steel building and a performance center with a unique exterior are among the few _____ of the Williams & Sons Architectural Firm.
full_sentence: A glass-and-steel building and a performance center with a unique exterior are among the few accomplishments of the Williams & Sons Architectural Firm.

questions: The customer representatives were _____ to refer shoppers complaining of injury due to the use of a product to the appliance store manager.
full_sentence: The customer representatives were instructed to refer shoppers complaining of injury due to the use of a product to the appliance store manager.

questions: _____ Viva Italia Dress Shop is Lush Hair Care, a beauty salon for men and women that charges the highest prices in the city for its hair treatments.

questions: Just before the manager introduced the next advertising presentation, the presenter, Mr. Johnston, was quickly looking over _____ notes.
full_sentence: Just before the manager introduced the next advertising presentation, the presenter, Mr. Johnston, was quickly looking over his notes.

questions: Trainees who pass a basic skills test are _____ to skip the first day of training and to proceed to the more advanced instruction classes.
full_sentence: Trainees who pass a basic skills test are permitted to skip the first day of training and to proceed to the more advanced instruction classes.

questions: The contractor told the restaurant owner that the _____ of the extension to an existing building could be completed in ten to twelve weeks.
full_sentence: The contractor told the restaurant owner that the construction of the extension to an existing building could be completed in ten to twelve weeks.

questions: At the print shop, employees use the _____ paper size for all print jobs unless the customer requests a different size.
full_sentence: At the print shop, employees use the standard paper size for all print jobs unless the customer requests a different size.

questions: _____ small children are allowed into the gift store, parents are responsible for making sure that they do not touch anything on the shelves.
full_sentence: Although small children are allowed into the gift store, parents are responsible for making sure that they do not touch anything on the shelves.

questions: At the technology convention, a professor _____ a lecture on the social problems caused by technological innovation and the need to address the issues.
full_sentence: At the technology convention, a professor delivered a lecture on the social problems caused by technological innovation and the need to address the issues.

questions: The department store supervisor checks all the displays to determine how _____ product items are arranged and to makes suggestions if necessary.
full_sentence: The department store supervisor checks all the displays to determine how attractively product items are arranged and to makes suggestions if necessary.

questions: _____ arriving at the airport, Ms. Stevens immediately changed her money to the local currency and then picked up some travel brochures.
full_sentence: Upon arriving at the airport, Ms. Stevens immediately changed her money to the local currency and then picked up some travel brochures.

questions: The local government made certain that there was a(n) _____ distribution of all the goods donated for the victims of the recent hurricane.

questions: To prevent relationships in the office from becoming too impersonal, the manager designed projects that require staff members to work _____ with each other.
full_sentence: To prevent relationships in the office from becoming too impersonal, the manager designed projects that require staff members to work more closely with each other.

questions: Since John Taylor was the only staff with experience in technical writing, he suggested _____ when the manager asked him to recommend a writer.
full_sentence: Since John Taylor was the only staff with experience in technical writing, he suggested himself when the manager asked him to recommend a writer.

questions: Employment counselors often have to give advice to jobless clients _____ career goals and objectives are unclear.
full_sentence: Employment counselors often have to give advice to jobless clients whose career goals and objectives are unclear.

questions: After a suitable building was selected for the company's new headquarters, the office staff received a memo _____ the planned office relocation.

questions: Applicants must have excellent communication skills and five years experience in the hotel industry to be _____ for the job opening being offered.
full_sentence: Applicants must have excellent communication skills and five years experience in the hotel industry to be eligible for the job opening being offered.

questions: The company's annual planning sessions are so exhausting that several breaks are needed during the day in order for the attendees to be able _____.
full_sentence: The company's annual planning sessions are so exhausting that several breaks are needed during the day in order for the attendees to be able to continue.

questions: A notice published in the newspaper announced that the sponsor of the fun run event had decided to _____ the event for next month.
full_sentence: A notice published in the newspaper announced that the sponsor of the fun run event had decided to postpone the event for next month.

questions: The clothing manufacturer provides its customer representatives with regular trainings to improve the _____ of its service.

questions: Nurses who have the responsibility of _____ medicines to patients on their floor must check medical records to ensure that they give the proper dosage.
full_sentence: Nurses who have the responsibility of administering medicines to patients on their floor must check medical records to ensure that they give the proper dosage.

questions: The farmers and agricultural workers in the region have made a _____ to avoid using synthetic fertilizer and pesticides on their vegetable and fruit crops.

questions: As soon as he completes his Master's program in business management, John Wentworth will _____ establish his own business or work for a multinational corporation.
full_sentence: As soon as he completes his Master's program in business management, John Wentworth will either establish his own business or work for a multinational corporation.

questions: Should Mr. Gilmore still be at the plant in Thailand next week, Luis Salcedo will chair the investors' meeting _____.
full_sentence: Should Mr. Gilmore still be at the plant in Thailand next week, Luis Salcedo will chair the investors' meeting himself.

questions: The factory supervisor refers workers _____ back, shoulder and neck pain to a health clinic with a pain management specialist.
full_sentence: The factory supervisor refers workers experiencing back, shoulder and neck pain to a health clinic with a pain management specialist.

questions: A travel magazine article noted that tourists who visit the mountains in the region for the first time all agree that they are a _____ sight.
full_sentence: A travel magazine article noted that tourists who visit the mountains in the region for the first time all agree that they are a remarkable sight.

questions: Poor planning made it difficult for some professors at the university _____ a seminar on education for highly gifted individuals.
full_sentence: Poor planning made it difficult for some professors at the university to attend a seminar on education for highly gifted individuals.

questions: It is the customer's _____ to inform the manufacturer if a product they ordered is damaged during shipping and to return it for refund.
full_sentence: It is the customer's responsibility to inform the manufacturer if a product they ordered is damaged during shipping and to return it for refund.

questions: Community leaders advise residents to be cautious by being _____ of their surroundings when walking in the evenings.
