questions: Customers who arrived at the bookstore were disappointed _____ they learned that the celebrated author had left the book-signing event early.
full_sentence: Customers who arrived at the bookstore were disappointed after they learned that the celebrated author had left the book-signing event early.

questions: According to store policy, _____ returns and exchanges are allowed on items that are purchased at a discount.
full_sentence: According to store policy, no returns and exchanges are allowed on items that are purchased at a discount.

questions: The personal assistant has numerous duties, from informing the executive officer of his appointments for the week _____ arranging meetings with clients.
full_sentence: The personal assistant has numerous duties, from informing the executive officer of his appointments for the week to arranging meetings with clients.

questions: Although teaching in a remote location can be inconvenient, many teachers stay because of the incentives and _____ increases in wages.
full_sentence: Although teaching in a remote location can be inconvenient, many teachers stay because of the incentives and prospective increases in wages.

questions: A market study _____ by Reilly & Associates concluded that most consumers do not want a manufacturer to change a product that they are satisfied with.
full_sentence: A market study conducted by Reilly & Associates concluded that most consumers do not want a manufacturer to change a product that they are satisfied with.

questions: The Winthrop Publishing Company thinks it can enhance its _____ by offering e-books and e-mail editions of popular publications.
full_sentence: The Winthrop Publishing Company thinks it can enhance its competitiveness by offering e-books and e-mail editions of popular publications.

questions: Convention delegates _____ need accommodations near the venue must submit their request on the website or by e-mail before September 25.
full_sentence: Convention delegates who need accommodations near the venue must submit their request on the website or by e-mail before September 25.

questions: Although the position entails long hours and working under time pressure, the employee is compensated with an _____ salary and benefits package.
full_sentence: Although the position entails long hours and working under time pressure, the employee is compensated with an attractive salary and benefits package.

questions: _____ a good international profile, the company employs local public relations officers in all countries where it maintains branches.
full_sentence: To keep a good international profile, the company employs local public relations officers in all countries where it maintains branches.

questions: After the applications have been checked and the interviews conducted, the hiring committee _____ their recommendations to the executive officer.
full_sentence: After the applications have been checked and the interviews conducted, the hiring committee submits their recommendations to the executive officer.

questions: The sales force met with their supervisor for last-minute instructions, after which they made preparations to _____ for their regional assignments.
full_sentence: The sales force met with their supervisor for last-minute instructions, after which they made preparations to depart for their regional assignments.

questions: Local government officials provide a forum for their constituents, _____ they are rich, middle-class or poor, in order to understand what their needs are.
full_sentence: Local government officials provide a forum for their constituents, whether they are rich, middle-class or poor, in order to understand what their needs are.

questions: To ensure that the essays are judged properly, the sponsors need a judging committee _____ credentials include experience in similar competitions.
full_sentence: To ensure that the essays are judged properly, the sponsors need a judging committee whose credentials include experience in similar competitions.

questions: Volunteers around the world are committed to participating in rescue efforts and assisting the survivors _____ a natural disaster occurs.
full_sentence: Volunteers around the world are committed to participating in rescue efforts and assisting the survivors when a natural disaster occurs.

questions: In accordance _____ federal rules, plant inspections are to be carried out by an inspector designated by a government official.
full_sentence: In accordance with federal rules, plant inspections are to be carried out by an inspector designated by a government official.

questions: To keep the staff updated about current developments, the manager will be _____ a monthly newsletter beginning next week.
full_sentence: To keep the staff updated about current developments, the manager will be circulating a monthly newsletter beginning next week.

questions: The supervisor _____ an orientation on the revised employment manual when the secretary asked him to take an important phone call.
full_sentence: The supervisor was giving an orientation on the revised employment manual when the secretary asked him to take an important phone call.

questions: According to a survey, about 60 percent of people who have full-time jobs prefer to shop online as it is _____ convenient but is also more affordable.
full_sentence: According to a survey, about 60 percent of people who have full-time jobs prefer to shop online as it is not only convenient but is also more affordable.

questions: Newspaper and magazine publishers _____ the need to establish online sites since most people today prefer to read their news on the Internet.
full_sentence: Newspaper and magazine publishers indicated the need to establish online sites since most people today prefer to read their news on the Internet.

questions: Before Alice Thompson became financial manager of Watertown Incorporated, she _____ in investments analysis and management.
full_sentence: Before Alice Thompson became financial manager of Watertown Incorporated, she specialized in investments analysis and management.

questions: Erwin Rudolf's newly-renovated apartment was _____ in Architecture Today for its furnishings and use of unusual materials.
full_sentence: Erwin Rudolf's newly-renovated apartment was featured in Architecture Today for its furnishings and use of unusual materials.

questions: The spending value of the dollar _____ every time the economy experiences a decline and inflation increases to double digits.
full_sentence: The spending value of the dollar shrinks every time the economy experiences a decline and inflation increases to double digits.

questions: The new electronics firm has already _____ to gain the public's attention with a striking advertisement of its new music player.
full_sentence: The new electronics firm has already managed to gain the public's attention with a striking advertisement of its new music player.

questions: The apparel manufacturer uses _____ fabrics imported from India and Bangladesh in producing its very popular blouses for young women.
full_sentence: The apparel manufacturer uses delicate fabrics imported from India and Bangladesh in producing its very popular blouses for young women.

questions: _____ the marketing study is completed, researchers will analyze the results to determine whether there is a market for the product.
full_sentence: When the marketing study is completed, researchers will analyze the results to determine whether there is a market for the product.

questions: The supervisor will meet with several workers who have made requests _____ transferring to the overseas branch in Tokyo.
full_sentence: The supervisor will meet with several workers who have made requests regarding transferring to the overseas branch in Tokyo.

questions: _____ who are considering attending training sessions for higher skills development should inform their team leader of their intention.
full_sentence: Those who are considering attending training sessions for higher skills development should inform their team leader of their intention.

questions: With the decreasing demand for smartphones, Winkler Mobile Phone Company is making a careful _____ about the timing of its next product release.
full_sentence: With the decreasing demand for smartphones, Winkler Mobile Phone Company is making a careful calculation about the timing of its next product release.

questions: With stock prices of major companies fluctuating, it is difficult to _____ clear advice about whether to buy or sell shares.
full_sentence: With stock prices of major companies fluctuating, it is difficult to obtain clear advice about whether to buy or sell shares.

questions: Houses in the suburbs are advertised at prices way below their actual value, but only a _____ have been sold in the past several months.
full_sentence: Houses in the suburbs are advertised at prices way below their actual value, but only a few have been sold in the past several months.

questions: To compete with online shopping sites, the department store is designing a website _____ will allow customers to purchase items via the Internet.
full_sentence: To compete with online shopping sites, the department store is designing a website that will allow customers to purchase items via the Internet.

questions: _____ there was little promotion for the romantic comedy called Love in Greece, it has become the top grossing movie for the summer.
full_sentence: Although there was little promotion for the romantic comedy called Love in Greece, it has become the top grossing movie for the summer.

questions: Even though the sale was announced as storewide, only _____ of the items on each floor were discounted at 50 percent off.
full_sentence: Even though the sale was announced as storewide, only some of the items on each floor were discounted at 50 percent off.

questions: Some of the components in the digital watches produced by Timeless Manufacturing are not covered by the one-year _____.
full_sentence: Some of the components in the digital watches produced by Timeless Manufacturing are not covered by the one-year warranty.

questions: Management did not grant Amy Jansen's request for a _____ because of corporate planning activities for the upcoming fiscal year.
full_sentence: Management did not grant Amy Jansen's request for a leave because of corporate planning activities for the upcoming fiscal year.

questions: _____ Italia Ristorante opened its doors to customers, it was the only restaurant serving authentic Italian food in the county.
full_sentence: At the time Italia Ristorante opened its doors to customers, it was the only restaurant serving authentic Italian food in the county.

questions: Health insurance is _____ by law even for students from foreign countries because of the exorbitant costs of medical treatments and hospital admissions.
full_sentence: Health insurance is required by law even for students from foreign countries because of the exorbitant costs of medical treatments and hospital admissions.

questions: After reviewing the project proposals, Steven Young will write down _____ recommendations on which projects should receive funding.
full_sentence: After reviewing the project proposals, Steven Young will write down his recommendations on which projects should receive funding.

questions: A trainee's first _____ months on the job is vital in determining what his strengths are and which of his skills need improving.

questions: Having accepted a job offer from a competing firm, Sheila Doyle submitted _____ letter of resignation to the administrative department.

questions: If you experience any serious side effects after taking the medication, please call or come to the clinic _____.

questions: _____ releasing its new line of cosmetics, employees at the launch gave samples to shoppers passing by the booth.

questions: The _____ increase in demand for the company's products was a surprise to the marketing team whose projections were about 20 percent less than actual sales.

questions: The entire staff has been busy _____ through the week to complete the annual report before the board of directors meeting.

questions: The administrative division stated in a memo that it would carefully review _____ grievances in a speedy and impartial manner.

questions: The keynote speaker at the publishers' convention will be giving a speech _____ how the Internet has affected book sales in the country.

questions: The administration requires a manager's authorization for access to _____ documents in the company's archives.

questions: The Blueberry Bakery at the corner of Third Street and Pearl Avenue is known for its _____ fruit pies and cheesecakes.

questions: Travel Industry magazine needs articles on tourist visits to remote areas for a special series, _____ is scheduled to see print beginning in May.

questions: Kevin Sutter was one of the few employees who _____ whether the employee evaluation system was transparent and impartial.

questions: Two years ago, the Internal Revenue Bureau _____ new measures that were formulated to improve and accelerate tax collection methods.

questions: Business analysts immediately _____ an increase in oil prices after Middle Eastern fuel companies declared a huge growth in operating costs.

questions: The trainer _____ described the objectives of the session before beginning the first lesson on the accounting software.

questions: _____ signing the service contract, have a lawyer study the stipulations carefully to make sure you agree with all the terms.

questions: Patients with an allergy are instructed to treat themselves by _____ administering medication before they experience symptoms of an attack.

questions: By the time the director arrives, the finance division _____ the financial statements for the investors meeting scheduled on Friday.

questions: Patricia Evans _____ for an employee from a cleaning service to inspect the office building and give an estimate.

questions: With the fitness program, Ms. Bankers successfully reduced her weight _____ 153 pounds to 127 pounds.

questions: The receptionist told Steven Bell that _____ dental appointment had been canceled because he had not confirmed it the previous week.

questions: After working as assistant to Cortland Couture's director for nearly five years, Stella Vandyke launched _____ own fashion house with Guy Patou as her clothing designer.
full_sentence: After working as assistant to Cortland Couture's director for nearly five years, Stella Vandyke launched her own fashion house with Guy Patou as her clothing designer.

questions: Students who completed an internship this term are required to submit a _____ description of the work they accomplished to their faculty advisors.

questions: _____ Jack Burns made a reservation at the Grand Hotel, the receptionist said that they had no such request in their records.

questions: New employees are requested to watch the software demonstration _____ and to ask questions at the end of the presentation.
full_sentence: New employees are requested to watch the software demonstration closely and to ask questions at the end of the presentation.

questions: During the launch of the new cosmetics line, _____ will be distributed to shoppers who visit the store.
full_sentence: During the launch of the new cosmetics line, samples will be distributed to shoppers who visit the store.

questions: _____ is allowed to enter the conference room while the investors meeting is ongoing unless there is an emergency.
full_sentence: No one is allowed to enter the conference room while the investors meeting is ongoing unless there is an emergency.

questions: The boiler in the apartment unit on the third floor was beyond repair and _____ had to be replaced.
full_sentence: The boiler in the apartment unit on the third floor was beyond repair and accordingly had to be replaced.

questions: The manager learned that there was an insect infestation _____ the building and was obligated to have it cleaned.
full_sentence: The manager learned that there was an insect infestation throughout the building and was obligated to have it cleaned.

questions: Various environmental groups are collaborating on a campaign that aims to _____ the use of recycled materials in manufacturing products.

questions: It usually takes _____ thirty and forty-five minutes to process a money transfer transaction at Mason Bank.

questions: Store hours at all restaurants on Bliss Street will be _____ until 3 A.M. during the Firefly Festival.

questions: Employees who _____ to attend the event for part of the day only should inform their supervisor and explain why.

questions: Very few individuals signed up for the computer course _____ the training center offered to seniors for free.
full_sentence: Very few individuals signed up for the computer course that the training center offered to seniors for free.

questions: With the recent increase in room rates at big hotels, most of the delegates to the _____ made reservations at small hotels in the city.
full_sentence: With the recent increase in room rates at big hotels, most of the delegates to the convention made reservations at small hotels in the city.

questions: The lodge staff asked the guest to store _____ valuables in the safe to prevent them from getting stolen.
full_sentence: The lodge staff asked the guest to store his valuables in the safe to prevent them from getting stolen.

questions: The community center now has a website where _____ events for members and their families are posted on a monthly basis.
full_sentence: The community center now has a website where upcoming events for members and their families are posted on a monthly basis.

questions: The sponsor will _____ late registrants to the technology convention, but it cannot guarantee that lodging will be available.

questions: As one of the ushers at this year's conference, _____ are responsible for guiding the attendees to their designated seats.
full_sentence: As one of the ushers at this year's conference, you are responsible for guiding the attendees to their designated seats.

questions: _____ Chiriman Holdings took over Nobusen Pharmaceuticals, the company will still retain the medicine manufacturer's employees.
full_sentence: Although Chiriman Holdings took over Nobusen Pharmaceuticals, the company will still retain the medicine manufacturer's employees.

questions: During the recession, the consultant was _____ available to help the unemployed find jobs appropriate for their skills.

questions: Bill Schriver called in to say that he had not decided _____ to give the keynote speech at the medical assembly in August.

questions: The children's parade organized by the local government will head _____ the park, after which participants will join in fun and games.

questions: Although most people want to end the year-long conflict in the region, they are _____ to use military force.

questions: A bank client requested an _____ in her bank records after receiving a statement of accounts with an error.

questions: A non-governmental organization received funding to conduct a _____ to teach families in low-income areas about proper nutrition.

questions: The people rescued during the flash flood were _____ grateful to the police department for their courage and quick thinking.

questions: The sales of Vaneeti Beverages Incorporated _____ relatively stable in the past year despite the emergence of new market competitors.

questions: The restaurant's special 3-course dinner is a set menu consisting of an appetizer, a soup and an entree, but patrons may select _____ they want from the dessert menu.

questions: Kettles that utilize a new technology consisting of a coating of tiny copper rods heat water _____ than kettles that are manufactured in the conventional way.

questions: According to the memo, Miriam's team is _____ for finalizing the revamp of the company's brochure, which must be submitted on October 8.
full_sentence: According to the memo, Miriam's team is responsible for finalizing the revamp of the company's brochure, which must be submitted on October 8.

questions: The client rejected the advertising banner produced by Adworks Incorporated because it _____ described the specifications of the product.

questions: Restaurant patrons are complaining about _____ the taste and the appearance of some of the dishes on the menu.

questions: A representative of the firm spent the morning _____ for better wholesale prices with a raw materials supplier.

questions: Mr. Jackson was _____ to join some of his co-workers for lunch because he was worried that he might be late for a meeting at 1 P.M.

questions: The car model was recalled _____ the manufacturer after customers began complaining that the brake sometimes got stuck at certain speeds.

questions: The express train service to Manchester will be temporarily suspended from 12 noon to 2:00 p.m. _____ a damaged railroad track is being repaired.

questions: Once the maintenance manager _____ the proposed security system for the building, the staff will install surveillance cameras in the lobby.

questions: The new advertising campaign emphasized that Cosby compact cars are as energy efficient as any other automobiles of _____ kind.

questions: Mike Cooper received an award for investigative writing _____ he never completed a course program in journalism or other writing course.

questions: Only two of the candidates were _____ for the assistant managerial position, but the company decided to interview an applicant with good references.

questions: The supermarket guarantees that all orders made on its website will be _____ delivered to the customer within an hour after completing the order.

questions: All of the students enrolled in the special school are known to have displayed exceptional intelligence or an impressive musical talent _____ in childhood.

questions: One _____ of the health campaign is to help the general public become aware of the dangers of using MSG as a seasoning when cooking.
full_sentence: One purpose of the health campaign is to help the general public become aware of the dangers of using MSG as a seasoning when cooking.

questions: The workers at the Italian restaurant worked round the clock _____ the establishment would be ready for its grand opening the next morning.

questions: Maintenance checks of all factory equipment should be performed at least twice a year to _____ that the machines are all in good working order.

questions: _____ Gilmore Business Association, more real estate companies are expected to develop beach resorts on the country's islands this year.

questions: Mr. Clinch, the photographer who expressed an interest in working for us on a freelance basis, came by the studio today to leave _____ resume and portfolio.
full_sentence: Mr. Clinch, the photographer who expressed an interest in working for us on a freelance basis, came by the studio today to leave his resume and portfolio.

questions: The construction industry suffered a _____ due to the economic crisis, but is expected to recover by the end of the year.
full_sentence: The construction industry suffered a decline due to the economic crisis, but is expected to recover by the end of the year.

questions: The Crystal Theater will _____ the musical performance this week because several performers have come down with the flu.
full_sentence: The Crystal Theater will cancel the musical performance this week because several performers have come down with the flu.

questions: When tickets to a soccer match between two top teams were offered online, they were completely sold out _____ a few hours.

questions: _____ the author's newest novel went on sale, it quickly sold millions of copies despite getting mostly negative reviews.
full_sentence: Once the author's newest novel went on sale, it quickly sold millions of copies despite getting mostly negative reviews.

questions: Janet Miller returned from her month-long trip to France with an exquisite painting, _____ was purchased at a small gift shop in Paris.
full_sentence: Janet Miller returned from her month-long trip to France with an exquisite painting, which was purchased at a small gift shop in Paris.

questions: Although the comments Steve gave during the discussion were _____ ideas, the boss asked him to prepare a proposal and present it at the next meeting.

questions: A month-long exhibit of Carlisle Hartnett's new African-themed sculpture collection will be _____ at the Cultural Museum of Arts beginning September 15.

questions: In response to customer feedback, Spindles Store _____ a consultation desk for customers who need information on appropriate fabrics for their clothing designs.

questions: Before closing the shop, please make sure that _____ of the flower orders have been delivered to their respective recipients.

questions: Nationwide sales of cellular phones is at an all-time low this quarter, but Arwel Mobile was able to _____ a 10 percent increase in profits over the previous quarter.
full_sentence: Nationwide sales of cellular phones is at an all-time low this quarter, but Arwel Mobile was able to realize a 10 percent increase in profits over the previous quarter.

questions: The firm's management is concerned about _____ and has hired a consultant to analyze the company's existing measures and make recommendations.

questions: Sales of textbooks jump by more than 100 percent when students purchase books on the _____ reading list at the beginning of each school term.

questions: The manager told us that new projects would be put on hold while the company is undergoing a _____ of reorganization.
full_sentence: The manager told us that new projects would be put on hold while the company is undergoing a period of reorganization.

questions: The deadline for the annual report is fast approaching, so the manager asked the staff to work _____.

questions: Ms. Thatcher was _____ in charge of factory operations while the plant manager was in Qatar for a weeklong seminar.

questions: Anne decided to buy a _____ of cupcakes because she was not sure which flavors her co-workers preferred.

questions: The original speaker _____ by the organizer Patricia Stern because he will be out of the country for the next few weeks.

questions: The RAD Magazine Club _____ members with e-mail updates on discounted subscription rates and new magazine offerings.

questions: The new social networking website gained millions of members in such a short period of time that it was considered _____.

questions: Although Carl Reyes was surprised about his _____, all the other staff at the company had expected it.

questions: The manager reminded the staff that _____ planning to attend the company outing should inform Grace Ronin immediately.

questions: Ceiling material made of recycled cellulose fiber is environmentally-friendly, a _____ of roofing that is considered safe and non-polluting.

questions: A collection _____ Italian sculptures dating back to the Renaissance is featured in this month's exhibit at the Monkton Museum.
full_sentence: A collection of Italian sculptures dating back to the Renaissance is featured in this month's exhibit at the Monkton Museum.

questions: The managing assistant said she _____ the furniture in the office to give the staff more privacy.
full_sentence: The managing assistant said she would arrange the furniture in the office to give the staff more privacy.

questions: The curator and his assistant met with the marketing _____ to discuss a media plan for the museum's exhibits.
full_sentence: The curator and his assistant met with the marketing director to discuss a media plan for the museum's exhibits.

questions: The department store's display designer will present a proposal _____ prepared for the autumn season's window displays.

questions: During the trial, a witness presented _____ proof that an accounting employee revealed company secrets to a competitor.

questions: The magazine provides readers with a(n) _____ of the best academic institutions and universities across the country.

questions: The organization is hoping _____ obtain funding for its educational and health projects for out-of-school youth.
full_sentence: The organization is hoping to obtain funding for its educational and health projects for out-of-school youth.

questions: _____ Faizen Motors has been operational for only six months, it has already recouped 45 percent of its initial investment.

questions: After the hurricane left the region, local officials _____ the cost of damage to the city to be ten million dollars.

questions: At the time the author's first novel was printed, the publisher considered an initial printing of 10,000 copies to be _____.

questions: The researchers concluded that gender bias is one reason for the _____ income inequality in both developing and developed countries.

questions: The basketball players performed at their best, _____ beating the opposing team by more than 20 points.

questions: If you have problems filling out the form and need _____, please refer to our FAQ page or request an online representative to help you.
full_sentence: If you have problems filling out the form and need assistance, please refer to our FAQ page or request an online representative to help you.

questions: In case the shopper purchases a garment of the wrong size, the item _____ at the outlet where it was bought.

questions: A spokesman for the company said that management is working hard to reach a satisfactory _____ with the owners of Goldstar Corporation.

questions: The financial reports for the quarter _____ by the senior accountant before being submitted to the financial manager for review.

questions: The first candidate was knowledgeable about the hotel industry, but the HRD hired Ben Jones because of his _____ attitude.

questions: The Well-Being Center, an organization providing for the health needs of women, will be closing their doors after twenty years of _____ to the community.
full_sentence: The Well-Being Center, an organization providing for the health needs of women, will be closing their doors after twenty years of service to the community.

questions: The news about Mr. Young's _____ to chief financial officer of Scottsdale Holdings was featured in several local newspapers.
full_sentence: The news about Mr. Young's promotion to chief financial officer of Scottsdale Holdings was featured in several local newspapers.

questions: Healy Recreation Park's financial report indicates that the Nature and Wildlife Foundation _____ contributing money towards the park's maintenance for the past six years.

questions: _____ a top designer and manufacturer of mobile phones, Aardvark Incorporated is now selling a majority of its shares to a competitor.

questions: Customers applying for a new passport must complete the form and _____ the stub to be able to claim the document.
full_sentence: Customers applying for a new passport must complete the form and retain the stub to be able to claim the document.

questions: Mary Jameson is competing _____ other amateur pianists who nonetheless have more experience and training than she does.

questions: The instructions on the label state that a _____ amount of lotion must be used to heal and soothe dry, damaged skin.

questions: Readers discussed the author's upcoming book on online forums for months _____ it was published and distributed to bookstores.

questions: With rumors of reduced economic activity circulating, investors have been _____ considering whether or not to sell their stock.

questions: _____ the manager regularly rotates work assignments in the office, the employees have the opportunity to engage in a wide variety of tasks.

questions: Having established more than 30,000 branches globally, Q-Rush has been _____ one of the most successful convenience store franchises in the world.
full_sentence: Having established more than 30,000 branches globally, Q-Rush has been historically one of the most successful convenience store franchises in the world.

questions: Since its broadband packages became more _____, Oneida Communications has been the preferred Internet service provider in Detroit.
full_sentence: Since its broadband packages became more affordable, Oneida Communications has been the preferred Internet service provider in Detroit.

questions: Members of the audience were _____ with the performance and showed their appreciation by applauding loudly.

questions: _____ the contenders for the acting awards were announced, the entertainment community began speculating who the winners would be.
full_sentence: Soon after the contenders for the acting awards were announced, the entertainment community began speculating who the winners would be.

questions: Although the topic for the workshop is a popular one, the organizers will _____ the number of participants because of the lack of space.

questions: _____ may need to submit additional documents with your loan application to verify your credit rating.
full_sentence: You may need to submit additional documents with your loan application to verify your credit rating.

questions: The employees are _____ whenever the director walks around the office to observe what everyone is doing.
full_sentence: The employees are nervous whenever the director walks around the office to observe what everyone is doing.

questions: Jeffrey Warren purchases _____ and renovates them before putting the units on the market for commercial and residential use.
full_sentence: Jeffrey Warren purchases buildings and renovates them before putting the units on the market for commercial and residential use.

questions: Although Ms. Hamilton rejected the terms of the contract, she _____ requested the company for a renegotiation.

questions: Experts do not think that the use of alternative sources of energy is an _____ solution to high power costs.

questions: Many investors sold their shares of Socal Firm _____ the value of the company's stock began plummeting.

questions: The performance was cancelled _____ the blizzard, and the ticket holders were offered the choice of a refund or tickets for a future concert.
full_sentence: The performance was cancelled due to the blizzard, and the ticket holders were offered the choice of a refund or tickets for a future concert.

questions: Customers become _____ when they don't receive an immediate and satisfactory response to their complaints.
full_sentence: Customers become frustrated when they don't receive an immediate and satisfactory response to their complaints.

questions: The client will _____ sign the advertising contract for her company's interior decoration services if we agree to the changes she requested.
full_sentence: The client will probably sign the advertising contract for her company's interior decoration services if we agree to the changes she requested.

questions: Trainees in the project implementation division are encouraged to assist _____ in order to build a strong team spirit.
full_sentence: Trainees in the project implementation division are encouraged to assist one another in order to build a strong team spirit.

questions: The museum stores _____ damaged paintings in a dark and moisture-free room before repairing or restoring them.
full_sentence: The museum stores its damaged paintings in a dark and moisture-free room before repairing or restoring them.

questions: Although Bill Wesson is a busy businessman, he is a _____ figure at Golf World, a golf course popular with celebrities and politicians.
full_sentence: Although Bill Wesson is a busy businessman, he is a familiar figure at Golf World, a golf course popular with celebrities and politicians.

questions: _____ Sharon Reid will be on vacation leave for two weeks, her tasks will be divided among staff members in her team until she returns.
full_sentence: Since Sharon Reid will be on vacation leave for two weeks, her tasks will be divided among staff members in her team until she returns.

questions: Grace Peterson was given a performance bonus for having worked the _____ of all the call center agents on her team.
full_sentence: Grace Peterson was given a performance bonus for having worked the hardest of all the call center agents on her team.

questions: Ms. Ramos brought her car to a motor shop upon learning that the _____ between the headlights and the switch was malfunctioning.
full_sentence: Ms. Ramos brought her car to a motor shop upon learning that the connection between the headlights and the switch was malfunctioning.

questions: Green Environment was given funding _____ research on the effects of magnetic radiation from mobile phones on bees and other insects.
full_sentence: Green Environment was given funding for research on the effects of magnetic radiation from mobile phones on bees and other insects.

questions: Some of the employees do not understand the _____ regarding leave days, so the supervisor will meet with them to explain it.
full_sentence: Some of the employees do not understand the regulation regarding leave days, so the supervisor will meet with them to explain it.

questions: The information that Anne obtained from the Internet site was incorrect, and _____ the report could not be submitted on time.
full_sentence: The information that Anne obtained from the Internet site was incorrect, and consequently the report could not be submitted on time.

questions: In an _____ to cut down on company expenses, an administrative assistant purchased cheaper raw materials from a new supplier.
full_sentence: In an effort to cut down on company expenses, an administrative assistant purchased cheaper raw materials from a new supplier.

questions: During the election campaign, the _____ took part in a comprehensive debate that was televised nationally.
full_sentence: During the election campaign, the candidates took part in a comprehensive debate that was televised nationally.

questions: _____ are the investors' concerns about the latest venture that the company is proposing for the upcoming year.
full_sentence: These are the investors' concerns about the latest venture that the company is proposing for the upcoming year.

questions: Infant Plus, a German-based company with branches in Asia and South America, has been the _____ manufacturer of baby products for the past decade.
full_sentence: Infant Plus, a German-based company with branches in Asia and South America, has been the leading manufacturer of baby products for the past decade.

questions: Anyone who wishes to enter the Rare Books section of Mabuz Library will have to get the _____ of the chief librarian.
full_sentence: Anyone who wishes to enter the Rare Books section of Mabuz Library will have to get the approval of the chief librarian.

questions: Artist Abigail O'Brien was interviewed on a radio show yesterday about her _____ launched collection of abstract paintings.
full_sentence: Artist Abigail O'Brien was interviewed on a radio show yesterday about her recently launched collection of abstract paintings.

questions: The new research head is strict about having accurate information, so please make sure to check your data more _____.
full_sentence: The new research head is strict about having accurate information, so please make sure to check your data more completely.

questions: According to the survey, people purchase smaller cars for lack of financing, but their personal _____ is the more expensive sports utility vehicle.
full_sentence: According to the survey, people purchase smaller cars for lack of financing, but their personal preference is the more expensive sports utility vehicle.

questions: A poll conducted by the newspaper shows that the leading candidate is now _____ the other aspirants by about 11 percent.
full_sentence: A poll conducted by the newspaper shows that the leading candidate is now ahead of the other aspirants by about 11 percent.

questions: Allergy-tested and one hundred percent fragrance-free, all our body soaps and perfumes are _____ for people with sensitive skin.

questions: A recent study indicated that 65 percent of today's single, young professionals make real estate purchases for _____.
full_sentence: A recent study indicated that 65 percent of today's single, young professionals make real estate purchases for themselves.

questions: Barbara White makes it a point to leave for work as early as 6 in the morning _____ she can avoid the traffic that builds up on Roslyn Avenue.
full_sentence: Barbara White makes it a point to leave for work as early as 6 in the morning so that she can avoid the traffic that builds up on Roslyn Avenue.

questions: Steve and Jerry first met _____ a seminar on campus, and they are now partners in one of the country's leading architectural firms.
full_sentence: Steve and Jerry first met at a seminar on campus, and they are now partners in one of the country's leading architectural firms.

questions: The advertising head met with his staff to _____ the failure of the advertising campaign for a new soft drink.
full_sentence: The advertising head met with his staff to discuss the failure of the advertising campaign for a new soft drink.

questions: The hiring committee could not _____ a candidate from the shortlist, so they requested the executive officer to make the choice.
full_sentence: The hiring committee could not select a candidate from the shortlist, so they requested the executive officer to make the choice.

questions: Christian, one of the newly-hired crew members of Whaco Loco Pizza, is in charge of making sure that all orders are delivered _____.
full_sentence: Christian, one of the newly-hired crew members of Whaco Loco Pizza, is in charge of making sure that all orders are delivered promptly.

questions: The basic _____ for the executive secretary position are listed in the advertisement, but a more comprehensive description is posted online.
full_sentence: The basic qualifications for the executive secretary position are listed in the advertisement, but a more comprehensive description is posted online.

questions: On Friday, art training _____ will simultaneously begin at 4:30 P.M. and will be followed by an informal dinner at 7 P.M.
full_sentence: On Friday, art training sessions will simultaneously begin at 4:30 P.M. and will be followed by an informal dinner at 7 P.M.

questions: Patricia must submit her application to the person _____ the forms before she leaves the office.
full_sentence: Patricia must submit her application to the person collecting the forms before she leaves the office.

questions: _____ the business report was completed on time, it contained many errors and had to be returned and rewritten.
full_sentence: Although the business report was completed on time, it contained many errors and had to be returned and rewritten.

questions: Miriam is happy with her new factory assignment as it is less _____ than the previous work she was doing.
full_sentence: Miriam is happy with her new factory assignment as it is less repetitive than the previous work she was doing.

questions: The acoustics at the music center are so good that people outside cannot hear the sounds coming from _____ the practice rooms.
full_sentence: The acoustics at the music center are so good that people outside cannot hear the sounds coming from within the practice rooms.

questions: The agency's tour of the French countryside is so delightful that visitors who _____ it before often sign up again.
full_sentence: The agency's tour of the French countryside is so delightful that visitors who have joined it before often sign up again.

questions: The art community believes that the true mark of a painter is when fellow artists give his or her works their _____.
full_sentence: The art community believes that the true mark of a painter is when fellow artists give his or her works their recognition.

questions: The shipping company guarantees delivery of packages in the contiguous United States _____ three days if they are sent before the holiday season begins.
full_sentence: The shipping company guarantees delivery of packages in the contiguous United States within three days if they are sent before the holiday season begins.

questions: An examination of the floor plan of a building constructed in the 1960s indicates that both of its fire exits _____ near the service elevator.
full_sentence: An examination of the floor plan of a building constructed in the 1960s indicates that both of its fire exits are located near the service elevator.

questions: For a limited time only, The Homeland is giving _____ of up to 50 percent on all countertops and dining room furniture.
full_sentence: For a limited time only, The Homeland is giving discounts of up to 50 percent on all countertops and dining room furniture.

questions: The staff, _____ by the loud noise in the hallway, stopped working to check what caused it.
full_sentence: The staff, alarmed by the loud noise in the hallway, stopped working to check what caused it.

questions: The editor requested a contributor to _____ a series of articles on the problems of minorities in the country.
full_sentence: The editor requested a contributor to write a series of articles on the problems of minorities in the country.

questions: Some of the workers complained that the factory puts them on forced leave because there is less work to do _____ winter.
full_sentence: Some of the workers complained that the factory puts them on forced leave because there is less work to do during winter.

questions: The delegates were reminded to wear their convention badges _____ their clothing at all times to make it easy for security to identify outsiders.
full_sentence: The delegates were reminded to wear their convention badges on their clothing at all times to make it easy for security to identify outsiders.

questions: The executive officer instructed the speakers to give a _____ presentation to help the investors focus on the advantages of the proposed project.
full_sentence: The executive officer instructed the speakers to give a simple presentation to help the investors focus on the advantages of the proposed project.

questions: The receptionist told the media personnel that _____ the director nor his assistant would be available for an interview in the coming weeks.
full_sentence: The receptionist told the media personnel that neither the director nor his assistant would be available for an interview in the coming weeks.

questions: After studying several investment alternatives in the area, Nathan decided to establish a house cleaning company with _____ sister, Amy.
full_sentence: After studying several investment alternatives in the area, Nathan decided to establish a house cleaning company with his sister, Amy.

questions: During the office expansion project, Mr. Allen _____ came in early and stayed late so that his team could meet important deadlines.
full_sentence: During the office expansion project, Mr. Allen often came in early and stayed late so that his team could meet important deadlines.

questions: The speaker at the job orientation session said that to _____ a regular employee, trainees must meet the sales quota by the end of the probationary period.
full_sentence: The speaker at the job orientation session said that to become a regular employee, trainees must meet the sales quota by the end of the probationary period.

questions: Finance experts around the world _____ the economic decline to slow down by early next year as trade in Europe and Asia begins rising.
full_sentence: Finance experts around the world expect the economic decline to slow down by early next year as trade in Europe and Asia begins rising.

questions: Profit earnings for many types of export products in the country dropped by 10 percent _____ the sudden drop in value of the local currency.
full_sentence: Profit earnings for many types of export products in the country dropped by 10 percent because of the sudden drop in value of the local currency.

questions: The most promising candidate in the group has a solid educational background and excellent skills, but he is lacking in _____.
full_sentence: The most promising candidate in the group has a solid educational background and excellent skills, but he is lacking in confidence.

questions: The purchasing officer gave me a complete list of the company's suppliers and asked me to contact _____ to update their information.
full_sentence: The purchasing officer gave me a complete list of the company's suppliers and asked me to contact them to update their information.

questions: The agreement signed by Freewell Electronics _____ Megabyte Computers requires the latter to provide semiconductors on a monthly basis.
full_sentence: The agreement signed by Freewell Electronics and Megabyte Computers requires the latter to provide semiconductors on a monthly basis.

questions: _____ the book released last month was a big seller, it was not enough to save the publishing company from applying for bankruptcy.
full_sentence: Although the book released last month was a big seller, it was not enough to save the publishing company from applying for bankruptcy.

questions: To control cash flow, the finance officer oversees the _____ of resources being expended in the company's day-to-day business operations.

questions: Both Nestor Arroyo _____ Katy Crowe, two of our overseas correspondents, will deliver live news reports from the Global Auto Expo in Moscow.
full_sentence: Both Nestor Arroyo and Katy Crowe, two of our overseas correspondents, will deliver live news reports from the Global Auto Expo in Moscow.

questions: First National Community Bank has _____ extended its operating hours on Fridays to service clients transacting business before the weekend.
full_sentence: First National Community Bank has recently extended its operating hours on Fridays to service clients transacting business before the weekend.

questions: The CEO said that the _____ in product demand was temporary and that production at the assembly plant should continue at the same rate.
full_sentence: The CEO said that the decrease in product demand was temporary and that production at the assembly plant should continue at the same rate.

questions: The organizers of the concert _____ that the total cost of the event will probably run into the hundreds of thousands of dollars.
full_sentence: The organizers of the concert estimate that the total cost of the event will probably run into the hundreds of thousands of dollars.

questions: Steve Booth is the company's most _____ negotiator and was assigned to meet with the client about the changes on the contract.
full_sentence: Steve Booth is the company's most dependable negotiator and was assigned to meet with the client about the changes on the contract.

questions: The book advises bird watchers to sit or stand _____ while they watch birds through binoculars to avoid frightening them away.
full_sentence: The book advises bird watchers to sit or stand still while they watch birds through binoculars to avoid frightening them away.

questions: Jeremy called to say that he would not be able to watch the final game with us because he has an important term paper _____.
full_sentence: Jeremy called to say that he would not be able to watch the final game with us because he has an important term paper to revise.

questions: The curator met with the security staff to emphasize the _____ of following the protocol for securing valuable items in the museum.
full_sentence: The curator met with the security staff to emphasize the importance of following the protocol for securing valuable items in the museum.

questions: The Traffic Office _____ that more than three hundred thousand people would attend the town's parade.
full_sentence: The Traffic Office predicted that more than three hundred thousand people would attend the town's parade.

questions: All legal consultations with the corporate lawyer are scheduled three days in advance as these _____ require preparation.
full_sentence: All legal consultations with the corporate lawyer are scheduled three days in advance as these appointments require preparation.

questions: _____ the laboratory test results are released and a diagnosis is made, the doctor will determine what treatment would be most suitable for the patient.
full_sentence: Once the laboratory test results are released and a diagnosis is made, the doctor will determine what treatment would be most suitable for the patient.

questions: After careful _____ of the company's financial situation, the board of directors agreed to sell a majority of its stock to an investor.
full_sentence: After careful consideration of the company's financial situation, the board of directors agreed to sell a majority of its stock to an investor.

questions: The radio announcer cautioned motorists to drive _____ as the streets and highways are covered with a thick layer of ice.
full_sentence: The radio announcer cautioned motorists to drive attentively as the streets and highways are covered with a thick layer of ice.

questions: Some of the best software designers in the country _____ in a series of technology articles in the magazine Computers Today next month.
full_sentence: Some of the best software designers in the country will be profiled in a series of technology articles in the magazine Computers Today next month.

questions: The organizer plans to change the concert venue to a larger hall _____ more customers than expected make reservations for seats.
full_sentence: The organizer plans to change the concert venue to a larger hall if more customers than expected make reservations for seats.

questions: Although most of the training sessions are designed for _____, some are geared towards developing needed qualities in team leaders.
full_sentence: Although most of the training sessions are designed for recruits, some are geared towards developing needed qualities in team leaders.

questions: Trade shows are important events because it is _____ these venues that connections are often made through representatives.
full_sentence: Trade shows are important events because it is at these venues that connections are often made through representatives.

questions: _____ Japanese lanterns, mats and other living room accessories may be ordered online at www.echoska.com or purchased by telephone.
full_sentence: Authentic Japanese lanterns, mats and other living room accessories may be ordered online at www.echoska.com or purchased by telephone.

questions: Whether you are a professional or amateur photographer, Chroma camera lens filters will _____ the color and sharpness of your landscape photographs.
full_sentence: Whether you are a professional or amateur photographer, Chroma camera lens filters will enhance the color and sharpness of your landscape photographs.

questions: _____ a lease agreement is signed and a deposit is paid in advance, the prospective tenant will not be allowed to occupy the apartment.
full_sentence: Until a lease agreement is signed and a deposit is paid in advance, the prospective tenant will not be allowed to occupy the apartment.

questions: The board of directors is convening with top managers this morning to make _____ decisions regarding the company's future.
full_sentence: The board of directors is convening with top managers this morning to make critical decisions regarding the company's future.

questions: The supervisor reminded the staff that _____ who are interested in transferring to the Austin branch should submit a request by tomorrow.
full_sentence: The supervisor reminded the staff that any who are interested in transferring to the Austin branch should submit a request by tomorrow.

questions: The public relations department held a press conference in _____ to media queries about the company's plans to lay off workers.
full_sentence: The public relations department held a press conference in response to media queries about the company's plans to lay off workers.

questions: The company's executive officer said that the launch of its new mobile phone would proceed _____ the recent economic decline.

questions: A warehouse personnel _____ packed an enormous crystal chandelier and a fragile glass vase to be shipped to an overseas address.
full_sentence: A warehouse personnel carefully packed an enormous crystal chandelier and a fragile glass vase to be shipped to an overseas address.

questions: The country's manufacturing sector as well as its export industry was _____ affected by the poor economic conditions in North America.

questions: Employees joining the company _____ to Creteland Plantation are asked to register at the personnel department by the end of the week.
full_sentence: Employees joining the company excursion to Creteland Plantation are asked to register at the personnel department by the end of the week.

questions: The marketing committee ensured that sponsors would provide pans, ovens, and _____ cooking implements for the culinary competition.
full_sentence: The marketing committee ensured that sponsors would provide pans, ovens, and other cooking implements for the culinary competition.

questions: Your _____ and aptitude in the workplace have impressed the hiring committee and made you one of the strongest candidates for the position.
full_sentence: Your qualifications and aptitude in the workplace have impressed the hiring committee and made you one of the strongest candidates for the position.

questions: _____ the artist had not so quickly sold a portrait he completed early in his career, he would have made millions off the painting.
full_sentence: If only the artist had not so quickly sold a portrait he completed early in his career, he would have made millions off the painting.

questions: The much-awaited symphony concert will _____ in Bellweather Music Hall, where the first Italian opera in the country was held.

questions: Customer representatives reported that a _____ complaint of the company's subscribers is that Internet connection was much too slow.
full_sentence: Customer representatives reported that a common complaint of the company's subscribers is that Internet connection was much too slow.

questions: After explaining the capabilities of the company's new computer tablet, the speaker _____ demonstrated one of its functions.
full_sentence: After explaining the capabilities of the company's new computer tablet, the speaker briefly demonstrated one of its functions.

questions: _____ by progressive competitors, Novel Phone Company lost its favored standing in the industry and withdrew from the market.
full_sentence: Surpassed by progressive competitors, Novel Phone Company lost its favored standing in the industry and withdrew from the market.

questions: With one of the presenters running late due to heavy traffic, the announcer apologized to the conference participants for the _____.
full_sentence: With one of the presenters running late due to heavy traffic, the announcer apologized to the conference participants for the delay.

questions: Customers _____ gift wrapping orders were placed thirty minutes before closing time may claim the items the following day.
full_sentence: Customers whose gift wrapping orders were placed thirty minutes before closing time may claim the items the following day.

questions: In his class on learning a second language, Mr. Brooks _____ to present a new technique he created for communicating in a foreign language.
full_sentence: In his class on learning a second language, Mr. Brooks attempted to present a new technique he created for communicating in a foreign language.

questions: _____ your satisfaction matters to us, we request that you rate our services by completing our customer survey.
full_sentence: Because your satisfaction matters to us, we request that you rate our services by completing our customer survey.

questions: At the book launch held this morning, the _____ author spoke about his latest novel and signed copies purchased by customers.
full_sentence: At the book launch held this morning, the celebrated author spoke about his latest novel and signed copies purchased by customers.

questions: The invitations sent out by the company indicate that the event would be a(n) _____ one and that guests should be dressed in casual attire.
full_sentence: The invitations sent out by the company indicate that the event would be a(n) informal one and that guests should be dressed in casual attire.

questions: The Silverway Appliance Store will _____ most of its old inventory by as much as 60 percent to make way for new merchandise.
full_sentence: The Silverway Appliance Store will be discounting most of its old inventory by as much as 60 percent to make way for new merchandise.

questions: To prevent accidents and injury, the construction supervisor at the site assigned some assistants to put up conspicuous signs in _____ areas.
full_sentence: To prevent accidents and injury, the construction supervisor at the site assigned some assistants to put up conspicuous signs in restricted areas.

questions: A keyboard _____ to the company this afternoon was defective and had to be returned to the manufacturer for replacement.
full_sentence: A keyboard delivered to the company this afternoon was defective and had to be returned to the manufacturer for replacement.

questions: Justin Hayes was directed to an office in the administrative department by the receptionist, but there was _____ around when he arrived.
full_sentence: Justin Hayes was directed to an office in the administrative department by the receptionist, but there was no one around when he arrived.

questions: Cross Cargo is the largest shipping service _____ in Eastern Europe with more than fifty affiliate companies across the region.
full_sentence: Cross Cargo is the largest shipping service provider in Eastern Europe with more than fifty affiliate companies across the region.

questions: The award for Best Comedy given to "The Neighbors" proves that it is one of the most _____ television programs today.

questions: All test papers, _____ complete or incomplete, must be submitted to the proctor when the allotted time for the examination is reached.
full_sentence: All test papers, whether complete or incomplete, must be submitted to the proctor when the allotted time for the examination is reached.

questions: A group of researchers from a cultural organization is conducting a 1-year study on the impact of _____ networks on young adults.
full_sentence: A group of researchers from a cultural organization is conducting a 1-year study on the impact of social networks on young adults.

questions: The former director's _____ on the company was so powerful that many staff members in the office still think of him as the boss.
full_sentence: The former director's influence on the company was so powerful that many staff members in the office still think of him as the boss.

questions: Only university students who have never been published are _____ to join the state's first short story writing competition.
full_sentence: Only university students who have never been published are eligible to join the state's first short story writing competition.

questions: The company's executive officers _____ the industry event last Friday if they hadn't been so busy with meetings.
full_sentence: The company's executive officers would have attended the industry event last Friday if they hadn't been so busy with meetings.

questions: The Linkletter Media Company _____ its products and services to customers through a wide variety of advertising methods.
full_sentence: The Linkletter Media Company promotes its products and services to customers through a wide variety of advertising methods.

questions: A third of the staff plan to work at the office over the weekend _____ complete the company's annual report before the end of the month.
full_sentence: A third of the staff plan to work at the office over the weekend in order to complete the company's annual report before the end of the month.

questions: _____ John was hesitant to start a limousine rental company in New Delhi, but India's thriving economy gave him the confidence to venture into the business.
full_sentence: At first John was hesitant to start a limousine rental company in New Delhi, but India's thriving economy gave him the confidence to venture into the business.

questions: With the emergence of personal computers, office workers became more _____ in handling data.
full_sentence: With the emergence of personal computers, office workers became more efficient in handling data.

questions: Critics are cautious about revealing too many details when reviewing a book as this would leave readers less _____ about buying it.
full_sentence: Critics are cautious about revealing too many details when reviewing a book as this would leave readers less excited about buying it.

questions: Because there were not enough seats on the plane, the delegates had no choice but to fly _____ when they traveled to Philadelphia.
full_sentence: Because there were not enough seats on the plane, the delegates had no choice but to fly separately when they traveled to Philadelphia.

questions: Because of the increasing incidence of obesity in younger people, the government now requires _____ school to have healthier menus.
full_sentence: Because of the increasing incidence of obesity in younger people, the government now requires every school to have healthier menus.

questions: The purchasing officer _____ the needed office supplies earlier if the staff had submitted their requisition forms last week.

questions: I requested the concierge to inform _____ of the tours being offered by the hotel so that I could make plans for the weekend.
full_sentence: I requested the concierge to inform me of the tours being offered by the hotel so that I could make plans for the weekend.

questions: The quickly changing market needs in the country made it impossible for Tri-Star Cellular to stay _____ the competition.
full_sentence: The quickly changing market needs in the country made it impossible for Tri-Star Cellular to stay ahead of the competition.

questions: _____, even though the company suffered a profit decline during the economic crisis, it was able to bounce back and recoup its losses.
full_sentence: Eventually, even though the company suffered a profit decline during the economic crisis, it was able to bounce back and recoup its losses.

questions: The Rotterland Industrial Park houses some of the most productive and proficient information technology companies _____ Memphis city.

questions: Mr. Villanueva will not be overseeing the activities for the product launch as he is _____ to fly to Vienna tomorrow morning for a meeting with an Austrian investor.
full_sentence: Mr. Villanueva will not be overseeing the activities for the product launch as he is scheduled to fly to Vienna tomorrow morning for a meeting with an Austrian investor.

questions: _____ some technical problems on stage, the opening night of Franco Albazini's satiric play was delayed for nearly an hour.
full_sentence: Due to some technical problems on stage, the opening night of Franco Albazini's satiric play was delayed for nearly an hour.

questions: The supervisor instructed _____ to make certain that all the equipment and machinery in the factory is turned off before he leaves.
full_sentence: The supervisor instructed him to make certain that all the equipment and machinery in the factory is turned off before he leaves.

questions: The new car model that was released by Ultima Automobiles last month has an excellent brake system and quick _____.
full_sentence: The new car model that was released by Ultima Automobiles last month has an excellent brake system and quick acceleration.

questions: New employees may apply for transfer to other local branches _____ they have the approval of their immediate supervisor.
full_sentence: New employees may apply for transfer to other local branches provided that they have the approval of their immediate supervisor.

questions: The article stated that in _____ times, the cellular phone is probably the most useful and one of the least expensive gadgets to own.
full_sentence: The article stated that in these times, the cellular phone is probably the most useful and one of the least expensive gadgets to own.

questions: After the advertising campaign failed, the company conducted a(n) _____ analysis to determine whether its product needed redesigning.
full_sentence: After the advertising campaign failed, the company conducted a(n) regular analysis to determine whether its product needed redesigning.

questions: The Tea and Danish Bakeshop on Second Avenue is popular with customers because of the wide _____ of baked goods it offers.
full_sentence: The Tea and Danish Bakeshop on Second Avenue is popular with customers because of the wide variety of baked goods it offers.

questions: The new marketing strategy _____ a significant increase in GT Electronics' revenues over the last two quarters.
full_sentence: The new marketing strategy has caused a significant increase in GT Electronics' revenues over the last two quarters.

questions: Beginning June 15, the Transportation Office will raise _____ for renewal of vehicle registration and driver's license.
full_sentence: Beginning June 15, the Transportation Office will raise fees for renewal of vehicle registration and driver's license.

questions: The supplies manager of Coco Steakhouse plans to _____ new kitchen equipment and dinnerware for the restaurant before the end of the month.
full_sentence: The supplies manager of Coco Steakhouse plans to purchase new kitchen equipment and dinnerware for the restaurant before the end of the month.

questions: The director had such a tight schedule that _____ giving a speech at a local event, he immediately left for another appointment.
full_sentence: The director had such a tight schedule that after giving a speech at a local event, he immediately left for another appointment.

questions: The head librarian makes it a point to ring a small bell when the noise at the high school library goes beyond the _____ level.
full_sentence: The head librarian makes it a point to ring a small bell when the noise at the high school library goes beyond the acceptable level.

questions: A good presenter _____ possible questions that the audience might have and prepares his or her answers ahead of time.
full_sentence: A good presenter anticipates possible questions that the audience might have and prepares his or her answers ahead of time.

questions: The editor requested the _____ to give the manuscript one final check after seeing a few errors as he scanned the pages.
full_sentence: The editor requested the proofreader to give the manuscript one final check after seeing a few errors as he scanned the pages.

questions: Most supermarkets carry similar or exactly the same items, but some stores sell their products at _____ higher prices than the others.
full_sentence: Most supermarkets carry similar or exactly the same items, but some stores sell their products at slightly higher prices than the others.

questions: She thought there was enough flour to bake a large cake, but when she checked the pantry, she discovered that there was _____ left.
full_sentence: She thought there was enough flour to bake a large cake, but when she checked the pantry, she discovered that there was little left.

questions: With her fluency in Spanish, Katherine Nichols was able to converse _____ with the clients from Cuba and Mexico.
full_sentence: With her fluency in Spanish, Katherine Nichols was able to converse easily with the clients from Cuba and Mexico.

questions: The office manager asked Evan Farris to buy some printer paper _____ the office supplies store on his way to work.
full_sentence: The office manager asked Evan Farris to buy some printer paper from the office supplies store on his way to work.

questions: None of the safety measures should be _____ by construction workers while they are in a project site.
full_sentence: None of the safety measures should be ignored by construction workers while they are in a project site.

questions: A proofreader at the newspaper _____ checks the details in the articles and verifies the writer's sources.
full_sentence: A proofreader at the newspaper completely checks the details in the articles and verifies the writer's sources.

questions: An announcer said the department store was looking for the person _____ left a diamond ring in the ladies' room.
full_sentence: An announcer said the department store was looking for the person who left a diamond ring in the ladies' room.

questions: The bank reported that a small business it lent money to was _____ expanding its furniture-making shop.
full_sentence: The bank reported that a small business it lent money to was presently expanding its furniture-making shop.

questions: The supervisor could _____ have expected the new plant workers to know how to handle complex machinery.
full_sentence: The supervisor could scarcely have expected the new plant workers to know how to handle complex machinery.

questions: At present, the Perez and Ericta Law Firm has only two lawyers who _____ in intellectual property disputes.
full_sentence: At present, the Perez and Ericta Law Firm has only two lawyers who specialize in intellectual property disputes.

questions: Banking websites must reassure their customers that their personal information is _____ stored online.
full_sentence: Banking websites must reassure their customers that their personal information is securely stored online.

questions: The Chaudary Career Fair was a remarkable success as _____ ten thousand jobseekers received employment offers.
full_sentence: The Chaudary Career Fair was a remarkable success as nearly ten thousand jobseekers received employment offers.

questions: Anyone _____ wishes to cancel their attendance to the seminar must submit a written request to the event organizer's office.
full_sentence: Anyone who wishes to cancel their attendance to the seminar must submit a written request to the event organizer's office.

questions: Dr. Reyes' team of laboratory scientists _____ to finish its analyses of the new medicine samples by March 15.
full_sentence: Dr. Reyes' team of laboratory scientists is expected to finish its analyses of the new medicine samples by March 15.

questions: The history department said that the information in a textbook listed for a course was both inaccurate _____ incomplete.
full_sentence: The history department said that the information in a textbook listed for a course was both inaccurate and incomplete.

questions: Most hoteliers say that one of the real _____ of the industry is staying sustainable during economic crises.
full_sentence: Most hoteliers say that one of the real challenges of the industry is staying sustainable during economic crises.

questions: The results of a recent survey show that the high unemployment rate is _____ the biggest problem by respondents.
full_sentence: The results of a recent survey show that the high unemployment rate is considered the biggest problem by respondents.

questions: The investment company's recent purchase of a majority of Mobile Quick's shares _____ by a spokesperson.
full_sentence: The investment company's recent purchase of a majority of Mobile Quick's shares was announced by a spokesperson.

questions: The assistants were hurrying with preparations as the meeting of the board was expected to begin _____ 10 minutes.
full_sentence: The assistants were hurrying with preparations as the meeting of the board was expected to begin within 10 minutes.

questions: After a 2-hour delay and a long and turbulent flight, most of the passengers were _____ as they disembarked.
full_sentence: After a 2-hour delay and a long and turbulent flight, most of the passengers were irritable as they disembarked.

questions: The company employed several more workers to cover the assembly line in order to ensure that the factory remain _____ during peak product demand.
full_sentence: The company employed several more workers to cover the assembly line in order to ensure that the factory remain productive during peak product demand.

questions: As announced over the loudspeaker system, a demonstration of Prokan's newest electric grill _____ at the Red-Brick Appliance Center in the mall's left wing.
full_sentence: As announced over the loudspeaker system, a demonstration of Prokan's newest electric grill is being held at the Red-Brick Appliance Center in the mall's left wing.

questions: Researchers from the marketing department complained about the _____ budget for the company's advertising campaigns.
full_sentence: Researchers from the marketing department complained about the reduced budget for the company's advertising campaigns.

questions: The administrative department hired a top recruiter to search for an individual with _____ in investments analysis.
full_sentence: The administrative department hired a top recruiter to search for an individual with expertise in investments analysis.

questions: _____ the high cost of expansion, the executive officer was convinced the investment would be a good strategy.
full_sentence: Regardless of the high cost of expansion, the executive officer was convinced the investment would be a good strategy.

questions: Hospital administrators plan to _____ the procedures involved in getting free or low-cost medical treatment.
full_sentence: Hospital administrators plan to simplify the procedures involved in getting free or low-cost medical treatment.

questions: The members of an advertising association _____ next week to discuss efficient methods of marketing.
full_sentence: The members of an advertising association will convene next week to discuss efficient methods of marketing.

questions: The _____ attendance at the convention of psychologists and counselors in Seattle is approximately 5,000 persons.
full_sentence: The estimated attendance at the convention of psychologists and counselors in Seattle is approximately 5,000 persons.

questions: The CEO thanked his staff for _____ the company attain the number one spot in the fast food industry.
full_sentence: The CEO thanked his staff for helping the company attain the number one spot in the fast food industry.

questions: KullervoDesign employees who want to arrange for _____ parking space should contact the building and grounds administrator.
full_sentence: KullervoDesign employees who want to arrange for personal parking space should contact the building and grounds administrator.

questions: For security purposes, outsiders are prohibited from entering the landfill _____ the management's permission.
full_sentence: For security purposes, outsiders are prohibited from entering the landfill without the management's permission.

questions: Tefnut Incorporated's prominent position in the retail industry is _____ due to its innovative approaches to product branding and workforce development.

questions: The author of the best-selling detective fiction series _____ his last novel to an individual that no one knew.

questions: Fixmate Hardware signed consignment _____ with a natural stone supplier and two bathroom fixture manufacturers.

questions: After a short _____, the radio announcer resumed giving updates on the results of the national election.

questions: Neil Torres considers himself _____ to be one of the few selected to transfer to the company's new overseas branch.

questions: Mr. Bentley, the department supervisor, is strict with workers who are remiss in their duties, and constantly reminds them to do their work _____.
