questions: The management has strongly advised employees to avoid making personal calls and _____ private visitors during office hours.

questions: After receiving the inspector's report, the manufacturer immediately _____ with regulations on equipment maintenance.

questions: _____ having the report published, the editor requested the proofreaders to give the manuscript a final check.

questions: Today's weather in Danang will be _____ cloudy with scattered thunderstorms in the afternoon.

questions: _____ plans for the next fiscal year were being made, another team was evaluating concluded projects.

questions: The production staff _____ believes that they should have retested the product before releasing it.

questions: If you plan to register for the upcoming seminar, please _____ us with your contact information.

questions: Workshop participants were informed that the training would not focus _____ on mobile phone technology.

questions: The advertising agency _____ garnered the most awards produced a series of television commercials on family values.

questions: _____ explaining the dangers of taking supplements, the article pointed out that some companies sell fake vitamins.

questions: In compliance with Star Airlines' policies, Adele Lovato paid a service charge for the changes made to the original _____ of her European trip.

questions: In a recent survey, respondents said that they were more interested in functional rather than _____ products.

questions: _____ taking office, the new mayor immediately installed a hotline to allow residents to speak directly to him.

questions: Mr. Baines would like to attend the conference on Wednesday, but he will be _____ Ohio to meet with a branch head.

questions: New employees _____ scheduled trainings with Mr. Davidson in the first week of their probationary period.
full_sentence: New employees attend scheduled trainings with Mr. Davidson in the first week of their probationary period.

questions: The CEO picked Jeremy Torres and Susan Warren to undertake the campaign as they _____ assignments quickly and thoroughly.

questions: The _____ have arrived and the courier would like us to inspect the contents before he continues on his route.

questions: David performed so _____ during the internship that the company offered him a part-time position at the end of the training.

questions: Copperham Museum will present works of European painters and sculptors in the upcoming _____ of Western art.

questions: With a membership card at Taylor's Department Store, shoppers can purchase a brand new microwave oven _____ only $175.

questions: Davy Nesmith brought _____ computer to the shop to have it fixed only to discover that it was closed for the week.

questions: The director accompanied the administrative head to the _____ to determine if it was suitable for headquarters.

questions: A tour group from Brussels visited City Hall, _____ was built in 1908 and has recently been renovated.

questions: _____ with government laws on earphone use in public places will reduce the incidence of accidents on stairs and streets.

questions: To meet unexpected demand during the year, the administration agreed to hire five new workers on a full-time _____.

questions: Although the institution made the announcement only today, the hall for the seminar was _____ filled up.

questions: Even though Sally seems to work _____, she always gets her assignments done ahead of the other workers.

questions: Theevent organizers informed participants that the _____ was postponed because the venue had to be changed.

questions: Only a few experts are capable of _____ restoring a painting, and the museum must be careful to hire the best.

questions: To compete with other supermarkets in the area, Best Store does not add a _____ for delivering groceries.

questions: A worker who was still in training last week _____ for injuries he sustained while using a factory machine.

questions: Although the administrative department was busy, the executive officer asked them to begin working on a(an) _____ version of the employee manual.

questions: The contractor estimated that constructing a 2-story factory of 10,000 square meters would cost _____ three million dollars.

questions: The members of the union supporting the work stoppage _____ for work the day after management gave in to their demands.

questions: The board of directors agreed to hire a full-time individual with legal _____ to handle lawsuits and other matters related to the law.

questions: Participants who attended the cooking workshop said that the _____ of the training was a dish prepared by a renowned chef.

questions: The patient should purchase the medication prescribed by his doctor and should not resort to taking a cheaper _____.

questions: Some first-time investors commit a large amount of money on a popular stock on the _____ belief that it will always earn a profit.

questions: The apartment unit on the tenth floor is more expensive than the other units because it has two bathrooms _____ a laundry room.

questions: Since Mr. Hunt has been in the publishing business for more than thirty years, he is _____ respected by people in the industry.

questions: Some online vendors allow an order to be _____ by the courier of the customer's choice if the content of the package is valuable.

questions: A recently-published health study indicates _____ women with high stress levels have an increased chance of having a heart attack.

questions: A customer representative said that she had not been able to respond to my _____ because it was near closing time.

questions: She told the boss that without temporary workers during the holiday season, the company's _____ drops by as much as 20 percent.

questions: At the seminar, the _____ of the retail store will make a presentation on small-scale business enterprises.

questions: It was not until after _____ had been on the highway for several hours that Peter asked me if I wanted stop at a restaurant for a bite to eat.

questions: Mr. Mercedes is used to changing car oil _____ rather than paying an automobile mechanic to do it.

questions: The company manager will talk to each of the new employees _____ in his office after lunch.

questions: _____ the director of the asset management department, Mr. Fugisawahas full knowledge of the bank's properties.

questions: The interviewer said that the best thing about the first job candidate is that he has strong connections in almost _____ industrial sector in the country.

questions: Interest payments on the country's enormous financial loan from a development bank _____ until the country is able to get back on its feet.

questions: In an interview for an entrepreneurial magazine, the owner of a gift shop said she still remembers the year _____ the store earned its first million.

questions: Most of the employees are happy with the new location of the headquarters as it is _____ situated near a subway station and the bus terminal.

questions: The _____ of the agricultural research service is to provide those in the industry with up-to-date information on growing safe, high-quality produce.

questions: _____ they encountered some setbacks in the beginning, Mr. Potter and his team still managed to finish the building renovations on time.

questions: Dennis Tadsen has been _____ assigned to chair the leadership workshop committee until Mr. Reyes returns from Guam.

questions: The _____ of the holiday sale made consumers' spending power rise significantly.

questions: Mary Jenkins wrote an e-mail to _____ on an earlier conversation she had with an entrepreneur she met at a business ventures convention.

questions: Our stock investing courses for beginners are designed to help professionals _____ their investment decisions and achieve their financial goals.

questions: The National History Education Museum regularly _____ in thousands of visitors who want to learn more about world history in a unique and interesting way.

questions: Our representative _____ the annual media convention took ill yesterday and had to be replaced by the magazine's editor at the last minute.

questions: Though he lost, Keith Towne's impressive _____ at the golf finals earned him the admiration and respect of all the other players.

questions: According to Indra Library's revised borrowing policy, the fee _____ every overdue book is now $0.25 per day.

questions: To prevent the interruption of your cable service, please settle your account at our main office _____ you receive this letter.

questions: _____ part of the government's program to enhance road safety, those who haven't attended a driving improvement course this year must register for a session before October 15.

questions: A spokesman for the company stated in a press release that _____ in launching its latest music player were largely due to a shortage in electronic components

questions: Owners of android smartphones were warned not to download Softworks applications from _____ website not authorized by the company.

questions: To ensure total protection from harmful sun rays, make certain to apply the sunscreen _____ on your skin before going outdoors.

questions: The planned resort hotel being developed by Icabod Properties will be situated _____ the coast of Florida.

questions: Elton was assigned to pack the medical _____ ordered by the health center.

questions: Replacements _____ defective items must be requested within forty-eight hours from the date of delivery.

questions: The business park in Kent is more _____ to people living south of the capital.

questions: The paintings currently on exhibit at the Dreamline Art Center are not _____ but were borrowed to celebrate the establishment's first anniversary.

questions: A movie about disasters on the sea was widely _____ by moviegoers in the mid-twentieth century to be one of the most exciting films ever screened.

questions: Persons who participated in the session on stress management were told to say _____ came to mind during the free discussion period.

questions: _____ unforeseen circumstances, "Art Week for Children" at the Museum of Modern Paintings will be postponed to the first week of August.

questions: In food manufacturing, there are _____ methods for analyzing the nutrition content of finished products, which should be strictly followed.

questions: According to the finance manager, purchasing cars for the company would be _____ than leasing vehicles on an annual basis.

questions: Branch managers are informed _____ about price changes so that they may immediately update their products' barcode information.

questions: _____ a brief intermission, audience members returned to their seats with great anticipation of seeing the story's climax in the second act.

questions: After checking attendance at the workshop, please give _____ the topic outline for the week and copies of all the handouts to be used today.

questions: Although the producer spent little on the actual production of the film, the movie was _____ reviewed by several well-known newspaper critics.

questions: Many carpenters use resin or epoxy glue when making furniture because these substances have the strongest holding power of _____ adhesive in existence.

questions: The city's traffic department is formulating _____ to reduce the high rate of accidents involving vehicles and bicyclists near the intersection.

questions: _____ his father at the helm of the family business, Gordon Scott inherited a sizeable operation with a healthy balance sheet.

questions: Business has been _____ at the restaurant ever since it replaced the outdated menu with recipes of fresh food.

questions: Emily and her team of architects presented a small scale _____ of the proposed shopping mall to the company's board of directors.

questions: In accordance with procedure, new staff are trained in basic administrative _____ before being assigned a particular position in the department.

questions: The construction supplies factory _____ in tile and cement production before it closed down and relocated to a newly developing region.

questions: Stephen Wintour's paintings are _____ not only by the style used but also by the large signature that the artist puts at the bottom right side of the canvas.

questions: Although Katlyn Summers is still on probation this month, the supervisor thinks that she can handle the database entry updates _____.

questions: Applications for the job position of executive administrative assistant must be submitted to HRD's Joyce Chang no later _____ September 5.

questions: The staff _____ the new managing director by hosting a dinner party last night.

questions: Customers who haven't claimed their free discount coupons must do so _____ as the promotion will expire tomorrow.

questions: Mr. Clark rescheduled _____ vacation leave for next week because training for the new writers was extended until Friday.

questions: The notice says that only applicants _____ excellent networking skills and fluency in both Chinese and English will be considered for the position.

questions: The opposition candidate _____ won the election and will have to work hard to satisfy the other half of the constituency that did not vote for him.

questions: The new owner of a house built in the early twentieth century wants to preserve the _____ of the structure by making only minimal changes to the facade.

questions: Local officials will release documentation _____ information on how the mayor used government funds during the election last year.

questions: Production in the factory was halted _____ to allow a technician to remove a plastic component that had become stuck in one of the machines.

questions: The manufacturer had no choice but to add a second shift of workers to _____ the newest smartphone model in time for its release in March.

questions: An _____ of the printing costs for the novel's paperback and hardbound editions is enclosed with this letter.

questions: The cut-off date for application to the university's international trade conference has been _____ to June 1 due to popular demand.

questions: The medical equipment your purchasing officer _____ must be installed according to the requirements and standards described in the manual.

questions: Feuerstein Bakery sells a vast selection _____ baked goods including cakes and pies.

questions: Increasing _____ from electronic manufacturers in Southeast Asia has driven Hang Sang Electronics to be more assertive in their advertising campaigns.

questions: The Czar coffeemakers were recalled _____ after a news report was published about their defective switches.

questions: Forced to slash its monthly production budget, the company decreased _____ by purchasing cheaper raw materials and laying off several workers.

questions: Whiz Works Electronics Manufacturing Company is known for its excellent research department _____ its quality control system is weak and needs regulating.

questions: High intake of fruits and vegetables rich in Vitamin C is strongly _____ for people with common colds.

questions: After the storm, the town's electrical connections were examined very _____ before power supply was restored.

questions: Although most people agree that manufacturing plants must _____ with federal environmental policy, some officials believe that states should make their own laws.

questions: When _____ merchandise for delivery to a customer, employees must make certain that the items ordered and their requested quantities are correct.
full_sentence: When packaging merchandise for delivery to a customer, employees must make certain that the items ordered and their requested quantities are correct.

questions: Weather announcements on radio and television urged people to stay _____ their homes and keep warm until the blizzard had passed.

questions: The memo instructed employees interested in participating in the event to meet _____ Milton Terminal before 8:00 a.m. on January 5.

questions: Winkler Audiobook Club members can update _____ personal information and newsletter subscriptions by logging in and clicking on the "My Account" link.

questions: Please be _____ of other visitors to the public restrooms by wiping the counter with a paper towel after you have finished washing your hands.

questions: Please make copies of the application forms _____ were sent by e-mail as soon as possible.

questions: Mr. Bing was quite _____ with the progress made on the construction of the warehouse in Denver.

questions: The manufacturing consultant concluded that the factory's assembly line was _____ efficient nor productive.

questions: The errors in the author's manuscript _____ and the editor has given the printery the green light to begin typesetting the pages of the book.

questions: Quality control workers are stringently trained to _____ check every stage of the manufacturing process and identify assembly line and product issues.

questions: The company _____ compensation in cases where a worker is injured while using a company vehicle or if an accident occurs on the premises of the factory.

questions: In some Asian countries, it is _____ for workers to work overtime hours without being remunerated for the additional time they give to the company.

questions: Members of the union are planning to go on strike this week to complain of _____ pay and rampant discrimination against entry-level workers.

questions: Teddy not only reserved a hotel room, _____ booked a city tour for the client who will go on a vacation to Macau next week.

questions: Only Mr. Anderson has the legal _____ to transact business on Ms. Krauss' behalf.

questions: Diamond Properties _____ for building high-end houses using environment-friendly materials.

questions: The town was once prosperous but after a large shoe factory became bankrupt, the smaller companies closed one by one and moved _____.

questions: The beverage firm experienced a significant _____ in sales after changing the formula of a soda that was generally unpopular with the public.

questions: _____ the gift shop has had its grand opening and the novelty of the place has worn off, sales of its products have begun to diminish.

questions: The staff were reminded to avoid _____ unnecessary software programs on their computers as they might use up too much hard drive space.

questions: At the keynote speaker's _____, the seminar organizer made arrangements with an audio-visual rental company to supply needed equipment.

questions: According to the accountant, expenses for travel and accommodations during business trips are fully _____, but must be supported by receipts.

questions: The firm's senior officers have agreed to _____ by their decision to terminate a faltering branch, having done everything they could to salvage its operations.

questions: In preparation for an event marking the company's tenth anniversary, a large hall at the Montblanc Hotel has been _____ for the evening of June 15.

questions: The marketing department has been deliberating whether the advertising campaign would be more effective at month's end _____ launching it as originally planned.

questions: The rental contract _____ states that tenants may not refurbish or alter their apartment unit in any way without permission from the landlord.
full_sentence: The rental contract expressly states that tenants may not refurbish or alter their apartment unit in any way without permission from the landlord.

questions: _____ a 10 percent increase in the toll fees charged on the expressways, the traffic on these thoroughfares has not decreased even one bit.

questions: Depositors and customers _____ the Quick Fund Transmission Service are complaining of the high rates charged by the bank for a single transaction.

questions: As supervisor, James Mendoza _____ reviews procedures for product inspection to ensure that all finished items are of the highest quality.

questions: _____ Lester was designated head of the human resources department, he was working as lead supervisor at the company's Wichita plant.

questions: On feedback forms supplied to office employees, a majority of the staff said they were pleased _____ the managerial style of their supervisor.

questions: Michigan Shipping has _____ Mr. Cantos accommodations and a transportation allowance in addition to his basic salary.

questions: Daniel Harris converted Morning Brew _____ a small coffee shop into a global chain of franchise cafes.

questions: Union leaders and the company's managers are _____ working toward an acceptable arrangement that will put an end to the workers' strike.

questions: Offering an easy payment plan for tuition fees helps the university _____ new students who cannot afford to pay for college education.

questions: Bill Warner, _____ worked at a regional branch before being appointed executive director, convened with departmental managers on his first day at headquarters.

questions: Louise Burns, who graduated from a top university in Chicago, has not been able to find a suitable job _____ arriving in New York City last month.

questions: The widely admired pianist Caroline Yu plays the piano _____ and is one of the top performers at the Billington Grand Theater in Chicago.
full_sentence: The widely admired pianist Caroline Yu plays the piano effortlessly and is one of the top performers at the Billington Grand Theater in Chicago.

questions: Anyone interested in attending the leadership training seminar should either inform Lesley at HRD _____ register for the event on the company's website.

questions: _____ Mr. Gariott streamlined the factory's operations, he has successfully reduced the company's overhead costs.

questions: Science Labs has invented a new machine that allows doctors to _____ eye problems more easily.

questions: Before leaving the office at the end of the day, all employees must make certain that _____ of their workspaces is clean and organized.

questions: A colleague recommended getting a subscription to Finance Weekly, _____ it contains the latest information on marketing trends and product demand.

questions: To avoid going overtime during sessions, the instructors were asked to focus only on the points that were considered _____ to their trainings.

questions: The merger of Starworks Incorporated and Thompson Printers ended weeks of _____ regarding the future of the printer manufacturing company.

questions: A good marketing strategy _____ interest in a new item or product line for a prescribed period before actually introducing it into the market.
full_sentence: A good marketing strategy stimulates interest in a new item or product line for a prescribed period before actually introducing it into the market.

questions: Ashley Mair is the university's expert on special needs education _____ Jodi Adamson is the authority on educating children with learning disabilities.

questions: Members of the online community received notice that the site would be _____ from noon until 4 p.m. for a scheduled upgrade.

questions: Tony Daemon and Albert Stacey, the actors _____ movies were advertised on Channel Sync today, both went to Oakland High School.
full_sentence: Tony Daemon and Albert Stacey, the actors whose movies were advertised on Channel Sync today, both went to Oakland High School.

questions: When the soccer game _____ by a power outage, the stadium's security personnel advised viewers to remain seated until the generator was switched on.
full_sentence: When the soccer game was interrupted by a power outage, the stadium's security personnel advised viewers to remain seated until the generator was switched on.

questions: _____ Maldives is popular for its diverse marine ecosystem, many Scuba divers visit the country every year to explore its deep waters.
full_sentence: Since Maldives is popular for its diverse marine ecosystem, many Scuba divers visit the country every year to explore its deep waters.

questions: In the early _____ of Widmark Company's founding, insufficient funds forced the business partners to prioritize obtaining needed capital.
full_sentence: In the early stages of Widmark Company's founding, insufficient funds forced the business partners to prioritize obtaining needed capital.

questions: The Herbs and Spices Restaurant has _____ refused to share recipes for the establishment's most popular dishes with the dining public.

questions: Supervisors at the plant are in charge of _____ the highest standards in operating procedures, manufacturing processes and equipment maintenance.

questions: The week-long assessment and planning session was concluded _____ with a summary of the organization's new goals and strategic plans.

questions: Before _____ the convention hall lobby, please make sure to pick up your identification badge and conference kit at the information counter.
full_sentence: Before leaving the convention hall lobby, please make sure to pick up your identification badge and conference kit at the information counter.

questions: _____ the digital age shapes virtually everything people do today, it has become necessary to redesign the educational system to meet the students' learning needs.
full_sentence: Because the digital age shapes virtually everything people do today, it has become necessary to redesign the educational system to meet the students' learning needs.

questions: The green subway line runs _____ the river and then turns north to City Hall.

questions: As a _____ measure, management requested that security cameras be installed at all exit and entry points of the office building.

questions: The skin clinic's dermatologists are giving _____ new customers a free consultation during the month of October.
full_sentence: The skin clinic's dermatologists are giving their new customers a free consultation during the month of October.

questions: The organizers of the technology convention have decided to give the keynote speaker an extra half hour to speak _____ the length of his speech.

questions: Staff members interested in applying for the position of research and development assistant must submit _____ applications by August 15.
full_sentence: Staff members interested in applying for the position of research and development assistant must submit their applications by August 15.

questions: The supervisor assigned an experienced and knowledgeable employee to serve as mentor to the new _____ in the research department.
full_sentence: The supervisor assigned an experienced and knowledgeable employee to serve as mentor to the new addition in the research department.

questions: As part of a new promotion, guests _____ have stayed at the hotel more than once are entitled to a 20 percent discount on reservations and a complimentary breakfast.
full_sentence: As part of a new promotion, guests who have stayed at the hotel more than once are entitled to a 20 percent discount on reservations and a complimentary breakfast.

questions: The central bank recently decreased interest rates on small loans to _____ a growing demand for capital by women interested in starting a business.
full_sentence: The central bank recently decreased interest rates on small loans to accommodate a growing demand for capital by women interested in starting a business.

questions: The main _____ for the training in September is financial planning and management for persons without a degree in business accounting.
full_sentence: The main theme for the training in September is financial planning and management for persons without a degree in business accounting.

questions: The architects at Urban Space were very _____ to win the bid for the project.

questions: Fedspar Supermarket was able to _____ on foreign suppliers for fruits and vegetables that were not available locally after the typhoon.

questions: During the financial crisis, rumors of corporate bankruptcies _____ surfaced.
full_sentence: During the financial crisis, rumors of corporate bankruptcies continually surfaced.

questions: For those who require expedited shipping, the manufacturer will ship orders via next business day delivery upon _____ of payment.

questions: Mobile phone companies today are experiencing a(n) _____ decline in smartphone sales, forcing some manufacturers to turn to computerized gear.

questions: In an effort _____ high newsstand sales and increased circulation of the magazine, the publisher hired a distribution services consultant.
full_sentence: In an effort to ensure high newsstand sales and increased circulation of the magazine, the publisher hired a distribution services consultant.

questions: Visitors _____ the building are reminded to surrender their visitor's pass to the receptionist in the lobby and to collect their identification card.
full_sentence: Visitors leaving the building are reminded to surrender their visitor's pass to the receptionist in the lobby and to collect their identification card.

questions: The local newspaper reported that community members are planning to donate _____ the expansion of the pediatrics unit in the town's only hospital.
full_sentence: The local newspaper reported that community members are planning to donate toward the expansion of the pediatrics unit in the town's only hospital.

questions: The foreman will examine the structural damage to the building caused by the hurricane and _____ repairs as soon as approval is given.

questions: Because her order has been delayed, Mrs. Walters was _____ contacted by the owner of the store.

questions: All passengers on board the tour bus must fasten their safety belts in compliance with _____ government laws.

questions: The management of South Murphy Medical Center _____ a new set of visiting guidelines to ensure the security of its patients.

questions: This year's exposition of products _____ in the state will attract thousands of visitors, including wholesalers, retailers and distributors.

questions: Dominic Franz said that his stint as a(n) _____ in a country under martial law taught him to appreciate the freedoms enjoyed by people in his country.
full_sentence: Dominic Franz said that his stint as a(n) correspondent in a country under martial law taught him to appreciate the freedoms enjoyed by people in his country.

questions: _____ retired from his position as executive director, Mark Seeger is now ready to write his memoirs of the experiences he had in the technology industry.
full_sentence: Having retired from his position as executive director, Mark Seeger is now ready to write his memoirs of the experiences he had in the technology industry.

questions: Weston Marketing Firm received the most prestigious advertising award because of its _____ high standards and its creative, funny and relevant ads.
full_sentence: Weston Marketing Firm received the most prestigious advertising award because of its consistently high standards and its creative, funny and relevant ads.

questions: A cooperative agreement between the state university and several corporations will allow hundreds of students to avail _____ grants for tuition and other fees.
full_sentence: A cooperative agreement between the state university and several corporations will allow hundreds of students to avail of grants for tuition and other fees.

questions: The CEO is considering establishing a factory in an Asian country but wants to study the local _____ of the people before taking definite steps.
full_sentence: The CEO is considering establishing a factory in an Asian country but wants to study the local practices of the people before taking definite steps.

questions: The current financial situation of the company will be discussed _____ the board of directors meets in the conference room tomorrow.
full_sentence: The current financial situation of the company will be discussed when the board of directors meets in the conference room tomorrow.

questions: Cal-Soft's new computer game has several _____ features, allowing players to communicate with each other.
full_sentence: Cal-Soft's new computer game has several interactive features, allowing players to communicate with each other.

questions: Writers who wish to improve their knowledge of grammar rules and word usage may _____ a short English course this weekend.
full_sentence: Writers who wish to improve their knowledge of grammar rules and word usage may attend a short English course this weekend.

questions: The grand ballroom has been reserved between 6 P.M. _____ 10 P.M. for the fundraising event.

questions: Toppenham Realty is searching for an applicant who has significant experience in setting up a branch office and managing it from its very _____.

questions: The addition of two subway lines extending across the city _____ demand from commuters for more routes to downtown.
full_sentence: The addition of two subway lines extending across the city induced demand from commuters for more routes to downtown.

questions: A memo was sent to all the staff reminding them that the conference room on the third floor is to be used _____ for meetings of managers and the board.

questions: Winners of the Grape Fizz Beverage Company's raffle may collect their checks at the company's headquarters or receive a(n) _____ prize in kind.
full_sentence: Winners of the Grape Fizz Beverage Company's raffle may collect their checks at the company's headquarters or receive a(n) equivalent prize in kind.

questions: _____ Jasmine Perfumery will launch its new line of fragrances this month depends on the readiness of the staff in charge of the campaign.
full_sentence: Whether Jasmine Perfumery will launch its new line of fragrances this month depends on the readiness of the staff in charge of the campaign.

questions: All of the participants found the leadership workshop beneficial; besides, the executives especially thought it _____.
full_sentence: All of the participants found the leadership workshop beneficial; besides, the executives especially thought it productive.

questions: We at Harper's Consulting are _____ updating our services to ensure that you are getting the most for your money.
full_sentence: We at Harper's Consulting are continually updating our services to ensure that you are getting the most for your money.

questions: Since the operations manager is unavailable this week, the pilot test for the research laboratory will be _____ until Monday.
full_sentence: Since the operations manager is unavailable this week, the pilot test for the research laboratory will be postponed until Monday.

questions: The department store will be _____ closed while renovations on all floors are being made and is expected to reopen by the end of the month.
full_sentence: The department store will be temporarily closed while renovations on all floors are being made and is expected to reopen by the end of the month.

questions: The older buildings _____ the glass and steel skyscraper were built in the 1950s and will be torn down to make way for other construction.
full_sentence: The older buildings surrounding the glass and steel skyscraper were built in the 1950s and will be torn down to make way for other construction.

questions: A restaurant serving vegetarian food was recently opened in London, and although food critics were initially _____, they now say it serves innovative dishes.
full_sentence: A restaurant serving vegetarian food was recently opened in London, and although food critics were initially skeptical, they now say it serves innovative dishes.

questions: A news broadcast reported that the _____ temperatures in the south has forced farmers to stay up nights to protect their warm weather crops.

questions: _____ Andrew once remarked that he had spent very little time riding a motorcycle, judging from his driving skills, he is definitely no beginner.
full_sentence: Although Andrew once remarked that he had spent very little time riding a motorcycle, judging from his driving skills, he is definitely no beginner.

questions: The surgeon removed what appeared to be a small instrument left in the patient's abdominal region from a surgery _____ months earlier.
full_sentence: The surgeon removed what appeared to be a small instrument left in the patient's abdominal region from a surgery conducted months earlier.

questions: The research on herbal plants, under the _____ of Dr. Timothy Houser, led to the discovery of alternative sources of medicine.
full_sentence: The research on herbal plants, under the direction of Dr. Timothy Houser, led to the discovery of alternative sources of medicine.

questions: Consumer Bulletin this month highly recommended _____ of Gunner Cameras' latest models for optimal digital imaging.

questions: No member of the staff may take a leave of absence _____ a signed permission form from their supervisor.

questions: _____ we want to meet our production goals this year, we have to invest in advanced factory equipment.

questions: The _____ of the poll show that most cellular phone customers prefer month-to-month payment plans.

questions: Individuals who wish to go camping inside the Rayon National Park must _____ permission from the ranger office and pay a fee of $15.

questions: There are _____ benefits to becoming a commission-based salesperson, one of which is the additional compensation made on unlimited sales.

questions: Several employees _____ offered to stay at the office over the weekend in anticipation of increased online sales during the holiday season.

questions: The company needs a maintenance worker who can _____ handle any technical problem involving any of the equipment or machines at the office.

questions: Although experts predicted a decline in consumer spending because of the economic downturn, it has not diminished as much as they _____ believed it would.

questions: Airport officials are keeping track of a developing hurricane in the area _____ might impact flight schedules within the next several days and result in unavoidable delays.

questions: The Pine Ridge Group recently announced their determination to construct a retail complex _____ to the popular Colfax Lake Park in order to attract a larger number of shoppers.

questions: _____ managers and staff can benefit from the workshops designed by a psychological institute to improve relationships within the workplace.

questions: Be ready to demonstrate your teaching skills by presenting a five-minute lesson on any of the topics listed in the _____ to this e-mail.

questions: When promoting staff to executive positions, the operations manager selects employees _____ track records are highly impressive.
full_sentence: When promoting staff to executive positions, the operations manager selects employees whose track records are highly impressive.

questions: The factory completed the wholesale shoe order on time despite _____ unreasonably tight schedule.

questions: Because supplies are monitored very closely, we ask that you not take anything out of the stationery drawer _____ telling the office supervisor.

questions: A $100 _____ is generally required for clients who would like to open a checking account at the Shimitzu Commercial Bank.

questions: The Hanson Dance Group requests the audience to _____ switch off all electronic devices during the ballet performance.

questions: _____ the foreign delegates arrive at the airport, volunteers will bring them to their assigned hotels and inform them of the day's activities.

questions: The purpose of the survey is to obtain data from _____ respondents to determine whether there is a market for a new line of hygiene products.

questions: In one residential district, the local government provides inexpensive housing spaced ten meters _____ to people in the low income bracket.

questions: _____ benefit of relocating to the downtown area is that most of the employees live within the city and will find it much more convenient to commute to work.

questions: The Art for Kids workshop will be _____ from May 7 to 9 at the McKinley Museum.

questions: Individuals immigrating to Canada should follow the official _____, which takes anywhere from a few months to several years.
full_sentence: Individuals immigrating to Canada should follow the official procedure, which takes anywhere from a few months to several years.

questions: What made the artists' sculptures _____ impressive was their use of recycled materials to make fine works of art.

questions: Esquivel Holdings is considering investing in a small software company _____ concerns that the business is very close to bankruptcy.

questions: The museum, which houses valuable paintings and sculptures _____ at millions of dollars, purchased a costly insurance plan to protect against losses.

questions: Although some staff have requested to receive their pay in cash, the company policy is to deposit employee earnings _____ into a savings account.

questions: Federal law requires a team of trained personnel to _____ a thorough inspection of all food distribution facilities in the region twice a year.

questions: Sycamore Hotel has received impressive reviews for being _____ to guests' special requests.

questions: Mr. Jason Speaks has been chosen _____ Ms. Baldwin as the chief procurement officer of the logistics department.

questions: To meet _____ monthly deadline, Karen spent extra hours in the office to finish the sales reports.
full_sentence: To meet her monthly deadline, Karen spent extra hours in the office to finish the sales reports.

questions: University graduates who want a _____ career are often disappointed when they find themselves working as a clerk or waiting on tables in a restaurant.

questions: If you plan to join the convention of architects and engineers next weekend but haven't registered, please do _____ by the end of this week.
full_sentence: If you plan to join the convention of architects and engineers next weekend but haven't registered, please do so by the end of this week.

questions: In _____ of a local custom to maintain the cleanliness of the floor, visitors are required to take off their shoes and leave them at the entrance.

questions: _____ items sent by post may be shipped back to the manufacturer at no additional cost to the customer and will be refunded or exchanged on request.

questions: We would like to inform our customers that prices in our product catalogue will be increased by 10 percent _____ rising raw material and shipping costs.

questions: Economic stimulus measures _____ by the government to encourage the establishment of businesses and the production of jobs for the unemployed.

questions: The new Northpole Tower is _____ taller than Windsor Building on Fifth Street.

questions: Most manufacturers rely on freight services to transport their products, but Woodwork Industries is one of the _____ that has a cargo plane of its own.
full_sentence: Most manufacturers rely on freight services to transport their products, but Woodwork Industries is one of the few that has a cargo plane of its own.

questions: A copy of each year's revenue report _____ in a secure vault.
full_sentence: A copy of each year's revenue report is being kept in a secure vault.

questions: A consultant can assess the professional needs of a company and help _____ the training programs required to maintain and improve the employees' skills.
full_sentence: A consultant can assess the professional needs of a company and help develop the training programs required to maintain and improve the employees' skills.

questions: A new contractor was hired to oversee construction of the company's manufacturing facility _____ the one hired earlier backed out.
full_sentence: A new contractor was hired to oversee construction of the company's manufacturing facility after the one hired earlier backed out.

questions: Sync Online has delivered copies of contracts to _____ the parties who have agreed to participate in a new venture to offer music on the Internet.

questions: A delicatessen on East Street was _____ operated by a neighbor, but it has since closed down and been replaced by a small grocery store.

questions: The decision to hire additional shift workers was made in _____ of an increase in demand for electric blankets during the winter months.

questions: _____ followers of the nationwide singing competition have made it the number one show on television since it first aired nearly 15 years ago.

questions: Wirecom International has two vacancies in the logistics department that it needs to _____ within three weeks.

questions: Janice was able to deliver an excellent presentation about online marketing strategies _____ she had very little time to prepare for it.

questions: The footwear manufacturer has sold over 3 million pairs of men's and women's shoes worldwide _____ it was first established a decade ago.

questions: Employees who commute to work by car have to _____ slow moving traffic on busy lanes and are thus stressed out by the time they arrive at the office.

questions: The support and assistance provided by the administrative department to employees planning to transfer to an overseas branch is greatly _____.

questions: The plan to postpone the company outing until _____ the end of May will ensure the participation of as many managers and staff as possible.

questions: A number of furniture pieces sold at Home Buddy are _____ designed for small and modern apartment spaces.

questions: When purchasing a residential or business property, an _____ down payment is required of clients on an installment plan.

questions: At the meeting, the chief communications officer _____ on hiring an advertising consultant to enhance the company's marketing strategies.
full_sentence: At the meeting, the chief communications officer insisted on hiring an advertising consultant to enhance the company's marketing strategies.

questions: The production and printing of educational materials for university students was _____ to the formation of the Learners Publishing House.

questions: Although Sound-G11 is not the best music player on the market, it sells more than the most technically sophisticated music player because of _____ affordability.
full_sentence: Although Sound-G11 is not the best music player on the market, it sells more than the most technically sophisticated music player because of its affordability.

questions: Before _____ the equipment, make sure that the cable is securely attached to the computer and the printer is plugged into an outlet and turned on.
full_sentence: Before installing the equipment, make sure that the cable is securely attached to the computer and the printer is plugged into an outlet and turned on.

questions: The Humphries Business Training Center _____ charges $250 for its 4-week business courses but will offer a 10 percent discount during the month of its anniversary.

questions: McCloud & Hirsch _____ places first in international advertising competitions for its candid and appealing television commercials and ad campaigns.

questions: The company provides members _____ a wide array of Internet-related services such as a search engine, file storage, online advertising and e-mail delivery.

questions: Broadcaster Hanna Sieland, _____ has just accepted a position with another news network, will be replaced by Andreas Buschet next month.
full_sentence: Broadcaster Hanna Sieland, who has just accepted a position with another news network, will be replaced by Andreas Buschet next month.

questions: Several Asian countries have lowered their corporate tax rates in an effort to _____ foreign companies to invest in their industries.

questions: When selecting a summer vacation destination, it is always _____ to look up the official Web sites of resort hotels.
full_sentence: When selecting a summer vacation destination, it is always helpful to look up the official Web sites of resort hotels.

questions: Due to budget cuts, our company will _____ limit its participation in international conferences and other business-related activities.

questions: Updates about the release of John Murphy's latest mystery novel will be _____ on the author's Web site.

questions: Han Petroleum Corporation chose a _____ site for its new gasoline station at Dierah, a developing business district in Dubai.

questions: Only two of the _____ members of a local branch of Clean Environment are still connected with the group, whose membership has since doubled.

questions: Soon after the CEO resigned, the company's second in command _____ the title, and an announcement of the company's new administrator was made.

questions: To allow managers to meet _____ having to leave their offices, the company uses a website application to connect their officers via tablet or desktop computer.

questions: To orient employees transferring overseas with an international work environment, Rosen and Katz Associates _____ a business etiquette counselor who conducts sessions on intercultural communication and behavior.
full_sentence: To orient employees transferring overseas with an international work environment, Rosen and Katz Associates engages a business etiquette counselor who conducts sessions on intercultural communication and behavior.

questions: A supervisor dispatched a technician to the conference room _____ the presenter failed to find a solution to the problem of a rotating projector that showed only partial images.

questions: The film director thought the movie was too _____ for the public, so he spent a few weeks editing it until it was about two hours long.

questions: Foreign and independent films are _____ evaluated and rated by the Movie Regulation Board before they are approved for public viewing at local cinemas.

questions: Some manufacturing plant owners believe that finding alternative sources of energy and meeting environmental standards are very _____ to put into practice.

questions: Further _____ about the proposed addition of medical services at the Lawson County Hospital will be discussed in the board meeting tomorrow.

questions: The proposal submitted by the team was _____, but the supervisor requested them to review the project's budgetary requirements.

questions: The local government office recently approved the construction of the dam _____ objections by a majority of the residents in the community.

questions: Stockholders in _____ of the proposed merger of Whitmore Beverage Company and Boyles Brewery indicated their approval by raising their hands.

questions: Mrs. Shields will be relocating, so make sure that all her accounts are settled _____ she moves out.

questions: For security reasons, all employees are required to _____ their identification cards while inside the office building during business hours.

questions: Fit&Right Health Club includes exercise studios, personal lockers _____ shower rooms among the many facilities accessible to its members.

questions: The progress report and the account statement of the BK Railway project are attached _____ this e-mail.

questions: A supervisor in the accounting division is trying to decide which accounting software would be most _____ for the staff to use.

questions: As _____, operating costs at the factory will increase by 25 percent by the end of the month, which will make it necessary for us to raise our prices.

questions: Finance experts at the bank help their clients _____ informed and timely decisions on investing their savings, whether it be in stock, bonds or real estate.

questions: The hospital has a shortage of _____ surgeons, and for this reason, it has begun inviting surgeons from other hospitals with excellent earnings and benefits packages.

questions: Alpine Manufacturers is considering hiring an expert to evaluate how _____ the plant's mechanical systems are and where improvements can be made to speed up production.

questions: An airport official announced a delay in the arrival of the 11:30 flight from Tokyo, Japan, and advised passengers waiting for confirmation that it would land _____ noon.

questions: The newest printing technology allows individuals without access to a computer to _____ send a document from a mobile phone to a printer at home or in the office.

questions: Due to the excessive rain and flooding, government passed a provision making agricultural producers _____ for disaster assistance aid to help cover production losses.

questions: Bernard Hough, Italy's best fashion designer, has brought new life to the world of fashion with his _____ feminine yet functional clothes for autumn.

questions: A special committee _____ to evaluate the failed marketing campaign for the latest Ybox software, and the CEO expects a report before the end of the week.

questions: As the leading _____ of wireless services, Thunder Telecom ensures that its customers receive the clearest mobile phone reception and fastest data transmission at affordable rates.

questions: The factory supervisor plans _____ the number of shifts during the first half of the fiscal year as the demand for air conditioning units has risen.

questions: Please make sure all the documentary requirements and forms are complete before _____ your application to Ella Smith at Human Resources.

questions: Frank Burke is scheduled to assume his new position in the company beginning next month, and this will _____ his responsibilities in the weeks to come.

questions: Helix International showed its _____ to creating high quality cosmetics by hiring only experienced researchers, dermatologists and product engineers to develop safe and effective products.

questions: Staff members are _____ to notify their supervisor in case they cannot make it to the office on time.

questions: A memorandum from the head of the administrative office is requesting supervisors to submit _____ for the upcoming 'Outstanding Employees' awards night.

questions: _____ the new sales office of Benson Corporation is finished, the company can better cater to the needs of its clients.

questions: The head office of A&C Banking and Finance is _____ three kilometers of its customer service building.

questions: The construction of a chain of small hotels throughout the northern and eastern regions of the United States should be completed _____ the end of the year.

questions: The manager asked a work supervisor to look into the _____ increase in absences over the past few months and to provide recommendations.

questions: As proof of our _____ to an agreement made with our partners on the hotel building project, we will be providing a construction timetable this week.

questions: The film's last showing is set for nine o' clock, so it is best to have dinner _____ either at home or at a nearby dining establishment.

questions: The director gave final approval of the marketing campaign, but _____ the timetable, he made recommendations for an earlier implementation.

questions: The invited speaker gave a lengthy _____ on software design and demonstrated how a single concept may be used to produce a variety of programs.

questions: Getting things right the first time is important, especially now that we _____ have three condominium units to put up within the year.

questions: An alarm _____ at Johansson Laboratories whenever a visitor enters a restricted area.

questions: Following the unexpected resignation of Jeremy Bordon, Julie Williams _____ interim executive director until a permanent replacement can be appointed.

questions: _____ did the book top the bestseller list, but it also won a prestigious award in the United States.

questions: The printing press is delivered only partly _____, but it comes with detailed instructions on how to finish putting the different parts together.

questions: The job posting contains all the necessary _____ regarding vacant positions at Johnson Savings Bank.

questions: The marketing staff should _____ their weekly progress report before starting a new project.

questions: Bravo Food Services caters _____ meals for offices and other workplaces in the business district.

questions: Monitored calls between the store and our customers show that callers react _____ to the blunt and hurried way that some representatives speak.

questions: Customers whose packages are returned to our warehouse due to errors on the shipping labels will be _____ a full refund.

questions: _____ caring for the political and economic interests of their own country, embassy officials promote cordial relations and commercial ties with the host nation.

questions: The business sector has regained some confidence after consumer spending increased _____ in June as a result of a decline in the prices of commodities.

questions: In countries where women don't shake hands, Julie, one of the company's traveling representatives, is never sure whether to extend _____ when she meets someone.
full_sentence: In countries where women don't shake hands, Julie, one of the company's traveling representatives, is never sure whether to extend hers when she meets someone.

questions: The memorandum reminded interested ones that _____ to the communications seminar at Malcolm Center is on a first come, first served basis.

questions: Professor Miranda Clooney _____ novels and history books about Asia during her ten-year stay in Hong Kong.

questions: This book contains tips on how to _____ the life of your home appliances and save energy.

questions: A group of scientists published a study on global warming, stating in explicit _____ what its effects would be on climate and sea levels over the next ten years.

questions: The receptionist referred visitors to the attendants for information _____ to the use of cameras and other recording equipment in the main hall.

questions: The local government office _____ an all-day event next month to commemorate the 125th anniversary of the establishment of the city.

questions: The new production management _____ will definitely help the factory conserve manufacturing and labor costs.

questions: The inventors have _____ a brief audio-visual presentation showcasing the features of the automatic door lock.

questions: The Micro Software Company _____ its recent gains in market to price cutting.

questions: The marketing manager was concerned _____ the major changes in the working condition.

questions: Candidates must have a doctor's degree to be eligible _____ the professional positions in this company.

questions: The airport shuttle leaves every hour _____ the hour Monday through Saturday.

questions: _____ 1996 there were no methods for curing AIDS but in 1997 a research team led by Dr. David Ho developed "AIDS cocktail".
full_sentence: Prior to 1996 there were no methods for curing AIDS but in 1997 a research team led by Dr. David Ho developed "AIDS cocktail".

questions: Attractive remuneration _____ with qualifications, experience, and commitment will be offered to all successful candidates.

questions: If we modernize our management, we will continue to grow and prosper well _____ the next century.

questions: He was _____ known as Alan Smith before he was forced to change his name because of his involvement in the CIA.

questions: I will only _____ receipt of a letter once I have it in front of me and I am given some time to go through it and give it my own seal of approval.
full_sentence: I will only acknowledge receipt of a letter once I have it in front of me and I am given some time to go through it and give it my own seal of approval.

questions: The board has made a _____ decision to approve the appointment of our new company president, so I would like to Introduce him to you now.

questions: Before you decide to travel around Europe, it is important to go to a travel agent so that you can put together a good _____.

questions: The privatization of the transport industry will result in a huge _____ for the economy of the region.

questions: Whenever you buy some milk at the store, it is important to check the _____ date on the side of the bottle.

questions: _____ had Mr. Kim left the office than his employees stopped work and put their feet up for the rest of the day.

questions: _____ all of the actors had learned their lines before they started rehearsing for the new production of the classic musical, CATS.

questions: Parking spaces will be _____ to all company employees as soon as everyone has paid the registration fee.

questions: The fact that the man was a known felon is irrelevant _____ the evidence which has been presented in this case today.

questions: Media _____ of this year's Olympics will be far more extensive than the previous time, so that viewers will be able to see as much of the games as possible.

questions: Our travel agency will provide full compensation for any _____ vacation bookings or plane tickets our clients have bought this summer.

questions: This amazing offer for a new HealthWalker fitness machine will be available at _____ outlets this summer.

questions: There is a general fear amongst residents of this town that waste from the nearby industrial site will _____ their water supply.

questions: All personnel must _____ their immediate supervisors if there are any changes to the running schedule at the plant.

questions: Help me to get this sick person to hospital, _____ he might suffer permanent brain damage or paralysis.

questions: The bridge will be _____ construction for the next two years, so please use the alternative route until it is finished.

questions: I will be away until next Tuesday, _____ if any of my friends call for me please take a message and tell them I will get back to them as soon as possible.
full_sentence: I will be away until next Tuesday, so if any of my friends call for me please take a message and tell them I will get back to them as soon as possible.

questions: A list of telephone _____ will be made available to all employees as soon as possible so that anyone can be easily contacted during working hours.

questions: Once we have planned the length of your stay in the United Kingdom, we will be able to _____ your flight number and hotel reservations.

questions: Once you reach adulthood, you will be able to make an _____ decision about your future career and marriage plans.

questions: In order to free up some space on the hard drive of this computer, I will have to _____ many files from the folders in my directory.

questions: Even though the situation in the Middle East is very tense presently, I think that effective _____ by the Western powers in the dispute will help to ease these tensions.

questions: I think we should take _____ of the present favorable economic circumstances and invest as much money as possible in saving for the future.

questions: I think that we can _____ that all the victims of the recent Concorde air crash were killed immediately on impact with the ground.

questions: The president is _____ available for comment on the issue of recent tax cuts in the federal budget this year.

questions: When crossing the enemy lines, the soldiers were told by their commanding officer to proceed with _____.

questions: The development of high technology industry in this country will almost definitely increase the _____ for economic growth.

questions: The decisions of this company are strongly influenced not only by the needs of its clients, but also by the decisions of the _____.
full_sentence: The decisions of this company are strongly influenced not only by the needs of its clients, but also by the decisions of the stockholders.

questions: The salesman _____ the amazing features of the new cell-phone which included voice recognition programming and internet access.

questions: The long-term _____ for economic recovery in this region of the country is fairly good, however it will take a lot of effort by the citizens to make things change.
full_sentence: The long-term forecast for economic recovery in this region of the country is fairly good, however it will take a lot of effort by the citizens to make things change.

questions: If you are walking late at night in this neighborhood, try to be conscious _____ your surroundings at all times.

questions: He was a very good administrator, but he was known to _____ when it came to issues relating to the staff in his company.

questions: I know that you are _____ a very difficult time presently, but please don't take it out on me.

questions: At this time, I would like to _____ a number of pertinent issues that affect all of the people living in this city.

questions: I hope that all forms of racial or gender _____ will be eradicated within the next few years, so that all people can reach their true potential.

questions: He rose to the _____ of head teacher within just a few weeks of arriving at the elementary school.

questions: In light of new evidence in this case, I think we can now _____ the list of suspects.

questions: The most important element of hotel management is maintaining high standards of customer service and _____.

questions: This company has only a _____ interest in trade with Eastern Europe because of recent economic troubles in that region.

questions: I sincerely hope that the craft fair will help to _____ funds to keep our charity alive.

questions: The World AIDS Conference next week will focus _____ effective ways to prevent transmission of the disease amongst young people.

questions: The police chief told the detective to _____ with the investigation after the evidence had been gathered.

questions: There had been a number of messages left for him _____ the day, but he was unavailable for comment.

questions: The governor will be _____ for comment as soon as he has been advised by the president this afternoon.

questions: I will come with you to the concert _____ you don't drink and drive on the way home.

questions: _____ I don't see you later, have a good afternoon and a wonderful evening with your family.
full_sentence: In time I don't see you later, have a good afternoon and a wonderful evening with your family.

questions: The estimate which the government proposed for economic growth this year doesn't come _____ to the actual figures.

questions: Please _____ this form carefully for any possible typing errors before it goes to the printing press next week.

questions: We have _____ to understand how the HIV virus will affect the world and the general health of people in the future.

questions: If you don't _____ with the local traffic regulations you may be fined or even jailed for up to a month.

questions: The _____ of toxic substances produced by exhaust fumes may result in allergies and respiratory illness.

questions: Office supplies are _____ weekly so as to make sure there are always adequate provisions in our offices.

questions: The town we are going to visit today is approximately 15 kilometers _____ from the downtown area of Seoul.

questions: The contents of the UFO found in the Sahara desert last month _____ description.

questions: The constant overproduction of toxic waste products _____ account for phenomena such as global warming.

questions: The most important thing to bear in mind when running a large restaurant is customer _____.

questions: _____ of harmful substances into the atmosphere is causing the protective ozone layer to become depleted.

questions: I will _____ all the proposals made at the last council meeting before I make a final decision on the matter.

questions: The management will _____ sick leave to any employees who feel burnt out and are consequently unable to fulfill their normal duties.

questions: All our clients will be presented with a highly _____ booklet designed to bring to attention all the most important elements of our new program.

questions: The suggestion that the witness should be allowed to give evidence was _____ received by the presiding judge of the court.

questions: The musical playing at the LG Arts Center presently had _____ high attendance that they had to promise an extra show at the end of the season.

questions: The charges brought before the court today are so serious that justice will have to be dealt out _____ to the accused without any chance for appeal.

questions: Mr. Lee was a very _____ and talented member of the team because he always had good ideas and was willing to persevere even when times were rough.

questions: Please _____ the application for employment to my senior manager as soon as possible, so that we can come to a decision by next week.

questions: The bridge _____ and fell into the river.

questions: She has put _____ a lot of weight since last year.

questions: The modern steam engine was first _____ to facilitate the mining of coal.

questions: I found the start quite boring so I _____ really got into the story.

questions: He earns $15,000 a year, _____ his wife gets at least $30,000.

questions: Poor sales forced the company to _____ bankruptcy.

questions: David was _____ with his job in Chicago so he asked for a transfer to the Los Angeles office.

questions: _____ his lifetime, Frederick Jones was awarded more than sixty patents for his inventions.

questions: The reporter is not _____ detailed to give us all the information we require.

questions: Automobile manufacturers are now _____ air bags in many passenger car models.

questions: I will try to be there _____ 6 P.M. at the latest.

questions: There _____ quite a few robberies around here just recently.

questions: They missed _____ opportunity to make a sale.
full_sentence: They missed an opportunity to make a sale.

questions: Everyone in the art community was _____ to the opening of the exhibition.

questions: There is no _____ evidence of his guilt than the fingerprint on the gun.

questions: If rents continue to rise, many local businesses may decide to _____.

questions: Prior to our conference, the executive director had requested that everyone _____ well prepared.

questions: As far as he _____, the outcome was quite satisfactory.

questions: The house is _____ big enough for the whole family.

questions: _____ the problem with the car we enjoyed our journey very much.

questions: I'd rather not go to Japan, _____ my husband insists that we go.

questions: Some members feared _____ Germany might raise its interest rates on Tuesday.

questions: Once each year the main office _____ an employee dinner.

questions: Her lawyers have _____ her against making any statement to the press.

questions: On careful inspection, it was determined that the press pass was _____.

questions: The group _____ an interesting report on young people's responses on advertising.

questions: I'll let you know my decision as soon as I _____ my lawyer.

questions: Overseas trade is expected to increase _____ next year.

questions: She is happier _____ than she was yesterday.

questions: The company laid off many employees _____ sluggish business.

questions: Three of the packages arrived this week, but _____ did not.
full_sentence: Three of the packages arrived this week, but the others did not.

questions: Travellers who are willing to fix their own _____ are able to avoid the tourist crowds.

questions: _____ attempts were made to locate the lost shipment.

questions: Many people _____ the use of natural fur in clothing.

questions: There is _____ candy left in the basket.

questions: There was little time left to _____ the job.

questions: _____ child wanting to join the after-school club should see Mrs. Williams.

questions: The company currently has no _____ positions.

questions: During their lifetime, some people may need more medical _____ than others.

questions: When I told my friend I hadn't brought my nametag, he said that he hadn't _____.

questions: This summer promises to be the most _____ on record.

questions: Federal _____ will be cut 50 percent over the next fiscal year.

questions: The Times is the best newspaper in _____.
full_sentence: The Times is the best newspaper in circulation.

questions: Newborn babies must be handled _____.

questions: Because of his good behavior, the prisoner was granted _____.
full_sentence: Because of his good behavior, the prisoner was granted parole.

questions: Government specifications require that all equipment be produced in _____ sizes.

questions: Construction of the canal _____ approximately twelve years.

questions: It was discovered that there was no factual basis to the _____ heard in the cafeteria.
full_sentence: It was discovered that there was no factual basis to the rumor heard in the cafeteria.

questions: With the increase, the advertising department's budget will _____ for the next fiscal year.
full_sentence: With the increase, the advertising department's budget will double for the next fiscal year.

questions: The company had to _____ from consideration many of the applicants because there were just too many.
full_sentence: The company had to omit from consideration many of the applicants because there were just too many.

questions: The _____ for the project has been moved to the end of the month.
full_sentence: The deadline for the project has been moved to the end of the month.

questions: The _____ in Congress over the budget could last the entire session.

questions: The company refuses to offer a bid until they see the rest of the _____.

questions: The charity receives its funding from both corporate and individual _____.

questions: The office will replace all of the _____ computers with new ones.

questions: The bulletin board is a method to keep employees _____ about changes in company policies.

questions: At the end of the year, the most _____ employees are given certificates for coming to work on time.
full_sentence: At the end of the year, the most punctual employees are given certificates for coming to work on time.

questions: All government offices will be closed until _____ notice.

questions: The farmers are all hoping _____ rain within a few days.

questions: There are lots of laughs in _____ for the audience attending the show tonight.

questions: If you haven't seen the latest thriller, _____ go see is together.

questions: We, the undersigned, conjoin our current holdings with those of the Pierce Group and the Dulling Corporation to _____ the acquisition of Fowler Publishing Company of Grand Rapids.

questions: Without a _____ strategy, one understood by all of the employees, this whole project may go adrift.

questions: In my twenty-five years on this job, I have never seen a promoter so _____ about his product.

questions: In time, we learned to _____ each other's views.

questions: _____ shortage is predicted in this area next year.

questions: In an effort to conserve natural resources recycling has been _____ in many communities across the nation.

questions: My doctor suggested _____ the medicine.

questions: As a last-ditch effort to increase sales, they put all of their money into _____.

questions: The governor has said _____ and again that he is tired of being forced to capitulated on one tax increase after another.

questions: When stress or depressive episodes become _____ occurrences, help should be sought immediately to forestall serious emotional problems.

questions: The Chinese government accused the U.S. of exaggerating its trade deficit _____ encouraging a policy of restrictions on imports.

questions: I like greeting guests but _____ answering the phone.

questions: The boss does not want to hear any more _____ today.

questions: A _____ in salary may improve employee morale.

questions: You will receive your pizza _____ thirty minutes of placing your order.

questions: _____ mismanagement, the business closed one year after it opened.

questions: The cabin couldn't have been move beautiful; however, the whole area was _____ with mosquitoes.

questions: There is next to nothing in communications between North and South Korea which could be called _____.

questions: The government board intended to _____ all funds which had been collected by the breakaway military unit.

questions: The only real top players which that college _____ produce have been transfer students who had most of their training elsewhere.

questions: Four of our support staff are sick and the general manager is on vacation, so we've hired temps to fill the _____.

questions: With the _____ of a free-market approach, businesses in the West are taking a second look.

questions: We just found out that the bookkeeping department was instructed to _____ the numbers to make it look like we turned a profit.

questions: Since it does not appear that Sullivan will be returning, we might say that his position is up _____.

questions: Building _____ in that area of the city are at a premium.

questions: After years of what his company liked to call "foreign service. " Saloom _____ his fill of moving from country to country.

questions: Although Wilson's actions require some sort of disciplinary action, I don't believe that they _____ his dismissal.

questions: Some observers think _____ that James Tillson is now recognized by the academy which he once criticized so caustically.

questions: The bidding got _____ that the smaller collectors had no chance to make any purchases.

questions: _____ we are to foreign markets, the sooner we will be able to set up the network we want.

questions: The representatives _____ your candor on such a personal matter.

questions: It now seems strange to think that for decades many western traders _____ the pacific rim.

questions: My partners and I have only _____ for you and your family.

questions: Sea travel doesn't seem to agree with you. You look a little _____.

questions: On behalf of the _____ team, I would like present this token of our appreciation for all that you have done for us this season.

questions: Even though his health was not good _____ he made a good living and provided for his family.
full_sentence: Even though his health was not good nothing he made a good living and provided for his family.

questions: Employees are reminded to refer to their employee _____ number when making inquiries about pay.

questions: The employees _____ the store before going home.

questions: Participation in Midwest Airline's frequent flier's program _____ to the terms and conditions of the program rulers.

questions: As might be expected on _____ continent, Australia has rather few varieties of freshwater fishes.

questions: The 2010 Cezanne exhibition at the Philadelphia Museum _____ more than half a million people in three months.

questions: The best advice _____ is never to give your credit card number to anyone who has called you.

questions: He felt in his pocket _____ his wallet.

questions: I thought up a topic for you to write _____.

questions: The _____ assumed for the sake of discussion was that business would see improvement during the next five years.

questions: Nondurable goods _____ for immediate use and are often less expensive than durable goods.

questions: Although I had long considered him a friend, that traitor _____ to be nothing more than a snake in the grass?

questions: In the early days of the factory system, people thought that the government had no right to _____ with business, and so no one forced the factory owners to treat their workers fairly.

questions: The emphasis on violence and crime in so many TV programs had led young people to _____ violence as a means of solving problem.

questions: Any suggestion should be _____ to the main office.

questions: Don't be _____; I don't have time to quibble about detail.

questions: They do not always _____ with their boots on.

questions: She accepted his proposal with alarming _____; she had the "yes" out of her mouth before he finished popping the question.

questions: Customers concerned about _____ utility rate increase will be given the option of prepaying for three months of service at today's rate.

questions: The businesses listed in the directory are first categorized by location and _____ in alphabetical order.
