questions: _____ at the medical conference reached 5,000 this year, breaking last year's record of 4,500.
full_sentence: Attendance at the medical conference reached 5,000 this year, breaking last year's record of 4,500.

questions: ABC Company is offering potential clients an initial consultation _____ free of charge.

questions: Dr. Roberts gave a very _____ presentation at the annual medical conference in Tokyo.

questions: In many _____ of the industry, the Grand Hotel has received high ratings for overall client satisfaction.

questions: _____ the manufacturing facility is over-staffed at the moment, we expect orders will pick up again after the holiday season.

questions: The number of students entering universities _____ after graduating from high schools has dropped in recent years.

questions: _____ mobile phones is strictly prohibited in the middle of movies.

questions: There is a reminder that the departure of Flight No. 04 _____ due to its mechanical problem.

questions: The construction company has had to _____ extra workers in order to meet the deadline.

questions: His allergic symptoms are likely to get worse with the _____ of the summer.
full_sentence: His allergic symptoms are likely to get worse with the arrival of the summer.

questions: Please contact one of the _____ sales offices to make a purchase of quality items.
full_sentence: Please contact one of the local sales offices to make a purchase of quality items.

questions: _____ attempts were made to find the missing shipment.
full_sentence: Several attempts were made to find the missing shipment.

questions: Any company will be _____ in overcoming difficulties as far as all members are willing to work collaboratively.
full_sentence: Any company will be successful in overcoming difficulties as far as all members are willing to work collaboratively.

questions: I'm afraid there is going to be _____ devaluation of the currency soon.
full_sentence: I'm afraid there is going to be another devaluation of the currency soon.

questions: The law has no _____ on us for the time being.
full_sentence: The law has no effect on us for the time being.

questions: H-1B visa is _____ available for workers, who possess a bachelor's degree or experiences of professional fields.
full_sentence: H-1B visa is exclusively available for workers, who possess a bachelor's degree or experiences of professional fields.

questions: The island is not only known for its beautiful scenery, _____ historic remains.
full_sentence: The island is not only known for its beautiful scenery, but historic remains.

questions: ST Appliances has conducted extensive surveys to maintain _____ market share in Europe.
full_sentence: ST Appliances has conducted extensive surveys to maintain its market share in Europe.

questions: _____ the unexpected bad weather, every flight has been delayed, which made passengers very inconvenient.
full_sentence: Due to the unexpected bad weather, every flight has been delayed, which made passengers very inconvenient.

questions: We sincerely regret that there will be a slight delay in shipping the order _____ you placed yesterday.
full_sentence: We sincerely regret that there will be a slight delay in shipping the order that you placed yesterday.

questions: The terms of the agreement between the firms are _____ under consideration.
full_sentence: The terms of the agreement between the firms are currently under consideration.

questions: She knows Richard so well that she can say _____ he is doing at any time.
full_sentence: She knows Richard so well that she can say what he is doing at any time.

questions: Please fill out the form on the table in order to provide you _____ an accurate estimate.
full_sentence: Please fill out the form on the table in order to provide you with an accurate estimate.

questions: Volunteers are required _____ the application along with their resume.
full_sentence: Volunteers are required to submit the application along with their resume.

questions: If the applicant fluently spoke any foreign language, he _____ for the position.
full_sentence: If the applicant fluently spoke any foreign language, he would be hired for the position.

questions: The new director _____ hasn't been chosen, but the position has been narrowed to three candidates.
full_sentence: The new director still hasn't been chosen, but the position has been narrowed to three candidates.

questions: Some studies revealed organic food can generally keep our body more _____ than expected.
full_sentence: Some studies revealed organic food can generally keep our body more healthy than expected.

questions: _____ have the market conditions throughout the country been favorable for purchasing new housing.
full_sentence: Hardly have the market conditions throughout the country been favorable for purchasing new housing.

questions: After discussing all conditions, both of the firms _____ finally decided to do a business with each other.
full_sentence: After discussing all conditions, both of the firms have finally decided to do a business with each other.

questions: The company finally decided to hire him as he was _____ than other candidates.
full_sentence: The company finally decided to hire him as he was more qualified than other candidates.

questions: Every client should check the results of their financial goods, based on the newly _____ manual.
full_sentence: Every client should check the results of their financial goods, based on the newly consolidated manual.

questions: Most of the part-time workers _____ no pay raise yet for the last three months.
full_sentence: Most of the part-time workers have been given no pay raise yet for the last three months.

questions: Next month, the board of directors _____ in the conference room to discuss new marketing strategies.
full_sentence: Next month, the board of directors will be held in the conference room to discuss new marketing strategies.

questions: Customers are eligible for obtaining special discounts by _____ in the course at least two months in advance.
full_sentence: Customers are eligible for obtaining special discounts by enrolling in the course at least two months in advance.

questions: The unemployment rate of most _____ countries through the world ranges between 1.8% and 3.4%.
full_sentence: The unemployment rate of most developed countries through the world ranges between 1.8% and 3.4%.

questions: Please do not forget _____ the bottom part of the invoice when you pay the bill by mail.
full_sentence: Please do not forget to enclose the bottom part of the invoice when you pay the bill by mail.

questions: Employees are _____ to order office supplies solely through HQ Office Supplies.
full_sentence: Employees are asked to order office supplies solely through HQ Office Supplies.

questions: Most workers in the urban area _____ to their work by public transportation.
full_sentence: Most workers in the urban area commute to their work by public transportation.

questions: We would like to know the departure date and the _____ arrival date.
full_sentence: We would like to know the departure date and the expected arrival date.

questions: Through _____ diligence and dedication, Mr. Smith has been proved worthy of a promotion.
full_sentence: Through his diligence and dedication, Mr. Smith has been proved worthy of a promotion.

questions: _____ his lifetime, Frederick Jones was given a number of awards for his achievements.
full_sentence: During his lifetime, Frederick Jones was given a number of awards for his achievements.

questions: Manuals have been distributed to all supervisors detailing the _____ of the new computer system.
full_sentence: Manuals have been distributed to all supervisors detailing the operation of the new computer system.

questions: If it rains, the party will be held in the main banquet hall _____ the garden.
full_sentence: If it rains, the party will be held in the main banquet hall instead of the garden.

questions: _____ involved in the Sanderson Project is reminded to hand in a record of hours worked by Monday at 5:00 P.M.
full_sentence: Everyone involved in the Sanderson Project is reminded to hand in a record of hours worked by Monday at 5:00 P.M.

questions: All registration forms to attend the annual conference should be accompanied _____ copies of appropriate identification.
full_sentence: All registration forms to attend the annual conference should be accompanied by copies of appropriate identification.

questions: After _____ effort, we have managed to redesign the keyboard to address the concerns of the client.
full_sentence: After considerable effort, we have managed to redesign the keyboard to address the concerns of the client.

questions: The weather forecast reported that it will _____ rain in the afternoon.
full_sentence: The weather forecast reported that it will probably rain in the afternoon.

questions: Mr. James has worked in the shipping firm _____ seven years.
full_sentence: Mr. James has worked in the shipping firm for seven years.

questions: The board of directors was held at the conference room _____ July 8, 2008.
full_sentence: The board of directors was held at the conference room on July 8, 2008.

questions: _____ you have trouble finding the building, I'll give you the map and their number.
full_sentence: In case you have trouble finding the building, I'll give you the map and their number.

questions: If you need _____ information about candidate's requirements, please feel free to call our office.
full_sentence: If you need more information about candidate's requirements, please feel free to call our office.

questions: That building, the interior of _____ is much better than the outside, was designed by the same architects.
full_sentence: That building, the interior of which is much better than the outside, was designed by the same architects.

questions: A change-of-address notice should be sent to _____ bank as soon as possible after you move.
full_sentence: A change-of-address notice should be sent to your bank as soon as possible after you move.

questions: Thanks to the _____ of new business partnership by Chem Co.'s president, the company is expected to increase earnings this year.
full_sentence: Thanks to the cultivation of new business partnership by Chem Co.'s president, the company is expected to increase earnings this year.

questions: Hisakawa recording equipment is used in professional applications, but _____ most other high-tech equipment, it is easily operated by nonspecialists as well.
full_sentence: Hisakawa recording equipment is used in professional applications, but unlike most other high-tech equipment, it is easily operated by nonspecialists as well.

questions: All this week, Yales Clothing Store is offering _____ of up to 50% on S and B products.
full_sentence: All this week, Yales Clothing Store is offering discounts of up to 50% on S and B products.

questions: The recently redecorated Grand Hotel contains more than 100 _____ rooms.
full_sentence: The recently redecorated Grand Hotel contains more than 100 elegant rooms.

questions: Perth Industries' _____ use of office space has been widely adopted by other businesses seeking to reduce costs.
full_sentence: Perth Industries' economical use of office space has been widely adopted by other businesses seeking to reduce costs.

questions: The Hugees-Fring Company has _____ Mr. Suzuki a job in Malaysia.
full_sentence: The Hugees-Fring Company has offered Mr. Suzuki a job in Malaysia.

questions: The extraordinary success of the fund-raising event went far _____ the board's modest expectations.
full_sentence: The extraordinary success of the fund-raising event went far beyond the board's modest expectations.

questions: Robinson Industries has so many new accounts that we are finding it _____ difficult to service our customers' machinery.
full_sentence: Robinson Industries has so many new accounts that we are finding it increasingly difficult to service our customers' machinery.

questions: A number of safety inspectors will be sent to visit the oil refinery and verify the sites _____ with safety regulations.
full_sentence: A number of safety inspectors will be sent to visit the oil refinery and verify the sites compliance with safety regulations.

questions: If you wish to charge this order _____ your credit card, please provide your account number and expiration date.
full_sentence: If you wish to charge this order to your credit card, please provide your account number and expiration date.

questions: Mr. Yamamoto is _____ how best to utilize the company's strategy consultant.
full_sentence: Mr. Yamamoto is determining how best to utilize the company's strategy consultant.

questions: The Watkins Company has _____ in many countries, and its officers travel overseas often.
full_sentence: The Watkins Company has interest in many countries, and its officers travel overseas often.

questions: Syna Corporation's yearly earnings were not impressive _____ to attract more investors.
full_sentence: Syna Corporation's yearly earnings were not impressive enough to attract more investors.

questions: To ensure an image appears on the subsequent sheets within a few seconds, paper should be _____ into the copy machine.
full_sentence: To ensure an image appears on the subsequent sheets within a few seconds, paper should be loaded into the copy machine.

questions: Compared to others in its field, WJR Enterprise places _____ emphasis on research and development.
full_sentence: Compared to others in its field, WJR Enterprise places greater emphasis on research and development.

questions: Before Mr. Smith and Kaori Kimura moved to offices on the third floor, both of _____ had been in temporary office space.
full_sentence: Before Mr. Smith and Kaori Kimura moved to offices on the third floor, both of them had been in temporary office space.

questions: As the attached itinerary indicates, the hospitality team should expect the new client _____ four o'clock this afternoon.
full_sentence: As the attached itinerary indicates, the hospitality team should expect the new client at four o'clock this afternoon.

questions: Our managers have at least eighty years of _____ experience in the food industry.
full_sentence: Our managers have at least eighty years of combined experience in the food industry.

questions: As always, John McHale was great in his role, but my friends didn't like the movie that much since the ending was too _____ and his supporting actors were real amateurs.
full_sentence: As always, John McHale was great in his role, but my friends didn't like the movie that much since the ending was too predictable and his supporting actors were real amateurs.

questions: Electronic transfers are a convenient way for customers to move money from one account to _____ without having to visit the bank.
full_sentence: Electronic transfers are a convenient way for customers to move money from one account to another without having to visit the bank.

questions: It is our belief that all the members of our organization put in their best effort for their own good as well as for the company's, _____ also setting aside time for their families, being both a good parent and a good spouse.
full_sentence: It is our belief that all the members of our organization put in their best effort for their own good as well as for the company's, while also setting aside time for their families, being both a good parent and a good spouse.

questions: The furniture which you ordered three days ago will be delivered today _____ tomorrow.
full_sentence: The furniture which you ordered three days ago will be delivered today or tomorrow.

questions: _____ the windchill factor which gives the best idea of how a person will feel outside on a cold day.
full_sentence: It is the windchill factor which gives the best idea of how a person will feel outside on a cold day.

questions: _____ the labor costs were significantly low last quarter, Solomon Inc. failed to generate profits.
full_sentence: Even though the labor costs were significantly low last quarter, Solomon Inc. failed to generate profits.

questions: Some shoppers wonder _____ the home appliances are so expensive.
full_sentence: Some shoppers wonder why the home appliances are so expensive.

questions: The research has shown that people _____ prefer using public transportation to driving their own car due to high oil prices.
full_sentence: The research has shown that people usually prefer using public transportation to driving their own car due to high oil prices.

questions: By the end of next month, she _____ in Singapore for exactly two years.
full_sentence: By the end of next month, she will have been in Singapore for exactly two years.

questions: _____ you feel well enough, you can go back to work on Monday.
full_sentence: Provided you feel well enough, you can go back to work on Monday.

questions: Mr. James _____ in the world trade fair a few days ago.
full_sentence: Mr. James participated in the world trade fair a few days ago.

questions: Most employees at our business currently _____ to work by public transportation.
full_sentence: Most employees at our business currently commute to work by public transportation.

questions: _____ ten years since I quit the sales manager of Thomas Smith & Co.
full_sentence: It has been ten years since I quit the sales manager of Thomas Smith & Co.

questions: The inspection of the production line will be _____ by the maintenance team soon.
full_sentence: The inspection of the production line will be conducted by the maintenance team soon.

questions: The _____ information should be obviously sent to the accounting office.

questions: It's necessary for employees _____ their creative ideas for invention of a new product.
full_sentence: It's necessary for employees to present their creative ideas for invention of a new product.

questions: All you lucky contestants will be given a guided tour of the station before heading to the studio, _____ you will be given a brief orientation.
full_sentence: All you lucky contestants will be given a guided tour of the station before heading to the studio, where you will be given a brief orientation.

questions: Due to the rise in cost of raw materials and labor, we have no _____ but to raise the prices of our new line of casual shoes as of January 1.
full_sentence: Due to the rise in cost of raw materials and labor, we have no choice but to raise the prices of our new line of casual shoes as of January 1.

questions: If we want to finish the project by the deadline, we _____ to request for some outside professional help and put in overtime.
full_sentence: If we want to finish the project by the deadline, we will have to request for some outside professional help and put in overtime.

questions: Come in and enjoy the finest selection of apparels and accessories available, which are sure to meet _____ taste you may have.
full_sentence: Come in and enjoy the finest selection of apparels and accessories available, which are sure to meet whatever taste you may have.

questions: _____ I start eating more healthy food especially less fattening food, I may not be able to see my son and daughter grow up to become adults.
full_sentence: Unless I start eating more healthy food especially less fattening food, I may not be able to see my son and daughter grow up to become adults.

questions: Since the new manager took over, our restaurant has become one of the most popular places, mainly _____ our excellent food and friendly service.
full_sentence: Since the new manager took over, our restaurant has become one of the most popular places, mainly due to our excellent food and friendly service.

questions: _____ the recent industrial growth in the region came increased air pollution, raising the question of whether the development is worth the damages to the environment.

questions: Before arriving at the airline's check-in desk, I was clearly told by my travel agent that I could check in two pieces of luggage _____ no extra charge.
full_sentence: Before arriving at the airline's check-in desk, I was clearly told by my travel agent that I could check in two pieces of luggage at no extra charge.

questions: The police were able to find no evidence against her, _____ surprised no one who knows her well.
full_sentence: The police were able to find no evidence against her, which surprised no one who knows her well.

questions: My best friend, who is an immigrant from Korea, speaks with an _____, but fortunately, he will have no problem finding a job since he has the ability to speak two other languages.
full_sentence: My best friend, who is an immigrant from Korea, speaks with an accent, but fortunately, he will have no problem finding a job since he has the ability to speak two other languages.

questions: Some plans are being developed to improve the access to the city either by bus _____ by train.
full_sentence: Some plans are being developed to improve the access to the city either by bus or by train.

questions: The suburban golf course is owned by the city, _____ run by a private individual.

questions: An individual _____ has a bad attitude toward customers or clients can cause a decrease in sales.
full_sentence: An individual who has a bad attitude toward customers or clients can cause a decrease in sales.

questions: Every month, the magazine presents an in-depth story about a local exemplary company which is noted _____ its successful operation.
full_sentence: Every month, the magazine presents an in-depth story about a local exemplary company which is noted for its successful operation.

questions: The marketing director says that the annual report could _____ efficiently if we had reviewed all the data more carefully.
full_sentence: The marketing director says that the annual report could have been organized efficiently if we had reviewed all the data more carefully.

questions: Although only regular employees have been given the cash prize so far, temporary workers are also _____ for consideration now.
full_sentence: Although only regular employees have been given the cash prize so far, temporary workers are also eligible for consideration now.

questions: Workers on the day shift can enter the building through the front door but _____ who work at night are requested to use the back door.
full_sentence: Workers on the day shift can enter the building through the front door but those who work at night are requested to use the back door.

questions: You can travel pretty comfortably because I have arranged for you to proceed _____ to your destination without any layover.
full_sentence: You can travel pretty comfortably because I have arranged for you to proceed directly to your destination without any layover.

questions: Responding to the recent announcement of lowering interest rates, investors are reentering the stock market _____.
full_sentence: Responding to the recent announcement of lowering interest rates, investors are reentering the stock market cautiously.

questions: Hong Kong is enjoying a _____ of its urban area as a cultural center of the whole Asia.
full_sentence: Hong Kong is enjoying a renewal of its urban area as a cultural center of the whole Asia.

questions: Investment projects at Speedy Company often changed _____ after they were examined by the committee.
full_sentence: Investment projects at Speedy Company often changed considerably after they were examined by the committee.

questions: The board of directors announced there would be no merger with our competitor _____ the leading role operating the future companies is guaranteed.
full_sentence: The board of directors announced there would be no merger with our competitor unless the leading role operating the future companies is guaranteed.

questions: The controversial program was initially _____ to enhance employees' morale and increase productivity by offering various incentives.
full_sentence: The controversial program was initially designed to enhance employees' morale and increase productivity by offering various incentives.

questions: Requests for revisions to the membership account must be submitted _____ writing.
full_sentence: Requests for revisions to the membership account must be submitted in writing.

questions: The Douglas Company continues to be the supplier's most _____ client throughout South African market.
full_sentence: The Douglas Company continues to be the supplier's most important client throughout South African market.

questions: Brown's Bakery will _____ open on July 2nd when the owner's widely advertised homemade bread is released for the first time.
full_sentence: Brown's Bakery will officially open on July 2nd when the owner's widely advertised homemade bread is released for the first time.

questions: Patrons can purchase advance tickets either at the box office _____ through our Web site.
full_sentence: Patrons can purchase advance tickets either at the box office or through our Web site.

questions: We will _____ refund your money provided that you return your merchandise with a recent store sales slip.
full_sentence: We will happily refund your money provided that you return your merchandise with a recent store sales slip.

questions: As Stellar Inc., moves forward into a new stage of its development, the _____ of enormous growth is waiting for us.
full_sentence: As Stellar Inc., moves forward into a new stage of its development, the prospect of enormous growth is waiting for us.

questions: As of August 1st, listening to the radio without the headset is prohibited in the workplace because noises are _____ others.
full_sentence: As of August 1st, listening to the radio without the headset is prohibited in the workplace because noises are disturbing others.

questions: Attendees can have more effective communication in a small-sized discussion group _____ they can in a large one.
full_sentence: Attendees can have more effective communication in a small-sized discussion group than they can in a large one.

questions: A total of 30 representatives will attend the annual convention, all of _____ will be bringing a spouse.
full_sentence: A total of 30 representatives will attend the annual convention, all of whom will be bringing a spouse.

questions: According to research, the more complicated the curriculum becomes, the _____ the curved line for accomplishment becomes.
full_sentence: According to research, the more complicated the curriculum becomes, the steeper the curved line for accomplishment becomes.

questions: In bacteria and in other organisms, _____ the nucleic acid DNA that provides the genetic information.
full_sentence: In bacteria and in other organisms, it is the nucleic acid DNA that provides the genetic information.

questions: Insadong Street is a colorful street with tiny shops selling textiles, jewelry, and _____ traditional medicine.
full_sentence: Insadong Street is a colorful street with tiny shops selling textiles, jewelry, and also traditional medicine.

questions: To improve a work atmosphere, managers should make it a point _____ employees' accomplishments publicly.
full_sentence: To improve a work atmosphere, managers should make it a point to recognize employees' accomplishments publicly.

questions: The customer service representative can meet with you anytime _____ 4 o'clock onwards, but not earlier.
full_sentence: The customer service representative can meet with you anytime from 4 o'clock onwards, but not earlier.

questions: The advertising campaign has exceeded all expectations; we have _____ decided to do it in seven more cities.
full_sentence: The advertising campaign has exceeded all expectations; we have therefore decided to do it in seven more cities.

questions: Webber Foods Company blamed rising taxes _____ the dramatic increase in prices of their products.
full_sentence: Webber Foods Company blamed rising taxes for the dramatic increase in prices of their products.

questions: _____ of our customer satisfaction questionnaires should take roughly half an hour.
full_sentence: Completion of our customer satisfaction questionnaires should take roughly half an hour.

questions: When you design your training program, you must take the time to consider carefully _____ you wish to accomplish.
full_sentence: When you design your training program, you must take the time to consider carefully what you wish to accomplish.

questions: The Morrison project could have been finished on time if all of the required tasks had been distributed _____.
full_sentence: The Morrison project could have been finished on time if all of the required tasks had been distributed equally.

questions: Mr. Chang came up with a set of corrective measures, _____ he thinks will remedy this unsatisfactory situation.
full_sentence: Mr. Chang came up with a set of corrective measures, which he thinks will remedy this unsatisfactory situation.

questions: _____ in the heart of Seoul, the Korean Center for Cultural Heritage promotes the understanding of its traditional cultures.
full_sentence: Located in the heart of Seoul, the Korean Center for Cultural Heritage promotes the understanding of its traditional cultures.

questions: Grand Hotel has received many customer complaints about their constantly _____ telephone lines.
full_sentence: Grand Hotel has received many customer complaints about their constantly busy telephone lines.

questions: If it is strictly _____, the new system of quality control should be nearly foolproof.
full_sentence: If it is strictly followed, the new system of quality control should be nearly foolproof.

questions: Guests are welcome to tour the rest of the resort and other _____ and ask one of our staff members any questions you may have.
full_sentence: Guests are welcome to tour the rest of the resort and other facilities and ask one of our staff members any questions you may have.

questions: _____ John Cabot who first reached North America under the flag of the English monarch.
full_sentence: It was John Cabot who first reached North America under the flag of the English monarch.

questions: The advertising agency is paid to develop the message _____ will be communicated to the target audience.
full_sentence: The advertising agency is paid to develop the message that will be communicated to the target audience.

questions: The food at the restaurant is great but the manager doesn't stop there and always tries to provide extraordinary _____ to each and every customer.
full_sentence: The food at the restaurant is great but the manager doesn't stop there and always tries to provide extraordinary service to each and every customer.

questions: _____ the tragic disaster in New York, airline security and increased anti-terrorism procedures have created longer waits and delays at airports.
full_sentence: Since the tragic disaster in New York, airline security and increased anti-terrorism procedures have created longer waits and delays at airports.

questions: The Johnsons prefer to travel overseas, especially in Southeast Asia, by _____ rather than as part of a group tour.
full_sentence: The Johnsons prefer to travel overseas, especially in Southeast Asia, by themselves rather than as part of a group tour.

questions: The award is named in honor of Henry James, the _____ of the Environment Protection Organization.
full_sentence: The award is named in honor of Henry James, the founder of the Environment Protection Organization.

questions: The clerks wondered _____ customers would make any purchases or not.
full_sentence: The clerks wondered whether customers would make any purchases or not.

questions: This manual will enable users to familiarize _____ with the equipment.
full_sentence: This manual will enable users to familiarize themselves with the equipment.

questions: In the parts division of Donovan Manufacturing, workers are under _____ to increase production rate fairly.
full_sentence: In the parts division of Donovan Manufacturing, workers are under pressure to increase production rate fairly.

questions: The proposals on the way to save spendings should be examined _____.
full_sentence: The proposals on the way to save spendings should be examined thoroughly.

questions: Howard took _____ interest in the work that eventually he was dismissed.
full_sentence: Howard took so little interest in the work that eventually he was dismissed.

questions: I have already written to Mr. Harris, _____ will no doubt be contacting you in the near future.
full_sentence: I have already written to Mr. Harris, who will no doubt be contacting you in the near future.

questions: If the complaints _____ carefully, the image of our firm would have been improved significantly.
full_sentence: If the complaints had been handled carefully, the image of our firm would have been improved significantly.

questions: _____ Americans have spent more on household affairs than on housing.
full_sentence: In recent years Americans have spent more on household affairs than on housing.

questions: Fees are non-refundable _____ the enrollment in the course has been processed.
full_sentence: Fees are non-refundable once the enrollment in the course has been processed.

questions: The extra copies of brochure are so detailed that all customers will get information of _____ products.
full_sentence: The extra copies of brochure are so detailed that all customers will get information of our products.

questions: ABC Corporation is exceptional in that it guarantees that even part-time employees are _____ for paid holidays.
full_sentence: ABC Corporation is exceptional in that it guarantees that even part-time employees are eligible for paid holidays.

questions: The client was very pleased with the trousers, but he requested that the length be _____.
full_sentence: The client was very pleased with the trousers, but he requested that the length be altered.

questions: After returning from a long business trip, Mr. Wolfson was advised to take a rest throughout the _____ of the week.
full_sentence: After returning from a long business trip, Mr. Wolfson was advised to take a rest throughout the remainder of the week.

questions: There will be _____ in implementing renovations to the Pittsburgh assembly line.
full_sentence: There will be delays in implementing renovations to the Pittsburgh assembly line.

questions: The legislators from Orange County unanimously _____ the proposed policy on industrial subsidies.
full_sentence: The legislators from Orange County unanimously rejected the proposed policy on industrial subsidies.

questions: The electrical problems had _____ been resolved by the next morning when trains were running as scheduled.
full_sentence: The electrical problems had evidently been resolved by the next morning when trains were running as scheduled.

questions: A recent study indicated that people who eat breakfast regularly have a tendency to exercise more and stay healthier than _____ who skip breakfast.
full_sentence: A recent study indicated that people who eat breakfast regularly have a tendency to exercise more and stay healthier than those who skip breakfast.

questions: Six out of ten major market areas are located _____ a six-hundred-mile radius of our main production facility.
full_sentence: Six out of ten major market areas are located within a six-hundred-mile radius of our main production facility.

questions: _____ there be high requests, we will have to increase the rate of production.
full_sentence: Should there be high requests, we will have to increase the rate of production.

questions: The accounting department is having difficulty _____ company budgets.
full_sentence: The accounting department is having difficulty saving company budgets.

questions: As soon as the products _____, we will be distributing them to respective divisions.
full_sentence: As soon as the products arrive, we will be distributing them to respective divisions.

questions: In _____ with other preventative measures, drinking sufficient water can help you stay fit during the winter.
full_sentence: In combination with other preventative measures, drinking sufficient water can help you stay fit during the winter.

questions: Since the workers were fired, they _____ on a strike against the decision.
full_sentence: Since the workers were fired, they have been going on a strike against the decision.

questions: If Ms. Huge _____ good performance, she would be posted to the Hawaiian branch.
full_sentence: If Ms. Huge showed good performance, she would be posted to the Hawaiian branch.

questions: _____ customers' needs, every member at TJ Foods aims at better service.
full_sentence: To meet customers' needs, every member at TJ Foods aims at better service.

questions: Before ordering software programs, consumers need to consider whether the products are _____ with their existing systems.
full_sentence: Before ordering software programs, consumers need to consider whether the products are compatible with their existing systems.

questions: Thomas Edison _____ most of his success to hard work, claiming 99% of success was perspiration and only 1% inspiration.
full_sentence: Thomas Edison attributed most of his success to hard work, claiming 99% of success was perspiration and only 1% inspiration.

questions: Ingrid's personal trainer suggested that she _____ to the gym regularly to get in shape.
full_sentence: Ingrid's personal trainer suggested that she go to the gym regularly to get in shape.

questions: To enter this room, insert the card and wait for the light to _____ green.
full_sentence: To enter this room, insert the card and wait for the light to turn green.

questions: _____ the outcome of the negotiations, the company has no choice but to wait and see.
full_sentence: Pending the outcome of the negotiations, the company has no choice but to wait and see.

questions: Nowadays, the police _____ high-tech radar drones to catch speeders.
full_sentence: Nowadays, the police are using high-tech radar drones to catch speeders.

questions: When Andrew set out to buy a house, he was _____ to hire a real estate agent who could guide him through the process.
full_sentence: When Andrew set out to buy a house, he was quick to hire a real estate agent who could guide him through the process.

questions: _____ news of the criminal's whereabouts, the police sent out several units to pursue him.
full_sentence: Having received news of the criminal's whereabouts, the police sent out several units to pursue him.

questions: The Genome Project was a 13-year international effort which _____ in October 1990.
full_sentence: The Genome Project was a 13-year international effort which began in October 1990.

questions: Based on what I learned at our meeting, I have referred him to a local company _____ operation is more in line with his qualifications.
full_sentence: Based on what I learned at our meeting, I have referred him to a local company whose operation is more in line with his qualifications.

questions: Mr. Hirsch's patience _____ limited when it came to students who were late to his classes.

questions: The couple did not win any awards at the dance competition even though they danced _____ exquisitely.

questions: The introduction of the Alsberg database network at Paris headquarters was a huge step _____, so the system was soon implemented in all the company's overseas offices.
full_sentence: The introduction of the Alsberg database network at Paris headquarters was a huge step forward, so the system was soon implemented in all the company's overseas offices.

questions: The finance department is scheduled to outline its _____ growth plans at the board of directors' meeting on Wednesday.

questions: Ms. Bell's duties have been divided up, so no single person will _____ of all her projects while she is absent.

questions: The prize committee will not accept any late _____ for the annual landscaping contest.

questions: Fortunately, both Dr. Smith and his research members seem _____ of explaining the symptoms.

questions: Please remember that the _____ of cameras and other recording devices is not allowed during the performance.

questions: In order to help customers with their holiday shopping, the downtown stores have agreed to stay open _____ during the month of January.

questions: Several _____ suggest that increasing the amount of walking done in a day can improve overall physical conditioning.
full_sentence: Several studies suggest that increasing the amount of walking done in a day can improve overall physical conditioning.

questions: _____ often I tell him to be careful, he keeps making the same mistake.

questions: Until the graduation started, no one but the master of ceremonies _____ aware that a celebrity alumnus had been invited to give a speech.

questions: Since you participated in the planning of this project, you are also partially _____ for this unfortunate result.

questions: With profits down 50%, the board of directors decided to _____ off 2,000 workers.

questions: The economists predict that we will soon get out of this long tunnel of economic _____.
full_sentence: The economists predict that we will soon get out of this long tunnel of economic recession.

questions: _____ speaking, it is desirable to record a call in the telephone log book as soon as the conversation is over.

questions: The city has an _____ program to benefit companies that build affordable apartments.

questions: Too many restrictions on employees can result in both frustration _____ resistance to management policies.

questions: _____ sufficient grant funding can be secured, preliminary research will start early next year.

questions: The mechanic was likely to _____ replacement parts for the old machine.

questions: All operators of heavy machinery at Steel Inc. are required to follow the safety regulations listed on the wall _____ each work station.
full_sentence: All operators of heavy machinery at Steel Inc. are required to follow the safety regulations listed on the wall beside each work station.

questions: Any information _____ recent market trend can be obtained from our company database.
full_sentence: Any information regarding recent market trend can be obtained from our company database.

questions: Regulations have been enacted to ensure that labels on all medications are easily _____.

questions: The most qualified candidate notified the personnel office that she could come for an interview _____ convenient.

questions: The tire company intends to _____ customers to its newest location.

questions: Orange Artworks is an organization _____ mission is to support and encourage public art projects in the Orange Town area.

questions: Allen, a senator from New jersey, will _____ a conference on August 4 to reaffirm the ban on biological and toxic weapons.

questions: When you apply for the consultant position, knowledge of more than two languages is a _____ advantage.

questions: Our new medicine can be _____ to your health.

questions: Transnox's new chair is stronger and offers far more comfort than earlier models, but actually costs _____.

questions: Examples of job enrichment opportunities include cross-training to learn new skills and job rotation to perform new tasks in _____ position.

questions: Samsung research team recommended _____ notebook computers to compete in the domestic market.

questions: Instructions posted above the exits _____ the procedures for emergency evacuation.

questions: Singapore is a wonderful city with exquisite shopping, exciting attractions and _____ luxurious hotels.

questions: All vehicles should be parked only at the _____ place to avoid serious congestion.

questions: Cancellations must be made 24 hours prior to arrivals, and no _____ can be made in this case.

questions: The anti-drug campaign _____ a positive effect on keeping inner-city students in schools and away from the streets.

questions: The director is considering introducing the new management system _____ he thinks costs less.

questions: Dr. Dewick of S.C University _____ the current government policies.

questions: In order _____ us to provide you with special gifts, please complete the following form thoroughly.

questions: A store or business must make an arrangement with the company _____ sells the product to ensure adequate levels of inventory.
full_sentence: A store or business must make an arrangement with the company that sells the product to ensure adequate levels of inventory.

questions: _____ candidates will be considered as a prospective employee of the position.

questions: The NOATECH Ltd. tries to make its sales representatives _____ that this year the competition for the computer market will increase dramatically.

questions: If Ms. Johansson _____ accustomed to handling customer's complaints well, she would be hired as a sales person.

questions: The city committee _____ the new project to renovate the facilities in the urban area.

questions: The board at Samsa Electronics decided _____ the expansion of the current production line.

questions: Since it was featured in the City Dining guide, Modak Restaurant has seen a marked _____ in the number of customers.

questions: When Hiller Co. _____ Morton Incorporated, several of the consumer goods divisions were closed.
full_sentence: When Hiller Co. was acquiring Morton Incorporated, several of the consumer goods divisions were closed.

questions: Ms. Flint is the _____ of Care World, a global organization helping to feed hungry children in third-world countries.
full_sentence: Ms. Flint is the founder of Care World, a global organization helping to feed hungry children in third-world countries.

questions: Disposal of harmful household chemicals like detergents and motor oil is a significant _____ hazard.
full_sentence: Disposal of harmful household chemicals like detergents and motor oil is a significant environmental hazard.

questions: Some manufacturers employ external contractors to create _____, but we prefer to use the resources available within our company.
full_sentence: Some manufacturers employ external contractors to create advertising, but we prefer to use the resources available within our company.

questions: The new subway line _____ has begun running since March, now serves 23 stations of the downtown.
full_sentence: The new subway line that has begun running since March, now serves 23 stations of the downtown.

questions: Most people these days are used to _____ the internet shopping.
full_sentence: Most people these days are used to doing the internet shopping.

questions: The bank _____ bankrupt a few months ago because of the loss of enormous money.
full_sentence: The bank went bankrupt a few months ago because of the loss of enormous money.

questions: By _____ plans in advance, you can save considerable time and money.
full_sentence: By establishing plans in advance, you can save considerable time and money.

questions: All drivers in the state are legally _____ to carry liability insurance and pay registration tax.

questions: After 30 years of dedication, Mr. Schindler is retiring _____ Chief Executive Officer of the worldwide diving gear company.
full_sentence: After 30 years of dedication, Mr. Schindler is retiring as Chief Executive Officer of the worldwide diving gear company.

questions: Over 300 international delegates attended the reception yesterday where _____ were served very delicious and expensive foods.
full_sentence: Over 300 international delegates attended the reception yesterday where they were served very delicious and expensive foods.

questions: Marcus Incorporated will always remain the most _____ supplier of fiber optic cables for Jules Communications.
full_sentence: Marcus Incorporated will always remain the most important supplier of fiber optic cables for Jules Communications.

questions: Most American workers _____ from their jobs during the Great Depression.

questions: His knowledge of various computer programs _____ the supervisor in many aspects.

questions: Overdue expenses must be _____ promptly, and otherwise we will suspend your credit card.
full_sentence: Overdue expenses must be paid promptly, and otherwise we will suspend your credit card.

questions: Because the department is shorthanded, many of the staff members complained to their supervisors that their tasks are much too _____ for them.
full_sentence: Because the department is shorthanded, many of the staff members complained to their supervisors that their tasks are much too demanding for them.

questions: Only those conducting years of studies will be able _____ a doctor's degree.
full_sentence: Only those conducting years of studies will be able to get a doctor's degree.

questions: There are a _____ number of parking areas within the district.
full_sentence: There are a limited number of parking areas within the district.

questions: Please _____ over the terms and conditions of the contract carefully before signing at the bottom.
full_sentence: Please look over the terms and conditions of the contract carefully before signing at the bottom.

questions: To decrease employee turnover, supervisors should make it a point _____ the complaints of each employee on a regular basis.
full_sentence: To decrease employee turnover, supervisors should make it a point to recognize the complaints of each employee on a regular basis.

questions: On our installment payment plan, the total balance must be paid three days _____ delivery of the item.

questions: If the car fails to start, your best bet is to first check the battery then the electrical _____ to the starter.

questions: I'd like to let you know that I can be _____ at home after 6:00 PM on weekdays or all day on weekends.

questions: In order to make this event a success, we must have dedication and _____ from all those involved in the planning stages.

questions: Our marketing directors found their sales terms quite _____ and too good to ignore.
full_sentence: Our marketing directors found their sales terms quite attractive and too good to ignore.

questions: More than 800 computer manufacturers are expected to exhibit _____ latest high - tech equipment at the upcoming San Diego Electronics show.
full_sentence: More than 800 computer manufacturers are expected to exhibit their latest high - tech equipment at the upcoming San Diego Electronics show.

questions: Although the plan was poorly received at first, Dr. Walter's idea is now gaining _____ among the executives.
full_sentence: Although the plan was poorly received at first, Dr. Walter's idea is now gaining momentum among the executives.

questions: Mr. Taylor has agreed to _____ Mr. Chiu in writing the proposal for the merger by next Friday's meeting.

questions: The low market barriers in the South America market have proved _____ to foreign importers.

questions: It is clear that _____ its customers' needs is a key to success in any business.

questions: Many hospitals are switching to disposable products because it is less _____ than sterilizing reusable ones.

questions: All contents in our website may not be published in any manner unless _____ noted.
full_sentence: All contents in our website may not be published in any manner unless otherwise noted.

questions: A sudden large reduction in business caused many of the companies to _____ their employees.

questions: When placing an order on line, customers should be as _____ as possible in describing the products.

questions: Pregnant women _____ in assembly positions must be removed and given less strenuous jobs.

questions: After achieving our fund-raising goal, the construction _____ started on May 3.

questions: In an effort to run the discussion in the alloted amount of time, speakers are asked _____ the summary of their talk.

questions: Dr. Kim's findings were incompatible with the other researchers' _____ of the test results.

questions: The Kowsant Lodge is located on a lake and has direct _____ to a small beach, where guests can swim, rent rowboats, and fish.

questions: _____ this warranty policy, all mechanical problems are to be fixed with no charges to customers and all defective parts will be replaced.
full_sentence: Under this warranty policy, all mechanical problems are to be fixed with no charges to customers and all defective parts will be replaced.

questions: Gasoline engines are replacing many of the diesel engines that were once so _____ in manufacturing mini vans.

questions: Since its construction in 1985, the Civil Auditorium _____ a well-known landmark of our city.

questions: Yesterday's car crash _____ three football players has alerted many people about driving under the influence.
full_sentence: Yesterday's car crash involving three football players has alerted many people about driving under the influence.

questions: The rent of the apartment on Cedar Hills _____ electricity and water, but gas is extra.

questions: Toeicpark is a newsletter _____ throughout the nation providing information on how to prepare for the toeic.

questions: Any request for sick leave must be _____ to Steve Macquin, the human resources manager.

questions: Just as her lawyer advised her, Ms. Merry remembered _____ the fine print before she actually signed anything.

questions: _____ eligible for overtime pay, you must put in more than 40 hours per week or 8 hours a day.
full_sentence: To be eligible for overtime pay, you must put in more than 40 hours per week or 8 hours a day.

questions: Especially in the early stages of development, many corporations prefer not _____ aside cash reserves.

questions: Teenage violinist Kuntbell Jackson from the U.S. came in _____ in last week's International Youth Competition.
full_sentence: Teenage violinist Kuntbell Jackson from the U.S. came in third in last week's International Youth Competition.

questions: The successful candidate for this position should have a master's degree in accounting and a _____ of a year's experience.

questions: Because of her drive, hard work and professional expertise, Ms. Bloombauer is considered _____ to our organization.
full_sentence: Because of her drive, hard work and professional expertise, Ms. Bloombauer is considered an asset to our organization.

questions: If you are not pleased _____ the results of the photos, we will develop your photos again with no charge.
full_sentence: If you are not pleased with the results of the photos, we will develop your photos again with no charge.

questions: To increase customer satisfaction and loyalty, it is imperative that customer service representatives be _____ to the needs of their clients.

questions: Supervisors told their employees _____ that nonsmoking policy covers all areas of the building.

questions: Our parent company is seeking a person who is _____ in spoken and written German for office in Hamburg.

questions: John has two brothers, _____ of whom work for the government.

questions: _____ often you may try to persuade me to invest, I made up my mind not to invest in stocks again.

questions: The mediator in the labor dispute was replaced when her _____ was called into question.

questions: The Grand Canyon is so beautiful that it _____ description.

questions: The maintenance of computer facilities relies _____ on the team of system engineers.

questions: The school directory, _____ provides names and telephone numbers of students and faculty, may not be used for solicitation of business, information or contributions.

questions: The consumer should be careful to observe _____ dates on prescription and over the counter medicine.

questions: The implementation of the new security measures will provide a number of on line banking options to our registered customers, _____ increasing user protection.

questions: If we want to make all the indoor repairs before the holidays, we will have to work _____ more quickly than we have been to finish our work.

questions: The Internal Revenue Service requires taxpayers to submit their tax returns applications in _____.

questions: Ms. Salem's presentation helped us to _____ our research into a few areas we had been neglecting.

questions: The total hospital fee for the use of the operation room, anesthesia and post-operative services _____ medication and follow up treatment.

questions: A _____ broadcast of the hearings was proposed in yesterday's congressional meeting.

questions: One of the tasks often given to new employees is to sort the orders _____ are complete from those that still require processing.
full_sentence: One of the tasks often given to new employees is to sort the orders that are complete from those that still require processing.

questions: The space was smaller than anticipated and will not suit our _____.

questions: A special _____ of Sports Digest that recounts significant events of the previous year is available on newsstands every January.

questions: Professor Mohamet is going to _____ a televised address on the recent dip in stock trading on Wall Street.

questions: Our initial aim is to develop microscopes which are capable _____ various parameters simultaneously with a high degree of sensitivity.

questions: Employees who are interested in taking part in the pension plan should let a pension specialist know _____ the end of this month.
full_sentence: Employees who are interested in taking part in the pension plan should let a pension specialist know by the end of this month.

questions: This new contract supersedes all previous _____ and understandings between the parties.
full_sentence: This new contract supersedes all previous agreements and understandings between the parties.

questions: Our library's index cards are arranged _____ by topic, title, and author's surname, with complete bibliographic information.
full_sentence: Our library's index cards are arranged alphabetically by topic, title, and author's surname, with complete bibliographic information.

questions: The summary is intended to _____ Mr. Galera's remarks about the proposed amendments to our management structure.
full_sentence: The summary is intended to clarify Mr. Galera's remarks about the proposed amendments to our management structure.

questions: The administrator will be in _____ of collecting and distributing the property of a person who dies without a will.

questions: One of the duties of the head of the accounting department is knowing _____ to allocate for the company's annual budget.

questions: Ceramics are fragile, but they do not _____ as quickly as many other valuable possessions.

questions: After several failed attempts, the company is _____ trying to advertise their latest product in overseas markets.

questions: This medicine should only be administered _____ the supervision of a skilled physician who is trained in the treatment of skin diseases.

questions: The low market barriers in the Asian market have proved _____ to foreign importers.

questions: After _____ this section of the test, please proceed to the next section without pausing or turning back.

questions: If you speak _____ and use correct pronunciation, you should be thoroughly understood by your clients.
full_sentence: If you speak clearly and use correct pronunciation, you should be thoroughly understood by your clients.

questions: It is advisable not to get involved _____ heated discussions concerning politics or religion at the workplace.
full_sentence: It is advisable not to get involved in heated discussions concerning politics or religion at the workplace.

questions: We would never have succeeded in closing the deal _____ June Lim's exceptional effort and expertise.
full_sentence: We would never have succeeded in closing the deal without June Lim's exceptional effort and expertise.

questions: Recently, inflation has been rising at an _____ fast rate and many businesses have been caught unprepared.
full_sentence: Recently, inflation has been rising at an exceptionally fast rate and many businesses have been caught unprepared.

questions: Next Monday is a national holiday, _____ most businesses will be closed.
full_sentence: Next Monday is a national holiday, so most businesses will be closed.

questions: The presentation will be _____ into three parts, so I'll need two more people to join me.
full_sentence: The presentation will be divided into three parts, so I'll need two more people to join me.

questions: Please use the envelope _____ in the catalog.
full_sentence: Please use the envelope provided in the catalog.

questions: Mayor Gillmore reported at today's news conference that the construction of the new City Hall building remains _____ schedule despite the recent unexpected delays.
full_sentence: Mayor Gillmore reported at today's news conference that the construction of the new City Hall building remains on schedule despite the recent unexpected delays.

questions: The scientist says that it is much _____ to write to a young audience than it is to simply write a research article.

questions: Our main _____ is to keep hazardous components out of the landfill and to provide an outlet for petroleum-contaminated materials.
full_sentence: Our main concern is to keep hazardous components out of the landfill and to provide an outlet for petroleum-contaminated materials.

questions: _____ year, due to a struggling economy and an increase in competition, company profits were down by nearly ten percent.
full_sentence: This year, due to a struggling economy and an increase in competition, company profits were down by nearly ten percent.

questions: Ms. Campbell's request for sick leave was _____ because she had already used up all her sick days to cover her previous absences.
full_sentence: Ms. Campbell's request for sick leave was refused because she had already used up all her sick days to cover her previous absences.

questions: It is not _____ for larger estate properties to be on sale for several years.

questions: All commuters to the suburbs are reminded that beginning May 15, the highway will be blocked _____ dark due to road construction.

questions: The Fair Trade Commission is warning against a new kind of online scam that claims you can _____ money by simply surfing the web.
full_sentence: The Fair Trade Commission is warning against a new kind of online scam that claims you can earn money by simply surfing the web.

questions: He _____ ever went to bed until 1 or 2 o'clock in the morning and sometimes worked through the night.
full_sentence: He hardly ever went to bed until 1 or 2 o'clock in the morning and sometimes worked through the night.

questions: Hopefully, I will get _____ the speech without making a mistake this time.
full_sentence: Hopefully, I will get through the speech without making a mistake this time.

questions: The Ministry officials said _____ to establish a heating-oil reserve in the northern part of the country would continue.
full_sentence: The Ministry officials said discussions to establish a heating-oil reserve in the northern part of the country would continue.

questions: The head librarian was required to make a _____ report on the condition of the library as of June 30.

questions: Due to our _____ to our employees' training and development, over 80% of our supervisors and managers have been promoted from within our organization.

questions: _____ our computer system has served us well in the past, it is not suitable for newer applications that have higher system requirements.

questions: The travel agent said the flight from Detroit to Houston would take _____ five hours.

questions: Human resource development plays a _____ role in building a team of qualified and motivated employees.

questions: The production line will operate _____ with the updated safety regulations.

questions: As there will be no reimbursement for _____ vacation time, employees are strongly urged to use all of it by the end of the calendar year.

questions: Customers can shop comfortably regardless of the weather, because many contemporary shopping centers are in _____ areas.
full_sentence: Customers can shop comfortably regardless of the weather, because many contemporary shopping centers are in enclosed areas.

questions: All programs and their respective rates, terms, and conditions _____ subject to change or modification.
full_sentence: All programs and their respective rates, terms, and conditions are subject to change or modification.

questions: Joseph has a tendency to get sick _____ he is under a lot of stress.

questions: Emergency 24 is now staffed with round-the-clock doctors, so we can provide _____ with medical assistance any time of the day.
full_sentence: Emergency 24 is now staffed with round-the-clock doctors, so we can provide you with medical assistance any time of the day.

questions: With very few exceptions, a home is the most valuable financial _____ a person owns.
