full_sentence: Two years after the tsunami, many families were still rebuilding their houses.

questions: The village people were evacuated when the river _____, because authorities feared some buildings could collapse.
full_sentence: The village people were evacuated when the river flooded, because authorities feared some buildings could collapse.

questions: Most major newspapers are now on-line, providing their readers with 24-hour news _____ their personal computer.
full_sentence: Most major newspapers are now on-line, providing their readers with 24-hour news through their personal computer.

questions: Thomas Ronson thinks that it would not be in the company's best _____ to wait any long to develop a new product.
full_sentence: Thomas Ronson thinks that it would not be in the company's best interests to wait any long to develop a new product.

questions: A welcome _____ for the newly hired staff is scheduled for Monday.
full_sentence: A welcome reception for the newly hired staff is scheduled for Monday.

questions: One reason for the rapid growth of Charlottesville is that _____ offers outstanding resources for new businesses.
full_sentence: One reason for the rapid growth of Charlottesville is that it offers outstanding resources for new businesses.

questions: The inventors of the New Bathroom Systems for seniors were awarded first prize in the Originality Contest for their _____ idea.
full_sentence: The inventors of the New Bathroom Systems for seniors were awarded first prize in the Originality Contest for their creative idea.

questions: The price of a cup of coffee seldom _____ reflects the cost of ingredient of coffee on the open market.
full_sentence: The price of a cup of coffee seldom directly reflects the cost of ingredient of coffee on the open market.

questions: Yoga is becoming an _____ popular hobby for the people of all ages.
full_sentence: Yoga is becoming an increasingly popular hobby for the people of all ages.

questions: Many companies _____ resisted the new insurance policy, but in the end almost everyone accepted it.
full_sentence: Many companies initially resisted the new insurance policy, but in the end almost everyone accepted it.

questions: _____ the economic depression, Ronald Imports decided that it would be best not to hire more people in the next six months.
full_sentence: Because of the economic depression, Ronald Imports decided that it would be best not to hire more people in the next six months.

questions: All the cars with the electronic auto-pay meter can drive through the payment booths _____ stopping to pay.
full_sentence: All the cars with the electronic auto-pay meter can drive through the payment booths without stopping to pay.

questions: To sign up for the one-year warranty, you must fill out the enclosed card and send it to the company _____ 60 days of your purchase.
full_sentence: To sign up for the one-year warranty, you must fill out the enclosed card and send it to the company within 60 days of your purchase.

questions: All of our luxury business rooms are equipped _____ accommodations that guarantee complete comfort during your stay at the Best Eastern Hotel.
full_sentence: All of our luxury business rooms are equipped with accommodations that guarantee complete comfort during your stay at the Best Eastern Hotel.

questions: Anyone who is not _____ satisfied with the class should report to the Head of Faculty.
full_sentence: Anyone who is not completely satisfied with the class should report to the Head of Faculty.

questions: Concessions made to reach an agreement were not as _____ as hoped.
full_sentence: Concessions made to reach an agreement were not as effective as hoped.

questions: It has been only two years that my boss has begun to look _____.
full_sentence: It has been only two years that my boss has begun to look old.

questions: For various reasons, the couples all rode in _____ car.
full_sentence: For various reasons, the couples all rode in separate car.

questions: My son's allergy symptoms _____ with the arrival of spring.
full_sentence: My son's allergy symptoms worsen with the arrival of spring.

questions: The US Steel Inc. is _____ that next year will bring a better economic situation.
full_sentence: The US Steel Inc. is optimistic that next year will bring a better economic situation.

questions: _____ equipment that is needed urgently will have to be approved by the department manager.
full_sentence: Any equipment that is needed urgently will have to be approved by the department manager.

questions: Close to the subway station as well as downtown, the Conference Center is _____ located.
full_sentence: Close to the subway station as well as downtown, the Conference Center is conveniently located.

questions: Mrs. Smith, who has supervised the Research and Development _____ 25 years, will be promoted to vice president.
full_sentence: Mrs. Smith, who has supervised the Research and Development for 25 years, will be promoted to vice president.

questions: Helmets must be worn at the construction site _____ all times.
full_sentence: Helmets must be worn at the construction site at all times.

questions: Stephanie has finished her internship at the hospital and is now working _____ a resident.
full_sentence: Stephanie has finished her internship at the hospital and is now working as a resident.

questions: Police officials regard setting up anti-crime measures _____ a main part of their responsibilities.
full_sentence: Police officials regard setting up anti-crime measures as a main part of their responsibilities.

questions: We _____ have dinner at six in the evening, but we are eating late today because my mother came home at 7:30.
full_sentence: We usually have dinner at six in the evening, but we are eating late today because my mother came home at 7:30.

questions: To achieve high productivity, all employees must _____ be responsible for their jobs.
full_sentence: To achieve high productivity, all employees must fully be responsible for their jobs.

questions: Our operators are on-line at every hour of the day, ready to provide _____ with the best service.
full_sentence: Our operators are on-line at every hour of the day, ready to provide you with the best service.

questions: _____ your product will find the right consumer groups after all of your marketing efforts.
full_sentence: Surely your product will find the right consumer groups after all of your marketing efforts.

questions: As of December, the number of subscribers to the internet had surpassed 33,000, a 250% increase _____ the previous year.
full_sentence: As of December, the number of subscribers to the internet had surpassed 33,000, a 250% increase over the previous year.

questions: Since _____ six months ago, the store has expanded its staff to fifty.
full_sentence: Since opening six months ago, the store has expanded its staff to fifty.

questions: Visitors almost always express _____ at the vast of the canyon.
full_sentence: Visitors almost always express amazement at the vast of the canyon.

questions: When the governors visited Donald Restaurant, _____ were served a special food.
full_sentence: When the governors visited Donald Restaurant, they were served a special food.

questions: The new report was widely considered as an improvement over the _____ one.
full_sentence: The new report was widely considered as an improvement over the previous one.

questions: A _____ receipt must be presented for a refund.
full_sentence: A valid receipt must be presented for a refund.

questions: The president met with the leaders of the union to discuss _____ concerns about the strike.
full_sentence: The president met with the leaders of the union to discuss his concerns about the strike.

questions: _____ more information on placing orders, please call 1-808-535-5528.
full_sentence: For more information on placing orders, please call 1-808-535-5528.

questions: I'd like to go with you tonight, but I'll be buried _____ a pile of paperwork.
full_sentence: I'd like to go with you tonight, but I'll be buried under a pile of paperwork.

questions: The reception that was held for our buyers lasted _____ midnight.
full_sentence: The reception that was held for our buyers lasted until midnight.

questions: The fragrant _____ of this lotion has attracted many young customers in the country.
full_sentence: The fragrant scent of this lotion has attracted many young customers in the country.

questions: Some critics think that the newly released film depends on _____ effects too much.
full_sentence: Some critics think that the newly released film depends on visual effects too much.

questions: Delivery personnel are reminded that they should deliver the _____ food items to each restaurant promptly.
full_sentence: Delivery personnel are reminded that they should deliver the perishable food items to each restaurant promptly.

questions: Products must conform to strict _____.
full_sentence: Products must conform to strict standards.

questions: The company is now looking for a few suitable candidates for the position of plant _____ to supervise the production process.
full_sentence: The company is now looking for a few suitable candidates for the position of plant manager to supervise the production process.

questions: Consumer responses to the newly introduced service were mostly favorable except for a serious _____ about the high price.
full_sentence: Consumer responses to the newly introduced service were mostly favorable except for a serious complaint about the high price.

questions: In the business world, mergers have _____ produced wonderful results for all the parties involved.
full_sentence: In the business world, mergers have seldom produced wonderful results for all the parties involved.

questions: The firm has _____ acquired a fast-growing pharmaceutical company to expand its business into a new area.
full_sentence: The firm has recently acquired a fast-growing pharmaceutical company to expand its business into a new area.

questions: The number of drugs which you can buy without a physician's prescription is strictly _____ in this country.
full_sentence: The number of drugs which you can buy without a physician's prescription is strictly limited in this country.

questions: The research service company required the temporary workers to obtain necessary skills for collecting _____ responses from consumers.
full_sentence: The research service company required the temporary workers to obtain necessary skills for collecting accurate responses from consumers.

questions: Most companies are expecting increased _____ this year as the economy is recovering from the long-term recession.
full_sentence: Most companies are expecting increased profits this year as the economy is recovering from the long-term recession.

questions: During the _____ 15 years, the level of overall workplace safety has been enhanced significantly.
full_sentence: During the past 15 years, the level of overall workplace safety has been enhanced significantly.

questions: The government official has _____ that additional fund would be allocated for the newly started project.
full_sentence: The government official has announced that additional fund would be allocated for the newly started project.

questions: Currently, AM DECK is _____ of producing 13 million units a year due to the successful expansion of the assembly line.
full_sentence: Currently, AM DECK is capable of producing 13 million units a year due to the successful expansion of the assembly line.

questions: The police carried out their duties with _____.
full_sentence: The police carried out their duties with restraint.

questions: The cassette tape manufacturer had to _____ the offer from the discount store because of the low price.
full_sentence: The cassette tape manufacturer had to decline the offer from the discount store because of the low price.

questions: If all of our telephone lines are _____, you can try to leave a message through the automatic message receiver.
full_sentence: If all of our telephone lines are busy, you can try to leave a message through the automatic message receiver.

questions: During the last few weeks, the stock market has been losing _____ due to the prolonged economic uncertainty.
full_sentence: During the last few weeks, the stock market has been losing momentum due to the prolonged economic uncertainty.

questions: Buyers of this product are advised to register it with the service center at their earliest _____.
full_sentence: Buyers of this product are advised to register it with the service center at their earliest convenience.

questions: _____, customers can purchase Whirlpool's new washing machines from the company's web-site.
full_sentence: Normally, customers can purchase Whirlpool's new washing machines from the company's web-site.

questions: This container can _____ up to 2 liters of food and it can be used inside the microwave.
full_sentence: This container can hold up to 2 liters of food and it can be used inside the microwave.

questions: On the contrary, there has been little financial support for the _____ of the old town's center.
full_sentence: On the contrary, there has been little financial support for the renewal of the old town's center.

questions: When Dwan Chemical established its service center in Seattle, the company made a huge step _____ for improving customer satisfaction.
full_sentence: When Dwan Chemical established its service center in Seattle, the company made a huge step inward for improving customer satisfaction.

questions: The company has a wonderful web-site that offers visitors excellent _____ of its overall product models.
full_sentence: The company has a wonderful web-site that offers visitors excellent examples of its overall product models.

questions: When you call a service center for help with a mechanical problem, please _____ it in detail.
full_sentence: When you call a service center for help with a mechanical problem, please describe it in detail.

questions: The company plans to make the new product _____ at any authorized stores around the country.
full_sentence: The company plans to make the new product available at any authorized stores around the country.

questions: Job applicants are supposed to send the personal information to the personnel office _____ upon being asked to do so.
full_sentence: Job applicants are supposed to send the personal information to the personnel office immediately upon being asked to do so.

questions: As you can see, the above examples _____ the changing consumer preference over the last 10 years.
full_sentence: As you can see, the above examples illustrate the changing consumer preference over the last 10 years.

questions: If you want, you can upgrade your service to the premium level at an additional _____ of $100.
full_sentence: If you want, you can upgrade your service to the premium level at an additional charge of $100.

questions: If this kind of accident _____ on the factory floor again, the management will be forced to close it.
full_sentence: If this kind of accident occurs on the factory floor again, the management will be forced to close it.

questions: In a move to increase sales revenues, the company started to advertise its products _____ throughout the country.
full_sentence: In a move to increase sales revenues, the company started to advertise its products widely throughout the country.

questions: From the development of the lawsuit case, we can _____ that many fast food restaurants will go out of business.
full_sentence: From the development of the lawsuit case, we can expect that many fast food restaurants will go out of business.

questions: They strictly _____ the use of the sports facility because of the ongoing renovation.
full_sentence: They strictly restricted the use of the sports facility because of the ongoing renovation.

questions: The famous consultant will give a lecture on how to deal with customer _____ efficiently and effectively.
full_sentence: The famous consultant will give a lecture on how to deal with customer complaints efficiently and effectively.

questions: Mark, the company's CEO, has pledged to review the factory expansion plan _____ at the inauguration ceremony.
full_sentence: Mark, the company's CEO, has pledged to review the factory expansion plan seriously at the inauguration ceremony.

questions: The experiment did not produce any meaningful results because it was _____ conducted.
full_sentence: The experiment did not produce any meaningful results because it was carelessly conducted.

questions: We are currently looking for a(n) _____ supplier who can provide us with high quality raw materials.
full_sentence: We are currently looking for a(n) reliable supplier who can provide us with high quality raw materials.

questions: _____ all of the respondents told that the product quality improved so much and they were very satisfied.
full_sentence: Nearly all of the respondents told that the product quality improved so much and they were very satisfied.

questions: Even though the total _____ were much higher than previous years, the total profits were very disappointing to all of us.
full_sentence: Even though the total revenues were much higher than previous years, the total profits were very disappointing to all of us.

questions: Please be reminded that the service company is not _____ to compensate for any damages during the service contract.
full_sentence: Please be reminded that the service company is not obligated to compensate for any damages during the service contract.

questions: There has been significant _____ in customer satisfaction since we hired those consultants.
full_sentence: There has been significant progress in customer satisfaction since we hired those consultants.

questions: To reduce overall turnover rate was one of the most _____ goals set by the management at the meeting.
full_sentence: To reduce overall turnover rate was one of the most important goals set by the management at the meeting.

questions: Because of the repeated delay of ordered shipments, Valueline _____ the contract with the Russian shipping company.
full_sentence: Because of the repeated delay of ordered shipments, Valueline terminated the contract with the Russian shipping company.

questions: _____ to the needs of those customers, Vax Shopping opened several new stores in the city of Greenville.
full_sentence: Responding to the needs of those customers, Vax Shopping opened several new stores in the city of Greenville.

questions: Only those who have signed up for the class will be _____ for the free gifts of notebooks and pencils.
full_sentence: Only those who have signed up for the class will be eligible for the free gifts of notebooks and pencils.

questions: Our current _____ is not enough to cover the large project, so we really need to raise more money.
full_sentence: Our current budget is not enough to cover the large project, so we really need to raise more money.

questions: The researchers had to find _____ ways to solve the recurring problem of communication breakdowns.
full_sentence: The researchers had to find innovative ways to solve the recurring problem of communication breakdowns.

questions: Your request for the _____ to the top secret is being reviewed and we will let you know the result soon.
full_sentence: Your request for the access to the top secret is being reviewed and we will let you know the result soon.

questions: To promote its newly introduced product, the company will launch a series of advertisements to _____ its image.
full_sentence: To promote its newly introduced product, the company will launch a series of advertisements to match its image.

questions: The real-estate expert _____ that most investors will face a bull market in the second half of the year.
full_sentence: The real-estate expert predicts that most investors will face a bull market in the second half of the year.

questions: Some of the employees have already _____ up for the seminar which will be held next month.
full_sentence: Some of the employees have already signed up for the seminar which will be held next month.

questions: On April 4, the chemical plant of Mansco will be shut down for _____ which will take 3 months.
full_sentence: On April 4, the chemical plant of Mansco will be shut down for renovation which will take 3 months.

questions: The annual budget for the city renovation project has been increased _____ with a unanimous decision of the city council.
full_sentence: The annual budget for the city renovation project has been increased substantially with a unanimous decision of the city council.

questions: Castrol Capital has set up an _____ department to assess each employee's productivity at work.
full_sentence: Castrol Capital has set up an independent department to assess each employee's productivity at work.

questions: The new supervisor will try _____ possible approach to the problem of high turnover rate.
full_sentence: The new supervisor will try every possible approach to the problem of high turnover rate.

questions: The number of entrepreneurs who donated more than $10 million for the charity drive _____ 100.
full_sentence: The number of entrepreneurs who donated more than $10 million for the charity drive exceeded 100.

questions: The company president is so temperamental these days that he will be likely to become furious with any management-level employee _____ sighs during a meeting.
full_sentence: The company president is so temperamental these days that he will be likely to become furious with any management-level employee who sighs during a meeting.

questions: The new bridge across the Mississippi which is currently under _____ will be one of the largest concrete structures in the world.
full_sentence: The new bridge across the Mississippi which is currently under development will be one of the largest concrete structures in the world.

questions: Either you agree to go bungee jumping with me on Saturday _____ I will be forced to enroll you in a skydiving course next weekend.
full_sentence: Either you agree to go bungee jumping with me on Saturday or I will be forced to enroll you in a skydiving course next weekend.

questions: Hoskin Manufacturing will not _____ its employees to come to work in casual wear.
full_sentence: Hoskin Manufacturing will not permit its employees to come to work in casual wear.

questions: The patent for the medicine which was established 15 years ago by Pharmacia will _____ as of next year.
full_sentence: The patent for the medicine which was established 15 years ago by Pharmacia will expire as of next year.

questions: We are sure that our _____ efforts will lead to a wonderful result at the end of the multi-year contract.
full_sentence: We are sure that our combined efforts will lead to a wonderful result at the end of the multi-year contract.

questions: The special history class was clearly _____ to help the students understand different cultures over the world.
full_sentence: The special history class was clearly designed to help the students understand different cultures over the world.

questions: The members get together _____ to have a talk on the status of the project which was started last year.
full_sentence: The members get together regularly to have a talk on the status of the project which was started last year.

questions: Compared to 1970s, more textile companies are _____ for the domestic market which has grown slightly.
full_sentence: Compared to 1970s, more textile companies are contending for the domestic market which has grown slightly.

questions: More financial and technical supports were badly needed when all the operations came to a _____ due to the serious mechanical problem.
full_sentence: More financial and technical supports were badly needed when all the operations came to a halt due to the serious mechanical problem.

questions: The board of directors talked about some _____ agendas such as racial discrimination and sexual harassment at the company.
full_sentence: The board of directors talked about some delicate agendas such as racial discrimination and sexual harassment at the company.

questions: At last, the project team came up with a(n) _____ method to decrease the number of defective TV sets at the production line.
full_sentence: At last, the project team came up with a(n) innovative method to decrease the number of defective TV sets at the production line.

questions: Because of the cost advantage, Cynthia has _____ an order for two toner cartridges through the Internet.
full_sentence: Because of the cost advantage, Cynthia has placed an order for two toner cartridges through the Internet.

questions: The engineers were dispatched to the new factory to find out why the boilers didn't work _____.
full_sentence: The engineers were dispatched to the new factory to find out why the boilers didn't work properly.

questions: In order to operate this new equipment safely, you must _____ to the instructor's explanation.
full_sentence: In order to operate this new equipment safely, you must listen to the instructor's explanation.

questions: _____ of the students who have submitted their summer job applications don't want to work at a farm.
full_sentence: Most of the students who have submitted their summer job applications don't want to work at a farm.

questions: Most behavioral scientists agree that there are a _____ of ways to motivate depressed employees at work.
full_sentence: Most behavioral scientists agree that there are a variety of ways to motivate depressed employees at work.

questions: Some of those products will not be available from any _____ stores in the country, so you must contact the headquarters.
full_sentence: Some of those products will not be available from any authorized stores in the country, so you must contact the headquarters.

questions: Reimbursement requests which are submitted to the revenue office after Jun 12th will not be _____ valid.
full_sentence: Reimbursement requests which are submitted to the revenue office after Jun 12th will not be considered valid.

questions: By cooperating with several international shipping companies, Dupont Chemical can deliver their products _____ geographic limitations.
full_sentence: By cooperating with several international shipping companies, Dupont Chemical can deliver their products regardless of geographic limitations.

questions: Dr. Irvine, one of the most highly regarded experts in stress management, will give a series of _____ on how to prevent workplace stress.
full_sentence: Dr. Irvine, one of the most highly regarded experts in stress management, will give a series of lectures on how to prevent workplace stress.

questions: Hallbrook Cards is looking forward to a steady sales growth for the _____ future with the introduction of thousands of new designs.
full_sentence: Hallbrook Cards is looking forward to a steady sales growth for the foreseeable future with the introduction of thousands of new designs.

questions: The service department has decided to provide answers to _____ asked questions for customers through the Internet.
full_sentence: The service department has decided to provide answers to frequently asked questions for customers through the Internet.

questions: The survey results _____ two-thirds of the workers in the area are still employed in traditional farming.
full_sentence: The survey results indicate two-thirds of the workers in the area are still employed in traditional farming.

questions: The job advertisement clearly stated that only _____ candidates would be considered for an interview.
full_sentence: The job advertisement clearly stated that only qualified candidates would be considered for an interview.

questions: All warehouse employees are required to do their best in preparing for the _____ annual inspection which will be conducted by several company and government inspectors.
full_sentence: All warehouse employees are required to do their best in preparing for the coming annual inspection which will be conducted by several company and government inspectors.

questions: When I told my friend I hadn't brought my name-tag, he said that he hadn't _____.
full_sentence: When I told my friend I hadn't brought my name-tag, he said that he hadn't either.

questions: The head economist predicts that telecommunication firms are _____ to grow at a rapid rate for many years to come.
full_sentence: The head economist predicts that telecommunication firms are likely to grow at a rapid rate for many years to come.

questions: The local bank _____ us that our loan application was finally approved by the branch manager.
full_sentence: The local bank notified us that our loan application was finally approved by the branch manager.

questions: Most _____ customers who will purchase our natural tea products live far from where we grow tea.
full_sentence: Most prospective customers who will purchase our natural tea products live far from where we grow tea.

questions: MAXIMA Inc. has decided to sell the auto division which _____ for only 25% of its total profits and is losing competitive advantage.
full_sentence: MAXIMA Inc. has decided to sell the auto division which accounts for only 25% of its total profits and is losing competitive advantage.

questions: Compared to last quarter's poor _____, there have been impressive improvements in total profitability.
full_sentence: Compared to last quarter's poor performance, there have been impressive improvements in total profitability.

questions: The CEO wants to have a serious talk on the new products that we are _____ developing.
full_sentence: The CEO wants to have a serious talk on the new products that we are currently developing.

questions: The government investigators are closely _____ into the financial scandal which involves a lot of high officials.
full_sentence: The government investigators are closely looking into the financial scandal which involves a lot of high officials.

questions: Surely, all the employees involved in the project will be _____ for their hard work and dedication.
full_sentence: Surely, all the employees involved in the project will be rewarded for their hard work and dedication.

questions: The delegates' opinions _____ in many ways and the final decision had to be postponed.
full_sentence: The delegates' opinions differed in many ways and the final decision had to be postponed.

questions: Besides the above _____, the second strategy will require only one-third of the workforce that the others need.
full_sentence: Besides the above advantages, the second strategy will require only one-third of the workforce that the others need.

questions: The secret service agents have been _____ placed in front of the bank in case there is another attempt to repeat the robbery of last month.
full_sentence: The secret service agents have been strategically placed in front of the bank in case there is another attempt to repeat the robbery of last month.

questions: According to our most recent _____, the temperature this winter is significantly higher than that of last year because of a number of changing atmospheric conditions.
full_sentence: According to our most recent calculations, the temperature this winter is significantly higher than that of last year because of a number of changing atmospheric conditions.

questions: In times of economic difficulties, many firms should develop plans to _____ employee productivity and reduce costs.
full_sentence: In times of economic difficulties, many firms should develop plans to increase employee productivity and reduce costs.

questions: Our new legal affairs manager, Mr. Clinton, has a good reputation and will report _____ to the president.
full_sentence: Our new legal affairs manager, Mr. Clinton, has a good reputation and will report directly to the president.

questions: At Liquor Barn, some senior officials are required to attend the business _____ which is held semiannually.
full_sentence: At Liquor Barn, some senior officials are required to attend the business function which is held semiannually.

questions: The regional managers of all the branches of the bank met on Tuesday to discuss _____ concerns about the current rise in petty thefts on company premises.
full_sentence: The regional managers of all the branches of the bank met on Tuesday to discuss their concerns about the current rise in petty thefts on company premises.

questions: _____ luggage should be brought to the airport complaints desk as soon as possible so that it can be assessed and reported to the airline upon arrival.
full_sentence: Damaged luggage should be brought to the airport complaints desk as soon as possible so that it can be assessed and reported to the airline upon arrival.

questions: Most of Mr. Barnett's associates have moved to the Seattle office, so he is planning to put _____ a transfer to go there next year.
full_sentence: Most of Mr. Barnett's associates have moved to the Seattle office, so he is planning to put in for a transfer to go there next year.

questions: Our director, Macmillan, is worried that the condition of the _____ excavation equipment is deteriorating.
full_sentence: Our director, Macmillan, is worried that the condition of the existing excavation equipment is deteriorating.

questions: The unexpected problem _____ the progress of the construction project, causing a huge loss to the company.
full_sentence: The unexpected problem obstructed the progress of the construction project, causing a huge loss to the company.

questions: It is important for everyone to _____ in the coming events this week.
full_sentence: It is important for everyone to participate in the coming events this week.

questions: The Millers arrived at the Bolken train station _____ before the scheduled departure time not to miss their train.
full_sentence: The Millers arrived at the Bolken train station well before the scheduled departure time not to miss their train.

questions: When you visit the branch office this Friday, please find out who is the point of _____ in organizing the annual event.
full_sentence: When you visit the branch office this Friday, please find out who is the point of contact in organizing the annual event.

questions: At the court, Timmons tried to _____ his murder of Mr. Lee as a right action to save him and his family.
full_sentence: At the court, Timmons tried to justify his murder of Mr. Lee as a right action to save him and his family.

questions: Collecting the necessary data was _____ easy, but analyzing them required a lot of efforts.
full_sentence: Collecting the necessary data was fairly easy, but analyzing them required a lot of efforts.

questions: Jack Welch, one of the most successful managers in the world, stressed that more power should be _____ to lower level employees.
full_sentence: Jack Welch, one of the most successful managers in the world, stressed that more power should be delegated to lower level employees.

questions: After all, the cost of hiring those advertisers was fully offset by the _____ results of a significant increase in sales.
full_sentence: After all, the cost of hiring those advertisers was fully offset by the impressive results of a significant increase in sales.

questions: Ms. Reinhart's study _____ that people who spend a lot of time on studying are more likely to be millionaires later in life.
full_sentence: Ms. Reinhart's study shows that people who spend a lot of time on studying are more likely to be millionaires later in life.

questions: The _____ of this training is to develop your confidence and skills so that you will be able to be the best dance instructor possible by the time we are finished.
full_sentence: The purpose of this training is to develop your confidence and skills so that you will be able to be the best dance instructor possible by the time we are finished.

questions: The secretary is leaving the company this month because she is getting _____.
full_sentence: The secretary is leaving the company this month because she is getting married.

questions: Be careful! This shirt will _____ when it is dried at the temperature of 50 C or more.
full_sentence: Be careful! This shirt will shrink when it is dried at the temperature of 50 C or more.

questions: Some analysts do not consider Cisbee to be _____ because they have always stuck to conservative approaches to business.
full_sentence: Some analysts do not consider Cisbee to be progressive because they have always stuck to conservative approaches to business.

questions: Davis, J-corp's marketing director, had to _____ his associates when they arrived late for the important meeting.
full_sentence: Davis, J-corp's marketing director, had to stand in for his associates when they arrived late for the important meeting.

questions: Please remember that your service charges for the last three months are still _____ and must be paid in full by Jun 12th.
full_sentence: Please remember that your service charges for the last three months are still overdue and must be paid in full by Jun 12th.

questions: The medical researchers plan to _____ a series of experiments to find out how the new medicine works on animals.
full_sentence: The medical researchers plan to conduct a series of experiments to find out how the new medicine works on animals.

questions: The management told us that they had every _____ of resuming talks on wages with the striking union.
full_sentence: The management told us that they had every intention of resuming talks on wages with the striking union.

questions: Several complaints received from customers forced the company to _____ its recently introduced new model.
full_sentence: Several complaints received from customers forced the company to redesign its recently introduced new model.

questions: It is _____ that the two opposing parties should find common ground on the pending matter before the deadline.
full_sentence: It is desirable that the two opposing parties should find common ground on the pending matter before the deadline.

questions: After hearing _____ opinions from the conference attendees, the CEO of Geneka provided an overview of the company's annual objectives.
full_sentence: After hearing diverse opinions from the conference attendees, the CEO of Geneka provided an overview of the company's annual objectives.

questions: The residents' consistent supports were the driving _____ behind the great success of the project.

questions: Mr. Yamano has asked the experts to come up with a plan to _____ with the increasing customer complaints.
