questions: Tourists are told to be _____ of pickpockets and guard their valuables at all times.
full_sentence: Tourists are told to be aware of pickpockets and guard their valuables at all times.

questions: Heavy storms on the south coast _____ fishing ships from leaving harbor.
full_sentence: Heavy storms on the south coast kept fishing ships from leaving harbor.

questions: This new spray which was introduced to the market last week has fresh _____ of lavender.
full_sentence: This new spray which was introduced to the market last week has fresh scent of lavender.

questions: Over the last thirty years, Guinett Mall has _____ been offering customers quality products at affordable prices.
full_sentence: Over the last thirty years, Guinett Mall has consistently been offering customers quality products at affordable prices.

questions: At first, those investigators promised to conduct their work _____ making the case public.
full_sentence: At first, those investigators promised to conduct their work without making the case public.

questions: Before installing the software on your computer, please read the attached instruction manual _____.
full_sentence: Before installing the software on your computer, please read the attached instruction manual carefully.

questions: To make himself understood more effectively, the guest speaker took a few _____ of successful businesses.
full_sentence: To make himself understood more effectively, the guest speaker took a few examples of successful businesses.

questions: The guest speaker told us that humans have been accomplishing scientific _____ through learning.
full_sentence: The guest speaker told us that humans have been accomplishing scientific advances through learning.

questions: Large discount stores sometimes use additional financial _____ to dispose of their old stocks.
full_sentence: Large discount stores sometimes use additional financial incentives to dispose of their old stocks.

questions: The computer we have just checked is equipped with diverse features, but it is _____ too expensive.
full_sentence: The computer we have just checked is equipped with diverse features, but it is far too expensive.

questions: Many transporting companies sometimes _____ wars as an wonderful opportunity to make high profits.
full_sentence: Many transporting companies sometimes rely on wars as an wonderful opportunity to make high profits.

questions: After the welcome reception at the hotel, the manager _____ the new employees on the company's business.
full_sentence: After the welcome reception at the hotel, the manager briefed the new employees on the company's business.

questions: When I called the headquarters, I was told that the secretary arranged a _____ for the newcomers.
full_sentence: When I called the headquarters, I was told that the secretary arranged a reception for the newcomers.

questions: During this special event period, you can enroll for the diet program for as _____ as $50 a month.
full_sentence: During this special event period, you can enroll for the diet program for as little as $50 a month.

questions: Even a professional photographer will have some difficulty taking picture of a _____ moving object.
full_sentence: Even a professional photographer will have some difficulty taking picture of a rapidly moving object.

questions: Judging from her great efforts and dedication, Mr. Yang will _____ be recommended for the position.
full_sentence: Judging from her great efforts and dedication, Mr. Yang will undoubtedly be recommended for the position.

questions: The final sales figures of this year are expected to _____ the goal set by the managers at the meeting.
full_sentence: The final sales figures of this year are expected to exceed the goal set by the managers at the meeting.

questions: The supporters' association has been focusing on the _____ of all fund-raising efforts for the political party.
full_sentence: The supporters' association has been focusing on the coordination of all fund-raising efforts for the political party.

questions: The senator has once more confirmed his _____ dedication to improving the economy of the city.
full_sentence: The senator has once more confirmed his unwavering dedication to improving the economy of the city.

questions: It seems that the national _____ is requesting the political reform to be carried out gradually.
full_sentence: It seems that the national consensus is requesting the political reform to be carried out gradually.

questions: Because the final decision has already been made, _____ discussions will be meaningless.
full_sentence: Because the final decision has already been made, subsequent discussions will be meaningless.

questions: When Jennifer visited the clothing shop, she couldn't find any clothes which _____ her nicely.
full_sentence: When Jennifer visited the clothing shop, she couldn't find any clothes which fit her nicely.

questions: Any guests who want to vacate their rooms before the scheduled date must submit _____ in writing.
full_sentence: Any guests who want to vacate their rooms before the scheduled date must submit notification in writing.

questions: _____ The accounting department is _____ under government investigation for illegal accounting practices.
full_sentence: presently The accounting department is presently under government investigation for illegal accounting practices.

questions: Applicants were required to _____ their job preference by marking the appropriate box on the form.
full_sentence: Applicants were required to indicate their job preference by marking the appropriate box on the form.

questions: According to the annual report, total revenues are up _____ 10 percent this year.
full_sentence: According to the annual report, total revenues are up nearly 10 percent this year.

questions: Any employees who want to take a vacation after August must _____ up for the schedule which they prefer.
full_sentence: Any employees who want to take a vacation after August must sign up for the schedule which they prefer.

questions: The problem of ever increasing overhead costs has _____ emerged as a key issue for the local firm.
full_sentence: The problem of ever increasing overhead costs has recently emerged as a key issue for the local firm.

questions: Qualcom reserves a right to _____ the contract with the component manufacturer if the price rises.
full_sentence: Qualcom reserves a right to terminate the contract with the component manufacturer if the price rises.

questions: The computer technicians _____ sales representatives with detailed instructions on how to operate the program.
full_sentence: The computer technicians provide sales representatives with detailed instructions on how to operate the program.

questions: Any customers who are reluctant to use Internet order system are encouraged to call Varieties Textiles _____ to place an order.
full_sentence: Any customers who are reluctant to use Internet order system are encouraged to call Varieties Textiles directly to place an order.

questions: The project manager asked the budget committee to build an extra 20% into the budget to cover _____ contingencies.
full_sentence: The project manager asked the budget committee to build an extra 20% into the budget to cover unexpected contingencies.

questions: The advertising department made higher profits last year while _____ costs by ten percent.
full_sentence: The advertising department made higher profits last year while reducing costs by ten percent.

questions: The total sales are expected to go far _____ the expectations as a result of the recently adopted distribution system.
full_sentence: The total sales are expected to go far beyond the expectations as a result of the recently adopted distribution system.

questions: Factors _____ to globalization include the development of transportation and communication, lower tariffs, more international travel, and so on.
full_sentence: Factors contributing to globalization include the development of transportation and communication, lower tariffs, more international travel, and so on.

questions: ITACA's earnings may not be particularly impressive, but we have to make _____ for the costly investment that the company has made.
full_sentence: ITACA's earnings may not be particularly impressive, but we have to make allowances for the costly investment that the company has made.

questions: Contracting an artist to create graphics made more _____ for the company than creating a full-time position.
full_sentence: Contracting an artist to create graphics made more sense for the company than creating a full-time position.

questions: When authorizing the sell order, investors should verify that their financial consultants are _____ registered.
full_sentence: When authorizing the sell order, investors should verify that their financial consultants are properly registered.

questions: With regard to the strategic alliance deal worked out by the delegates from the two companies, no _____ objections are anticipated.
full_sentence: With regard to the strategic alliance deal worked out by the delegates from the two companies, no serious objections are anticipated.

questions: What do you say _____ this afternoon?
full_sentence: What do you say to swimming this afternoon?

questions: Jason is invincible; he could beat you at _____ time.
full_sentence: Jason is invincible; he could beat you at any time.

questions: The stadium _____ by May 10.
full_sentence: The stadium is to be built by May 10.

questions: She reminded me _____ my brother.
full_sentence: She reminded me of my brother.

questions: Faced with decreasing _____ which are reflected in the report, the company must carry out a drastic measure.
full_sentence: Faced with decreasing profits which are reflected in the report, the company must carry out a drastic measure.

questions: The Health Ministry _____ that the newly introduced medicine be used with great care as it can have a serious side effect.
full_sentence: The Health Ministry recommended that the newly introduced medicine be used with great care as it can have a serious side effect.

questions: Several important changes have been made to the company handbook in the _____ five years.
full_sentence: Several important changes have been made to the company handbook in the past five years.

questions: The employees were asked to notify the convention organizers of whether they would attend it or not at their earliest _____.
full_sentence: The employees were asked to notify the convention organizers of whether they would attend it or not at their earliest convenience.

questions: The sales projection was not _____ because it didn't include some important data.
full_sentence: The sales projection was not accurate because it didn't include some important data.

questions: Mr. Smith had to _____ the job offer because he wanted to extend his study to a graduate school.
full_sentence: Mr. Smith had to decline the job offer because he wanted to extend his study to a graduate school.

questions: The new production equipment which was installed last week is _____ of turning out 300 units a day.
full_sentence: The new production equipment which was installed last week is capable of turning out 300 units a day.

questions: Inter-Solution has been offering customers easy access to online resources _____ of time and location.
full_sentence: Inter-Solution has been offering customers easy access to online resources regardless of time and location.

questions: Many young people choose to attend graduate schools as a temporary _____ to seeking employment.
full_sentence: Many young people choose to attend graduate schools as a temporary alternative to seeking employment.

questions: Detour signs will be _____ placed at right spots so that motorists can easily notice them while driving.
full_sentence: Detour signs will be prominently placed at right spots so that motorists can easily notice them while driving.

questions: Decline in automobile import has done little to _____ concerns about the country's trade deficit.
full_sentence: Decline in automobile import has done little to alleviate concerns about the country's trade deficit.

questions: Usually, Friday is a very _____ day for most banks and post offices because there are lots of work to process.
full_sentence: Usually, Friday is a very busy day for most banks and post offices because there are lots of work to process.

questions: As more and more investors invest their money in Hancok Metal, its shares are gaining _____.
full_sentence: As more and more investors invest their money in Hancok Metal, its shares are gaining momentum.

questions: Mr. Lee helped me _____ over those international contracts and I was able to finish work on time.
full_sentence: Mr. Lee helped me look over those international contracts and I was able to finish work on time.

questions: The medical research project will start next March _____ the government approves the budget request.
full_sentence: The medical research project will start next March providing the government approves the budget request.

questions: At the end of the presentation, the speaker left the _____ that he would be the best candidate to supervise the project.
full_sentence: At the end of the presentation, the speaker left the impression that he would be the best candidate to supervise the project.

questions: Since the upgraded service was carried out, there have been significantly fewer number of customer _____.
full_sentence: Since the upgraded service was carried out, there have been significantly fewer number of customer complaints.

questions: At James Logan High School, most of the students are studying _____ for the upcoming entrance exam.
full_sentence: At James Logan High School, most of the students are studying hard for the upcoming entrance exam.

questions: When you visit the equipment room, you can borrow the machine to _____ the large balloons with helium.
full_sentence: When you visit the equipment room, you can borrow the machine to fill the large balloons with helium.

questions: Unfortunately, those newcomers were not _____ enough to identify some major problems in the presented documents.
full_sentence: Unfortunately, those newcomers were not alert enough to identify some major problems in the presented documents.

questions: Among the several beaches in the area, Cocomo Beach is _____ located near the city.
full_sentence: Among the several beaches in the area, Cocomo Beach is agreeably located near the city.

questions: The noise from the construction site _____ both the teacher and the students during the class.
full_sentence: The noise from the construction site distracted both the teacher and the students during the class.

questions: The manager at the store gave us the _____ that we would be given the discount coupons for the model.
full_sentence: The manager at the store gave us the assurance that we would be given the discount coupons for the model.

questions: According to the _____ that I obtained from the tourist center, there is a train leaving for Reno every hour on the hour.
full_sentence: According to the brochure that I obtained from the tourist center, there is a train leaving for Reno every hour on the hour.

questions: If you cannot _____ the deadline for the design work, you must let the supervisor know immediately.
full_sentence: If you cannot meet the deadline for the design work, you must let the supervisor know immediately.

questions: The job consultant has been encouraging young job seekers to _____ on their personal experience.
full_sentence: The job consultant has been encouraging young job seekers to draw on their personal experience.

questions: Before the release of the highly _____ movie, the distributor conducted several advertising campaigns for it.
full_sentence: Before the release of the highly anticipated movie, the distributor conducted several advertising campaigns for it.

questions: Treating every employee _____ is an important task for any managers when it comes to employee motivation.
full_sentence: Treating every employee respectfully is an important task for any managers when it comes to employee motivation.

questions: When you finish this computer course, employment prospects will be more _____ than before.
full_sentence: When you finish this computer course, employment prospects will be more promising than before.

questions: Some unexpected obstacles are _____ the merger between the two corporations from taking place.
full_sentence: Some unexpected obstacles are preventing the merger between the two corporations from taking place.

questions: Fortunately, new interns appeared _____ of acquiring necessary skills for their jobs at the company.
full_sentence: Fortunately, new interns appeared capable of acquiring necessary skills for their jobs at the company.

questions: Negotiations on the acquisition of the small company suffering from the shortage of funds are _____ very well.
full_sentence: Negotiations on the acquisition of the small company suffering from the shortage of funds are proceeding very well.

questions: Remodeling the head office took a lot of time and money, but the result was well worth the _____.
full_sentence: Remodeling the head office took a lot of time and money, but the result was well worth the expense.

questions: The manager will be giving a _____ of the manufacturing plant to the visitors coming from Japan.
full_sentence: The manager will be giving a tour of the manufacturing plant to the visitors coming from Japan.

questions: Despite the unfounded rumors about the lawsuit, the relations between Amco and Textron _____ harmonious.
full_sentence: Despite the unfounded rumors about the lawsuit, the relations between Amco and Textron remain harmonious.

questions: Currently, employee morale is so high _____ the management expects the overall productivity to rise substantially.
full_sentence: Currently, employee morale is so high that the management expects the overall productivity to rise substantially.

questions: Jason is invincible; he could beat you at _____ times.
full_sentence: Jason is invincible; he could beat you at all times.

questions: The building _____ by December 1.
full_sentence: The building will have been built by December 1.

questions: She reminded me _____ my brother.
full_sentence: She reminded me to call my brother.

questions: Sue _____ TV ever since she got up this morning.
full_sentence: Sue has been watching TV ever since she got up this morning.

questions: The manager had _____ driven his car to get to the airport before it started to rain severely.
full_sentence: The manager had hardly driven his car to get to the airport before it started to rain severely.

questions: The overall turnover rate for this year is expected to be 10 percent, _____ to just 5 percent last year.
full_sentence: The overall turnover rate for this year is expected to be 10 percent, compared to just 5 percent last year.

questions: We cannot _____ the service contract unless you pay the requested amount by the deadline.
full_sentence: We cannot renew the service contract unless you pay the requested amount by the deadline.

questions: After Hagendiz's production line expansion, its new management wanted to _____ some of its original flavors.
full_sentence: After Hagendiz's production line expansion, its new management wanted to retain some of its original flavors.

questions: They have developed an _____ advertising campaign to introduce the new paper product to the market.
full_sentence: They have developed an effective advertising campaign to introduce the new paper product to the market.

questions: One key to effective money _____ lies in the methods employed to reduce spending for food.
full_sentence: One key to effective money management lies in the methods employed to reduce spending for food.

questions: The store manager suggested that the sales representatives should file any orders received _____.
full_sentence: The store manager suggested that the sales representatives should file any orders received promptly.

questions: The customer service department had fewer complaints, challenging the _____ that the quality of our software is deteriorating.
full_sentence: The customer service department had fewer complaints, challenging the perception that the quality of our software is deteriorating.

questions: For reimbursement purposes, staff are requested to submit all the valid receipts in order to _____ expenses.
full_sentence: For reimbursement purposes, staff are requested to submit all the valid receipts in order to verify expenses.

questions: Based on the report, factory output has risen over 20 percent since the _____ year.
full_sentence: Based on the report, factory output has risen over 20 percent since the previous year.

questions: _____ discounted airfare rates may seem attractive, but travelers are advised to purchase their tickets in advance.
full_sentence: Heavily discounted airfare rates may seem attractive, but travelers are advised to purchase their tickets in advance.

questions: The press community _____ applauded the government's announcement to increase the number of papers in the country.
full_sentence: The press community enthusiastically applauded the government's announcement to increase the number of papers in the country.

questions: According to the ad, Flu-Aid reduces the _____ of common influenza symptoms in older patients.
full_sentence: According to the ad, Flu-Aid reduces the duration of common influenza symptoms in older patients.

questions: The enclosed copies of letters and mailing receipts _____ that you should have received the invoice three months ago.
full_sentence: The enclosed copies of letters and mailing receipts indicate that you should have received the invoice three months ago.

questions: Business owners in the city are hoping people from _____ cities will spend some time and money while they wait for their trains.
full_sentence: Business owners in the city are hoping people from surrounding cities will spend some time and money while they wait for their trains.

questions: Kosato Inc., the only beverage maker in the area, has announced that its _____ have risen 16 percent in the past six months.
full_sentence: Kosato Inc., the only beverage maker in the area, has announced that its profits have risen 16 percent in the past six months.

questions: The main mission of those experts is to _____ contribute to the nation's strong economy through their expertise.
full_sentence: The main mission of those experts is to consistently contribute to the nation's strong economy through their expertise.

questions: The mobile phone with a small built-in camera _____ a significant advance in communication technologies.
full_sentence: The mobile phone with a small built-in camera represents a significant advance in communication technologies.

questions: Some lawmakers strongly maintain that regulations on rents nationwide must be kept to an _____ minimum.
full_sentence: Some lawmakers strongly maintain that regulations on rents nationwide must be kept to an absolute minimum.

questions: Calgary government has allocated $10 million to be distributed to various _____ that restore and maintain national historic sites.
full_sentence: Calgary government has allocated $10 million to be distributed to various organizations that restore and maintain national historic sites.

questions: The number of prizes available for Great Employees Award is _____ limited; only 5 people will receive one.
full_sentence: The number of prizes available for Great Employees Award is strictly limited; only 5 people will receive one.

questions: Most corporate owners are reluctant to make an investment since they feel _____ about the long-term strength of the economy.
full_sentence: Most corporate owners are reluctant to make an investment since they feel insecure about the long-term strength of the economy.

questions: The new procedure will be put into _____ after the committee reviews its overall effectiveness and feasibility.
full_sentence: The new procedure will be put into effect after the committee reviews its overall effectiveness and feasibility.

questions: Sam has been _____ progress in his work since he was hired by the company.
full_sentence: Sam has been making progress in his work since he was hired by the company.

questions: Investopia tries to minimize office noise pollution, which lowers productivity by _____ analysts from their work.
full_sentence: Investopia tries to minimize office noise pollution, which lowers productivity by distracting analysts from their work.

questions: Please remember that the contents of the packages are perishable, so they must be delivered _____.
full_sentence: Please remember that the contents of the packages are perishable, so they must be delivered promptly.

questions: The advertisement on some major newspapers is a job seeker's first _____ with Funaki Industries.
full_sentence: The advertisement on some major newspapers is a job seeker's first contact with Funaki Industries.

questions: Thanks to the _____ of new business partnership by Axon's president, the firm now can expand into European market.
full_sentence: Thanks to the cultivation of new business partnership by Axon's president, the firm now can expand into European market.

questions: Each customer's eligibility for the special financing plan is _____ to credit approval and a $ 1,000 minimum purchase.
full_sentence: Each customer's eligibility for the special financing plan is subject to credit approval and a $ 1,000 minimum purchase.

questions: By the end of the year, faster computers will be installed in _____ of current ones.
full_sentence: By the end of the year, faster computers will be installed in place of current ones.

questions: If you have to vacate your room, please give us one day's _____ so that we can arrange reservation schedules.
full_sentence: If you have to vacate your room, please give us one day's notice so that we can arrange reservation schedules.

questions: In an _____ to better serve consumers around the world, VERTICAL Inc. conducted consumer satisfaction surveys in many countries.
full_sentence: In an effort to better serve consumers around the world, VERTICAL Inc. conducted consumer satisfaction surveys in many countries.

questions: Faced with its worsening profit margin, HYPO Socket must reduce costs and operate more _____.
full_sentence: Faced with its worsening profit margin, HYPO Socket must reduce costs and operate more efficiently.

questions: Every year, people come to the small village of Montana around July 4th to enjoy its _____ fireworks displays.
full_sentence: Every year, people come to the small village of Montana around July 4th to enjoy its colorful fireworks displays.

questions: All employees and their family members are invited to _____ the company picnic which will be held at Brilery Park this Saturday.
full_sentence: All employees and their family members are invited to attend the company picnic which will be held at Brilery Park this Saturday.

questions: So that your credit card application can be processed quickly, please make sure that all sections of the form are filled out _____.
full_sentence: So that your credit card application can be processed quickly, please make sure that all sections of the form are filled out completely.

questions: Each of the students _____ doing a different assignment last night.
full_sentence: Each of the students was doing a different assignment last night.

questions: This is done out of modesty; in other words, we feel _____ we are not deserving of so much praise.
full_sentence: This is done out of modesty; in other words, we feel like we are not deserving of so much praise.

questions: Scientists are finding that some smells make us _____ better.
full_sentence: Scientists are finding that some smells make us feel better.

questions: Neither other renovated cars nor my car _____ pollution.
full_sentence: Neither other renovated cars nor my car stops pollution.

questions: Several large corporations expressed their interest in buying KFN, a state-owned company now _____ for privatization.
full_sentence: Several large corporations expressed their interest in buying KFN, a state-owned company now available for privatization.

questions: Recently, many airlines extended discount fares to the longer routes that are an _____ part of global business travel.
full_sentence: Recently, many airlines extended discount fares to the longer routes that are an essential part of global business travel.

questions: Consideration for the program is based on the individual _____, such as gender, age, and household income.
full_sentence: Consideration for the program is based on the individual characteristics, such as gender, age, and household income.

questions: _____ The trains were delayed. However, we predicted that the schedule should return to _____ for evening rush hours.
full_sentence: normal The trains were delayed. However, we predicted that the schedule should return to normal for evening rush hours.

questions: The demand for more powerful computers has _____ with the introduction of new technologies.
full_sentence: The demand for more powerful computers has increased with the introduction of new technologies.

questions: At last, the meeting has been _____ scheduled to take place at RAMDA Hotel near Crystal Lake.
full_sentence: At last, the meeting has been tentatively scheduled to take place at RAMDA Hotel near Crystal Lake.

questions: If you have any further questions, please do not _____ to telephone me.
full_sentence: If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to telephone me.

questions: When _____ a long distance call in their rooms, guests are requested to contact the operator to ask for help.
full_sentence: When making a long distance call in their rooms, guests are requested to contact the operator to ask for help.

questions: Any employees who need office supplies should submit a request _____ to the purchasing director.
full_sentence: Any employees who need office supplies should submit a request directly to the purchasing director.

questions: Job seekers are advised to develop different _____ of resumes to appeal to various employers.
full_sentence: Job seekers are advised to develop different versions of resumes to appeal to various employers.

questions: Thirty percent of the workers of the _____ part of the country are employed in service industry.
full_sentence: Thirty percent of the workers of the southern part of the country are employed in service industry.

questions: Unfortunately, the stock of cordless telephone is sold out, but we expect we can receive the supply _____.
full_sentence: Unfortunately, the stock of cordless telephone is sold out, but we expect we can receive the supply soon.

questions: Mr. Bahar has a good _____ for improving productivity in the new factory.
full_sentence: Mr. Bahar has a good suggestion for improving productivity in the new factory.

questions: It is very important that all corporation materials should be secured in a _____ place.
full_sentence: It is very important that all corporation materials should be secured in a safe place.

questions: Mr. Robert would have won the election _____ easily if he had remained in the race.
full_sentence: Mr. Robert would have won the election fairly easily if he had remained in the race.

questions: The hospital management announces that customers' private health records will be kept _____ confidential.
full_sentence: The hospital management announces that customers' private health records will be kept completely confidential.

questions: Bala Beauty Cosmetics sent us samples of its new line of eyeshadow for _____.
full_sentence: Bala Beauty Cosmetics sent us samples of its new line of eyeshadow for evaluation.

questions: The best way to resolve the disagreement of the two _____ sides has not yet been decided.
full_sentence: The best way to resolve the disagreement of the two opposing sides has not yet been decided.

questions: As an _____ to switch to Wirestar Communications, new business accounts receive a ten-euro credit.
full_sentence: As an incentive to switch to Wirestar Communications, new business accounts receive a ten-euro credit.

questions: The spokesman plans to give a statement that clearly expresses the executive management's _____ on the issue.
full_sentence: The spokesman plans to give a statement that clearly expresses the executive management's stance on the issue.

questions: The number of cars sold by James has substantially _____ the minimum requirement asked by the sales department.
full_sentence: The number of cars sold by James has substantially exceeded the minimum requirement asked by the sales department.

questions: Employees of Contak should remember to turn off all office lights before _____ for the day.
full_sentence: Employees of Contak should remember to turn off all office lights before leaving for the day.

questions: I am writing to _____ a leave of absence for the annual seminar that will be held in Seattle.
full_sentence: I am writing to request a leave of absence for the annual seminar that will be held in Seattle.

questions: People who are _____ to receiving instant feedback from their environment tend to be impatient with anything.
full_sentence: People who are accustomed to receiving instant feedback from their environment tend to be impatient with anything.

questions: Subscribers should first review the terms of the _____ carefully before singing it.
full_sentence: Subscribers should first review the terms of the agreement carefully before singing it.

questions: Authorities are looking for new technologies to control pollution, but they are afraid that the _____ may not be easy.
full_sentence: Authorities are looking for new technologies to control pollution, but they are afraid that the solutions may not be easy.

questions: All the articles in the book are the property of their _____ authors and may not be copied.
full_sentence: All the articles in the book are the property of their respective authors and may not be copied.

questions: The mega software has a new feature _____ users to include up to 10 animated elements in a presentation.
full_sentence: The mega software has a new feature allowing users to include up to 10 animated elements in a presentation.

questions: _____ Eco System has received a national award _____ $100,000 for promoting environmental awareness.
full_sentence: worth Eco System has received a national award worth $100,000 for promoting environmental awareness.

questions: Compared to last quarter's disappointing earnings, the figures of this quarter indicate an _____ trend.
full_sentence: Compared to last quarter's disappointing earnings, the figures of this quarter indicate an encouraging trend.

questions: Our pharmacy research team _____ added chocolate flavoring to antibiotics.
full_sentence: Our pharmacy research team recently added chocolate flavoring to antibiotics.

questions: The Nilsen Media Research conducted a _____ to find out the number of hours that children watch TV every day.
full_sentence: The Nilsen Media Research conducted a survey to find out the number of hours that children watch TV every day.

questions: The Grand Hotel located in the downtown shopping area contains more than 100 _____ rooms.
full_sentence: The Grand Hotel located in the downtown shopping area contains more than 100 elegant rooms.

questions: The mayor praises the detective for solving the difficult case in a _____ manner.
full_sentence: The mayor praises the detective for solving the difficult case in a timely manner.

questions: Construction _____ with the replacement of the old business building will take about 5 months.
full_sentence: Construction associated with the replacement of the old business building will take about 5 months.

questions: All staff members at Quality Inc. are _____ to take one 30-minute break during the 8-hour work day.
full_sentence: All staff members at Quality Inc. are allowed to take one 30-minute break during the 8-hour work day.

questions: Collecting stamps _____ been my hobby for a long time.
full_sentence: Collecting stamps has been my hobby for a long time.

questions: Only in my dreams _____ this would come true.
full_sentence: Only in my dreams did I think this would come true.

questions: The project's purpose was to store _____ on life.
full_sentence: The project's purpose was to store information on life.

questions: I forgot _____ the alarm, so I got up late.
full_sentence: I forgot to set the alarm, so I got up late.

questions: The original cost estimate was unrealistic because we had not _____ how much money would be spent on initial overhead costs.
full_sentence: The original cost estimate was unrealistic because we had not calculated how much money would be spent on initial overhead costs.

questions: It is _____ that the results of the research study remain confidential until they are released to the public.
full_sentence: It is essential that the results of the research study remain confidential until they are released to the public.

questions: Mr. Hopkins announced that the company is planning to implement business strategies that will not rely _____ on labor cost cutting.
full_sentence: Mr. Hopkins announced that the company is planning to implement business strategies that will not rely solely on labor cost cutting.

questions: Because few hotels in the region accept a credit card, the tour guide recommends that tourists bring _____.
full_sentence: Because few hotels in the region accept a credit card, the tour guide recommends that tourists bring cash.

questions: Son's Grill is the largest restaurant _____ to be built along the shore of the lake.
full_sentence: Son's Grill is the largest restaurant ever to be built along the shore of the lake.

questions: The computer workshop schedule is still considered _____, and we will keep you posted on any changes.
full_sentence: The computer workshop schedule is still considered tentative, and we will keep you posted on any changes.

questions: Employees at the local hotel create a warm _____ for clients by providing them with friendly service.
full_sentence: Employees at the local hotel create a warm atmosphere for clients by providing them with friendly service.

questions: _____ The Norton Bank personnel will automatically renew customers' enrollment in the online bill-paying program unless instructed to do _____.
full_sentence: otherwise The Norton Bank personnel will automatically renew customers' enrollment in the online bill-paying program unless instructed to do otherwise.

questions: The advertising team is working on the campaign that presents the mini van as the best _____ for families because of its spaciousness and safety features.
full_sentence: The advertising team is working on the campaign that presents the mini van as the best choice for families because of its spaciousness and safety features.

questions: The computer technicians should be able to service your area more often because their work load has been _____.
full_sentence: The computer technicians should be able to service your area more often because their work load has been reduced.

questions: The sales projections show that we will need to _____ next year's production by 15 percent.
full_sentence: The sales projections show that we will need to raise next year's production by 15 percent.

questions: Due to unexpected system _____, the grand opening was postponed until next month.
full_sentence: Due to unexpected system failures, the grand opening was postponed until next month.

questions: Most documents are _____ because the printing press was not designed to handle the detailed graphic the clients provided.
full_sentence: Most documents are illegible because the printing press was not designed to handle the detailed graphic the clients provided.

questions: Arrangements have been made to recall the _____ merchandise and issue refunds to customers.
full_sentence: Arrangements have been made to recall the defective merchandise and issue refunds to customers.

questions: Attendance at today's outdoor opening of the theater may be affected by the heavy rain _____ to begin in the afternoon.
full_sentence: Attendance at today's outdoor opening of the theater may be affected by the heavy rain expected to begin in the afternoon.

questions: Employees at Synergy Oil should remember that great care must be taken not to _____ rules and policies of the corporation.
full_sentence: Employees at Synergy Oil should remember that great care must be taken not to violate rules and policies of the corporation.

questions: Rexco Motors will offer customers extra _____ to buy new MXR Puma models introduced just 2 months ago.
full_sentence: Rexco Motors will offer customers extra incentives to buy new MXR Puma models introduced just 2 months ago.

questions: The clerical support team _____ to finish the project before the scheduled deadline is over.
full_sentence: The clerical support team rushed to finish the project before the scheduled deadline is over.

questions: James, who is one of the most successful employees, has an _____ customer service rating.
full_sentence: James, who is one of the most successful employees, has an enviable customer service rating.

questions: The magazine's plan to increase subscription has been only _____ successful, as it is often difficult to break into the new market.
full_sentence: The magazine's plan to increase subscription has been only somewhat successful, as it is often difficult to break into the new market.

questions: Because the office furniture is _____ for delivery this afternoon, the employees should make room for it before noon.
full_sentence: Because the office furniture is scheduled for delivery this afternoon, the employees should make room for it before noon.

questions: A number of safety inspectors will be sent to visit the oil refinery and verify the site's _____ with the safety regulations.
full_sentence: A number of safety inspectors will be sent to visit the oil refinery and verify the site's compliance with the safety regulations.

questions: The board of directors will _____ next week to approve the pending acquisition deal at the board room.
full_sentence: The board of directors will convene next week to approve the pending acquisition deal at the board room.

questions: The largest economic _____ predicts that the overall interest rates will rise a few percentage points in the next 6 months.
full_sentence: The largest economic forecast predicts that the overall interest rates will rise a few percentage points in the next 6 months.

questions: Elizabeth will take minutes of the meeting as the members further _____ cost-cutting measures.
full_sentence: Elizabeth will take minutes of the meeting as the members further discuss cost-cutting measures.

questions: The delegates from each department were able to reach a _____ on a proposal to reduce the overhead costs.
full_sentence: The delegates from each department were able to reach a consensus on a proposal to reduce the overhead costs.

questions: AMERICA Paper will look _____ different after the new chief executive officer takes over the company in July.
full_sentence: AMERICA Paper will look radically different after the new chief executive officer takes over the company in July.

questions: All the members of XEN CLUB should register for the _____ conference by September to avoid paying a late fee.
full_sentence: All the members of XEN CLUB should register for the annual conference by September to avoid paying a late fee.

questions: The media coverage dealing with the bribery case is _____ in the history of the newspaper company.
full_sentence: The media coverage dealing with the bribery case is unprecedented in the history of the newspaper company.

questions: Mr. Kim will be _____ the research study on nutritional supplement for the next 6 months.
full_sentence: Mr. Kim will be conducting the research study on nutritional supplement for the next 6 months.

questions: Because of the limited budget, the manger decided to lease a used one in good _____ for two years.
full_sentence: Because of the limited budget, the manger decided to lease a used one in good condition for two years.

questions: Economic indicators were getting better, but there was widespread _____ that they would worsen to the contrary.
full_sentence: Economic indicators were getting better, but there was widespread speculation that they would worsen to the contrary.

questions: _____ After several hours of discussion, the managers have agreed that the projected costs were not _____ estimated.
full_sentence: accurately After several hours of discussion, the managers have agreed that the projected costs were not accurately estimated.

questions: Career consultants advise their clients to reflect _____ on the approaches they take to a job search.
full_sentence: Career consultants advise their clients to reflect periodically on the approaches they take to a job search.

questions: Despite the inevitable delay, the committee announced that their schedule would still _____ a meeting next week.
full_sentence: Despite the inevitable delay, the committee announced that their schedule would still accommodate a meeting next week.

questions: In order to compete _____ in a highly competitive market, companies should develop a long-term plan.

questions: The fire fighters went to the factory, _____ down the blaze.
full_sentence: The fire fighters went to the factory, bringing down the blaze.

questions: Mary _____ to the States last year.
full_sentence: Mary went to the States last year.

questions: The Japanese _____ the game and passed it on to other countries.
full_sentence: The Japanese transformed the game and passed it on to other countries.

questions: Argument is often considered _____ in rigid families.
full_sentence: Argument is often considered disrespectful in rigid families.

questions: We will not give cash refunds, but will accept returns of unworn merchandise for store credit _____.
full_sentence: We will not give cash refunds, but will accept returns of unworn merchandise for store credit only.

questions: _____ the approval of the new business plan, Klein Enterprises generated enough funds for it.
full_sentence: Subsequent to the approval of the new business plan, Klein Enterprises generated enough funds for it.

questions: Employees wishing to be _____ for mileage need to submit the required documents.
full_sentence: Employees wishing to be reimbursed for mileage need to submit the required documents.

questions: Ocean's Delight located in 3rd street features the most _____ selection of seafood dishes in the city.

questions: To succeed in your stock investment, you must be willing to _____ responsibilities for any losses.

questions: The recent surge in attendance at the local museum has been _____ to the new Egyptian exhibit.
full_sentence: The recent surge in attendance at the local museum has been attributed to the new Egyptian exhibit.

questions: The special advisory committee will _____ to discuss the fiscal plan to boost the slow economy.
full_sentence: The special advisory committee will meet to discuss the fiscal plan to boost the slow economy.

questions: Several domestic companies worked together on a _____ profitable development project.
full_sentence: Several domestic companies worked together on a highly profitable development project.

questions: Decisions about vacation time are _____ determined by department head, though shift managers may grant permission.
full_sentence: Decisions about vacation time are typically determined by department head, though shift managers may grant permission.

questions: When the staff members in the department work too _____, they are more apt to make mistakes.
full_sentence: When the staff members in the department work too rapidly, they are more apt to make mistakes.

questions: He obtained most of the data from the previous researches, but the final report was _____ by Ms. Chin's analysis of the result.
full_sentence: He obtained most of the data from the previous researches, but the final report was influenced by Ms. Chin's analysis of the result.

questions: Reservation may be _____ by telephone or you can send an e-mail to the office if you prefer.

questions: For the best performance, you are advised to use only batteries _____ designed for this type of camera.
full_sentence: For the best performance, you are advised to use only batteries specifically designed for this type of camera.

questions: The original _____ of the town's historical buildings will be preserved after the renovation project.
full_sentence: The original appearance of the town's historical buildings will be preserved after the renovation project.

questions: James, our valuable employee, has been recognized for his years of _____ to the children's health clinic.
full_sentence: James, our valuable employee, has been recognized for his years of service to the children's health clinic.

questions: In response to the strong request from the accounting department, the information technology department granted a two-week _____ on the loan of the equipment.
full_sentence: In response to the strong request from the accounting department, the information technology department granted a two-week extension on the loan of the equipment.

questions: The prices quoted in our catalog are subject to change because the international market for gold is currently _____.
full_sentence: The prices quoted in our catalog are subject to change because the international market for gold is currently unstable.

questions: Students will find helpful _____ at www.science.com for their course assignments.
full_sentence: Students will find helpful resource at www.science.com for their course assignments.

questions: Some financial consultants don't advise people to invest in stocks which can _____ in value.
full_sentence: Some financial consultants don't advise people to invest in stocks which can decrease in value.

questions: The company had difficulty attracting overseas clients _____ their products are equal in quality to those of its global competitors.
full_sentence: The company had difficulty attracting overseas clients even though their products are equal in quality to those of its global competitors.

questions: Fortunately, the company managed to boost its sales to its _____ level of revenue in five years.
full_sentence: Fortunately, the company managed to boost its sales to its highest level of revenue in five years.

questions: Those advertising methods are valuable _____ for any company seeking to boost sales.
full_sentence: Those advertising methods are valuable tools for any company seeking to boost sales.

questions: The installation of the equipment will start at _____ 9 am tomorrow, so employees can come to work by 10 am.
full_sentence: The installation of the equipment will start at approximately 9 am tomorrow, so employees can come to work by 10 am.

questions: In anticipation of the inevitable merger with Brown Plastics, more representatives are _____ to travel to Europe to meet with the potential partners next week.
full_sentence: In anticipation of the inevitable merger with Brown Plastics, more representatives are scheduled to travel to Europe to meet with the potential partners next week.

questions: The Battys department stores honor coupons from any retailers to _____ that their prices are competitive.
full_sentence: The Battys department stores honor coupons from any retailers to ensure that their prices are competitive.

questions: Completion of the new financial towers took much _____ than the contractors had originally estimated.
full_sentence: Completion of the new financial towers took much longer than the contractors had originally estimated.

questions: The company's administrative department reserves the _____ to modify policies as necessary without the consent of the employees.
full_sentence: The company's administrative department reserves the right to modify policies as necessary without the consent of the employees.

questions: A number of medical researchers claim that the general lifestyle of workers has a _____ impact on their ability to produce efficiently on the job.
full_sentence: A number of medical researchers claim that the general lifestyle of workers has a considerable impact on their ability to produce efficiently on the job.

questions: Until the 3rd floor water damage is cleared, the accounting staff will _____ be working from the 6th floor conference center.
full_sentence: Until the 3rd floor water damage is cleared, the accounting staff will temporarily be working from the 6th floor conference center.

questions: Each section of the sales training manual should _____ the relevant statistics for consumer-based strategies.
full_sentence: Each section of the sales training manual should summarize the relevant statistics for consumer-based strategies.

questions: We at Grover Hill Flowers sincerely regret the error in your shipment and assure you that a replacement bouquet will be sent _____.
full_sentence: We at Grover Hill Flowers sincerely regret the error in your shipment and assure you that a replacement bouquet will be sent promptly.

questions: Grainger Architects has a high-profile staff consisting of engineers with excellent reputations and high _____ in commercial development.
full_sentence: Grainger Architects has a high-profile staff consisting of engineers with excellent reputations and high expertise in commercial development.

questions: Outdated software programs that are more _____ to corruption should be replaced with newer versions.
full_sentence: Outdated software programs that are more vulnerable to corruption should be replaced with newer versions.

questions: National accrediting specialists in a variety of industries caution that a _____ of well-trained managers harms employee relations and therefore affects corporate productivity.
full_sentence: National accrediting specialists in a variety of industries caution that a lack of well-trained managers harms employee relations and therefore affects corporate productivity.

questions: By the end of the year, all administrators will need to _____ one of three training workshops sponsored by the company.
full_sentence: By the end of the year, all administrators will need to attend one of three training workshops sponsored by the company.

questions: The manager has sent every member of the local business association an _____ to join her for an informal discussion.

questions: They have to work _____ to achieve their goals.
full_sentence: They have to work hard to achieve their goals.

questions: Right after he came home, he _____.
full_sentence: Right after he came home, he ran upstairs.

questions: The TV talk show went off the _____ after 20 years.
full_sentence: The TV talk show went off the air after 20 years.

questions: There are _____ in the newly published book on Asian history.

questions: From reviewing the application, we have determined that he is highly _____ for the position of financial analyst.
full_sentence: From reviewing the application, we have determined that he is highly qualified for the position of financial analyst.

questions: In order for the assembly line to run _____, we will need to hire more employees.
full_sentence: In order for the assembly line to run effectively, we will need to hire more employees.

questions: Most of the managers at Chevoir Packaging thought it is _____ to hire an outside company to handle the project.

questions: Genesis Software Inc. has decided to expand its business into Mexico and is looking for an agent who can _____ the company in that country.
full_sentence: Genesis Software Inc. has decided to expand its business into Mexico and is looking for an agent who can represent the company in that country.

questions: The high level of risk involved in the strategy _____ justifies a careful examination.

questions: Computech is donating used computers to local schools, _____ providing students with proper training.

questions: The instructors who were hired by the company will conduct a _____ range of courses for the employees.
full_sentence: The instructors who were hired by the company will conduct a wide range of courses for the employees.

questions: In the early days of meteorological research, the Weather Bureau obtained information about the weather from _____ to balloons and kites.
full_sentence: In the early days of meteorological research, the Weather Bureau obtained information about the weather from devices attached to balloons and kites.

questions: The famous city park became unpopular since temperature dropped so _____.
full_sentence: The famous city park became unpopular since temperature dropped so suddenly.

questions: Bradley Construction Inc. is seeking _____ workers for its hotel project which the company won last October.

questions: Mr. Lao has been appointed to head the _____ working on educational reform.
full_sentence: Mr. Lao has been appointed to head the committee working on educational reform.

questions: A cardiac arrest is a condition _____ the heart stops pumping blood, and is the cause for tens of thousands of deaths a year.
full_sentence: A cardiac arrest is a condition in which the heart stops pumping blood, and is the cause for tens of thousands of deaths a year.

questions: He is the one who made all this possible, so the _____ must go to him.
full_sentence: He is the one who made all this possible, so the credit must go to him.

questions: The defendant continued to _____ not guilty of the crime he was charged with.

questions: The risks of _____ skin cancer can be significantly reduced by putting on sunscreen when going outdoors in the summer.
full_sentence: The risks of developing skin cancer can be significantly reduced by putting on sunscreen when going outdoors in the summer.

questions: Several years of unchecked and unhealthy expansion have thrown the economy into the recession that is now _____ the nation.
full_sentence: Several years of unchecked and unhealthy expansion have thrown the economy into the recession that is now crippling the nation.

questions: If you have great talents, industry will improve them: if you have only moderate abilities, industry will make up for their _____.
full_sentence: If you have great talents, industry will improve them: if you have only moderate abilities, industry will make up for their deficiency.

questions: Many independent college graduates want to be _____ rather than be hired by a big company.
full_sentence: Many independent college graduates want to be self-employed rather than be hired by a big company.

questions: The war of words is now being _____ between the two interested parties.

questions: The interview with Grace Alkins, done by Pop Culture's top journalist Mary White, will be included in the February _____.
full_sentence: The interview with Grace Alkins, done by Pop Culture's top journalist Mary White, will be included in the February issue.

questions: Nextile Fabrics is an emerging corporation _____ to make a reputation for itself in the industry.
full_sentence: Nextile Fabrics is an emerging corporation eager to make a reputation for itself in the industry.

questions: Recent renovations of the downtown district are anticipated to _____ visitors to the area.

questions: Beginning next year, any checked out software manuals will be _____ within five days in order to avoid losing materials.
full_sentence: Beginning next year, any checked out software manuals will be due within five days in order to avoid losing materials.

questions: To take _____ of the upcoming sale, shoppers should be waiting at the store at least one hour prior to opening.

questions: Mr. Harper kindly volunteered to _____ the report personally instead of using a courier service.

questions: In a couple of days, Ms. Martinez will get the _____ of the poll taken by the marketing department.
full_sentence: In a couple of days, Ms. Martinez will get the results of the poll taken by the marketing department.

questions: Mr. Cordova will _____ much of his control even though he is stepping down as president.

questions: In accordance with the new regulations, all workers will be _____ to apply for personal leave of up to three months.

questions: Palmer Developments is about to announce that condominiums are being built in highly _____ locations along the river.
full_sentence: Palmer Developments is about to announce that condominiums are being built in highly desirable locations along the river.

questions: A safety inspector will visit the plant next week to address any _____ employees may have relating to hazards in the workplace.
full_sentence: A safety inspector will visit the plant next week to address any concerns employees may have relating to hazards in the workplace.

questions: I am writing _____ to point out an erroneous entry on my Premium Customers Card.
full_sentence: I am writing again to point out an erroneous entry on my Premium Customers Card.

questions: The publication of my medical article in the New Med magazine's July 15 issue was _____.
full_sentence: The publication of my medical article in the New Med magazine's July 15 issue was unauthorized.

questions: Included is a duplicate of the fax sent by your company _____ that no additional money transfers were made subsequent to March 6.
full_sentence: Included is a duplicate of the fax sent by your company confirming that no additional money transfers were made subsequent to March 6.

questions: The older of the two daughters _____ to take matters into her own hands since their father died.

questions: The new boss is difficult _____; he is too demanding.
full_sentence: The new boss is difficult to work for; he is too demanding.

questions: No one is perfect. We should accept the fact that all people are _____ to make mistakes.
full_sentence: No one is perfect. We should accept the fact that all people are liable to make mistakes.

questions: _____ our school brochure and an application form.
full_sentence: Enclosed please find our school brochure and an application form.

questions: Atty Meeks told me that you and he have been _____ colleagues for some time now.
full_sentence: Atty Meeks told me that you and he have been close colleagues for some time now.

questions: Before we are able to _____ Sandy Pitt's application for a loan, she must provide her credit and banking history.
full_sentence: Before we are able to evaluate Sandy Pitt's application for a loan, she must provide her credit and banking history.

questions: I have been employed as a legal assistant for the Laureta Law Firm where I closed a _____ prominent case involving the illegitimate use of a company logo.
full_sentence: I have been employed as a legal assistant for the Laureta Law Firm where I closed a highly prominent case involving the illegitimate use of a company logo.

questions: Simtech program will be _____ on the new drive installed by the company.
full_sentence: Simtech program will be accessible on the new drive installed by the company.

questions: Due to the retirement this year of many senior officials, the HR newsletter _____ has many openings listed.
full_sentence: Due to the retirement this year of many senior officials, the HR newsletter currently has many openings listed.

questions: Since the violinist practiced very hard, her performance at the concert was without a _____.
full_sentence: Since the violinist practiced very hard, her performance at the concert was without a flaw.

questions: There are bound to be many _____ in life.

questions: The fact that the suspect was _____ guilty by the jury surprised no one.

questions: If a(n) _____ is not paid within 10 days after it is due, a delinquent charge of $10 will be paid by the buyer.
full_sentence: If a(n) installment is not paid within 10 days after it is due, a delinquent charge of $10 will be paid by the buyer.

questions: The sculptor made a plaster _____ of his hand so that he could have an exact mold.
full_sentence: The sculptor made a plaster cast of his hand so that he could have an exact mold.

questions: The average American is headed for a heart attack, due to bad _____ habits and stress.
full_sentence: The average American is headed for a heart attack, due to bad dietary habits and stress.

questions: Under no _____ will I allow that rule to be changed.

questions: Because of the increase in raw materials costs such as paper and ink, newspapers are being forced to _____ subscription rates.
full_sentence: Because of the increase in raw materials costs such as paper and ink, newspapers are being forced to raise subscription rates.

questions: Current customers will receive a new year's calendar if they renew their _____ to Exercise Magazine.
full_sentence: Current customers will receive a new year's calendar if they renew their subscription to Exercise Magazine.

questions: Harry's Trucks recently _____ the expansion of its dealership nationwide, beginning on the eastern coast.
full_sentence: Harry's Trucks recently announced the expansion of its dealership nationwide, beginning on the eastern coast.

questions: A memo has been sent out to make the staff _____ of upcoming changes to the corporate structure.
full_sentence: A memo has been sent out to make the staff aware of upcoming changes to the corporate structure.

questions: The company will reimburse any _____ that you might have incurred during your trip.
full_sentence: The company will reimburse any expenses that you might have incurred during your trip.

questions: Given that the first shipment goes smoothly, we plan to _____ orders solely with that distributor.
full_sentence: Given that the first shipment goes smoothly, we plan to place orders solely with that distributor.

questions: The library does not allow renewal of books that are extremely _____, because other patrons are waiting for them.
full_sentence: The library does not allow renewal of books that are extremely popular, because other patrons are waiting for them.

questions: It is _____ essential that all the necessary data be sent to the researchers before 20th.
full_sentence: It is absolutely essential that all the necessary data be sent to the researchers before 20th.

questions: Because of the current financial crisis, we are unable to _____ the additional funding the research department is requesting.
full_sentence: Because of the current financial crisis, we are unable to provide the additional funding the research department is requesting.

questions: Trend Computing's latest computer model has been _____ advertised since it was launched last quarter.
full_sentence: Trend Computing's latest computer model has been widely advertised since it was launched last quarter.

questions: Employees will be able to discuss the employment contract in detail after they have had an _____ to read and sign it.
full_sentence: Employees will be able to discuss the employment contract in detail after they have had an opportunity to read and sign it.

questions: Please check the building to verify that signs indicating the quickest exit route are _____ posted.
full_sentence: Please check the building to verify that signs indicating the quickest exit route are clearly posted.

questions: You are required to present two forms of _____ to the management office in order to use any of our services.
full_sentence: You are required to present two forms of identification to the management office in order to use any of our services.

questions: I regret to inform you that I am unable to _____ your invitation to the party because of an unexpected event.
full_sentence: I regret to inform you that I am unable to accept your invitation to the party because of an unexpected event.

questions: In case you are not completely satisfied with the product, you can return it within two weeks for a full _____.
full_sentence: In case you are not completely satisfied with the product, you can return it within two weeks for a full refund.

questions: The product was seriously damaged in shipping because the packaging provided was not _____.
full_sentence: The product was seriously damaged in shipping because the packaging provided was not adequate.

questions: Faced with strong competition all over the world, we must remain _____ of rapidly changing technology.
full_sentence: Faced with strong competition all over the world, we must remain aware of rapidly changing technology.

questions: The Royal Palm Tree Hotel _____ guests with complimentary shuttle service around the city.
full_sentence: The Royal Palm Tree Hotel provides guests with complimentary shuttle service around the city.

questions: For a _____ time, the employees at Rotus Inc. may take advantage of the special discount offer.
full_sentence: For a limited time, the employees at Rotus Inc. may take advantage of the special discount offer.

questions: Please read the directions _____ on the reverse side before starting to fill out this application form.
full_sentence: Please read the directions thoroughly on the reverse side before starting to fill out this application form.

questions: Customers are advised to remember that our discount coupons are _____ for one year from the date when they are issued.
full_sentence: Customers are advised to remember that our discount coupons are valid for one year from the date when they are issued.

questions: An international vendor travels all over the world in _____ of new merchandise that reflects current trends.
full_sentence: An international vendor travels all over the world in search of new merchandise that reflects current trends.

questions: Please _____ receipt of this document by signing your name on the front page.
full_sentence: Please acknowledge receipt of this document by signing your name on the front page.

questions: Purchasers of this device are advised to use only _____ Winthrop Electronics accessories to go with it.
full_sentence: Purchasers of this device are advised to use only genuine Winthrop Electronics accessories to go with it.

questions: At the banquet, the CEO _____ the guests who came from different countries in order to attend the conference.
full_sentence: At the banquet, the CEO welcomed the guests who came from different countries in order to attend the conference.

questions: You'd better not talk to strangers here, unless _____.
full_sentence: You'd better not talk to strangers here, unless spoken to.

questions: Man has succeeded in generating electricity by _____ the solar energy.
full_sentence: Man has succeeded in generating electricity by harnessing the solar energy.

questions: When the husband kissed his wife who was dying of cancer, it was a _____ scene.
full_sentence: When the husband kissed his wife who was dying of cancer, it was a heart-rending scene.

questions: The archaeologists _____ the remains of the ancient city that was buried hundreds of feet in the ground.

questions: The _____ sensor triggers an alarm whenever anyone comes within 10 feet of the door.

questions: In order to _____ money for the new art museum, the local art council has decided to hold a series of exhibits.
full_sentence: In order to raise money for the new art museum, the local art council has decided to hold a series of exhibits.

questions: There was a price increase in its entire product line following an _____ rise in the cost of raw materials.
full_sentence: There was a price increase in its entire product line following an unprecedented rise in the cost of raw materials.

questions: No refund will be made for any vacation package that is unused _____ voluntary cancellation.
full_sentence: No refund will be made for any vacation package that is unused due to voluntary cancellation.

questions: The emergency equipment is tested _____ to ensure that it is in good condition.
full_sentence: The emergency equipment is tested frequently to ensure that it is in good condition.

questions: All participants at the Money Management Seminar are asked to complete the evaluation _____.
full_sentence: All participants at the Money Management Seminar are asked to complete the evaluation form.

questions: The head of the marketing department put the _____ about the job opening in the department newsletter.

questions: There will be a _____ from Gordian Industries this afternoon to install the new equipment.
full_sentence: There will be a technician from Gordian Industries this afternoon to install the new equipment.

questions: The headquarters wants all local branch offices to _____ how the new telephone system works.

questions: A light jacket is _____ for the winter months in the country's warmer regions.

questions: _____ pay increases cannot be expected unless next year's budget shows that there is a surplus of funds.
full_sentence: Substantial pay increases cannot be expected unless next year's budget shows that there is a surplus of funds.

questions: According to the tour guide, tourists can visit a variety of restaurants _____ located on Marcus St.
full_sentence: According to the tour guide, tourists can visit a variety of restaurants conveniently located on Marcus St.

questions: Sales managers should take care of several personal _____ before returning to the office.
full_sentence: Sales managers should take care of several personal matters before returning to the office.

questions: The international symposium on preventing AIDS will be _____ by human resources department.

questions: Recruitment advertisements should be written in _____ with the company's personnel advertisement guideline.

questions: Upgrading the training center with new sound equipment may _____ to a better learning experience.
full_sentence: Upgrading the training center with new sound equipment may contribute to a better learning experience.

questions: The New Wave Department Store _____ an entire city block in the heart of the commercial district.
full_sentence: The New Wave Department Store occupies an entire city block in the heart of the commercial district.

questions: Good Health Hospital has provided _____ service to the residents since 1967.
full_sentence: Good Health Hospital has provided comprehensive service to the residents since 1967.

questions: A team with five certified public accountants were formed to _____ the company's new accounting process.

questions: I can't find my glasses. _____ did I put them?

questions: Their _____ for the secret information may take an additional time to process if inadequate instructions are given.

full_sentence: This document certifies that the water samples were collected in accordance with the procedures established by the Clean Air and Water Commission.

questions: Your brother and sister will study in the United States next year. _____ they speak English?

questions: There are two groups of students. _____ group is in your class?

questions: One of their greatest _____ over traditional bookstores is the sheer comprehensiveness of their available stock.

questions: In an effort to reduce _____, Callaway has halved the advertising budget.

questions: Based on your previous work experience, the _____ will be $850 per week.
full_sentence: Based on your previous work experience, the pay will be $850 per week.

questions: It has been reported that gas prices rose recently. Preston Okura made a _____ observation when he had to pay a higher price at the nearby gas station.
