questions: The degree to which electrical power is lost to heat is called Joule heating, which is _____ upon both the current and the resistance.
full_sentence: The degree to which electrical power is lost to heat is called Joule heating, which is dependent upon both the current and the resistance.

questions: Personal information about employees should be divulged only to _____ who need to know it.
full_sentence: Personal information about employees should be divulged only to those who need to know it.

questions: If a company has inadequate cash, it may be _____ to pay its bill and become insolvent.
full_sentence: If a company has inadequate cash, it may be unable to pay its bill and become insolvent.

questions: _____ October 31, responsibility for delinquent accounts will be transferred from the billing section to the new division of collections.
full_sentence: On October 31, responsibility for delinquent accounts will be transferred from the billing section to the new division of collections.

questions: Subsequent events showed that the bank's decision to acquire the property _____ to their main branch had been a good one.
full_sentence: Subsequent events showed that the bank's decision to acquire the property adjacent to their main branch had been a good one.

questions: Studies show that work _____ more rapidly when the supervisor is on the factory floor.
full_sentence: Studies show that work progresses more rapidly when the supervisor is on the factory floor.

questions: Tired and frustrated with the failure to reach a _____, Dr. Pellas left the negotiations early.
full_sentence: Tired and frustrated with the failure to reach a consensus, Dr. Pellas left the negotiations early.

questions: A drop in demand for factory goods is seen _____ a sign of trouble in the manufacturing sector.
full_sentence: A drop in demand for factory goods is seen as a sign of trouble in the manufacturing sector.

questions: _____ the end of the month, the class will be divided into groups, to review a current case study in professional ethics.
full_sentence: Toward the end of the month, the class will be divided into groups, to review a current case study in professional ethics.

questions: When mailing your payment, please be sure to include the top _____ of your invoice.
full_sentence: When mailing your payment, please be sure to include the top portion of your invoice.

questions: Because plants are becoming more and more expensive, it is a good idea to raise _____ own whenever it is possible.
full_sentence: Because plants are becoming more and more expensive, it is a good idea to raise your own whenever it is possible.

questions: When shows are sold out, theater policy is to start a waiting list and call customers _____ there are cancellations.
full_sentence: When shows are sold out, theater policy is to start a waiting list and call customers if there are cancellations.

questions: According to the agreement, temporary workers are eligible for union membership and are given priority when there are position _____.
full_sentence: According to the agreement, temporary workers are eligible for union membership and are given priority when there are position vacancies.

questions: A member of _____ is supposed to report without bias, and a judge is expected to rule impartially.
full_sentence: A member of the press is supposed to report without bias, and a judge is expected to rule impartially.

questions: Exercise Instructors must _____ that all participants have signed a liability waiver.
full_sentence: Exercise Instructors must ensure that all participants have signed a liability waiver.

questions: The ancient history wing of the museum will be closed for renovation during the next two weeks and will reopen _____ the end of August.
full_sentence: The ancient history wing of the museum will be closed for renovation during the next two weeks and will reopen at the end of August.

questions: In the 1980s, Britain took an _____ turn when the Thatcher government rejected the long-established policy of labor-management conciliation.
full_sentence: In the 1980s, Britain took an unexpected turn when the Thatcher government rejected the long-established policy of labor-management conciliation.

questions: Sales of new cars are down nearly five percent _____ quarter.
full_sentence: Sales of new cars are down nearly five percent this quarter.

questions: The assistant manager sent a memo _____ that employees sign out for all breaks.
full_sentence: The assistant manager sent a memo requesting that employees sign out for all breaks.

questions: One frequent complaint air travelers make is that the _____ compartments are too small.
full_sentence: One frequent complaint air travelers make is that the overhead compartments are too small.

questions: The board's report has been received but the expansion _____ has not yet responded.
full_sentence: The board's report has been received but the expansion committee has not yet responded.

questions: A recent study conducted in New Orleans found that people who eat breakfast stay _____ than those who skip breakfast.
full_sentence: A recent study conducted in New Orleans found that people who eat breakfast stay healthier than those who skip breakfast.

questions: The original contracts with the Sargasso shipping company have just been shredded _____ they expired ten years ago today.
full_sentence: The original contracts with the Sargasso shipping company have just been shredded because they expired ten years ago today.

questions: The Shanghai Center is pleased to announce the long-awaited inauguration of a series of programs devoted to the _____ of Chinese culture.
full_sentence: The Shanghai Center is pleased to announce the long-awaited inauguration of a series of programs devoted to the exploration of Chinese culture.

questions: There are a limited number of visitor parking spaces _____ the building.
full_sentence: There are a limited number of visitor parking spaces in front of the building.

questions: A good resume tells employers how a candidate's _____ match the job responsibilities.
full_sentence: A good resume tells employers how a candidate's qualifications match the job responsibilities.

questions: Our office has recently moved, so please contact _____ at our mailing address as printed above.
full_sentence: Our office has recently moved, so please contact us at our mailing address as printed above.

questions: Last week's unprecedented $2.50 a-share offer for troubled French retailer was eight to ten cents above the expert's _____.
full_sentence: Last week's unprecedented $2.50 a-share offer for troubled French retailer was eight to ten cents above the expert's expectation.

questions: Sellers should always ship items to their buyers promptly after receiving payment, or customers will be sending their business to _____.
full_sentence: Sellers should always ship items to their buyers promptly after receiving payment, or customers will be sending their business to competitors.

questions: Many of the short stories submitted for the contest had to be _____ because the authors did not follow submission guidelines.
full_sentence: Many of the short stories submitted for the contest had to be rejected because the authors did not follow submission guidelines.

questions: The railroad, in combination _____ the Gold Rush of 1849, brought many permanent settlers to the new territory of California.
full_sentence: The railroad, in combination with the Gold Rush of 1849, brought many permanent settlers to the new territory of California.

questions: If you have technical problems with the computer monitor, you should _____ Natalia Navarro, who is the company's computer guru.
full_sentence: If you have technical problems with the computer monitor, you should contact Natalia Navarro, who is the company's computer guru.

questions: The contractors say they will begin the _____ work shortly before 8 A.M. tomorrow.
full_sentence: The contractors say they will begin the renovation work shortly before 8 A.M. tomorrow.

questions: Everyone on the Board of Directors is in agreement that the merger should go forward as _____.
full_sentence: Everyone on the Board of Directors is in agreement that the merger should go forward as planned.

questions: Because I'd like you to acknowledge _____ of the books you ordered, I am sending you a self-addressed envelope with the invoice enclosed.
full_sentence: Because I'd like you to acknowledge receipt of the books you ordered, I am sending you a self-addressed envelope with the invoice enclosed.

questions: We ask that you kindly return the enclosed documents by five o'clock Friday at the _____.
full_sentence: We ask that you kindly return the enclosed documents by five o'clock Friday at the latest.

questions: The Jade Star hotel chain, which has hotels throughout Asia, offers a wide range of excellent services for the business _____.
full_sentence: The Jade Star hotel chain, which has hotels throughout Asia, offers a wide range of excellent services for the business travelers.

questions: From day to day, a business owner must manage his or her organization _____ its strategic plans are carried out.
full_sentence: From day to day, a business owner must manage his or her organization so that its strategic plans are carried out.

questions: We have enclosed extra copies of the brochure you requested so that you can share them _____ your customers.
full_sentence: We have enclosed extra copies of the brochure you requested so that you can share them with your customers.

questions: _____ the occupants or purposes of a room may change over time, our company will customize office suites to suit a client's individual needs.
full_sentence: Because the occupants or purposes of a room may change over time, our company will customize office suites to suit a client's individual needs.

questions: Follow the installation directions carefully to avoid _____ to the light fixture.
full_sentence: Follow the installation directions carefully to avoid damage to the light fixture.

questions: Incontrovertibly, today's entire society has been shaped by _____ knowledge created in the past _____ years, decades, even centuries ago.
full_sentence: Incontrovertibly, today's entire society has been shaped by scientific knowledge created in the past scientific years, decades, even centuries ago.

questions: The computer has undergone many changes _____ it was first designed.
full_sentence: The computer has undergone many changes since it was first designed.

questions: No matter what theorists say, salary remains the most important factor to _____ employees.
full_sentence: No matter what theorists say, salary remains the most important factor to most employees.

questions: Director Atkinson's conclusion was that United Shipbuilding should _____ offices to Singapore.
full_sentence: Director Atkinson's conclusion was that United Shipbuilding should move offices to Singapore.

questions: Mr. Reed's promotion means that he now is _____ for dealing with the labor unions.
full_sentence: Mr. Reed's promotion means that he now is responsible for dealing with the labor unions.

questions: New customers are obtained _____ people who have never used the company's product to start doing so.
full_sentence: New customers are obtained by convincing people who have never used the company's product to start doing so.

questions: Because we at Credit Pacifica take customer _____ seriously we pledge not to sell your address to outside marketing firms.
full_sentence: Because we at Credit Pacifica take customer privacy seriously we pledge not to sell your address to outside marketing firms.

questions: The inventors of the Spin Gadget were _____ first prize in the Family Fun & Games contest for their creative idea.
full_sentence: The inventors of the Spin Gadget were awarded first prize in the Family Fun & Games contest for their creative idea.

questions: The Dadja textile plant will not become operational until all of the necessary safety equipment has been _____ tested.
full_sentence: The Dadja textile plant will not become operational until all of the necessary safety equipment has been thoroughly tested.

questions: _____ before Dan Inoue moved into the apartment, the landlord unfairly raised the rent.
full_sentence: Immediately before Dan Inoue moved into the apartment, the landlord unfairly raised the rent.

questions: Companies competing _____ scarce talent should try different forms of media instead of relying solely on newspaper listings.
full_sentence: Companies competing for scarce talent should try different forms of media instead of relying solely on newspaper listings.

questions: Most government and commercial establishments will be closed on Monday _____ observance of Independence Day.
full_sentence: Most government and commercial establishments will be closed on Monday in observance of Independence Day.

questions: Make sure to fill out the form completely before submitting it _____ our office.
full_sentence: Make sure to fill out the form completely before submitting it to our office.

questions: The time management seminar was clearly designed to help _____ employee efficiency.
full_sentence: The time management seminar was clearly designed to help improve employee efficiency.

questions: A packet of new product information was _____ with every catalog sent out in December.
full_sentence: A packet of new product information was included with every catalog sent out in December.

questions: Passengers arriving at Gate H had to walk up the stairs to the main terminal _____ the escalator was temporarily out of order.
full_sentence: Passengers arriving at Gate H had to walk up the stairs to the main terminal because the escalator was temporarily out of order.

questions: He bought the boat _____ he saw at the show.
full_sentence: He bought the boat that he saw at the show.

questions: There are many fine restaurants within _____ reach of the bus station.
full_sentence: There are many fine restaurants within easy reach of the bus station.

questions: The waltz was the most _____ dance of the nineteenth century.
full_sentence: The waltz was the most popular dance of the nineteenth century.

questions: We at Lambert Laboratories pride ourselves _____ being the premiere medical research organization in the country.
full_sentence: We at Lambert Laboratories pride ourselves on being the premiere medical research organization in the country.

questions: Please supply your bank account information _____ the automatic payment plan.
full_sentence: Please supply your bank account information to activate the automatic payment plan.

questions: The article about the _____ refinery expansion appeared in the Jackson City Sentinel.
full_sentence: The article about the planned refinery expansion appeared in the Jackson City Sentinel.

questions: All of our repair technicians complete two weeks of _____ formal training before they begin making house calls.
full_sentence: All of our repair technicians complete two weeks of intensive formal training before they begin making house calls.

questions: Visitors almost always express amazement at the _____ of the canyon.
full_sentence: Visitors almost always express amazement at the immensity of the canyon.

questions: The diverse _____ of the Hale Valley continue to delight visitors and residents.
full_sentence: The diverse attractions of the Hale Valley continue to delight visitors and residents.

questions: In the future, the reports must _____ much more clearly to avoid costly errors in communication.
full_sentence: In the future, the reports must be written much more clearly to avoid costly errors in communication.

questions: After the implementation of some key changes, our company will be able to offer customers improved prices and _____.
full_sentence: After the implementation of some key changes, our company will be able to offer customers improved prices and convenience.

questions: _____ the high quality of his work, Mr. Young will undoubtedly be promoted to Assistant Sales Manager next year.
full_sentence: Due to the high quality of his work, Mr. Young will undoubtedly be promoted to Assistant Sales Manager next year.

questions: _____ Mr. Christenson ask to see the recent sales figures, please give him a copy of the quarterly report.
full_sentence: Should Mr. Christenson ask to see the recent sales figures, please give him a copy of the quarterly report.

questions: Initial projections of quarterly earnings have _____ been exceeded with a month still remaining.
full_sentence: Initial projections of quarterly earnings have already been exceeded with a month still remaining.

questions: Through the years, Glenview Laboratory has consistently provided quality, cost-effective services _____ its customers.
full_sentence: Through the years, Glenview Laboratory has consistently provided quality, cost-effective services to its customers.

questions: Customers are advised to be as specific as possible when describing the problem they have _____ a product.
full_sentence: Customers are advised to be as specific as possible when describing the problem they have with a product.

questions: The address that was supplied to our _____ office was 509 West 121st Street.
full_sentence: The address that was supplied to our billing office was 509 West 121st Street.

questions: Hiroko Sakai, the audit consultant, has requested access _____ the quarterly budget reports of all departments.
full_sentence: Hiroko Sakai, the audit consultant, has requested access to the quarterly budget reports of all departments.

questions: Despite an attempt to stagger working hours, _____ employees still arrive at 9 a.m.
full_sentence: Despite an attempt to stagger working hours, the majority of employees still arrive at 9 a.m.

questions: Woodsmax has finally compiled a report which _____ the company's financial performance over the past 10 years.
full_sentence: Woodsmax has finally compiled a report which details the company's financial performance over the past 10 years.

questions: Upgrading the old machines at the factory with new ones should significantly _____ the rate of production.
full_sentence: Upgrading the old machines at the factory with new ones should significantly increase the rate of production.

questions: Gappert Company, one of the country's oldest accounting firms, is _____ overseas and hiring additional employees.
full_sentence: Gappert Company, one of the country's oldest accounting firms, is expanding overseas and hiring additional employees.

questions: The company was _____ to expand its production facilities, despite the rise in demand.
full_sentence: The company was reluctant to expand its production facilities, despite the rise in demand.

questions: South Wales has hundreds of misused coal mines, which are used as _____ for criminals.
full_sentence: South Wales has hundreds of misused coal mines, which are used as hideouts for criminals.

questions: Most of the inhabitants were asked to take part in the _____ defense exercise.
full_sentence: Most of the inhabitants were asked to take part in the civil defense exercise.

questions: _____ With profits down 50%, the board of directors decided to _____ off 2,000 workers.
full_sentence: lay With profits down 50%, the board of directors decided to lay off 2,000 workers.

questions: Hours after the passenger jet crashed, helicopters dotted the scene, searching for possible _____.
full_sentence: Hours after the passenger jet crashed, helicopters dotted the scene, searching for possible survivors.

questions: You know what they say? It is _____ over spilt milk.
B: of no use to have cried
full_sentence: You know what they say? It is no use crying over spilt milk.

questions: The telecommunications department is completing a detailed evaluation of each factory site _____ the types of equipment and features needed in each area.
full_sentence: The telecommunications department is completing a detailed evaluation of each factory site to determine the types of equipment and features needed in each area.

questions: World Report and News Focus are international business magazines, with _____ in over 50 countries.
full_sentence: World Report and News Focus are international business magazines, with subscribers in over 50 countries.

questions: The large bookstore chain is considering renovating the old store _____ located in the newly developed area.
full_sentence: The large bookstore chain is considering renovating the old store conveniently located in the newly developed area.

questions: He told us that some fans lined up outside of the box office to _____ a ticket for the concert.
full_sentence: He told us that some fans lined up outside of the box office to purchase a ticket for the concert.

questions: _____ small startup companies rely on the unique contributions of their employees, larger, more established companies are beginning to outsource positions that were once salaried.
full_sentence: While small startup companies rely on the unique contributions of their employees, larger, more established companies are beginning to outsource positions that were once salaried.

questions: Sending a letter of thanks immediately after a job interview is a highly recommended _____.
full_sentence: Sending a letter of thanks immediately after a job interview is a highly recommended practice.

questions: We are sorry to let you know that the jacket you ordered is currently _____ in the color you requested.
full_sentence: We are sorry to let you know that the jacket you ordered is currently unavailable in the color you requested.

questions: We decided to switch our suppliers because they have been _____ late in shipping their orders.
full_sentence: We decided to switch our suppliers because they have been consistently late in shipping their orders.

questions: In order to manage manufacturing tires and ensure adequate component supply, CR Cooperative _____ enters into agreements with contract suppliers.
full_sentence: In order to manage manufacturing tires and ensure adequate component supply, CR Cooperative occasionally enters into agreements with contract suppliers.

questions: Mr. Kobayashi spoke quite excitedly _____ he was making his sales presentation.
full_sentence: Mr. Kobayashi spoke quite excitedly while he was making his sales presentation.

questions: It is essential that we operate within the parameters of time and a _____ budget.
full_sentence: It is essential that we operate within the parameters of time and a limited budget.

questions: Mr. Robinson has asked me to send _____ warm regards to you and your staff.
full_sentence: Mr. Robinson has asked me to send his warm regards to you and your staff.

questions: Please protect your face with a mask _____ using welding materials.
full_sentence: Please protect your face with a mask when using welding materials.

questions: The vice president feels that the launch of our new software should be delayed due to _____ conditions in the market.
full_sentence: The vice president feels that the launch of our new software should be delayed due to unfavorable conditions in the market.

questions: Although not particularly favorable, Mr. Kiuru's remarks regarding the new shoe design were accurate and to the _____.
full_sentence: Although not particularly favorable, Mr. Kiuru's remarks regarding the new shoe design were accurate and to the point.

questions: Our facility will be _____ renovations soon to provide better services, so I would like to invite you to work with me as a consultant.
full_sentence: Our facility will be undergoing renovations soon to provide better services, so I would like to invite you to work with me as a consultant.

questions: To celebrate its 20th anniversary, the discount store will offer each resident a bunch of bananas _____ free of charge.
full_sentence: To celebrate its 20th anniversary, the discount store will offer each resident a bunch of bananas completely free of charge.

questions: Usually, all the accountants at the Simon Accounting Company are extremely busy _____ to the filing deadline.
full_sentence: Usually, all the accountants at the Simon Accounting Company are extremely busy prior to the filing deadline.

questions: Due to the unexpected _____ in the cost of fuel, all shipping costs will increase by 10% from March.
full_sentence: Due to the unexpected rise in the cost of fuel, all shipping costs will increase by 10% from March.

questions: You have to provide us with a financial document verifying that you have enough fund to cover four months' living _____.
full_sentence: You have to provide us with a financial document verifying that you have enough fund to cover four months' living expenses.

questions: Many employees seem more confused now about how to use the new telephone system _____ they did before they attended the workshop.
full_sentence: Many employees seem more confused now about how to use the new telephone system than they did before they attended the workshop.

questions: After the main course, _____ from our wide variety of homemade desserts.
full_sentence: After the main course, choose from our wide variety of homemade desserts.

questions: One of the frequent complaints _____ airline passengers is that there is not enough legroom.
full_sentence: One of the frequent complaints among airline passengers is that there is not enough legroom.

questions: Faculty members are _____ to hold a party in honor of Dr. Williams, who will retire at the end of the semester.
full_sentence: Faculty members are planning to hold a party in honor of Dr. Williams, who will retire at the end of the semester.

questions: Because of its long-term success, the new company wants to _____ the previous company's production line.
full_sentence: Because of its long-term success, the new company wants to retain the previous company's production line.

questions: Interest rates of long-term loans have _____ recently, so this would be a good time to consider expanding the facilities.
full_sentence: Interest rates of long-term loans have fallen recently, so this would be a good time to consider expanding the facilities.

questions: Domestic travel locations are gaining _____ as international flights become more expensive to ordinary people.
full_sentence: Domestic travel locations are gaining popularity as international flights become more expensive to ordinary people.

questions: Subscribers to IT Monthly will have the _____ to preview the articles to be included for each following month.
full_sentence: Subscribers to IT Monthly will have the opportunity to preview the articles to be included for each following month.

questions: The local government is considering building an _____ underground parking garage to relieve some of the crowding in the existing one.
full_sentence: The local government is considering building an additional underground parking garage to relieve some of the crowding in the existing one.

questions: All employees should present the newly issued parking permit and failure to display a permit may _____ a citation.
full_sentence: All employees should present the newly issued parking permit and failure to display a permit may result in a citation.

questions: Faced with lots of unfinished work, the builder had to _____ more carpenters to meet the project deadlines.
full_sentence: Faced with lots of unfinished work, the builder had to hire more carpenters to meet the project deadlines.

questions: We're sorry for the mistake and your article will surely be printed in the next _____ of the magazine.
full_sentence: We're sorry for the mistake and your article will surely be printed in the next issue of the magazine.

questions: Cooks must remember that some raw foods are very perishable and should be refrigerated or chilled _____ ready to be eaten or cooked.
full_sentence: Cooks must remember that some raw foods are very perishable and should be refrigerated or chilled until ready to be eaten or cooked.

questions: Every two years, the board of directors _____ a new financial officer to oversee the overall investment projects.
full_sentence: Every two years, the board of directors appoints a new financial officer to oversee the overall investment projects.

questions: The shipping department was forced to _____ all of the orders by the end of the fiscal year.
full_sentence: The shipping department was forced to fulfill all of the orders by the end of the fiscal year.

questions: In compliance with the regulation, customers should provide us with a proper document to request a refund or _____.
full_sentence: In compliance with the regulation, customers should provide us with a proper document to request a refund or replacement.

questions: Despite an exceptionally small rice harvest, _____ predict that the Tarvo Republic will not need to rely on imported staple foods this year.
full_sentence: Despite an exceptionally small rice harvest, analysts predict that the Tarvo Republic will not need to rely on imported staple foods this year.

questions: The report reveals that people who have a _____ structured daily schedule will be more likely to suffer from stress.
full_sentence: The report reveals that people who have a highly structured daily schedule will be more likely to suffer from stress.

questions: Any club members who are _____ in receiving first-aid training should contact Mr. Collins, who is the training manager.
full_sentence: Any club members who are interested in receiving first-aid training should contact Mr. Collins, who is the training manager.

questions: Lifelong learning is the only way to remain competitive in today's job market, according to _____ George Marshall.
full_sentence: Lifelong learning is the only way to remain competitive in today's job market, according to economist George Marshall.

questions: To understand and monitor the risks their organization _____, James and Frank will set up a new department.
full_sentence: To understand and monitor the risks their organization faces, James and Frank will set up a new department.

questions: The lecture will _____ the relevant methods of determining the impact of currency fluctuations on international transactions.
full_sentence: The lecture will cover the relevant methods of determining the impact of currency fluctuations on international transactions.

questions: Please note that customs regulations do not _____ the shipment of perishable items.
full_sentence: Please note that customs regulations do not permit the shipment of perishable items.

questions: Brencorp has demonstrated a strong commitment _____ employee development through its many incentive programs.
full_sentence: Brencorp has demonstrated a strong commitment to employee development through its many incentive programs.

questions: If savings _____ elsewhere, we would have continued to give financial support to local community service organization last year.
full_sentence: If savings could have been made elsewhere, we would have continued to give financial support to local community service organization last year.

questions: To improve employee productivity, Mcdowell Industries _____ employment preparedness sessions four times a year.
full_sentence: To improve employee productivity, Mcdowell Industries holds employment preparedness sessions four times a year.

questions: The guest lecturer will probably talk about the appropriate handling of _____ client information.
full_sentence: The guest lecturer will probably talk about the appropriate handling of sensitive client information.

questions: The organization has been putting _____ effort to the public campaign since it was founded in 2000.
full_sentence: The organization has been putting considerable effort to the public campaign since it was founded in 2000.

questions: There are over thirty keyboard commands _____ can prompt word-processing procedures, but common usage involves only a few.
full_sentence: There are over thirty keyboard commands that can prompt word-processing procedures, but common usage involves only a few.

questions: Because the equipment is very _____, it must be handled with care.
full_sentence: Because the equipment is very delicate, it must be handled with care.

questions: He has spent a great _____ of time on this project.
full_sentence: He has spent a great deal of time on this project.

questions: The notebook computer is the most profitable of all the _____ that are presently on sale.
full_sentence: The notebook computer is the most profitable of all the products that are presently on sale.

questions: Mrs. Clark returned from her trip to Jakarta _____ yesterday evening.
full_sentence: Mrs. Clark returned from her trip to Jakarta late yesterday evening.

questions: Photocopier World guarantees that any defective photocopy machine will be _____ immediately with a new one.
full_sentence: Photocopier World guarantees that any defective photocopy machine will be replaced immediately with a new one.

questions: The city council proposed _____ the new residential area where the sugar factory used to be.
full_sentence: The city council proposed developing the new residential area where the sugar factory used to be.

questions: Based on the company policy, documents of a _____ nature should be stored in locked file cabinets at all times.
full_sentence: Based on the company policy, documents of a confidential nature should be stored in locked file cabinets at all times.

questions: According to the manufacturer, the new generator is capable of reducing the amount of power _____ by our facility by nearly ten percent.
full_sentence: According to the manufacturer, the new generator is capable of reducing the amount of power consumed by our facility by nearly ten percent.

questions: Unfortunately, neither Mr. Gracia nor Ms. Martin will be able to _____ the awards banquet this evening.
full_sentence: Unfortunately, neither Mr. Gracia nor Ms. Martin will be able to attend the awards banquet this evening.

questions: Unless our production figures _____ in the near future, we will have to hire more people between now and July.
full_sentence: Unless our production figures improve in the near future, we will have to hire more people between now and July.

questions: The prime minister is expected _____ at the convention hall at approximately 7:00 P.M.
full_sentence: The prime minister is expected to arrive at the convention hall at approximately 7:00 P.M.

questions: While you are in the building, please wear your identification badges at all times _____ you are recognizable as a company employee.
full_sentence: While you are in the building, please wear your identification badges at all times so that you are recognizable as a company employee.

questions: Board members should _____ define their goals and objectives for the agency before the monthly meeting next week.
full_sentence: Board members should carefully define their goals and objectives for the agency before the monthly meeting next week.

questions: For business relations to continue between our two firms, a satisfactory agreement must be both reached _____ signed.
full_sentence: For business relations to continue between our two firms, a satisfactory agreement must be both reached and signed.

questions: The corporation, which underwent a major restructuring seven years ago, has been growing _____ for five years.
full_sentence: The corporation, which underwent a major restructuring seven years ago, has been growing steadily for five years.

questions: The publishers suggested that the envelope _____ sent to them by courier so that the film can be developed as soon as possible.
full_sentence: The publishers suggested that the envelope be sent to them by courier so that the film can be developed as soon as possible.

questions: A letter of confirmation _____ further details about the course will be mailed to you three weeks before the new semester begins.
full_sentence: A letter of confirmation containing further details about the course will be mailed to you three weeks before the new semester begins.

questions: The orchestra's performance yesterday was the most spectacular _____ has been given for some time.
full_sentence: The orchestra's performance yesterday was the most spectacular that has been given for some time.

questions: _____ you want to beat the crowd, stop by our store prior to the grand opening, where you can enter the drawing for a free European trip.
full_sentence: Should you want to beat the crowd, stop by our store prior to the grand opening, where you can enter the drawing for a free European trip.

questions: According to City Councilman Raul Khan, the plans for _____ a new computerized filing system do not include adequate safeguards against abuse.
full_sentence: According to City Councilman Raul Khan, the plans for implementing a new computerized filing system do not include adequate safeguards against abuse.

questions: The FBI's Dallas office said it has finished looking _____ the software company's accusations, and no charges have been filed.
full_sentence: The FBI's Dallas office said it has finished looking into the software company's accusations, and no charges have been filed.

questions: As a result of improved demand, wages in the food service industry have increased _____ in recent months.
full_sentence: As a result of improved demand, wages in the food service industry have increased markedly in recent months.

questions: We remind all staff that articles _____ behind by customers are to be given to security for safekeeping.
full_sentence: We remind all staff that articles left behind by customers are to be given to security for safekeeping.

questions: National Law requires automobile dealers to make any necessary repairs _____ no charge if a new vehicle is in need of repair.
full_sentence: National Law requires automobile dealers to make any necessary repairs at no charge if a new vehicle is in need of repair.

questions: Negotiations are not going well; in case we do not reach an agreement, we have _____ begun to search for a new supplier.
full_sentence: Negotiations are not going well; in case we do not reach an agreement, we have already begun to search for a new supplier.

questions: Our studies show that increases in worker _____ have not been adequately rewarded by significant increases in compensation.
full_sentence: Our studies show that increases in worker productivity have not been adequately rewarded by significant increases in compensation.

questions: In order to avoid double booking rooms _____, front desk clerks are asked to follow the regulation checklist very closely.
full_sentence: In order to avoid double booking rooms accidentally, front desk clerks are asked to follow the regulation checklist very closely.

questions: The present government has an excellent opportunity to _____ exports.
full_sentence: The present government has an excellent opportunity to increase exports.

questions: Below is a _____ of events planned for the weekend and you are really asked to help us organize them.
full_sentence: Below is a summary of events planned for the weekend and you are really asked to help us organize them.

questions: Telecommunication companies and equipment vendors in North America are watching keenly to see how customers _____ to the new generation of mobile phones.
full_sentence: Telecommunication companies and equipment vendors in North America are watching keenly to see how customers react to the new generation of mobile phones.

questions: This presentation will demonstrate how Metron computers are superior to _____ of our competitors in terms of both features and speed.
full_sentence: This presentation will demonstrate how Metron computers are superior to those of our competitors in terms of both features and speed.

questions: The _____ of the award gave a speech of thanks.
full_sentence: The recipient of the award gave a speech of thanks.

questions: Innovative and _____ priced Italian food draws a large number of visitors to the district.
full_sentence: Innovative and reasonably priced Italian food draws a large number of visitors to the district.

questions: The CHS Corporation has always maintained _____ its greatest growth potential lies overseas.
full_sentence: The CHS Corporation has always maintained that its greatest growth potential lies overseas.

questions: The airline industry announced yesterday that it had canceled a $4.5 billion _____ for jet planes.
full_sentence: The airline industry announced yesterday that it had canceled a $4.5 billion contract for jet planes.

questions: The Executive Council of the Fashion Buyer's Congress is composed of fifteen members from _____ branches of the fashion industry.
full_sentence: The Executive Council of the Fashion Buyer's Congress is composed of fifteen members from various branches of the fashion industry.

questions: We are a major international company with a _____ number of interests in North America.
full_sentence: We are a major international company with a growing number of interests in North America.

questions: The report _____ that the Tibrook Fund is acting properly by delivering policy advice privately rather than announcing it to the public.
full_sentence: The report indicates that the Tibrook Fund is acting properly by delivering policy advice privately rather than announcing it to the public.

questions: _____ their performance was relatively unpolished, the actors held the audience's attention for the duration of the play.
full_sentence: Though their performance was relatively unpolished, the actors held the audience's attention for the duration of the play.

questions: The Director of Educational Programs works _____ with the Ministry of Education to ensure that the programs are meeting the needs of the institution.
full_sentence: The Director of Educational Programs works collaboratively with the Ministry of Education to ensure that the programs are meeting the needs of the institution.

questions: Please consider the size of the space before recommending an _____ air-conditioning system.
full_sentence: Please consider the size of the space before recommending an appropriate air-conditioning system.

questions: The training department has been under the _____ of Jane Eheir for the past three years.
full_sentence: The training department has been under the supervision of Jane Eheir for the past three years.

questions: To access the information, you must _____ the account number and password that were sent to you by mail.
full_sentence: To access the information, you must enter the account number and password that were sent to you by mail.

questions: We conduct our audit in accordance with _____ accepted auditing standards.
full_sentence: We conduct our audit in accordance with generally accepted auditing standards.

questions: Rates for the use of recreational facilities do not include tax and are subject _____ change without notice.
full_sentence: Rates for the use of recreational facilities do not include tax and are subject to change without notice.

questions: Armstrong has the most impressive management team of the three companies _____ consideration.
full_sentence: Armstrong has the most impressive management team of the three companies under consideration.

questions: The recent storms have led to the temporary _____ of our overseas office.
full_sentence: The recent storms have led to the temporary closure of our overseas office.

questions: We were completely unaware of the problems with the air-conditioning units in the hotel rooms _____ this week.
full_sentence: We were completely unaware of the problems with the air-conditioning units in the hotel rooms until this week.

questions: Savat National Park is accessible _____ train, bus, charter plane, and rental car.
full_sentence: Savat National Park is accessible by train, bus, charter plane, and rental car.

questions: In Piazzo's latest architectural project, he hopes to demonstrate his flare _____ blending contemporary and traditional ideals.
full_sentence: In Piazzo's latest architectural project, he hopes to demonstrate his flare for blending contemporary and traditional ideals.

questions: _____ the office equipment that the company purchased only three years ago seems quite wasteful.
full_sentence: Replacing the office equipment that the company purchased only three years ago seems quite wasteful.

questions: Dr. Abernathy's _____ to Owston College broke the record for the largest private gift ever given to the campus.
full_sentence: Dr. Abernathy's donation to Owston College broke the record for the largest private gift ever given to the campus.

questions: The presenter is the author of a best-selling book and has researched small business trends worldwide _____ twenty years.
full_sentence: The presenter is the author of a best-selling book and has researched small business trends worldwide for twenty years.

questions: Students who are undergoing academic difficulty should be _____ to the Counseling Center for assistance as soon as possible.
full_sentence: Students who are undergoing academic difficulty should be referred to the Counseling Center for assistance as soon as possible.

questions: In order for the conference to run _____, we will need hundreds of volunteers.
full_sentence: In order for the conference to run smoothly, we will need hundreds of volunteers.

questions: The need for skilled workers in the manufacturing trade will increase dramatically _____ the next decade.
full_sentence: The need for skilled workers in the manufacturing trade will increase dramatically over the next decade.

questions: West Street has the city's _____ concentration of art galleries, museums, and restaurants.
full_sentence: West Street has the city's largest concentration of art galleries, museums, and restaurants.

questions: In order to _____ a call outside the office, you have to dial nine first.
full_sentence: In order to place a call outside the office, you have to dial nine first.

questions: The audience is reminded that _____ cameras nor recording equipment will be permitted in the auditorium.
full_sentence: The audience is reminded that neither cameras nor recording equipment will be permitted in the auditorium.

questions: If you are submitting your account through our e-billing system, please return all your receipts _____ a billing inquiry is made.
full_sentence: If you are submitting your account through our e-billing system, please return all your receipts in case a billing inquiry is made.

questions: Although SPH Corporation is headquartered here, work on the privatization of state-owned factories has taken the company's employees to a number of _____ countries.
full_sentence: Although SPH Corporation is headquartered here, work on the privatization of state-owned factories has taken the company's employees to a number of different countries.

questions: Only after the Internet began to be used for commercial endeavors _____ the company start its own Web site.
full_sentence: Only after the Internet began to be used for commercial endeavors did the company start its own Web site.

questions: Making _____ arrangements for audiovisual equipment is strongly recommended for all seminars.
full_sentence: Making advance arrangements for audiovisual equipment is strongly recommended for all seminars.

questions: Mr. Ito has drafted the proposal, but it has not _____ been reviewed.
full_sentence: Mr. Ito has drafted the proposal, but it has not yet been reviewed.

questions: Interviewees should _____ the company brochure to read while they are waiting for their interviews.
full_sentence: Interviewees should be given the company brochure to read while they are waiting for their interviews.

questions: Everyone should have periodic eye examinations _____ sure any problems are quickly discovered.
full_sentence: Everyone should have periodic eye examinations to make sure any problems are quickly discovered.

questions: The firm reinstated Mr. Jones as its accountant after _____ was learned that he had not been mishandling funds.
full_sentence: The firm reinstated Mr. Jones as its accountant after it was learned that he had not been mishandling funds.

questions: _____ as an impetuous interpreter of Beethoven and Mozart, Maria Sanchez has played in the best halls in the world.
full_sentence: Known as an impetuous interpreter of Beethoven and Mozart, Maria Sanchez has played in the best halls in the world.

questions: London Japanese restaurant _____ Ken Suzuki hopes that the new botanical garden he just put in will attract new customers.
full_sentence: London Japanese restaurant owner Ken Suzuki hopes that the new botanical garden he just put in will attract new customers.

questions: News of our coming had evidently preceded us, for whistles and sirens blew, and along the way workmen waved to us from _____ buildings.
full_sentence: News of our coming had evidently preceded us, for whistles and sirens blew, and along the way workmen waved to us from various buildings.

questions: A number of procedural changes have taken place in the shipping department _____ your last order for goods.
full_sentence: A number of procedural changes have taken place in the shipping department following your last order for goods.

questions: Two assistants will be required to check reporters' names when they _____ at the press conference.
full_sentence: Two assistants will be required to check reporters' names when they arrive at the press conference.

questions: On the 24th, a cold front moved into the state, _____ temperatures into the 70s, where they stayed for the remainder of the month.
full_sentence: On the 24th, a cold front moved into the state, dropping temperatures into the 70s, where they stayed for the remainder of the month.

questions: The state supports many specialized training programs with a total budget _____ more than one billion dollars.
full_sentence: The state supports many specialized training programs with a total budget of more than one billion dollars.

questions: The _____ volume in New Orleans was sent to the proprietor of a used book store in upstate South Carolina.
full_sentence: The rare volume in New Orleans was sent to the proprietor of a used book store in upstate South Carolina.

questions: On average, employees reach their peak _____ level when they have been on the job for at least two years.
full_sentence: On average, employees reach their peak performance level when they have been on the job for at least two years.

questions: Conservatives predict that government finances will remain stable _____ the period of the investigation.
full_sentence: Conservatives predict that government finances will remain stable during the period of the investigation.

questions: The success of the new manufacturing process has doubled the number of requests _____ the product.
full_sentence: The success of the new manufacturing process has doubled the number of requests for the product.

questions: We are _____ to inform you that the missing order has been found.
full_sentence: We are pleased to inform you that the missing order has been found.

questions: A recent global survey suggests that demand for aluminum and tin _____ at its current level for the next five to ten years.
full_sentence: A recent global survey suggests that demand for aluminum and tin will remain at its current level for the next five to ten years.

questions: As the filming location has not yet been determined, the release date has been _____.
full_sentence: As the filming location has not yet been determined, the release date has been postponed.

questions: _____ caution should be used when the forklift truck is being operated.
full_sentence: Extreme caution should be used when the forklift truck is being operated.

questions: The county hospital is _____ looking for volunteers to staff the reception.
full_sentence: The county hospital is currently looking for volunteers to staff the reception.

questions: Answering telephone calls is the responsibility of an _____.
full_sentence: Answering telephone calls is the responsibility of an operator.

questions: Visitors are encouraged to use, test, and handle the objects _____ display.
full_sentence: Visitors are encouraged to use, test, and handle the objects on display.

questions: A free watch will be _____ with every purchase of $20.00 or more for a limited period of time.
full_sentence: A free watch will be provided with every purchase of $20.00 or more for a limited period of time.

questions: The president of the corporation has already arrived in Copenhagen and will meet with the Minister of Trade _____ Monday morning.
full_sentence: The president of the corporation has already arrived in Copenhagen and will meet with the Minister of Trade on Monday morning.

questions: Because we value your business, we have arranged for card members like you to receive one thousand dollars of _____ life insurance.
full_sentence: Because we value your business, we have arranged for card members like you to receive one thousand dollars of complimentary life insurance.

questions: The Trade Ministry's report asserts that the growing scarcity of skilled labor is limiting business _____.
full_sentence: The Trade Ministry's report asserts that the growing scarcity of skilled labor is limiting business expansion.

questions: Employees are reminded that _____ the new government regulations, there is to be no smoking in the factory.
full_sentence: Employees are reminded that due to the new government regulations, there is to be no smoking in the factory.

questions: Ms. Galera _____ a long speech in honor of the retiring vice-president.
full_sentence: Ms. Galera gave a long speech in honor of the retiring vice-president.

questions: It has been suggested that employees continue to work in their current positions _____ the quarterly review is finished.
full_sentence: It has been suggested that employees continue to work in their current positions until the quarterly review is finished.

questions: We have approached the proposal with a good deal of caution _____ some of the ideas put forward are very unconventional.
full_sentence: We have approached the proposal with a good deal of caution since some of the ideas put forward are very unconventional.

questions: The worldwide representatives initially resisted the change in billing policy, but in the end almost everyone came to _____ it.
full_sentence: The worldwide representatives initially resisted the change in billing policy, but in the end almost everyone came to accept it.

questions: _____ a dramatic increase in its student population, the directors of Filmont School have decided to hire ten additional teachers for the upcoming school year.
full_sentence: Due to a dramatic increase in its student population, the directors of Filmont School have decided to hire ten additional teachers for the upcoming school year.

questions: The winners of our weekly crossword competition will be drawn randomly from all complete and correct _____.
full_sentence: The winners of our weekly crossword competition will be drawn randomly from all complete and correct entries.

questions: _____ the Waldorf Bridge is presently under construction, Route 11 is being used as a detour.
full_sentence: Since the Waldorf Bridge is presently under construction, Route 11 is being used as a detour.

questions: Because the company is going through a difficult time _____, bonus payments will be smaller than they were last year.
full_sentence: Because the company is going through a difficult time financially, bonus payments will be smaller than they were last year.

questions: Candidates are asked to indicate their research interests _____ checking the boxes next to the projects on which they prefer to work.
full_sentence: Candidates are asked to indicate their research interests by checking the boxes next to the projects on which they prefer to work.

questions: Clothing manufacturers watch fashion trend setters closely in an attempt to spot styles _____ to become popular.
full_sentence: Clothing manufacturers watch fashion trend setters closely in an attempt to spot styles likely to become popular.

questions: Some knowledge of programming will be an advantage, but it is not a prerequisite for the course in _____ technology.
full_sentence: Some knowledge of programming will be an advantage, but it is not a prerequisite for the course in information technology.

questions: At Sea Voyagers Marina, the $50 boat deposit is not refundable _____ a confirmed reservation is canceled.
full_sentence: At Sea Voyagers Marina, the $50 boat deposit is not refundable if a confirmed reservation is canceled.

questions: Macau Airlines emerged as the leader _____ small airlines after it hired a renowned consulting firm to design its advertisements.
full_sentence: Macau Airlines emerged as the leader among small airlines after it hired a renowned consulting firm to design its advertisements.

questions: The director must authorize any use of the company credit card for entertainment _____.
full_sentence: The director must authorize any use of the company credit card for entertainment purposes.

questions: The photo lines at Simon's House of Fine Furniture are staffed by dedicated representatives with a thorough knowledge of the company's _____.
full_sentence: The photo lines at Simon's House of Fine Furniture are staffed by dedicated representatives with a thorough knowledge of the company's products.

questions: By comparing features and prices on different models, consumers can make _____ purchasing decisions.
full_sentence: By comparing features and prices on different models, consumers can make prudent purchasing decisions.

questions: During the coming year, we will position ours as the premier refrigerator _____ quality kitchen appliances.
full_sentence: During the coming year, we will position ours as the premier refrigerator among quality kitchen appliances.

questions: There are no interoffice envelopes on the shelf in the mail room, so if your office has any, please let Andrea Fox know _____.
full_sentence: There are no interoffice envelopes on the shelf in the mail room, so if your office has any, please let Andrea Fox know immediately.

questions: The Power Plus Health Club offers new members full use of its weight-training equipment for as little as $40 _____ month.
full_sentence: The Power Plus Health Club offers new members full use of its weight-training equipment for as little as $40 per month.

questions: Most employers understand that workers given challenging assignments are less likely to become _____.
full_sentence: Most employers understand that workers given challenging assignments are less likely to become bored.

questions: The European subsidiary has already submitted its sales totals, but we have not finished calculating ours _____.
full_sentence: The European subsidiary has already submitted its sales totals, but we have not finished calculating ours yet.

questions: Our colleagues from Singapore decided to take a trip to Mount Visco _____ they had always wanted to go camping in the mountains.
full_sentence: Our colleagues from Singapore decided to take a trip to Mount Visco because they had always wanted to go camping in the mountains.

questions: Risk Takers, the new thriller filmed almost _____ on one London street, grossed over ninety million pounds in its first weekend at the box office.
full_sentence: Risk Takers, the new thriller filmed almost entirely on one London street, grossed over ninety million pounds in its first weekend at the box office.

questions: Contracts must be read carefully before _____ are signed.
full_sentence: Contracts must be read carefully before they are signed.

questions: Helen Shaw joined Newbridge University thirty-six years ago, _____ her the longest-serving member of the faculty.
full_sentence: Helen Shaw joined Newbridge University thirty-six years ago, making her the longest-serving member of the faculty.

questions: When Paxton Enterprises was restructuring its textile division, _____ middle managers were laid off.
full_sentence: When Paxton Enterprises was restructuring its textile division, several middle managers were laid off.

questions: _____ half of the employees at Century Photo Labs commute to work by bus.
full_sentence: Roughly half of the employees at Century Photo Labs commute to work by bus.

questions: The freshness of the seafood served at this restaurant varies a great deal _____ upon the supplier.
full_sentence: The freshness of the seafood served at this restaurant varies a great deal depending upon the supplier.

questions: The one-year warranty promises that, if an appliance fails _____ a manufacturing defect, Kitchen Creators will repair it for free.
full_sentence: The one-year warranty promises that, if an appliance fails due to a manufacturing defect, Kitchen Creators will repair it for free.

questions: At the time the transportation allowance policy was _____, most of our workers were traveling by bus from distant towns.
full_sentence: At the time the transportation allowance policy was created, most of our workers were traveling by bus from distant towns.

questions: Marlene Seifert was promoted after _____ heading the standards review task force.
full_sentence: Marlene Seifert was promoted after successfully heading the standards review task force.

questions: The number of transport companies competing for government contracts has decreased _____ in the last ten years.
full_sentence: The number of transport companies competing for government contracts has decreased sharply in the last ten years.

questions: Many students did not complete the economics assignment on time, _____ the professor expressed his disappointment without sounding too angry.
full_sentence: Many students did not complete the economics assignment on time, but the professor expressed his disappointment without sounding too angry.

questions: We will begin processing Mr. Vallejo's loan _____ once we receive the supporting documents.
full_sentence: We will begin processing Mr. Vallejo's loan application once we receive the supporting documents.

questions: Creative solutions are required _____ not only answer yesterday's questions but also anticipate tomorrow's needs.
full_sentence: Creative solutions are required that not only answer yesterday's questions but also anticipate tomorrow's needs.

questions: Despite concerns about the possible effects of a longer workweek on employee morale, most board members voted in favor of the _____ change.
full_sentence: Despite concerns about the possible effects of a longer workweek on employee morale, most board members voted in favor of the proposed change.

questions: Both of the floor tile patterns were designed with great care, and we _____ you that whichever you choose will bring years of satisfaction.
full_sentence: Both of the floor tile patterns were designed with great care, and we assure you that whichever you choose will bring years of satisfaction.

questions: The new train line, which has been running _____ March, serves each of the town's six stations.
full_sentence: The new train line, which has been running since March, serves each of the town's six stations.

questions: Business Notes reported that ViStar's stock prices _____ after the merger announcement.
full_sentence: Business Notes reported that ViStar's stock prices plummeted after the merger announcement.

questions: When _____ whether she will retire soon, Ms. Johannsen said that she will never stop working.
full_sentence: When asked whether she will retire soon, Ms. Johannsen said that she will never stop working.

questions: The number of new employees who require extensive training in customer service procedures _____ declined since the company changed employment agencies.
full_sentence: The number of new employees who require extensive training in customer service procedures has declined since the company changed employment agencies.

questions: Because group size is limited, _____ interested in joining the discussion will need to register in advance.
full_sentence: Because group size is limited, those interested in joining the discussion will need to register in advance.

questions: The client reported that the quality of the designs the production team _____ was quite outstanding.
full_sentence: The client reported that the quality of the designs the production team had prepared was quite outstanding.

questions: During the building security meeting, many of the procedures put in place by last year's committee were _____.
full_sentence: During the building security meeting, many of the procedures put in place by last year's committee were revised.

questions: David Southland, the arts critic for the Union Times, recommended _____ neither the community play nor the upcoming jazz concert.
full_sentence: David Southland, the arts critic for the Union Times, recommended seeing neither the community play nor the upcoming jazz concert.

questions: The new building is needed because the library's collection of books has grown _____ in recent years.
full_sentence: The new building is needed because the library's collection of books has grown quickly in recent years.

questions: Deluxetype Incorporated has encountered many difficulties in _____ its word-processing software for use with all of the written languages of the world.
full_sentence: Deluxetype Incorporated has encountered many difficulties in adapting its word-processing software for use with all of the written languages of the world.

questions: Everyone on the fund-raising committee has been given an opportunity to speak about the proposal to launch the book sale in February _____ in May.
full_sentence: Everyone on the fund-raising committee has been given an opportunity to speak about the proposal to launch the book sale in February rather than in May.

questions: Helmets must be worn at the _____ site at all times.
full_sentence: Helmets must be worn at the excavation site at all times.

questions: _____ Smithton police officials _____ community relations as a vital part of the police department's responsibilities.
full_sentence: regard Smithton police officials regard community relations as a vital part of the police department's responsibilities.

questions: Harmony Design consultants can help clients decide _____ to use curtains or blinds when decorating their windows.
full_sentence: Harmony Design consultants can help clients decide whether to use curtains or blinds when decorating their windows.

questions: The convenience store around the corner is _____ open twenty-four hours a day, even if it is a national holiday.
full_sentence: The convenience store around the corner is always open twenty-four hours a day, even if it is a national holiday.

questions: If you have received an invoice, but you have not _____ received your identification card, please contact Member Services.
full_sentence: If you have received an invoice, but you have not yet received your identification card, please contact Member Services.

questions: We have already received ten inquiries since the advertisement _____ in last week's edition of the newspaper.
full_sentence: We have already received ten inquiries since the advertisement ran in last week's edition of the newspaper.

questions: Once the initial application form has been received in our office, you will not be required _____ any further documentation.
full_sentence: Once the initial application form has been received in our office, you will not be required to provide any further documentation.

questions: The research team was _____ up of information managers from 20 private companies and 15 government agencies.
full_sentence: The research team was made up of information managers from 20 private companies and 15 government agencies.

questions: A social event for _____ residents of Wildwood Senior Community will take place Wednesday afternoon in our spacious activity room.
full_sentence: A social event for prospective residents of Wildwood Senior Community will take place Wednesday afternoon in our spacious activity room.

questions: Mr. Gonzales was very _____ about the upcoming board of directors meeting.
full_sentence: Mr. Gonzales was very concerned about the upcoming board of directors meeting.

questions: Discount grocery stores typically offer financial incentives for purchasing items _____ bulk.
full_sentence: Discount grocery stores typically offer financial incentives for purchasing items in bulk.

questions: With its catchy slogan and upbeat music, the advertising campaign has had a(an) _____ effect on sales.
full_sentence: With its catchy slogan and upbeat music, the advertising campaign has had a(an) noticeable effect on sales.

questions: Having heard the conditions of the merger, the president of DBC Corporation could _____ longer consider the offer.
full_sentence: Having heard the conditions of the merger, the president of DBC Corporation could no longer consider the offer.

questions: Port Stephens is both a peaceful resort town and a vibrant economic center _____ luxury goods from around the world are available duty-free.
full_sentence: Port Stephens is both a peaceful resort town and a vibrant economic center where luxury goods from around the world are available duty-free.

questions: The current exhibition of gold jewelry from ancient cultures has _____ many first-time visitors to the National Museum.
full_sentence: The current exhibition of gold jewelry from ancient cultures has attracted many first-time visitors to the National Museum.

questions: Make sure that all of the signed letters have been put into envelopes to be mailed out _____ this afternoon.
full_sentence: Make sure that all of the signed letters have been put into envelopes to be mailed out by this afternoon.

questions: Airlines can continue to attract customers by offering _____ rates, good services, and incentive programs.
full_sentence: Airlines can continue to attract customers by offering competitive rates, good services, and incentive programs.

questions: Because her new assignment was highly confidential, only Ms. Miller's _____ supervisor was told where she was being sent and what duties she would carry out.
full_sentence: Because her new assignment was highly confidential, only Ms. Miller's immediate supervisor was told where she was being sent and what duties she would carry out.

questions: This special offer on Lumex copy paper is _____ at participating stores while supplies last.
full_sentence: This special offer on Lumex copy paper is valid at participating stores while supplies last.

questions: Even though labor costs were _____ lower last quarter, Enex, Inc., still failed to show a profit.
full_sentence: Even though labor costs were significantly lower last quarter, Enex, Inc., still failed to show a profit.

questions: Ms. Fischer is a talented _____ who has taken pictures of many of the world's most famous actors and musicians.
full_sentence: Ms. Fischer is a talented photographer who has taken pictures of many of the world's most famous actors and musicians.

questions: Effective March 1, all the staff _____ for time off must submit the request form to a supervisor at least three days before the requested leave time.
full_sentence: Effective March 1, all the staff asking for time off must submit the request form to a supervisor at least three days before the requested leave time.

questions: This week only, all remaining items in stock at our downtown location will be discounted _____ 60 percent.
full_sentence: This week only, all remaining items in stock at our downtown location will be discounted up to 60 percent.

questions: It is my pleasure to send you the enclosed gift _____ for an overnight stay at the Select Hotel.
full_sentence: It is my pleasure to send you the enclosed gift certificate for an overnight stay at the Select Hotel.

questions: You are a valued _____ to First Communications and your role in boosting our company expansion is appreciated.
full_sentence: You are a valued asset to First Communications and your role in boosting our company expansion is appreciated.

questions: Only Globepack Software offers a worldwide shipment tracking system that integrates cargo lists, customs regulations, and geographic _____.
full_sentence: Only Globepack Software offers a worldwide shipment tracking system that integrates cargo lists, customs regulations, and geographic information.

questions: The discoveries of early scientists _____ the company to pioneer new medicine to fight infectious diseases.
full_sentence: The discoveries of early scientists enabled the company to pioneer new medicine to fight infectious diseases.

questions: Do not store or use any flammable liquid or gas _____ a heat source or a heat-producing appliance.
full_sentence: Do not store or use any flammable liquid or gas near a heat source or a heat-producing appliance.

questions: President Anderson's recent visit to the Westview plant _____ a tour of the canning facilities and lunch in the staff cafeteria.
full_sentence: President Anderson's recent visit to the Westview plant included a tour of the canning facilities and lunch in the staff cafeteria.

questions: Thomas Ronson's _____ suggests that it would not be in the company's best interest to wait any longer to hire new programmers.
full_sentence: Thomas Ronson's analysis suggests that it would not be in the company's best interest to wait any longer to hire new programmers.

questions: Because it was _____ than similar products on the market, DrinkPro's travel mug did not sell well this quarter.
full_sentence: Because it was more expensive than similar products on the market, DrinkPro's travel mug did not sell well this quarter.

questions: The ideal candidate for the program manager position will possess excellent communication skills and an ability to make decisions _____.
full_sentence: The ideal candidate for the program manager position will possess excellent communication skills and an ability to make decisions quickly.

questions: More and more people are choosing R. L. Langston jewelry _____ the superior quality, style, and artistry of its handcrafted pieces.
full_sentence: More and more people are choosing R. L. Langston jewelry because of the superior quality, style, and artistry of its handcrafted pieces.

questions: Owners of the affected vehicles will receive a written _____ within the next month.
full_sentence: Owners of the affected vehicles will receive a written notification within the next month.

questions: We ask that you _____ the contents of each package to ensure that the shipment is complete and in good condition.
full_sentence: We ask that you inspect the contents of each package to ensure that the shipment is complete and in good condition.

questions: When _____ fresh meat and vegetables, restaurant employees must follow the established food safety guidelines.
full_sentence: When handling fresh meat and vegetables, restaurant employees must follow the established food safety guidelines.

questions: If you should leave this company for any reason, you will not accept a job with any of our competitors _____ the next three years.
full_sentence: If you should leave this company for any reason, you will not accept a job with any of our competitors within the next three years.

questions: _____ the crew is working, traffic will not be able to access the parking lot at all.
full_sentence: While the crew is working, traffic will not be able to access the parking lot at all.

questions: A $100 deposit must be received at least thirty days _____ the departure date.
full_sentence: A $100 deposit must be received at least thirty days prior to the departure date.

questions: Prices for items not on this list can be _____ from the vendors.
full_sentence: Prices for items not on this list can be obtained from the vendors.

questions: We ask that all employees return the blue personnel forms _____ April 10.
full_sentence: We ask that all employees return the blue personnel forms by April 10.

questions: All clients are _____ to review the performance of their specific accounts on the new consolidated monthly statement.
full_sentence: All clients are encouraged to review the performance of their specific accounts on the new consolidated monthly statement.

questions: The customers were told that no reservations could be made on weekend nights _____ the restaurant was too busy.
full_sentence: The customers were told that no reservations could be made on weekend nights because the restaurant was too busy.

questions: The sales representative's presentation was difficult to understand because he spoke very _____.
full_sentence: The sales representative's presentation was difficult to understand because he spoke very quickly.

questions: It has been _____ that an increasingly weak dollar will stimulate tourism in the United States.
full_sentence: It has been predicted that an increasingly weak dollar will stimulate tourism in the United States.

questions: Any person who is interested in _____ his or her time for the campaign should send the office a letter of intent.
full_sentence: Any person who is interested in volunteering his or her time for the campaign should send the office a letter of intent.

questions: When changing jobs, it is important to consider both salary _____ benefits.
full_sentence: When changing jobs, it is important to consider both salary and benefits.

questions: According to some sources, mechanical innovations have reduced our production time _____ fifty percent.
full_sentence: According to some sources, mechanical innovations have reduced our production time by fifty percent.

questions: The Sanulife Web site brings _____ news of the latest advances in medical research.
full_sentence: The Sanulife Web site brings you news of the latest advances in medical research.

questions: Blair Industries is working with a local agency to identify _____ sites for the proposed furniture factory.
full_sentence: Blair Industries is working with a local agency to identify potential sites for the proposed furniture factory.

questions: The average price of milk products is expected to rise _____ in the next year due to the increased costs associated with dairy farming.
full_sentence: The average price of milk products is expected to rise significantly in the next year due to the increased costs associated with dairy farming.

questions: Responses to the _____ work schedule changes are still outstanding from several departments.

questions: If you send in an order by mail, we recommend that you phone _____ sales division directly to confirm the order.

questions: Currently, all work sites within the company have safety rules that every worker is expected _____.

questions: In the brokerage business, the past may not be a perfect indicator of the future, _____ it is the best predictor we have.

questions: _____ the foreign delegates visited La Fleur Restaurant, they were served a special mushroom appetizer.

questions: _____ an information booth at each entrance to the airport.

questions: I get to work by subway. _____ do you usually go to work?

questions: Since the landlord has never _____ raised the rent without notice, there can be no complaint among students.

questions: When the sales representatives from the New York branch arrived at our office, _____ were offered an opportunity to observe how we manage our office.

questions: Mr. Stewart and Mrs. Melissa in sales will be transferred to the department of _____ in May.
