questions: Among the three plans for improving the image of the company, two plans don't reflect the cost at all while _____ is excellent.

questions: The secretary position which she applied for would require _____ to speak English and Japanese fluently.

questions: Ambitious youngsters are _____ to better themselves by studying things like computer or foreign languages.

questions: It's an honor for us to announce the presence of Robert Kooks a _____ legal scholar and lawyer from Toronto.

questions: The hotel temporarily discontinues its operation _____ the end of every year in order to renovate its rooms.

questions: We have recently changed our order system, allowing customers to _____ their orders more easily at any time of the day or the night.

questions: The equipment had to be sent back to the manufacturer because it was damaged _____ repair.

questions: Even though the start was delayed by the inclement weather, the project was completed as _____ scheduled.

questions: _____ a drop in demand for passenger vehicles, Diesel Motors had to cut back on production.

questions: Thanks to the back-up generators which were _____ installed, we could keep the plant operational during the power outage.

questions: Please be noted that any purchased items which have a market value of over 300 dollars are _____ to a 15% duty charge.

questions: In order to deal with our new investment portfolios, we need to acquire _____ computer systems.

questions: Although we _____ need audio technicians in the recording studio, our current budget does not allow us to hire any.

questions: If you do not make a payment by the due date, a service _____ of two percent will be added.

questions: Even though they cost much more than others, flowers still _____ the most popular items for decoration in the reception area.

questions: _____ he discovered the cause of the engine problem, the airline mechanic worked through the night to correct it.

questions: From now on, the company cafeteria will be closing at 10 pm unless _____ stated.

questions: The Secretary's _____ remarks had an immediate impact on his audience.

questions: All employees are asked to use the new software before commenting _____ it.

questions: The dramatic decrease in _____ sales in recent months shows that consumer confidence has dropped significantly.

questions: _____ the visitors to the National Museum should fill out a form before they enter the room to enjoy the exhibition.

questions: A replacement for the faulty microwave which I bought through the internet is _____ to be delivered this afternoon.

questions: _____ the opening of the downtown Italian restaurant was later than expected, many agree that the food it is providing is worth the wait.

questions: Ms. Bennet will leave for the convention after she _____ the meeting with the manager of Que Enterprises.

questions: The editors of the magazine are trying to feature fascinating stories in every issue so that the magazine can build _____ reputation for itself.

questions: Free _____ of Update News will be distributed to the citizens of Wildwood community only for two days.

questions: The team meeting successfully concluded with the majority of team members _____ supporting the plan to relocate the main office.

questions: The director _____ the customer service department that three complaints from valued customers had been filed during the past four weeks.

questions: Through careful _____ of customer data, the sales representatives of the company could provide customized services.

questions: The _____ of these team meetings is to address the problems concerning the staffing situation.

questions: Many welcomed the manager's idea _____ providing every new employee with a week of rigorous computer training.

questions: Nobody in _____ has been able to come up with new channels of funding.

questions: _____ The government agency for Financial Management has _____ a two-year consulting contract with SEI Technologies.
full_sentence: renewed The government agency for Financial Management has renewed a two-year consulting contract with SEI Technologies.

questions: One problem with the new delivery system is that tracking numbers are not printed _____ on the address labels.

questions: If there is any money _____ in the budget, we need to modernize our company's present system of international communications.

questions: The company plans to cut its operating costs by closing two plants and encouraging workers to take early _____.

questions: Internal communications are expected to improve once the new telephone system _____.

questions: After fifteen years of dedicated _____ to the company, Ms. Melissa will be retiring at the end of this month.

questions: As a result of the recent reorganization of the company, the management _____ an improvement in productivity.
full_sentence: As a result of the recent reorganization of the company, the management anticipates an improvement in productivity.

questions: The quality of programs for young children is _____ determined by the knowledge, experience and training of the staff.
full_sentence: The quality of programs for young children is largely determined by the knowledge, experience and training of the staff.

questions: A banquet is scheduled for next week in order to _____ the exceptional job performance of Maria Hollis.
full_sentence: A banquet is scheduled for next week in order to honor the exceptional job performance of Maria Hollis.

questions: The executives of the company will gather to make suggestions for _____ staff productivity.
full_sentence: The executives of the company will gather to make suggestions for improving staff productivity.

questions: _____ that you cannot come in person to receive the award, your proxy should present her identification as well as yours.
full_sentence: In the event that you cannot come in person to receive the award, your proxy should present her identification as well as yours.

questions: After several weeks of _____, the union leaders were finally able to agree on a compromise with management.
full_sentence: After several weeks of negotiation, the union leaders were finally able to agree on a compromise with management.

questions: You should make sure that your support belt is _____ fastened whenever you are on the loading dock.
full_sentence: You should make sure that your support belt is securely fastened whenever you are on the loading dock.

questions: The beautification project _____ to be completed by the end of this month will begin next Monday.
full_sentence: The beautification project scheduled to be completed by the end of this month will begin next Monday.

questions: It was reported that _____ half of the workers have a part-time job to better satisfy their financial needs.
full_sentence: It was reported that roughly half of the workers have a part-time job to better satisfy their financial needs.

questions: After making a series of checks, the inspectors determined that the building conditions are _____ adequate.
full_sentence: After making a series of checks, the inspectors determined that the building conditions are more than adequate.

questions: That the company will see a great rise in sales during the next year is obvious since _____ product quality has greatly improved.
full_sentence: That the company will see a great rise in sales during the next year is obvious since its product quality has greatly improved.

questions: The company's sudden _____ to close one of its branches has attracted much criticism from the employees.
full_sentence: The company's sudden decision to close one of its branches has attracted much criticism from the employees.

questions: Because the new system was installed only a month ago, its impact on production has _____ to be evaluated.
full_sentence: Because the new system was installed only a month ago, its impact on production has yet to be evaluated.

questions: This quarterly report _____ the performance of many leading international corporations from the investors' viewpoint.
full_sentence: This quarterly report summarizes the performance of many leading international corporations from the investors' viewpoint.

questions: _____ the fourth consecutive year, sales of transportation equipment have shown a double-digit growth rate.
full_sentence: For the fourth consecutive year, sales of transportation equipment have shown a double-digit growth rate.

questions: Both parties must _____ to the terms of the contract no matter what the consequences are.
full_sentence: Both parties must adhere to the terms of the contract no matter what the consequences are.

questions: When the clothing company announced _____ retirement pay and benefits, many workers applied for voluntary retirement.
full_sentence: When the clothing company announced attractive retirement pay and benefits, many workers applied for voluntary retirement.

questions: At the plant a group of _____ had an opportunity of watching at close distance the way computer chips were being made.
full_sentence: At the plant a group of representatives had an opportunity of watching at close distance the way computer chips were being made.

questions: We might need more chairs and copies of handouts _____ how many attendees turn up for the presentation.
full_sentence: We might need more chairs and copies of handouts depending on how many attendees turn up for the presentation.

questions: The _____ most important factor in academic success of a child is the parents' involvement in the education.
full_sentence: The single most important factor in academic success of a child is the parents' involvement in the education.

questions: We are planning to interview a few women who _____ outside their home and raise their children successfully.
full_sentence: We are planning to interview a few women who labor outside their home and raise their children successfully.

questions: We at Crimson Pub are grateful to you for your patronage, and hope you will be able to use the enclosed _____ dining coupon.
full_sentence: We at Crimson Pub are grateful to you for your patronage, and hope you will be able to use the enclosed complimentary dining coupon.

questions: Effective financial analysts collect as many data as possible before writing and revise their finished report _____.
full_sentence: Effective financial analysts collect as many data as possible before writing and revise their finished report afterward.

questions: A new Premium Savings has advantageous interest _____ based on the customer's account balance.
full_sentence: A new Premium Savings has advantageous interest rate based on the customer's account balance.

questions: In the midst of the slump, a _____ demand for home electronics products continued to decline worldwide.
full_sentence: In the midst of the slump, a substantial demand for home electronics products continued to decline worldwide.

questions: The supervisor and her subordinates will be severely reprimanded _____ submitting inaccurate data in the report.
full_sentence: The supervisor and her subordinates will be severely reprimanded for submitting inaccurate data in the report.

questions: We need to revise the published contract with Corporation in order to _____ some of the clauses more accurate.
full_sentence: We need to revise the published contract with Corporation in order to make some of the clauses more accurate.

questions: Customers will be able to take advantage of _____ working hours of the Central Bank starting on November 1.
full_sentence: Customers will be able to take advantage of extended working hours of the Central Bank starting on November 1.

questions: Online banking service has made individual financial data _____ available to account holders.
full_sentence: Online banking service has made individual financial data readily available to account holders.

questions: With the continuous efforts made by environmental groups, the amount of pollutants has dramatically _____.
full_sentence: With the continuous efforts made by environmental groups, the amount of pollutants has dramatically declined.

questions: Apparently, your agent was not _____ to listen to my complaints when I called her.
full_sentence: Apparently, your agent was not willing to listen to my complaints when I called her.

questions: The museum was unable to display the artist's works due to insufficient _____.
full_sentence: The museum was unable to display the artist's works due to insufficient fund.

questions: The advertising campaign has contributed _____ to the success of the new book.
full_sentence: The advertising campaign has contributed significantly to the success of the new book.

questions: The manufacturing firm _____ Ms. Zerry is working is located near the airport.
full_sentence: The manufacturing firm where Ms. Zerry is working is located near the airport.

questions: Any employee who remains in the office after 10 p.m must report their _____ to the security department.
full_sentence: Any employee who remains in the office after 10 p.m must report their presence to the security department.

questions: Computers are an integral part of our business so it's important to keep _____ in working order at all times.
full_sentence: Computers are an integral part of our business so it's important to keep them in working order at all times.

questions: Dr. Zumer, a _____ writer for the magazine Cook and Joy, has been working as a chef of the Summit Hotel.
full_sentence: Dr. Zumer, a contributing writer for the magazine Cook and Joy, has been working as a chef of the Summit Hotel.

questions: The new album of the increasingly popular guitarist John Hayashi should be ready for release _____ early next year.
full_sentence: The new album of the increasingly popular guitarist John Hayashi should be ready for release by early next year.

questions: Many companies that manufacture or sell tobacco products spend much on _____.
full_sentence: Many companies that manufacture or sell tobacco products spend much on advertising.

questions: All applications for the position of Mint Library Director will be _____ to the human resources department.
full_sentence: All applications for the position of Mint Library Director will be forwarded to the human resources department.

questions: Before Ms. Brooks left the company, she _____ her resignation to the head of the department.
full_sentence: Before Ms. Brooks left the company, she had submitted her resignation to the head of the department.

questions: Any changes _____ the location or schedule of the fund-raising campaign will be posted on the bulletin board.
full_sentence: Any changes regarding the location or schedule of the fund-raising campaign will be posted on the bulletin board.

questions: The current health club policy is expected to remain in effect _____ the end of the year.
full_sentence: The current health club policy is expected to remain in effect until the end of the year.

questions: The board of directors has decided to donate the _____ from the auction to local schools.
full_sentence: The board of directors has decided to donate the proceeds from the auction to local schools.

questions: Errors or omissions on this shipping list should be reported _____ to the shipping department.
full_sentence: Errors or omissions on this shipping list should be reported promptly to the shipping department.

questions: The next marketing campaign should be successful _____ the company will face enormous financial risk.
full_sentence: The next marketing campaign should be successful or the company will face enormous financial risk.

questions: Many electronic components, _____ are made by foreign companies, often cannot be used for domestic products.
full_sentence: Many electronic components, which are made by foreign companies, often cannot be used for domestic products.

questions: _____ Mr. Berman was asked to supervise the changes that were about to be _____ to the database.
full_sentence: made Mr. Berman was asked to supervise the changes that were about to be made to the database.

questions: At the board meeting, the finance department complained that a lot of money is _____ on unnecessary paper use.
full_sentence: At the board meeting, the finance department complained that a lot of money is being wasted on unnecessary paper use.

questions: Only a few members of the board have the _____ to approve changes to the prices of company goods.
full_sentence: Only a few members of the board have the authority to approve changes to the prices of company goods.

questions: We should thoroughly examine _____ the contract amendments before making a final deal.
full_sentence: We should thoroughly examine all the contract amendments before making a final deal.

questions: If any of the appliances turn out to be defective, we will happily replace them with _____.
full_sentence: If any of the appliances turn out to be defective, we will happily replace them with others.

questions: Mr. Papas was accused of _____ providing untrue information during the contract negotiations.
full_sentence: Mr. Papas was accused of knowingly providing untrue information during the contract negotiations.

questions: If you encounter any problems with the equipment, please call your _____ service representatives.
full_sentence: If you encounter any problems with the equipment, please call your local service representatives.

questions: Attendance at weekly staff meeting is _____ for all full-time employees.
full_sentence: Attendance at weekly staff meeting is mandatory for all full-time employees.

questions: After Unified Bank and Trust had computerized its accounts, efficiency increased _____.
full_sentence: After Unified Bank and Trust had computerized its accounts, efficiency increased noticeably.

questions: Every member of the board had to accept the idea of Mr. Lam since he argued very _____.
full_sentence: Every member of the board had to accept the idea of Mr. Lam since he argued very persuasively.

questions: Mr. Hodge wants to revise the terms of the contract _____ signed when he entered the company three years ago.
full_sentence: Mr. Hodge wants to revise the terms of the contract he signed when he entered the company three years ago.

questions: You can freely present any problems with our delivery service by filling in a _____ form.
full_sentence: You can freely present any problems with our delivery service by filling in a complaint form.

questions: You can cancel up your product order until 4pm today _____ calling our retail service number.
full_sentence: You can cancel up your product order until 4pm today by calling our retail service number.

questions: Before she left the company, Ms. Gutiez hired a suitable _____ to fill her position.
full_sentence: Before she left the company, Ms. Gutiez hired a suitable replacement to fill her position.

questions: The last _____ of paper samples was delivered to your office the day before yesterday.
full_sentence: The last shipment of paper samples was delivered to your office the day before yesterday.

questions: We must delay the launch of our new software, because the developers are behind _____.
full_sentence: We must delay the launch of our new software, because the developers are behind schedule.

questions: Please be _____ that we will do our best to respond to any concern you may have in the future.
full_sentence: Please be assured that we will do our best to respond to any concern you may have in the future.

questions: Even after _____ negotiations, a mutually agreeable agreement has not yet been reached.
full_sentence: Even after repeated negotiations, a mutually agreeable agreement has not yet been reached.

questions: The special sessions were planned _____ familiarize employees with the new auditing procedures.
full_sentence: The special sessions were planned to familiarize employees with the new auditing procedures.

questions: Of the three proposals, Mr. Lewis was _____ impressed with the one Frank submitted.
full_sentence: Of the three proposals, Mr. Lewis was particularly impressed with the one Frank submitted.

questions: When _____ a contract, it is very important to examine all aspects of the contract in detail.
full_sentence: When negotiating a contract, it is very important to examine all aspects of the contract in detail.

questions: As far as I know, Ms. Tirano was the only person who was in the room at the time of _____.
full_sentence: As far as I know, Ms. Tirano was the only person who was in the room at the time of delivery.

questions: Train service will be temporarily suspended from 5 pm to 10 pm Monday for _____.
full_sentence: Train service will be temporarily suspended from 5 pm to 10 pm Monday for maintenance.

questions: The Milltown Cinema's outdoor cafe will be closed _____ the winter months.
full_sentence: The Milltown Cinema's outdoor cafe will be closed during the winter months.

questions: Daily guided tours of the warehouse _____ at 10:00 a.m. in the reception area on the first floor.
full_sentence: Daily guided tours of the warehouse begin at 10:00 a.m. in the reception area on the first floor.

questions: Most of the new houses for sale on Seegers Island are _____ priced and in excellent condition.
full_sentence: Most of the new houses for sale on Seegers Island are moderately priced and in excellent condition.

questions: Employees must receive _____ approval for any travel that will be reimbursed by the company.
full_sentence: Employees must receive prior approval for any travel that will be reimbursed by the company.

questions: Next year Khosun Industries will _____ several employees to work in the new factory in Kuala Lumpur.
full_sentence: Next year Khosun Industries will send several employees to work in the new factory in Kuala Lumpur.

questions: The Bemier Company's financial reports are typically published in _____ English and French.
full_sentence: The Bemier Company's financial reports are typically published in both English and French.

questions: Dr. Varagas will soon retire, ending _____ distinguished 30-year career as a research scientist with Gillan Laboratories.
full_sentence: Dr. Varagas will soon retire, ending her distinguished 30-year career as a research scientist with Gillan Laboratories.

questions: All members of the sales team are grateful for Michael Dreman's substantial _____ to the project over the last six months.
full_sentence: All members of the sales team are grateful for Michael Dreman's substantial contributions to the project over the last six months.

questions: A _____ from Jensen-Colmes Corporation will be happy to meet with prospective job applicants at the Westborough Job Fair.
full_sentence: A representative from Jensen-Colmes Corporation will be happy to meet with prospective job applicants at the Westborough Job Fair.

questions: Visitors to the library are asked to speak _____ and keep conversations brief when in the main reading room.
full_sentence: Visitors to the library are asked to speak quietly and keep conversations brief when in the main reading room.

questions: Telephone-conferencing equipment is _____ available in every meeting room in the Judson Building.
full_sentence: Telephone-conferencing equipment is now available in every meeting room in the Judson Building.

questions: Saturday's clearance sale will reduce old stock and make room for next season's products, _____ will arrive very soon.
full_sentence: Saturday's clearance sale will reduce old stock and make room for next season's products, which will arrive very soon.

questions: Visitors must sign in at the security desk and provide photo _____ identification in order to _____ visitor passes.
full_sentence: Visitors must sign in at the security desk and provide photo obtain identification in order to obtain visitor passes.

questions: As part of its business expansion _____, Ausgaard Automobiles plans to launch a line of small utility trucks.
full_sentence: As part of its business expansion strategy, Ausgaard Automobiles plans to launch a line of small utility trucks.

questions: The department-wide changes suggested _____ Ms. Juntasa received unanimous approval from company management.
full_sentence: The department-wide changes suggested by Ms. Juntasa received unanimous approval from company management.

questions: Marsden Manufacturing, Inc. is hiring temporary workers to address the present _____ for greater personnel resources.
full_sentence: Marsden Manufacturing, Inc. is hiring temporary workers to address the present demand for greater personnel resources.

questions: Candidates for positions at Pereira Consulting should answer the questions on the application form as _____ as possible.
full_sentence: Candidates for positions at Pereira Consulting should answer the questions on the application form as accurately as possible.

questions: Crown Corporation has been the nation's _____ commercial supplier of fabric dyes for over 25 years.
full_sentence: Crown Corporation has been the nation's leading commercial supplier of fabric dyes for over 25 years.

questions: The community swimming pool is not to be used at any time _____ a trained lifeguard is on duty.
full_sentence: The community swimming pool is not to be used at any time unless a trained lifeguard is on duty.

questions: Researchers at Firmatek Synthetics are working on a new material that will be twice as _____ as ordinary concrete.
full_sentence: Researchers at Firmatek Synthetics are working on a new material that will be twice as durable as ordinary concrete.

questions: The exhibition of German sculpture will be on _____ for the next twelve weeks at the Richter Art Museum.
full_sentence: The exhibition of German sculpture will be on display for the next twelve weeks at the Richter Art Museum.

questions: A competent project manager makes sure that the work involved in a project is assigned _____.
full_sentence: A competent project manager makes sure that the work involved in a project is assigned equally.

questions: In order to _____ late fees, please pay the entire balance no later than the due date.
full_sentence: In order to avoid late fees, please pay the entire balance no later than the due date.

questions: If its estimate _____ more competitive, Maley Construction would have been the main contractor.
full_sentence: If its estimate had been more competitive, Maley Construction would have been the main contractor.

questions: Many young employees say that they would prefer more vacation time _____ a pay raise.
full_sentence: Many young employees say that they would prefer more vacation time to a pay raise.

questions: Because of the recent stock market crash, investors are _____ about entering the market again.
full_sentence: Because of the recent stock market crash, investors are cautious about entering the market again.

questions: Dell is one of the biggest computer software companies _____ to expand its operation in South America.
full_sentence: Dell is one of the biggest computer software companies eager to expand its operation in South America.

questions: _____ we installed the new accounting software the number of complaints from customers about billing errors has almost doubled.
full_sentence: Since we installed the new accounting software the number of complaints from customers about billing errors has almost doubled.

questions: I read Rita's comments on the proposal and I honestly think mine has a lot more detail than _____.
full_sentence: I read Rita's comments on the proposal and I honestly think mine has a lot more detail than hers.

questions: I found a beautiful covering for the dining table but unfortunately they didn't have _____ napkins.
full_sentence: I found a beautiful covering for the dining table but unfortunately they didn't have matching napkins.

questions: Normally I _____ to work but today I decided to take the subway because of construction on the highway.
full_sentence: Normally I drive to work but today I decided to take the subway because of construction on the highway.

questions: _____ we have branches in six European countries and four in Asia and will be opening one in South America next year.
full_sentence: Currently we have branches in six European countries and four in Asia and will be opening one in South America next year.

questions: The discount can be _____ only to purchases above one hundred dollars from the sporting goods department.
full_sentence: The discount can be applied only to purchases above one hundred dollars from the sporting goods department.

questions: The writing for the ad has already been _____ by Tom, so it can go to the newspaper now.
full_sentence: The writing for the ad has already been approved by Tom, so it can go to the newspaper now.

questions: _____ we have made several changes to this model our sales are still far behind those of our competitor.
full_sentence: Even though we have made several changes to this model our sales are still far behind those of our competitor.

questions: As long as they have their video games and some toys, the children can amuse _____ quietly.
full_sentence: As long as they have their video games and some toys, the children can amuse themselves quietly.

questions: I plan to just stay at home, make a few house repairs, and do a lot of reading _____ my vacation.
full_sentence: I plan to just stay at home, make a few house repairs, and do a lot of reading during my vacation.

questions: This one is much cheaper than the other but the quality is so _____ that I think it would not be a wise purchase.
full_sentence: This one is much cheaper than the other but the quality is so inferior that I think it would not be a wise purchase.

questions: It is said that Ralph is leaving but I don't think it will be difficult to find a _____ replacement for him.
full_sentence: It is said that Ralph is leaving but I don't think it will be difficult to find a suitable replacement for him.

questions: The three of us can manage to finish this on time _____ it would certainly be easier if we had one or two more people to help.
full_sentence: The three of us can manage to finish this on time even if it would certainly be easier if we had one or two more people to help.

questions: These telescopes are part of a larger program to search for _____ in space.
full_sentence: These telescopes are part of a larger program to search for intelligence in space.

questions: Because of the recent _____ in sales, we have decided to buy some radio ads.
full_sentence: Because of the recent decrease in sales, we have decided to buy some radio ads.

questions: Beginning today, the only keys to the supply room will be Fred's and _____.
full_sentence: Beginning today, the only keys to the supply room will be Fred's and yours.

questions: The movie _____ me so much that I actually fell asleep about half way through it.
full_sentence: The movie bored me so much that I actually fell asleep about half way through it.

questions: _____ seven people will attend the meeting so we can use the small conference room rather than the larger board room.
full_sentence: Only seven people will attend the meeting so we can use the small conference room rather than the larger board room.

questions: There will be parties and parades all week as the country celebrates its _____ from its former colonial rulers.
full_sentence: There will be parties and parades all week as the country celebrates its independence from its former colonial rulers.

questions: I might make more sometimes as a salesman but I prefer to have the _____ income that my office job gives me.
full_sentence: I might make more sometimes as a salesman but I prefer to have the stable income that my office job gives me.

questions: This office space doesn't allow much room for future expansion of our staff but it should be _____ for the next year or two.
full_sentence: This office space doesn't allow much room for future expansion of our staff but it should be inadequate for the next year or two.

questions: This year the lawn care exhibition will _____ place outdoors at the valley garden grounds.
full_sentence: This year the lawn care exhibition will take place outdoors at the valley garden grounds.

questions: We have already received _____ responses from people interested in buying the boat.
full_sentence: We have already received several responses from people interested in buying the boat.

questions: Now and then the machine might run badly but after a few minutes it will correct _____.
full_sentence: Now and then the machine might run badly but after a few minutes it will correct itself.

questions: There are eleven staff and we have only eight seats available so if _____ asks to come we will have a problem.
full_sentence: There are eleven staff and we have only eight seats available so if anyone asks to come we will have a problem.

questions: It's over a month since Kelly and Scott went to Chicago and I still haven't received _____ initial report.
full_sentence: It's over a month since Kelly and Scott went to Chicago and I still haven't received their initial report.

questions: The fire damage was so serious so it's good that we _____ by a good insurance policy.
full_sentence: The fire damage was so serious so it's good that we are covered by a good insurance policy.

questions: The company has made a profit every year since it was _____ in 1924.
full_sentence: The company has made a profit every year since it was established in 1924.

questions: We won't know how much _____ for next year's budget until we have the final total for this year's expenditures.
full_sentence: We won't know how much to request for next year's budget until we have the final total for this year's expenditures.

questions: Contrary _____ the predictions of the analysts, the economy has become stronger over the past six months.
full_sentence: Contrary to the predictions of the analysts, the economy has become stronger over the past six months.

questions: My boss _____ my plan to reorganize the marketing department after six months of negotiations.
full_sentence: My boss approved my plan to reorganize the marketing department after six months of negotiations.

questions: _____ he submitted his proposal over a month ago, he still hasn't had any response.
full_sentence: Although he submitted his proposal over a month ago, he still hasn't had any response.

questions: We will run ads on all of the local radio stations and hold _____ events in the larger shopping malls on weekends.
full_sentence: We will run ads on all of the local radio stations and hold promotional events in the larger shopping malls on weekends.

questions: A copy of the _____ contract has been sent to the lawyer and he will call us after he has read it.
full_sentence: A copy of the revised contract has been sent to the lawyer and he will call us after he has read it.

questions: A bell sounded because his _____ speech had run past the time limit and the next speaker will take the stage.
full_sentence: A bell sounded because his acceptance speech had run past the time limit and the next speaker will take the stage.

questions: Today for lunch, _____ going to Mario's for spaghetti again, why don't we have a hamburger?
full_sentence: Today for lunch, instead of going to Mario's for spaghetti again, why don't we have a hamburger?

questions: We have been experiencing a serious _____ in sales recently and might have to fire some people.
full_sentence: We have been experiencing a serious decrease in sales recently and might have to fire some people.

questions: Everyone in the company is _____ and loyal because we have a very good profit sharing plan.
full_sentence: Everyone in the company is industrious and loyal because we have a very good profit sharing plan.

questions: Before the change, I knew exactly what I wanted to do but now I am _____.
full_sentence: Before the change, I knew exactly what I wanted to do but now I am unsure.

questions: We'd like to start building right away but need final confirmation from the city _____.
full_sentence: We'd like to start building right away but need final confirmation from the city to proceed.

questions: The boss _____ my request for extra vacation time so I will be able to take that trip to Africa.
full_sentence: The boss approved my request for extra vacation time so I will be able to take that trip to Africa.

questions: It was a big investment for us to make but after only two years most of the costs _____.
full_sentence: It was a big investment for us to make but after only two years most of the costs have been recovered.

questions: We cannot buy any new office equipment until the bank _____ our loan or we sell more.
full_sentence: We cannot buy any new office equipment until the bank approves our loan or we sell more.

questions: It was _____ to me the plane wouldn't leave on time because the weather was so bad.
full_sentence: It was obvious to me the plane wouldn't leave on time because the weather was so bad.

questions: I used to pay close attention to everything he wrote but I _____ his columns for the past few years.
full_sentence: I used to pay close attention to everything he wrote but I haven't followed his columns for the past few years.

questions: If the application is not _____ completed it will automatically be rejected by the judges.
full_sentence: If the application is not properly completed it will automatically be rejected by the judges.

questions: Sometimes it is hard to be effective if you operate strictly _____ the guidelines.
full_sentence: Sometimes it is hard to be effective if you operate strictly within the guidelines.

questions: He gets a lot of penalties because he is _____ an aggressive player and breaks many rules.
full_sentence: He gets a lot of penalties because he is such an aggressive player and breaks many rules.

questions: It's a much too _____ calculation for me to do without using a computer and special software.
full_sentence: It's a much too complex calculation for me to do without using a computer and special software.

questions: When I started here, Marion gave me some _____ advice about how to deal with the boss and I really appreciated it.
full_sentence: When I started here, Marion gave me some useful advice about how to deal with the boss and I really appreciated it.

questions: On a trip to Switzerland we stayed at a _____ little cottage high up on a mountainside.
full_sentence: On a trip to Switzerland we stayed at a charming little cottage high up on a mountainside.

questions: If you follow the instructions carefully and completely you will quickly learn the easiest _____ to change the filters.
full_sentence: If you follow the instructions carefully and completely you will quickly learn the easiest method to change the filters.

questions: Before we decide _____ to manage this project, I'd like to know more about the people you are considering for it.
full_sentence: Before we decide who's to manage this project, I'd like to know more about the people you are considering for it.

questions: The award was so unexpected that I just didn't know how _____ to the applause.
full_sentence: The award was so unexpected that I just didn't know how to react to the applause.

questions: Evans is _____ regarded as the best lawyer in the country for this type of case.
full_sentence: Evans is widely regarded as the best lawyer in the country for this type of case.

questions: My son is a good basketball player but his younger sister is _____ better!
full_sentence: My son is a good basketball player but his younger sister is even better!

questions: I just don't understand what some of these _____ from my paycheck are about.
full_sentence: I just don't understand what some of these deductions from my paycheck are about.

questions: He made his first million dollars by _____ unwanted, useless land in Florida to people in New York.
full_sentence: He made his first million dollars by selling unwanted, useless land in Florida to people in New York.

questions: It seems that the company will hire someone new, so neither Paul _____ Mary will be given the promotion.
full_sentence: It seems that the company will hire someone new, so neither Paul nor Mary will be given the promotion.

questions: There are some important changes you should read in the 3rd chapter of the newest _____ of his book.
full_sentence: There are some important changes you should read in the 3rd chapter of the newest version of his book.

questions: I expect the Board _____ its earlier decision about expansion after the members have considered these new facts.
full_sentence: I expect the Board to reverse its earlier decision about expansion after the members have considered these new facts.

questions: More than twice _____ many applications for summer jobs were received this year than last year.
full_sentence: More than twice as many applications for summer jobs were received this year than last year.

questions: The _____ of the play I saw in London was much better than the one I saw in New York City.
full_sentence: The production of the play I saw in London was much better than the one I saw in New York City.

questions: Thank you for your interest and you will be informed _____ our decision with an e-mail.
full_sentence: Thank you for your interest and you will be informed of our decision with an e-mail.

questions: The award was created as _____ for the staff to think of ideas that help make our systems better.
full_sentence: The award was created as encouragement for the staff to think of ideas that help make our systems better.

questions: I arrived _____ for the meeting so I missed the entire discussion about the western branch.
full_sentence: I arrived late for the meeting so I missed the entire discussion about the western branch.

questions: That farmland we bought has proven to be one of our most _____ investments.
full_sentence: That farmland we bought has proven to be one of our most profitable investments.

questions: We have been very good friends _____ he moved into the neighborhood ten years ago.
full_sentence: We have been very good friends since he moved into the neighborhood ten years ago.

questions: You must let me know immediately _____ someone from head office calls or faxes us.
full_sentence: You must let me know immediately should someone from head office calls or faxes us.

questions: He _____ to work with my brother when they both lived in Berlin in the early 80s.
full_sentence: He used to work with my brother when they both lived in Berlin in the early 80s.

questions: The introduction of the new manufacturing process will double _____ number of orders for the product.

questions: _____ is necessary for all trainees to complete a 3-day orientation course before they start work.

questions: Although I was angry, I could not help _____ at his excuse.

questions: The taking of _____ is not allowed in this building.

questions: _____ chairing our local steering committee, Mr. Graham has been active in other activities.

questions: _____ his tight schedule, Mr. Baker will not be able to visit the plant this week.

full_sentence: The supervisor knows that Mr. Andrew is the only employee that labored on the weekend.

questions: There are three times _____ many workers in 2015 as there were in 2010 in our company.

questions: _____ the opportunities he had, that one was the best.

full_sentence: The instructor whose classes many students take is going to be on a TV talk show tomorrow.

questions: As an added incentive, when you take the survey, your name will be included in a special _____ for three $100 gift certificates redeemable at any of our store locations.

questions: Won't you please take a moment to fill out the enclosed survey _____ your shopping experiences at your local N.K. Men's store?
full_sentence: Won't you please take a moment to fill out the enclosed survey concerning your shopping experiences at your local N.K. Men's store?

questions: Their policies are better organized than _____ of our company.

questions: The _____ you live to a big city, the more expensive your living costs will be.

questions: _____ the report issued by the accounting department, the net profits of this year increased drastically.

questions: If you leave your name _____ the waiting list, you will be served in order.

questions: _____ employees attended the celebration party.

questions: Does she have _____ collected information?

questions: Banks are a primary source _____ capital.

questions: We don't just _____ in sports but also police the abuse of company brands, logos and trademarks across the web.

questions: The company tried to buy Twitter late last year for an estimated $500 million in stock, but the offer was _____.

questions: Revenues are rising, costs are falling and first-half _____ are expected to be at the top end of forecasts.

questions: The pharmaceutical industry _____ companies which differ hugely in size, work in many different spheres, and do quite different things.

questions: Regulations also _____ mandatory training requirements on aircrew, and staff working for in-flight catering companies and cargo companies.

questions: We currently seek a Front End Developer who wants to work in a fun, _____, and fast paced environment.

questions: Helen is looking for someone to give _____ a ride to the airport tomorrow morning.

questions: Ken agreed to _____ his manager on a trip to Europe to conclude a business contract.

questions: Procrastinators are famous _____ letting work pile up.

questions: The commission _____ that remuneration should be fully disclosed, and decided by the board and "not delegated to senior management".

questions: I'm pleased to _____ that Stephen Jenkins has been named manager of the Investment Products Division.

questions: We haven't heard anything from Mary yet. She hasn't written a letter, _____ has she called. We're getting worried.

questions: As soon as the products _____, she will dispatch them to the proper department.

questions: Smaller companies that could not embark on such projects on their _____ have joined forces to set up workplace nurseries.

questions: Nursing and residential homes, like any other businesses, _____ VAT on many of the purchases that they make.

questions: _____ the chairman thinks you are suitable for the public relations position, he will contact you to schedule a second interview.

questions: It is general knowledge that solar power is more efficient _____ coal or oil-based power.

questions: Students are _____ to provide identification before entering the stacks of Macintyre University's library.

questions: For the researcher, a properly maintained notebook can be a _____ of useful information for many years.

questions: If she _____ that it was going to rain, she would have brought her umbrella.

questions: We need both the name and the address of the individual _____ our computers can trace a person's records.

questions: Our 54 member companies include distillers, blenders, bottlers, and brokers of Scotch Whisky, _____ around 90% of the industry.

questions: Turn _____ the light when you leave the room.

questions: We _____ to establish a friendly relationship with that country for the past two years.

questions: The apartment _____ Mr. Carter lives in is not very large.

questions: _____ had she finished her study abroad than she came back to her country.

questions: Although I knew that profits were poor, never _____ things would get this bad.

questions: There was a big argument about _____ we should expand the company.

questions: If she _____ that the weather was going to be cold, she wouldn't have booked the holiday.

questions: Lower-income households often have to choose between investing in safety equipment or purchasing the other _____ of life.

questions: The palace has _____ gardens, a maze, and tennis courts.

questions: However the dealer won't replace the _____ shock absorber under warranty without the consent of Lotus Cars.

questions: Corporate brokers may also attend institutional meetings and press briefings as directed by their _____ who are the companies.

questions: Bruce's sales _____ over the past year has averaged twenty-five percent higher than any other sales representative.

questions: Had I not _____ at the presentation on that day, I would not have met Susan and Peter.

questions: In this section, you'll find an array of _____ Matt merchandise from mugs to books or prints to greetings cards.

questions: Resilience is about how people, infrastructures and networks might _____ the impact of an event while continuing to operate.

questions: Services employment saw its biggest _____ since comparable records began in 1996, with hotels and restaurant staff bearing the biggest brunt.

questions: We regret to inform you that the products cannot be shipped _____ next Monday.

questions: It _____ two-thirds of its revenue and slightly more of its profit from its banking and asset management division.

questions: If he _____ the detective honestly, he would not have been arrested.

questions: There are daily cycles in commuter traffic that _____ with when people go to work and when they return home.

questions: More _____, the government reversed previous reforms intended to inject internationally accepted disciplines into the market by reducing government interference.

questions: Such transparency _____ employees to identify and act upon the appropriate objectives, strengths and weaknesses of the company.

questions: Sometimes _____ the right tech - the neatest gadget, the most efficient service, the soundest software - can be difficult.

questions: There has been _____ evidence of a sharper slowdown across the board in China in the last month.

questions: A day earlier, US consumer prices posted their first annual decline since 1955, _____ concern that Federal Reserve actions will cause inflation to soar.

questions: If I can be of assistance to you in any additional way, please don't _____ to call.

questions: _____ is your completed 2014 Tax Return and a copy for your records.

questions: The sign on the lawn says clearly that people _____ not walk on the grass.

questions: The employee is often required to _____ training activities during the 'non-working time'.

questions: Stung by recent steep rise in private service charges, the government has _____ to the old-fashioned solution of clamping down on the inflationary spiral.

questions: A few years ago, while he was traveling through Italy, a good idea for a history of Florentine architecture _____ to him.

questions: However, considering the loss of self-control caused by addiction, the system is expected to help alleviate gaming addiction to some _____.
full_sentence: However, considering the loss of self-control caused by addiction, the system is expected to help alleviate gaming addiction to some degree.

questions: He says his _____ are rising faster than his paycheck.

questions: As automation increases, the problems of unemployment will become progressively more serious _____ more men and women are given the training necessary for white collar positions.

questions: However, the strict _____ criteria mean that few people qualify, and even those who do are reassessed regularly.

questions: _____ is slowly seeping back, helped by lower interest rates, energy and fuel deflation, and of course falling food prices.
full_sentence: Confidence is slowly seeping back, helped by lower interest rates, energy and fuel deflation, and of course falling food prices.

questions: Automotive markets across the world have been stung by a _____ of credit and confidence among consumers.

questions: We have given very careful consideration to their situation and regrettably concluded that the business was unsustainable _____ the extent of creditor pressure.

questions: The Bank would have to _____ the money supply by printing more money, known as quantitative easing.

questions: Boards and remuneration committees will have to reflect in future on _____ the risks and rewards are appropriate.

questions: The company is also looking at investing in renewable energy projects, _____ appropriate contracts for secure and guaranteed earnings are in place.

questions: Some will _____ again as the economy recovers; others have to shape a different future as customers' needs change.

questions: China's lenders, CDB included, are poised to disgorge masses of new loans to _____ the nation's growth.

questions: And economists warned that retailers will face a difficult year as consumers cut their spending _____ amid the recession.
full_sentence: And economists warned that retailers will face a difficult year as consumers cut their spending substantially amid the recession.

questions: He was angry with his son, for he would not tell how he came _____ his watch.
full_sentence: He was angry with his son, for he would not tell how he came by his watch.

questions: The newspapers are thick with _____ offering employment to qualified persons with much educational background.

questions: The _____ candidate will be customer oriented, able to lead by example, a strong team player, and have excellent verbal and communication skills.
full_sentence: The ideal candidate will be customer oriented, able to lead by example, a strong team player, and have excellent verbal and communication skills.

questions: WM serves nearly 25 million customers in residential, commercial, industrial and municipal markets throughout North America _____ a network of collection operations.
full_sentence: WM serves nearly 25 million customers in residential, commercial, industrial and municipal markets throughout North America through a network of collection operations.

questions: Having recently invested more than $50 million in extraordinary upgrades and brand-new venues, GSR has established itself as far above the _____ quo.
full_sentence: Having recently invested more than $50 million in extraordinary upgrades and brand-new venues, GSR has established itself as far above the status quo.

questions: We're looking for individuals who are _____ to being equally exceptional.
full_sentence: We're looking for individuals who are committed to being equally exceptional.

questions: My boss said he was going to quit _____ golf since he didn't make a good score.
full_sentence: My boss said he was going to quit playing golf since he didn't make a good score.

questions: It is very important that everyone be there with a few initial ideas sketched out. Let's utilize this time to _____ every proposal.
full_sentence: It is very important that everyone be there with a few initial ideas sketched out. Let's utilize this time to discuss every proposal.

questions: Conference coordinators _____ on site and ready to assist you with any of your needs for the duration of the conference.
full_sentence: Conference coordinators will be on site and ready to assist you with any of your needs for the duration of the conference.

questions: We requested the superintendent of the building to clean up the storage room in the basement _____ that the children might have enough space for their bicycles.
full_sentence: We requested the superintendent of the building to clean up the storage room in the basement so that the children might have enough space for their bicycles.

questions: Directors _____ that they should establish a new branch in New York.
full_sentence: Directors suggested that they should establish a new branch in New York.

questions: On September 16, 1620, the Mayflower, a sailing vessel of about 180 tons, started a memorable _____ from England.
full_sentence: On September 16, 1620, the Mayflower, a sailing vessel of about 180 tons, started a memorable voyage from England.

questions: Consumers have a lot of issues, whether refinancing mortgages or _____ with higher fuel and food bills.

questions: Property investors believe Brixton has been too slow in seeking to strengthen its balance sheet amid _____ asset values.
full_sentence: Property investors believe Brixton has been too slow in seeking to strengthen its balance sheet amid tumbling asset values.

questions: My experience as clerk, supervisor, and floor manager has been very positive and I'm _____ that I will use many of the skills I have learned at Fielders in the future.
full_sentence: My experience as clerk, supervisor, and floor manager has been very positive and I'm confident that I will use many of the skills I have learned at Fielders in the future.

questions: Applicants for employment in the US must have work authorization that does not now or in the future _____ sponsorship of a visa for employment authorization in the United States.
full_sentence: Applicants for employment in the US must have work authorization that does not now or in the future require sponsorship of a visa for employment authorization in the United States.

questions: As Director of Studies with your organization, I would bring a focus _____ quality and effectiveness to your syllabus design.

questions: The complexity of work on the assembly _____ is a serious problem in a mass production.

questions: The meeting was _____ to order at 9:30 a.m.

questions: A newspaper _____ us in touch with the world.

questions: Promoting _____ growth is much harder.
full_sentence: Promoting sustainable growth is much harder.

questions: Shipping is free _____ you order more than two collections.

questions: Nuclear power is not a _____ source of energy.

questions: The local community has mobilized very quickly, and the first shipment of clothing and blankets is due _____ Bolton this afternoon.

questions: The flooding will, of course, mean _____ reparations for both infrastructure and people's houses and valuables.

questions: _____ these market signals, policy holders continue to demonstrate inappropriate behavior as regards fire prevention.

questions: If you have any other questions, please feel free _____ us at any time before and during the conference.

questions: Recently, China unleashed multiple moves to support its markets and prevent its currency from a free fall, while at the same time _____ to stimulate the economy.
full_sentence: Recently, China unleashed multiple moves to support its markets and prevent its currency from a free fall, while at the same time trying to stimulate the economy.

questions: Before deciding, you should consider your investment _____, risk tolerance and your level of experience on these products.
full_sentence: Before deciding, you should consider your investment objectives, risk tolerance and your level of experience on these products.

questions: On the other hand, the energy sector has certainly _____ the US economy since the financial crisis and has created lots of high paying jobs with wonderful multiplier effects.
full_sentence: On the other hand, the energy sector has certainly boosted the US economy since the financial crisis and has created lots of high paying jobs with wonderful multiplier effects.

questions: As soon as day _____ we left for New York.
full_sentence: As soon as day broke we left for New York.

questions: Like other insectivorous plants, sundews grow well in bogs and swamps _____ there is little nitrogen in the soil.
full_sentence: Like other insectivorous plants, sundews grow well in bogs and swamps where there is little nitrogen in the soil.

questions: The aurora is a common feature of the planet earth and appears along two oval belts _____ the aurora ovals.

questions: Understandably, companies reduced work forces further to reduce costs and brace themselves against what is expected to be a _____ year.

questions: By _____ in the commercial property area, we have gained an expertise in every conceivable form of transaction and have built a list of clients from New York to California.

questions: Our publication, "How To Improve Your Image Through Writing", offers the reader the opportunity to _____ the good letter with the bad.
full_sentence: Our publication, "How To Improve Your Image Through Writing", offers the reader the opportunity to compare the good letter with the bad.

questions: When your future plans _____ for a bus or a van, please give us a call and let us show you what we can do for you.
full_sentence: When your future plans call for a bus or a van, please give us a call and let us show you what we can do for you.

questions: Strikingly, India ranked 29 out of 30 countries in the 2015 Global Intellectual Property Center index, which _____ commitment to innovation via IP protection efforts.
full_sentence: Strikingly, India ranked 29 out of 30 countries in the 2015 Global Intellectual Property Center index, which measures commitment to innovation via IP protection efforts.

questions: By their next anniversary, they _____ married 20 years.
full_sentence: By their next anniversary, they will have been married 20 years.

questions: The Assistant Manager is a position that reports to the Airport Director and is _____ for both airside and landside operations.
full_sentence: The Assistant Manager is a position that reports to the Airport Director and is responsible for both airside and landside operations.

questions: Some unforeseen incident came up the other day and forced me to _____ our meeting.
full_sentence: Some unforeseen incident came up the other day and forced me to cancel our meeting.

questions: If you would like _____ your free sample of our mineral springs water, please mail your information request card to us today.
full_sentence: If you would like to receive your free sample of our mineral springs water, please mail your information request card to us today.

questions: All the neighbors commented on how strange it was _____ the Smiths to have ever chosen so ugly a color to paint the house.

questions: TruGreen is a _____ in the service industry and we have a career opportunity for an ambitious, team-oriented professional who wants to learn to manage one of our lawn care operations.
full_sentence: TruGreen is a leader in the service industry and we have a career opportunity for an ambitious, team-oriented professional who wants to learn to manage one of our lawn care operations.

questions: Harrisburg, a transportation center in the days of riverboat traffic, has been Pennsylvania's capital _____ 1812.
full_sentence: Harrisburg, a transportation center in the days of riverboat traffic, has been Pennsylvania's capital since 1812.

questions: The Olympic Games, first celebrated in Athens in 1896, have been held _____ four years so far this century, except during the two world wars.

questions: He said that he had better _____ for the States.
full_sentence: He said that he had better be leaving for the States.

questions: One of the _____ deals about the therapy is that it could be broadly applied to many different diseases.
full_sentence: One of the big deals about the therapy is that it could be broadly applied to many different diseases.

questions: Our firm recently received an extremely favorable review from The Forbes, which we hope may be _____ some interest to you.
full_sentence: Our firm recently received an extremely favorable review from The Forbes, which we hope may be of some interest to you.

questions: Since we do not represent any individual computer hardware manufacturer, the products that we carry are _____ with many systems.
full_sentence: Since we do not represent any individual computer hardware manufacturer, the products that we carry are compatible with many systems.

questions: If the United States had built more homes for poor people in 1955, the housing problems now in some parts of this country _____ so serious.
full_sentence: If the United States had built more homes for poor people in 1955, the housing problems now in some parts of this country wouldn't be so serious.

questions: Ashley Furniture has been serving its community with furniture since 1945. We provide quality furniture at _____ prices and great customer service.
full_sentence: Ashley Furniture has been serving its community with furniture since 1945. We provide quality furniture at affordable prices and great customer service.

questions: Unfortunately, the city was not able to extend the deadline for us. We filed for an _____ late last year but it was turned down by the city board.
full_sentence: Unfortunately, the city was not able to extend the deadline for us. We filed for an extension late last year but it was turned down by the city board.

questions: I don't know if you know but I was called down to our warehouse that day to deal with an _____ matter.
full_sentence: I don't know if you know but I was called down to our warehouse that day to deal with an urgent matter.

questions: The instruction pamphlet says never to open the radio; in fact, it suggests always having a technician _____ it.
full_sentence: The instruction pamphlet says never to open the radio; in fact, it suggests always having a technician service it.

questions: 62% of black working-age households have no assets in a retirement account, _____ with just 37% of white households.
full_sentence: 62% of black working-age households have no assets in a retirement account, compared with just 37% of white households.

questions: Minority households tend to invest in lower-return assets _____ housing, and also tend to borrow at high interest rates.
full_sentence: Minority households tend to invest in lower-return assets such as housing, and also tend to borrow at high interest rates.

questions: Bill Gates is wealthy because he was able to establish _____ rights over his software, with the help of his father, a lawyer.
full_sentence: Bill Gates is wealthy because he was able to establish property rights over his software, with the help of his father, a lawyer.

questions: On the political side, the battle with communism was won, but it was the financial side of world affairs _____ marked the downfall of the U.S.
full_sentence: On the political side, the battle with communism was won, but it was the financial side of world affairs that marked the downfall of the U.S.

questions: Jean's uncle insisted that _____ in this hotel.
full_sentence: Jean's uncle insisted that he not stay in this hotel.

questions: If you come late once more, I will have to _____ you.
full_sentence: If you come late once more, I will have to fire you.

questions: They all _____ each other.

questions: Please _____ your seat belt. The plane is going to take off.
full_sentence: Please fasten your seat belt. The plane is going to take off.

questions: Around 86% of smart phones in Russia are powered by Android, which limits Yandex's ability _____ with Google in the mobile market.
full_sentence: Around 86% of smart phones in Russia are powered by Android, which limits Yandex's ability to compete with Google in the mobile market.

questions: Recently, researchers at the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency _____ an array of small electrodes into the region of the brain that controls movement in a woman who is paralyzed.
full_sentence: Recently, researchers at the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency implanted an array of small electrodes into the region of the brain that controls movement in a woman who is paralyzed.

questions: World Magazine is also a great gift for the holidays at a very _____ price.
full_sentence: World Magazine is also a great gift for the holidays at a very affordable price.

questions: Scientists have concluded that sunspots _____ rainfall and general weather conditions.

questions: If the problem _____ out to be a minor adjustment, we shall make the repair and be sure to return the product to you within thirty days.
full_sentence: If the problem turns out to be a minor adjustment, we shall make the repair and be sure to return the product to you within thirty days.

questions: The quality of education _____ elementary school through college has become a subject of special interest in recent years.
full_sentence: The quality of education from elementary school through college has become a subject of special interest in recent years.

questions: When the Civil War ended traffic on the Mississippi River, Mark Twain left his job _____ a river pilot and moved to Carson City.

questions: Scientists know very little about the drug's long-term effects, _____ it has been on the market for only two years.

questions: The controversial legislation reinterprets Article 9 of the Japanese constitution, which outlaws war as a means of settling international _____.

questions: Also, if you sign up a friend for an _____ subscription, you will receive a free pullover from Golf World magazine.
full_sentence: Also, if you sign up a friend for an additional subscription, you will receive a free pullover from Golf World magazine.

questions: Each man and woman had to _____ in the test booklet and answer sheet before going out of the testing center.

questions: Earlier this month, China _____ its largest military parade ever to celebrate 70 years since Japan's World War II defeat.

questions: Japan's Ministry of Defense _____ a 5.09 trillion yen ($41.7 billion) request for budget allocations for the coming fiscal year, a 2.2% increase from 2015.
full_sentence: Japan's Ministry of Defense submitted a 5.09 trillion yen ($41.7 billion) request for budget allocations for the coming fiscal year, a 2.2% increase from 2015.

questions: Russian military spending is now approaching 10 percent of its GDP, and China has made a similar commitment to spending on _____.

questions: Computer Sciences Corp. offers a complete and diverse line of computer software packages for _____ personal and business application.

questions: _____ knows just when pantomime began.

questions: One of the puzzles _____ biologists is how cells know what to become in embryo.
full_sentence: One of the puzzles mystifying biologists is how cells know what to become in embryo.

questions: Japan sees robots as a potential solution to its rapidly aging society, _____ the number of citizens aged 65 and above hitting a record-high 32 million in October 2013.

full_sentence: The Route Service Manager is responsible for managing, planning, and administrating the daily operational functions of the branch in the most cost-effective and customer-satisfying manner.

questions: Our goal is to find a person who is a team player and _____ the creative vision to advance the Agency's services.

questions: Someone who has the interpersonal skills and the ability to easily relate and adjust to a variety of situations and personalities would _____ in our organization.
full_sentence: Someone who has the interpersonal skills and the ability to easily relate and adjust to a variety of situations and personalities would thrive in our organization.

questions: You want to join a growing, aggressive and dynamic company that _____ success and challenges you to grow.
full_sentence: You want to join a growing, aggressive and dynamic company that rewards success and challenges you to grow.

questions: _____ satire is often comic, its object is to evoke not mere laughter but laughter for a corrective purpose.

questions: Worse still, Shell continues to pollute and flare gas with impunity in the Niger Delta, poisoning land and _____ locals.
full_sentence: Worse still, Shell continues to pollute and flare gas with impunity in the Niger Delta, poisoning land and aggravating locals.

questions: Thereafter prices will stabilize and will remain stagnant until around 2014 allowing them to become more _____ before again prices begin to rise.
full_sentence: Thereafter prices will stabilize and will remain stagnant until around 2014 allowing them to become more affordable before again prices begin to rise.

questions: The company will also revamp 700 smaller stores, including _____ its pharmacy service.
full_sentence: The company will also revamp 700 smaller stores, including enhancing its pharmacy service.

questions: Demand for gold will also _____ as pension funds, sovereign funds and other asset managers seek to preserve their wealth against inflation.
full_sentence: Demand for gold will also rise as pension funds, sovereign funds and other asset managers seek to preserve their wealth against inflation.

questions: Many of those who fiercely _____ reduced immigration and much tighter public spending controls - not least on immigrants - have rallied to a cause.
full_sentence: Many of those who fiercely advocate reduced immigration and much tighter public spending controls - not least on immigrants - have rallied to a cause.

questions: Its Sugar division performed well but its Grocery division was _____ affected by high priced contracts in US corn oil.
full_sentence: Its Sugar division performed well but its Grocery division was adversely affected by high priced contracts in US corn oil.

questions: Barratt and Priceless were placed into administration last month after trading _____ rapidly amid the economic downturn.
full_sentence: Barratt and Priceless were placed into administration last month after trading deteriorated rapidly amid the economic downturn.

questions: While we were standing at a road side, an airplane flew over our heads with a deafening _____.
full_sentence: While we were standing at a road side, an airplane flew over our heads with a deafening roar.

questions: Hurry up, _____ you will miss the train.
full_sentence: Hurry up, or you will miss the train.

questions: _____ I go and bring you some coffee?
full_sentence: Shall I go and bring you some coffee?

questions: Mary wishes _____ buy a new apartment.
full_sentence: Mary wishes she could buy a new apartment.

questions: This small dog acts as if it were _____ with intestinal parasite.
full_sentence: This small dog acts as if it were afflicted with intestinal parasite.

questions: Moreover, they do not take into _____ losses associated with the various bailouts of the financial system.
full_sentence: Moreover, they do not take into account losses associated with the various bailouts of the financial system.

questions: The company has _____ a number of financial sector heavyweights to help it oversee a move into mainstream banking.

questions: A 62-year-old man was arrested on _____ of being aviation staff performing an aviation function after exceeding the prescribed alcohol limit.
full_sentence: A 62-year-old man was arrested on suspicion of being aviation staff performing an aviation function after exceeding the prescribed alcohol limit.

questions: Men have been affected more than women because they _____ the industries that have been hit hardest by the downturn.
full_sentence: Men have been affected more than women because they dominate the industries that have been hit hardest by the downturn.

questions: Shorter-term speculation is much riskier, as _____ by research from Fidelity Investments, the biggest unit trust manager in the world.
full_sentence: Shorter-term speculation is much riskier, as demonstrated by research from Fidelity Investments, the biggest unit trust manager in the world.

questions: Standard Life acknowledged that the watchdog was examining all aspects of the business to ensure policyholders' interests were being _____.

questions: Nearly 600 million euros of public money was spent last year _____ promoting bullfights, subsidizing local fiestas, and maintaining bullfighting schools.
full_sentence: Nearly 600 million euros of public money was spent last year on promoting bullfights, subsidizing local fiestas, and maintaining bullfighting schools.

questions: Often these are accompanied by incentives _____ welcome packs, free money boxes or magazines.
full_sentence: Often these are accompanied by incentives like welcome packs, free money boxes or magazines.

questions: Mr. Greenspan is _____ about the widespread, if not, global abuse of intellectual property rested in patents and copyrights.

questions: I hope the film does well and _____ its aim of increasing awareness of the effects of over-fishing.

questions: Many people are dependent upon sleeping pills, amphetamines and other means to _____ the illusion of contented life.

questions: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) _____ that each year roughly 48 million Americans get sick, 128,000 are hospitalized, and 3,000 die of foodborne diseases.
full_sentence: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) estimates that each year roughly 48 million Americans get sick, 128,000 are hospitalized, and 3,000 die of foodborne diseases.

questions: We have cocoa but we help them to produce good cocoa without _____ the natural environment and improving the productivity.
full_sentence: We have cocoa but we help them to produce good cocoa without destroying the natural environment and improving the productivity.

questions: While it's not exactly an app you can delete and reinstall, you can clear your old texts, which may be _____ up massive amounts of storage space on your phone.
full_sentence: While it's not exactly an app you can delete and reinstall, you can clear your old texts, which may be taking up massive amounts of storage space on your phone.

questions: Students in the bottom 25% of family income will surely pay less at wealthy private schools, where financial aid is _____, than at state universities.
full_sentence: Students in the bottom 25% of family income will surely pay less at wealthy private schools, where financial aid is substantial, than at state universities.

questions: I am very happy _____ to you that we have finally won the rights for the Maynard Park Project.
full_sentence: I am very happy to announce to you that we have finally won the rights for the Maynard Park Project.

questions: Costing an estimated $5.6 billion, the 1,600 km pipeline would _____ 8 trillion cubic meters over a 20 year period.

questions: To make this pressing deadline, we are asking all team members to focus all of their energy on getting this project completed _____ whatever work you currently have.
full_sentence: To make this pressing deadline, we are asking all team members to focus all of their energy on getting this project completed more than whatever work you currently have.

questions: _____ one of our valued customers, your satisfaction is one of our primary concerns. Please accept our apology.
full_sentence: As one of our valued customers, your satisfaction is one of our primary concerns. Please accept our apology.

questions: Among the most _____ of common metals, lead was valued and widely used in ancient times.
full_sentence: Among the most versatile of common metals, lead was valued and widely used in ancient times.

questions: Authorities have found that the addition of antibiotics to livestock fodder can make humans _____ to drugs.
